Review Body: all your driver's we very good, knowledgeable and friendly. however, ellie was exceptional. she established a rapport with my daughter and i in the very short time we were in the car with her. she was helpful, answered our questions about the island and even gave us a few suggestions on places she enjoyed eating. which in fact we did try freda's and it was good. thank you, ellie, for your service, customer service and helpfulness!

driver canceled the ride because he couldn’t find us and we were charged $5.  we were waiting for him but he didn’t show up.  when i tried contacting him, i went directly into voicemail but couldn’t leave a message.  had to order another ride and the second driver picked us up.

Review Title: Nasty behavior of Uber auto driver
Review Body: uber driver complained he does not know the route to destination. refused to talk to my friend who was trying to guide us. dropped me off 10 mins away from destination. demanded payment when it was already paid thro my amex. uber has not cared to respond to my complaints.

my drivers were great, on time, comfortable people, clean, enjoyed the ride. i would've given 5 stars if the price had been reasonable. a 2 mile 5 minute ride should not cost $27 one way and add a tip!! geez!! then to get home. a reasonable fee would be $12 one way! if it was within my budget would use uber more often.
attn corporate please reconsider pricing for seniors thank you

Review Title: My debit card was charged twice for a…
Review Body:
my debit card was charged twice for a pre schedule ride on february 15th. the original driver never made pickup. i was also charged a cancellation fee after i schedule another ride. the issue has not been resolved by uber. i am a very dissatisfied customer. i will never use uber again, i feel i am being scammed.
uber don't send me anymore emails.

Review Title: Great ride and friendly driver and great conversation
Review Body: the experience with my driver was on time and nice conversation and clean ride and felt safe some time and some time ride seem cold and hide you get out fast. i been a rider going 3 to 4 months and so fat no regrets getting to work and home.

i was picked up at the airport, and started talking to my driver rodolfo, who was very pleasant and easy going.
when i got dropped off, i forgot my bag in his vehicle, and i started panicking because i had my wallet and all my clothes in that bag. i called customer support and they put me in contact with rodolfo, who was already in route to another pick up. he was gracious enough to come back to my house and return my bag with all my belogings. thank you rodolfo and thank you uber for having the best employees.

as i live in rural queensland i have not used uber very much before but it turned out to be very easy. the driver was not far away and arrived in a spacious car that fitted us and our luggage. the drive to the airport was efficient and not having to fumble around for payment at the end was a bonus.

the ride to the concert was fine.  the ride home-- didn't happen.  driver no-showed and uber decided to send someone else.  uber was sending someone else, bu they never showed and charged us a $35.00 cancellation fee.  disputing that now.  we went with a better company for a ride home.

i’m old. well i’m 57. i’ve spent too much of life on hold to cab offices to be cut off by chardonnay who needed a cigarette after 15 minutes of love island, that she was watching rather than contacting drivers. i could have stuck with the miserable drivers telling me how bad the traffic was as they took me on a 7 detour to ramp the meter up. then demand a tip because the “heating bills have gone up innit.”
no. i’ve downloaded uber and never looked back. it’s brilliant

Review Title: I ordered an Uber XL which is supposed…
Review Body: i ordered an uber xl which is supposed to be able to accommodate 6 people. it was for 4 adults plus airline luggage. then a toyota prius arrived. after some shoehorning we were squeezed in. this was not an xl size vehicle. uber needs to send a strong message to drivers that this is not acceptable.
needed a round trip ride, 2 hours apart. first time using uber, and i-phone procedures were thorough and    detailed. drivers were friendly and courteous. will be using them again !

my first uber driver picked me up with all of my stuff i was moving he said it was to far and had me get it i had to cancel and get another uber and you guys still charged me for that driver not wanting to go that far
drivers are prompt. we experienced a few drops, but we were able to get another driver quickly.  the vehicles were always clean and the drivers are always friendly and courteous.

drivers are always friendly and courteous. quick and cost efficient way of getting to and from places.
you don't have to wait long as well as knowing the driver's name, make of car and license plate number.

Review Title: Uber drivers need ar have a age limit I…

your driver robert 77askx (sarasota florida 14/02/23 at 10:05) arrived at the meeting point but he didn't stop but he had anyway to pay for the ride, and i had to call another car , he didn't call to know if someone was there i saw him passing .... i am asking for a refund of the $15 paid by me

Review Title: I ordered food from a restaurant
Review Body: i ordered food from a restaurant. the driver called and said they had no ice cream, so i didn't get my shake. however i was charged for it. i filed a claim and uber replied i am not eligible for a refund. bad in the restaurant and bad on uber. decided to read reviews on uber. i have decided that i'm closing my account and will never use their service again under any circumstances.

Review Title: Booked a taxi on the app.
Review Body:
booked a taxi on the app.
got in the taxi with the driver shown on the app.
the next day i notice £5.41 came out my bank account it was a cancellantion fee.

the uber wasn't cancelled.

i want it put back into my bank account not added to my wallet as i won't use this company again. the driver came and there was no cancellation so you don't have a right to take my money.

on going problem....

i would avoid this scam.

nothing wrong with the drivers, but with company policies.
i use uber may be once in 4-5 years. last time it was in nyc, november -22. once..
they sneaked in "uber pass" and started taking $9.99 every month, i discovered it by accident. and you cannot talk to a real person to take the deal off and get $$ back. virtual assistant refer me to a technical support (also virtual). the "support" ask me to pay $1 refundable, but charge $46 on the card. damn! first, they stole my money, then charged me 150% to get it back!
anyways, watch out for that "pass," or, better yet - take a taxi.

uber allow the drivers to decide their journeys which means when in a busy city centre (london) longer journey don’t get taken as smaller shorter journey bring in more money. drivers should be fined and customers given credit for cancellation just like the customer is fined if they cancel a journey!

Review Title: Would rate zero as I had a very nasty…
Review Body: would rate zero as i had a very nasty experience with uber today morning i took a cab for my child's second day of school to drop him off it didn't even take me two mins i had to say morning n stuff to the teachers as i can't throw my child in school like that n come manage to come as quick as i can till then the driver was waiting as i booked returned home was well he drove far from where he dropped me i had to run to him n i was tired he shouted me as everyone was watching me saying i took he's the extra time he threatened me please 🙏 don't use this service they abuse my day was ruined i had to return with him as i paid doubled the fare price they r frauds they show u amount but will charge more n more i got threatening from also now i'm very much scared as he has saw my address and child i'm feeling very scared n he also sounded racist as he said that's y he don't wanna do my race n culture peoples job please don't use this uber rides for the sake of peace of mind this is how they make money

Review Title: Uber have stolen my money and held it…
Review Body:
uber have stolen my money and held it captive on my uber account which i’ll be deleting as soon as i use it…
tried to book an uber yesterday but it kept scrolling and scrolling.. got fed up waiting and cancelled it, not one driver had excepted the request..
order a bolt and it was excepted straight away and a wonderful friendly driver turned up and home i went..
on reaching home i noticed an email from uber stating a cancellation fee.. i went into the app to retrieve my money and without a question asked, they paid it back into my uber account and said i can use it next time… i hardly use taxis anymore and it could be months before i get to use my money again.. how can that be legal, to withhold someone’s money and keep it in their coffer’s… outrageous and i’ll just bolt all the time or any other taxi service and bolt was actually two quid cheaper than the boiler room that is uber.. use at your peril..

uber,

i would have agreed to the driver cancellation fee if the driver moved in my direction. my driver stayed parked.
the fee is collected for drivers that are en route to the destination, not drivers who stayed parked. technically and legally i was charged wrongly. technology can track drivers' movements and only charge if the driver in route.
i feel scammed.
i was forced to look for another ride because this one did not attempt to come.

in addition, when uber says "agree to this ride," i agreed to be picked up in 6 min as stated.
if the car is en route and takes longer than 6 min, even because of natural causes, then you are in default of our contract.
you​'​ re misleading customers with false time expectations.
this is false advertising. you are tricking them into agreeing to ride based on false data. false advertising is criminal.

it is also severely unethical to not have a customer support line when people are at riding with strangers you hire from the web.

i expect the fee to be refunded. please take care of this corrupt business practice appropriately and inform me of the steps you took to ensure the protection of other riders.

i feel like this story needs to be shared with the public. i will research lawsuits against uber's unfair business practices and join the mission and help others join.

uber. do better.

in addition to the criminal acts reported here, i feel there are more scandalous crimes within your company by c- bosses who benefit from underpaying, exploiting, embezzling, and using company resources for personal gain.

these pyramid business models are dying, and every c-boss will have to pay his spiritual debts.
they will not be allowed in the kingdoms of higher souls. they will not ascend. they will be left behind and not join the others around them are awakening and ascending.

they will remain on earth forced to learn painful lessons until their karma is finally balanced.

justice is always served.

g. lovette

Review Title: The service was very good, but ended up paying twice.
Review Body:
the service was very good. turned up as expected. knew exactly where to go.

only problem was i did not realise that the fare had automatically been paid from paypal, so paid the driver again from credit card with a good tip. only when i checked later i saw the payment of £21.47 on paypal. don’t think it was the driver’s fault as english not great, and traffic incident when he was dropping us off, and did not have time to fully discuss. i think he was surprised that i did not know i had paid.

charges cancellation fees when driver cancels
1st time i used uber about a decade ago in la, the driver never showed up at our hotel so we wasted 1/2 hour waiting and had to get alternative transportation. so i've used lyft ever since until the past year. uber has charged me a cancellation fee twice when the driver cancels - especially unpleasant after waiting in the cold for him to no-show. it's too bad lyft is the only competition and more expensive and bad uber drivers can drive for lyft as well.

Review Title: I have been charged an exorbitantly…
Review Body:
i have been charged an exorbitantly high cleaning fee.
i saw an additional charge for my uber ride taken on 20 th dec from princeton jct to jfk. my son who is 9 years old was traveling with me. its a long ride and due to traffic, it took even longer. sadly, towards the end of the trip, my son threw up ( mostly water). the driver was kind enough to hand over some kitchen towels, a grocery bag and also a bottle of water.
i promptly cleaned up the mess. there was no spills, stain on the seats. there was some water leakage from the grocery bag which was sitting on the all weather mat. the car had a camera to record passenger activity.
few days later, a charge appeared on my card. i reached out to customer service and was replied that it was because of the mess that happened in the car. i explained everything that i have mentioned above and then also asked for the video footage to check if i have missed anything. i owned up for the reason and agreed to pay some amount which i deam as sufficient to clean a all weather mat but i don't agree to pay $150.
to this date, i have not received any response nor the video. i don't appreciate this and feel cheated.

Review Title: Uber Driver Cancels Trip in Front of Me
Review Body: first uber driver drove to the port to pick us up.  i could see his vehicle, and then he cancelled the trip.  we had to wait another 15 minutes or so for the second uber driver to accept and actually pick us up.  fyi - 2d uber driver was great and the actual trip went very well.

i use uber quite often and have never had an issue before. early hours of sunday morning, i ordered an uber for me and my friends. it was a reasonable price and the trip went as it typically does. i was satisfied with that part and my driver was nice. however, they have charged me the original price for the ride but then i have £50 pending from my account that is unexplained on my receipt. i don’t believe it’s a cleaning fee as i don’t drink at all and the friends i was riding with were not inebriated. we all remember going home and not leaving a mess at all. i have gotten in contact with uber customer service via the app and gave received no response for over 18 hours. £50 is a lot of money to me and is making it as i work part time on minimum wage. it’s causing me a great deal of stress. i am willing to rectify this review if they respond soon and solve this but i am doubtful.
easy to reserve in advance, and find our driver, for a safe smooth ride home. great driver and beautiful clean car too.
first time on uber. timely. driver good.  my only problem is that i flew from florida to delaware for $52.00.  trip of 8 -9 miles to my house from the airport was 40 plus tip $10.00.

Review Title: Price for trip agreed at £7.50 for a…
Review Body: price for trip agreed at £7.50 for a journey home from manchester, which is 1.5 miles.  when the app was checked after we got home, the driver had charged us £23.80, however he had driven all over manchester city centre, and tried to take us to a place we did not know.  put in a complaint for being  robbed, uber as usual ignored the complaint and refused to refund the money.  the driver was rude and we felt at risk by his behaviour, makes you wonder what checks uber carries out on their drivers, they are thieves.

Review Title: Disappointing first attempt to use Uber
Review Body:
this is the first time that i decided to use uber as i generally go with lyft.

i booked the ride 3 days in advance in order to go to the airport.

exactly 1 minute before the uber arrival, uber cancelled the ride with no explanation or further remedy.

fortunately, i contacted lyft and the driver was there in 5 minutes.

the driver drove us to the airport efficiently, effortlessly and seamlessly.

the most important issue is that there was no possible way of contacting uber except in the uber app that erased the potential trip entirely.

none of the options were doable due to the erased trip.

any company that gets so big that forgets how they got there is in on a
speedy road towards its demise.

uber will probably never see this however millions of people will.

lyft’s core values speak volumes.

“uplift others: take care of each other — no matter which seat you're sitting in. make it happen: own the work. focus on impact. reimagine what's possible.”

choose lyft!

thank you.

Review Body: uber allows drivers to be biased towards riders even if they are respectful and tip well. they did nothing about the driver that wrongfully gave me a bad review. every other driver has been fair and i've tipped them well. unfortunately because of that one, my score dropped and that has made things difficult for my daily commute to work. if you allow drivers to downvote riders without a reason provided, something is very wrong with you. i'm disgusted. being quiet shouldn't earn someone a 1 star, especially if they are polite, still speak, and aren't rude to the drivers. i tipped ten dollars for a short trip and i get a slap in the face in return.

Review Title: Uber rideshare: Yay! Uber Eats? Boo, hiss!
Review Body:
uber's rideshare program is a lifesaver for people like me, who don't own cars. most of the time, i rely on public transportation for trips longer than 10 miles and on my bicycle for trips shorter than that. but sometimes i need to get somewhere fast or avoid bad weather--and in those times, uber always comes through with a ride for a decent price.

so why not give them five stars? because of uber eats. that wing of the company pulled a (highly illegal) bait and switch, then refused to make it right. (and they still have the nerve to send me emails!) so drivers can get five stars from me, but uber itself never will, because of my experience with uber eats.

i was an uber driver. i was having a productive day until a rider said that they felt i was under the influence.  i of course was not, meaning it was a flat lie.  uber chose to believe the lie and blocked my account. the result of uber choosing to believe the lie was that i was not able to go out and uber to make money.  this is insulting.  anyone  can make false accusations, making it so the driver can't make a living and uber could careless.  this is based on their actions.  i have called and responded to in app messages.  their response was that they will take my story and try to improve for the future.  uber, in this situation did not lose any money, and did not take any responsibility in believing a liar. uber instead let me lose money with no remorse.  there of course was no repercussions for the rider who made up the lie.

Review Title: This was my very 1st experience with Uber
Review Body:
this was my very 1st experience with uber.
1. your app makes you leave a tip as soon as you get in the car. who ever leaves a tip prior to any service ?

2. the driver sat in her car upon her arrival & i was standing about 20 feet in front of her car, in full daylight. i was texting her & she did not respond that she was right in front of me. there are 80 apartments in my complex. she could have been anyone's visitor. i finally walked over to her car to ask if it was her & she was my ride. then, after the ride, she charged me - for the time i was right there in front of her!
3. the return person was (live) face timing with someone as he drove, on his cell phone, mounted to his dash. i had no idea this is allowed!

my continuous poor experience with uber has now meant that my complaint has been completely fobbed off and i can only warn others of the pita experience i have had. i have been taken advantage of by this organisation and feel i won't be heard now. i am making this review for 2 reasons.

1. i feel a victim of a crime: what uber has done should be illegal in my eyes and would like to ask anyone if i can report them to anyone. basically been mugged.

2. i won't be using uber again and plead with others to do the same.

on the early hours of the 31st of december i had booked an uber. it was very busy with both people looking for taxis (customers) and taxis.

i booked an uber and waited a while before i was accepted a ride. it then said that the ride had been cancelled.

i booked a second ride and went towards where the car was. for all i know this may have been the first driver. when i saw the car and checked the number plate i said my name and he said no and put the window up. thanks sayyid!

it's very clear that these drivers were not wanting to miss out out on money and go 12 miles out to drop us off for such a low competitive fee. which is fine but i should not have been charged £11.50 for this. they took advantage, took the £5.75 each and picked others up - they were not at an inconvenience.

to further illustrate how horrid this company is, there were other uber drivers offering lifts cash in hand outside too which of course are uninsured lifts.

to add to this, i've not heard one word back from uber despite complaining hours after and providing a number and email address. i'm glad this has happened in a way because i now know that uber are not a legitimately ran company and have 0 ethics when it comes to treating their customers.

absolute s**t heads.

by and large, my experience with uber and its drivers has been great. they serve a need, especially to someone like myself, who is a professional truck driver. when our truck is in the shop or we just want to go somewhere that doesn't allow our trucks, uber has been there. most recently, i put my truck in the shop for repairs in albuquerque, nm. i needed a ride from the shop to the hotel. $12.00 and 15 minutes later, i was picked up and taken to the hotel. pleasant conversation, comfortable ride, and no hassles. 2 days later, i needed to return to the shop to pick up my truck. same experience.

Review Title: Uber Unfair Practices and Cancellation of Rides
Review Body:
uber, these days it has become so difficult to get a cab/booking on your app wherein your allocated drivers (who are next to impossible) always ask to pay in cash whereas you've already chosen to pay online. yesterday was one of that day's. i tried to book a cab from ndls railway station and i had the worst experience ever with your service(s):

1) 3 cab driver's cancelled it after accepting the ride, saying that if you'll pay in cash then only we will come to pick you up or cancel by yourself
2) another driver who accepted the ride and came, was asking for toll charges (additionally) which he paid for routing from inside the ndls railway station.
3) 2 another cab driver's denied the ride after accepting the same saying that cancel it through uber and we will take you personally at the same price in cash.

total accepted bookings: 6, ride: none

under the section 178 in the motor vehicles act, 1988 all these acts are punishable and subject to penalty.

and this was not it, usually if i book uber in my day to day journey, then the fare shown at the time of booking and the fare deducted from my wallet/card always vary (on the higher side). why?
(fyi: these are termed as "unfair trade practices")

uber freight

Review Title: My uber driver text me and waited till…
Review Body: my uber driver text me and waited till i found the pick up area where he was waiting. great customer service.

very convenient. uber on time, cars clean, excellent drivers and no stress at all.

our uber driver in colorado springs has his big service dog with him and stayed in his lap while he his driving. i didn’t feel safe at all and how i’d wish he stated in the ride confirmation why he has a service dog with him and i’ll understand more. but he took us to the airport safely even though it was snowing.
i appreciated rides arrived reliably and timely.  the added safety features of knowing the drivers’ names and the car models were reassuring.

Review Title: We had two really nice drivers
Review Body: we had two really nice drivers, the cars were clean and comfortable. we didn't have to wait long to be picked up, we were very happy with the service received.
friendly, respectful caring drivers, easy to schedule, clean vehicle and safe delivery.

Review Title: Everytime i book a drive the drivers…
Review Body: everytime i book a drive the drivers ask rs.100 more. no control. useless service. for our urgency we are going. but i don't know whether uber accepts this. if they don't accept please call me in 7667690910. if you accept such dirty behaviour please don't call

i had a great experience.  the driver arrived at my starting point early and we had a smooth ride to the airport in the morning.  the driver was knowledgeable about the airport and very careful to make sure that i will be dropped off at the right place.

Review Title: The driver cancelled the initial ride…
Review Body: the driver cancelled the initial ride because he was at the wrong location. even after communicating with him via chat advising him that he was at the wrong location, he still cancelled the trip. since i had to get to an appointment, i requested an uber ride and he accepted it. on this ride, he appeared at the right location. the initial trip he cancelled was less and uber charged me a penalty because of the driver's error. supposedly, it is now a credit versus a refund, adding insult to injury. uber assumes i desire to utilize its services. i am greatly disappointed in uber.

the driver was excellent. he was on-time, and a really good driver; a professional behind the wheel who stayed within the speed limits and didn’t engage in aggressive driving behavior even though encountering several stupid drivers along the way. i hope to have him drive me again.

have used uber a few times now and in different countries. up until then was always a fan of a particular cab company. since the pandemic though it's proven difficult to get a cab from anything other than uber.
there's always been a driver available so far and not having to deal with cash a bonus.
can't fault it

Review Body: two drivers cancelled after i waited for 15 minutes.  the driver i got was great but i am not sure why the others cancelled after accepting the job

Review Title: Great Drivers, Price Fluctuates Too Much
Review Body: well so far i've had a great experience with the drivers! all of them have been so nice, the only thing i don't like is how much the price fluctuates! like for instance, today i got a ride to the store which is about 11 blocks from me, so very close, just down the street, it cost $7 to get there and then 45 minutes later when i needed to get home it was almost $13, & that's a huge difference! the other day to get home for my boyfriend's it cost 14 and now i'm about ready to get another uber to go there and now i'm worried cuz i have no idea how much it's going to cost now and that's just really frustrating never knowing how much your ride is going to be.

Review Title: This is yelling to the sky!
Review Body: i will never ever oreder an uber again even if i would need a race with them for my life because this guys are just reserving their right to do whatever they want with your money and your account! honestly what happends these days? i ordered a cab with £12.95, at the end of the trip they are refunded me £12.95 and take £15.38 from my account! the next day i order a cab with £20.99 and they refunded me £20.99 and took £24.29!??!?!?!! how is that even possible? how they can dare to do what they want with my money? i chose to pay a ride with 20 and at then end of the ride they just take more and god knows why because it wasn't even heavy traffic! and all this afrer their drivers ar....god they make me feel sick honestly.

Review Body: drivers were all very nice my only oet peeve was new years eve the driver left us after cancelling my ride. we were held up in the bar paying our bill, the driver was litterally in the parking lot, i talked to him but less than 5  minutes after the app said he arrived  he cancelled our ride. he then said 2 more cars were on there way but only one showed  up.  just think there should be some leaway on a night like new years eve. otherwise, experience to the venue was exceptional, other driver that picked us up was exceptional and overall experience  was really good. i want to also add that every other time i have used uber has been exceptional, drivers friendly, cars clean and arrived safely to my destination. so although i rated dec 31 2 am as a 3 my overall rating would be a 5.

Review Title: I've had a extremely bad experience…
Review Body: i've had a extremely bad experience with uber this evening. i was waiting outside for a driver to turn up, he text me whilst i was outside, telling me he was there. he absolutely wasn't, i then called him and he put me on hold, still maintaining he was outside. then i received a text that my lift had been cancelled, i phoned uber and i was told i wasn't outside, so i'd still be charged. i've used uber and uber eats for quite a considerable amount of time. once my refund, which i had to argue for, turns up i will be cancelling my uber accounts and i will tell everyone i know to cancel their's!

Review Title: 5 Stars to Autumn, app was confusing
Review Body:
5 stars to autumn, our fantastic driver. he was friendly and conscientious and turned out to be our neighbor! way less stars to the app. i hadn't used it in quite a while, and it was very confusing. it was trying to tell me to go to a different pickup spot. i'm not sure why, but also, i couldn't tell on the map which spot indicated where i was and where it was trying to tell me to go.

thankfully, autumn found us and got us home!
nice driver, good ride

Review Title: Uber Pet - no different to the standard service and more expensive
Review Body: i was pleased when uber introduced uber pet as i thought it would be a good way to safely take my cat to the vet - some drivers complain at having an animal in the car even if i tell them in advance. however, i  have now used it several times and twice i have been really unimpressed. the first time the driver wanted to put my cat in the boot and when i refused he tried to insist and only relented when i went to leave the cab. the second time was even worse - the driver didn't wait for me to strap in my cat's carrier, let alone strap in myself, he refused to turn off the radio when i requested it (my cat gets distressed by loud noise), agreeing only to turn it down (and in a manner that suggested i should be grateful) and his driving was incredibly fast and jerky. on both occasions the drivers looked dismayed when i opened the door with a cat carrier - i had ordered an uber pet and they were picking me up from the vet. on top of this, an uber pet is £3 more expensive than a standard service even though there is no discernible difference. i have tried to pass on my feedback to uber but - surprise, surprise - there is no way to contact them so i am posting my review here instead.
fast service. friendly driver
prompt response of the driver  and his courtesy. friendly and warm engagement

i ordered my ride from baggage claim at seatac airport and then had a little trouble finding the pick-up point. my driver very kindly called to direct me and then waited while i got through the holiday crowds to get to the right place. very helpful, loading my bag in and out, too.

Review Title: Uber put my family in danger
Review Body:
i reserved an uber on friday, december 30 to pick us up at 3:30 at ski santa fe in santa fe, new mexico.

i was getting messages that said driver was 45 minutes away and then all of a sudden ride was cancelled.

we were stuck at ski santa fe in freezing temperatures for over an hour as all the buses had already left. we had to beg an employee to give us a ride back to our hotel.

uber put my family in danger and for that reason i will never use their services again.

Review Title: The driver was so friendly and warm
Review Body: the driver was so friendly and warm. we had a great conversation.

Review Title: Most recent was with Ashley and he was…
Review Body: most recent was with ashley and he was very nice and excellent driver and very professional

i feel like the drivers are serious about safety, and are personable.

Review Title: Driver gets paid to cancel trip
Review Body: i shared my location but the driver stopped two streets away. he cancelled the trip because he, "waited 5 minutes or more." i was then charged a cancellation fee.
once i was able to load the app i was able to easily schedule my ride.  ride arrived on time, even a few minutes early, communications were clear and timely.  pleasant, courteous driver.

Review Title: Most of the time driver update the…
Review Body: most of the time driver update the price  after reaching the destination.

Review Title: I had two rides in one day
Review Body:
i had two rides in one day. both drivers were excellent drivers and assisted me walking to the car ( snow streets)). i made a reservation 2 hours in advance for my first ride. i called fir my second ride and the driver was there within minutes. my complaint concerns the fare. i was charged over $43.00 and the later price breakdown included fees for reserving the ride and some otheradmin fee. this charge was 3x the cost of the return trip. i was not informed in advance of a charge for reserving-calling in advance.
i dont use uber often but don't like a system thst doesn’t allow communication in real time.

Review Title: Courtesy, Punctuality, choice of vehicle, ease of booking
Review Body: pleasant and courteous driver, clean car, good driving behavior.  brief waiting time.

great first experience. driver was very helpful, friendly and personable.
also had our two young teenage grandchildren with us and it being their first experience with uber. good experience for them as future uber customers.

Review Title: Could NOT get any response from UBER…
Review Body: could not get any response from uber support after leaving my car key in one of their uber cars. tried for over 24 hours to reach them and the driver. the driver never responded either... very poor customer service and cost me $390 to get a new key, plus had to rent a van as couldn't use my own vehicle. very costly mistake and so i'm very unhappy with uber right now !!
driver great.  uber scamming prices on uber cash that became nonexistent

it’s new years eve so it seems it’s time and a half.  i catch an uber and just before my destination there is barrier so driver would have to go around it.  instead of doing that the driver says just walk. i say it’s raining and he says you have an umbrella!  he then wishes me happy new year. disgusting service.  i ended up walking

Review Title: Had our kids in town and needed to take…
Review Body: had our kids in town and needed to take 2 car’s downtown to dinner. instead we took an uber xl which worked perfectly. we took separate ubers home since everyone went their own way. it couldn’t have worked out better. super easy, great drivers both ways and reasonably priced.

on time.
very pleasant driver.

Review Title: Good prices. Cheaper than Lyft or a cab.
Review Body: sometimes the drivers will talk and joke around with you. other times they don't speak at all. either way though, they are professional and get you where you need to go as efficiently as possible.
fast, efficient, friendly and courteous drivers!!!!

Review Title: Trying to lug home 20+ hardbacks from…
Review Body: trying to lug home 20+ hardbacks from library, very frustrating. called uber and driver came to my rescue so quick. you may think that's funny but if you're a 60 year old woman trying to get to the bus and to the library back to the bus and then to her home with the 20 plus books you'd be as happy as i was. thank you for making my day so much easier.
the driver was prompt, courteous, professional and knowledgeable about how best to deal w/the congestion entering and exiting the airport.
our driver was very courteous and helpful.   he picked us up on time and quickly delivered us to our intended destination.
driver was polite & helpful. my husband has mobility issues & takes a little time to get in & out of vehicles. at no stage did the driver show any impatience.

i arrived at my pickup location and ordered my uber from there. it took about 5 mins for the car to arrive. i saw the car arrive and park about 10 meters from me (it was a parking lot). it took me less than 15 seconds to reach it. the driver could have parked closer but it was fine for me as the car was only about 10 paces away. however, i was charged for waiting time!

in my town waiting time can only be charged after the driver has waited one minute. in this case i was already there and the driver did not have to wait at all.

uber so called customer service chose not to believe me, saying that i had made a claim for false waiting time in the past. true. it has happened before. that doesn’t mean to say it didn’t happen again! i think some drivers just try to earn a few more cents by scamming customers in this way. please watch out for this.
uber has just lost a customer. there are better alternatives to uber these days.

Review Title: I love Uber on my soul you guys are…
Review Body: i love uber on my soul you guys are fast when it comes to picking me up for work all the drivers makes me feel comfortable

the fabulous driver went to extra lengths to assist me with my shopping as i have a broken arm. he was delightful, courteous and polite. a rare thing these days, especially for a short trip with groceries.

Review Title: The driver arrived quick in about 7…
Review Body: the driver arrived quick in about 7 min. he was kind, courteous, and patient with me. i gave him 25% tip.
friendly drivers to auckland airport and from christchurch airports. both arrived on time, easy to communicate with and very helpful.
driver was professional friendly and a good driver
excellent driver!!! he was sociable and nice. knew his way around town and drove very safe.

i live in rio rancho, new mexico, my driver damian was super friendly and professional my entire trip and he drove an exceptionally clean and comfortable luxury car! i left my blue hp laptop behind on my trip back home, damian was kind enough to drop it off to me personally after work that same day and he didn't charge me the $15 fee associated with retrieval of a lost item! i left him a $9.00 tip but getting my computer back was worth so much more!

Review Title: Always there when I need you
Review Body: always there when i need you! great communication with the texting capability, as we (driver and i) changed pick up place slightly.  easy to use!

Review Title: Never trust Uber, never book a service with them
Review Body: i ordered groceries from asda using uber eats app. unfortunately my order has been taken by a romanian guy , which cancelled my order, lying that he didn’t find me because i don’t had the house number in the app. after this cancelled, uber charged me the order which is not correct to steel my money. is very well known that romanian drivers are pretending things like this to keep clients order and uber encourge and tolerate things like this. i’ve spoken with them in app but there seems to be a cheaos in a chat, they answered after many hours, speaking with different agents for my issue. they didn’t want to investigate what happened. in fact after i’ve received via the app the message “the driver will be there in 1 min” , i went outside waiting for him. i waited few minutes and no one showed . when i got worried i used the app to get in touch with the driver , but this process was very hard. when finnaly i succeed to call the driver he was engaged in another call and didn’t want to answer me even if i called him few times. after long time he answered me and told me that he cancelled my order, motivate that is too late to deliver the order to me. i wrote in app about what happened and they found this is my fault , saying to me that the driver been waiting 8 min. i wonder about me waiting the order outside more then 8 min and tried to get in touch with the driver why doesn’t matter for them? i been  double robbed by uber and their romanian driver. very bad experience, never i’ll order a ride or food with them. don’t trust uber!!!

awful experience with the driver named abdul rauf in sydney, rude guy, he complained about everything, that we have to turn the lights of while he was the one that put it on.  i would never recommend him, no clue how he got 4.87 stars at the uber app. he probably wrote good reviews about himself.
the driver was on time courteous,and the car was clean.

booked at 9:04 for a doctors appointment. driver 13 mins away.
i cancelled it at 9:30, the time of the appointment, while the driver was still 12km away.
doctors appointments are hard enough to get, missing one because of this is a real pita.
terrible experience. drivers are unsafe, argumentative, rude and reckless am son on. their vehicles are dirty and they are horrible. this are mine last two experiences

over all i had a good experience. for some reason the driver parked on the corner instead of coming to my house, which caused some confusion, but no big deal. it was a pleasant ride in a clean, warm car.

quick pick up
courteous driver
clean vehicle

Review Title: Some very Crap uber taxi drivers
Review Body: some of the uber taxi drivers deserve a 5 🌟 rating but as for the rest if them no star! why are you employing stupid & cluess people who are nasty and rude to passengers. taxis as a whole some drivers really shouldn't be allowed a licence especially wen it concerns the public. these type of people should work in an office on a computer or on a farm with crops that don't involve people or animals because they really don't work well with either when they carry that crap attitude around it isn't good for the customers its a bad case of a rubbish vibe on others . there also should be an easy way to contact customer service direct because the app dont seem to provide that ! and the drivers don't even know and yet they work for the company.

Review Title: Charged a waiting fee when driver was in the wrong place.
Review Body: booked a return uber 16 december  from ponsonby road. the driver did not stop at correct address (i was waiting outside. after a couple of minutes decided go see if he was parked somewhere else along the road. the driver made no attempt to call me and when i said he  should have said where he was he just replied 'yeah'  i was then charged a waiting fee of $1.95. reported this to customer support who told me not to book a ride until i was ready. absolutely incensed when the refused to refund this charge. definitely will be moving away from uber.
the driver was kind however, he didn’t new the exact place of the destination.

drivers are normally very good.
lately it's been getting hard to get hold of drivers and have given up a number of times.
are there a shortage?
excellent, quick safe journey with friendly driver

Review Title: Multiple charges and Not much went right
Review Body: not much went right. booked a driver, a minute before arrival, uber cancelled, without reason or explanation! fully charged us for their mistake! booked two more. charged us for six journeys, when only two made. ( dukes hotel to clifton gardens , about 12.30 pm). so far no apology for the cancellation or the multiple charges , or compensation for wasted time and distress to the family!

booked a cab, gave correct destination postcode, driver found it without issue, then receive message from uber “ stealing” another £15 claiming destination wasn’t where they expected ( words to that effect) - taken me 45 minutes on phone arguing to get the money refunded.
not impressed- i agreed a price and they stole another £15! a refund has been agreed but will take 3-5 days to come back despite taking seconds to recieve when they helped themselves from my account!
disgusting behaviour

my driver in liverpool joanne carol was friendly and great company, i had a wonderful time talking with her. the journey was smooth with no issues and i think she represents your company in a way you should be proud of.
thank you joanne, and thank you uber.

placed an order on the mcdonalds app which is uber delivery, noticed as order was placed i hadn't changed to correct adress so contacted mcdonalds and they told me to contact uber. uber had told me to contact driver and ask to deliver to correct adress, if he doesn't ring back and they will deal with it, driver refused. he then banged on the door of the adress and argued with them and dumped it on the door step. uber are now saying they will not issue a refund as the order was delivered.

Review Title: Ordered an Uber for a friend
Review Body: ordered an uber for a friend, driver refused to take her ( she was quite drunk and looked like she was going to throw up any minute) which was fine, i understood this, we changed our plan and decided she could stay at mine. bearing in mind the uber man had said i’m going to cancel it don’t worry you won’t be charged.. well i was charged! for a taxi that i hadn’t cancelled! and never got. uber are over priced, some of the drivers are so rude. greedy company with over priced cars. i’ve deleted the app and will never use them again, including for takeaway.

Review Title: Grateful for your service in poor weather
Review Body: during the recent storm, we used the ride service. despite horrible driving conditions, the drivers were very careful and courteous. we are very grateful the drivers were out and about.

everything is great driver service and the app very fast and simple

Review Title: Never use Uber APP and customer service are NOT…
Review Body: uber app and customer service are not reliable and untrustworthy. waste of time and money. the driver cancelled my trip and uber charged me a cancellation fee. the app does not take instruction as to what your pick up location you put up, instead it asks you to come to the end of the road. the customer service spent a lot of time to check your account profile for just to tell you that they cannot resolve the issues and to tell you that you have to book a new ride again on the unreliable app. i was kept on stress to a boiling point by the uber.

Review Title: Uber is showing payment due because I paid by cash
Review Body: initially i choose the non cash payment method..but driver requested me to give him cash because he needed the money..so i paid by cash..but now uber is asking to pay extra money because i paid to driver.. this is the worst experience...why i should pay extra amount?this is the way to treat customer?

Review Title: Driver cancelled the ride and I was charged
Review Body:
tried using the uber app but it was a miserable failure.

firstly the app didn’t show my own location on the map - my phone’s location services was switched on.

i selected the pick up location and a driver. he started to come towards me then stopped and wanted me to walk towards him!! no, that’s not how it should work - he has to come to me. then he cancelled the ride. i ended up getting a normal taxi. i noticed the next day that i had been charged a fee of £5.10 for cancelling the ride!! actually it was the driver who cancelled it.

i will delete the uber app.

Review Title: The car is clean and the driver is very…
Review Body: the car is clean and the driver is very nice. i will use theuber again. thank you!

i use to like uber about a year ago. the problem is they have become so unreliable that i just can't depend on them anymore. i now use lyft because they get me to my destination on time.  i live within 2 miles of my place of employment. i don't care how much time i set an uber trip they are always late now. when i set up a trip 45 minutes ahead of time, it might say that the driver will arrive in 15 minutes. by the time it gets down to 4 minutes, they switch drivers making the arrival time almost 20 more minutes making me either late for work or almost. this is ridiculous and it happens more frequently than not. i don't know what uber has done to their business in the last year but it's not working.
wonderful experience. friendly driver.

sorry to say this was a sorryful experience,website consists of two many words,and confuses people,tried to book a ride to airport next week,a driver was coming straight away,tried to take my money,he rang me,to say you have 3mins to cancel,or you loose your money.arrogant man coundnt talk properly to a customer
needs someone with it experience to sort this shambles out,trouble paying fare,no email receipt.
really nice and friendly driver! he was very reliable and punctual. mahalo!

Review Title: Had to wait at train station for 10…
Review Body: had to wait at train station for 10 minutes. driver then cancelled on me. another driver was going to be another 15 minutes wait. so i got a taxi instead

terrible service, used to be reliable when uber first launched, now it’s just gone downhill with uber drivers cancelling trips they don’t want to do. go back to normal taxis - don’t support this company.

i like the app overall. however, december, booked a ride for the next morning due to winter storm. received notification that drivera received the booking and will pick me up at the requested time. driverb shows up at the requested time. says he just picked up the request 13 mins ago. i told him about the driver confirmation and he acted like he didn't even know about it. received the receipt: trip fare- $37; reservation fee-$26; booking fee-$5; plus plus plus; total-$80. if i knew that these fees were applicable to advanced booking, i would have booked regularly. i thought the fare price was due to the potential morning traffic, but no, because i used the booking service. won't be doing that again.

Review Title: The driver Mahmoud was on time
Review Body: the driver mahmoud was on time, helped us with our luggage ( we had quite a few pieces) . he is friendly and very courteous.

Review Title: I recently booked an Uber and…was charged twice
Review Body: i recently booked an uber and accidentally put in the address of were i wanted picking up instead of my home address, when the driver arrived at ne he said what i’d done so i needed to cancel the uber and re book but instead the driver (who didn’t understand the app either) completed the trip instead of cancel so i rebooked with my address and was charged twice for the trips. j have sent a message through the app and heard nothing back which is disappointing.

Review Title: Uber taxi got lost then refused to take me
Review Body: ordered an uber, driver went to a different pick up location and messaged to say he’d arrived. messaged back to confirm where he was and walked to him. i was completely on my own at 1am and he cancelled the trip as i got to him and refused to take me. but i was charged anyway!!!!! time to go back to local reliable taxi firms. i have no faith in uber anymore

Review Title: Avoid...This was the first time ive used uber…
Review Body: this was the first time ive used uber and will certainly be my last time too.  i booked a trip waited a few mins or so and was accepted by a driver showing all the appropriate details.  excellent i thought and what a great service.  the counter was showing 15 mins which i thought was reasonable but then it all turned rather crap.  i had 5 mins left for the driver to arrive and the booking disappeared and i was then taken back to the searching screen for 30 mins then gave up and uninstalled the app. as catherine tate says...what a load of old ****

i take 20 plus ubers a week. i will no longer be using their service...for their fees i can hire an independent who is customer service oriented and is honest about finding expensive coats.

i have heavy suitcases and a husband that isn’t able to help. only a couple of uber drivers in various parts of australia has offered to help load and unload. no customer service.
and stop asking for ratings. it would be more accurate ratings if there was a possibility to write a small review in the app.

easy , fun , safe.

Review Title: Paid for food I never got, did not get a refund
Review Body: driver delivered to the wrong address, and we couldn’t get a refund or any credit because the order is the customer’s sole responsibility after its been delivered. even if it was delivered to the wrong address. i didn’t get a photo of the order being dropped off but the customer service said they did. i said if they could show me and they said they can’t. the guy described it to me because he said the driver delivered it to my address for sure. after describing the photo, i could tell it wasn’t our house at all. i said if i prove that it wasn’t our house can i get a refund or anything but they just sent me the automated message of sorry nope. so i paid money for something i didn’t get just because someone else made a mistake. customer service wasn’t helpful either.

Review Title: Impressed by the maturity of this platform
Review Body: this app has really improved a lot over the years. i wouldn't necessarily call it a good bargain (what chauffer experience is) but the app experience is so smooth and adaptable. drivers are responsible and held accountable by the system. over all, little to no complaints. you can even send friends safely home from your own phone, and track their progress.

Review Title: Uber Feature Needed Showing Active Drivers In Area
Review Body: i live in a small town located in a rural county. being new to the area, i was unsure if there were any uber drivers near my area. the app automatically attempts to book a ride by sending out a request. if the request is not picked up by a driver, the rider is auto-prompted to try again in few minutes with the message like, "all our drivers are out with other riders." however, in my case, it seems that there are no drivers that work in my area. i spent 4 hours trying to get a ride and just happened to get lucky when an uber driver from out-of-town was passing through and took my request. *** the uber app needs a feature showing how many active drivers are available in a specified area. ***

Review Title: Every time I  book an Uber I’m let down
Review Body:
every time i try and book an uber (usually busy periods ) it lets me down . too many ways for drivers/ system to accept jobs then let you down/ not turn up/ cancel after waiting forever.

the system needs changing so that drivers can be relied upon.

useless company - taxi drivers regularly break the speed limit and cancel jobs after keeping customers waiting.

if we cancel we get a £4.00 fee, drivers get to accept a passenger's drop only to get a better offer and no £4.00 compensation for us.

the app also super drains battery and its the only taxi company i know that charges passengers more for their own ineptitude at ensuring there is enough drivers on the road. my local taxi company is often cheap and quicker and always safer.
it’s dangerous due to low driver pay and ride quantity based incentives that incentivize sleepy and crazy driving!

on dec 10, we waited for our driver to pick me up to take me to the atlanta airport. the driver was going to be over 30 minutes late and was still stuck in traffic per the location app. the driver did not respond to our questions about how late he/she thought they’d be. time being of the essence for the flight we had no choice but to cancel the booking and re-book with a different driver that was already in close proximity to our home. he arrived quickly, but kept the heat on in the car. i had to roll down the windows to keep from sweating. the music he played too loud, which was very annoying. then to cap it off, uber charged me a cancellation fee of $29 even though their driver was going to be at least 30 minutes late. sadly you can’t call and speak with anyone at uber. you’re forced to use text messaging via their app. since my wife booked it for me, and i was already in flight, she had to deal with getting the cancellation charges reversed. she was told i would not be charged and to wait 3 -5 days for the credit. i waited a week and still no credit on my visa card. hence i was forced to file a dispute with my credit card company for ubers unscrupulous billing procedures. and you have little hope of resolving it amicably because you can’t speak to their reps. when i explained this to the visa rep, they said they are well aware and that this happens all the time. in good faith i can longer recommend using uber. it’s a bad company in my mind. time to start using lyft.
anthony from atlanta

i’m a driver of uber. yesterday, after picked up 1st order, uber requested me to take the 2nd order with 0 km $6. but in fact, i had to run 3 km to deliver the 2nd order for customer. i called uber support to inform the problem from their app, but finally no one responded me. they transferred my call to 5 person, and i had to repeat my issue 5 times as well as i had to wait for more than 15 minutes for each time they were transferring the call. and the last call i were waiting for more than 20 minutes, but no one answered me. i cannot believe that uber’s employees are not professional like that. they don’t care drivers issue. it was so bad.

this was my first experience using uber and i was extremely impressed with the service and the driver. the car was clean, smelled good and he was a very good driver. i enjoyed talking with him, and he drove me not just to my terminal, but to the gate i was departing from at the airport. i was also impressed with the fact that i received a photo of the driver, the car and the card license, which made me feel very secure getting into the car..

unable to transfer account from canada to texas was advised to delete account and can be reactivated for seven years or create a new one with different email. if they can't even set up a website properly, change account settings,or assist new drivers i have zero faith they will take care of customers.ill be sticking with favor

Review Title: Accused of urinating in a taxi which…
Review Body: accused of urinating in a taxi which did not happen and charged an £80 fee. no proof but a photo of a seat? how do we no thats the taxi drivers car,? absolutely disgusting.

cars are always available, short wait time, app is simply fantastic and easy to use. drivers have all been outstanding, helpful, polite. i will recommend uber to my friends and family without hesitation.

works exactly as promised with updates and progress on trip through app messages. clear info on driver, car and registration number. trip price given at time of booking pending chosen vehicle size. can’t be easier and more straight forward than this.

ordered a taxi. taxi confirmed and “on the way”. with one minute to go i get a call “where are you going?” obviously the driver already knew that. when i confirmed where i was going, i was cut off and immediately blocked. shocking. needless to say the taxi didn’t turn up and i was left in the street, on crutches, where i had struggled to get to so that the taxi wouldn’t have to wait for me. never again uber.
driver was very friendly

Review Title: Friendliness All but one driver was friendly and…
Review Body: all but one driver was friendly and talkative. all but one had clean cars. that is a 90% rating and i’m very satisfied with it. uber out preformed lyft by a mile.

the entire process is so simple and efficient. the drivers are professional, knowledgeable and the cars are clean.the app is so helpful for someone who travels lots and doesn’t want the hassle of navigating in unfamiliar cities, not to mention the low costs that are available. love it and will use anytime i need a ride.
as a first time user i think it really expensive also gas price is down why a service charge and the extra fuel charge also i pay wait time fee and the driver did not have to wait.

my driver was wonderful. unfortunately, i lost the contents in my purse during the trip. my purse must’ve been opened without me realizing. i contacted the driver and he told me that he had my belongings. he dropped it off to my house and everything was there. great service and i appreciate his honesty.

Review Title: Friendly driver with a clean car that…
Review Body: friendly driver with a clean car that was on time

my uber driver missed the exit on the a316 outside london. he didn’t listen to me when i instructed him to take the next exit, as a result we ended up several miles from my house. i was quite scared. he was so rude and non apologetic. i said i’m not paying for this to which he said you won’t have to. however when i eventually got home they had debited £72.34 for the journey, the original price was £22!! despite my appeal they won’t refund the money, they will only credit my uber account. i don’t want credit as i don’t want to use them again ever and i need my hard earned cash, not credit. this is not the first shocking experience i have had with this appalling company.

Review Title: Easy & worry free for those times you…

Review Title: The last trip from 2918 East Euclid…
Review Body: the last trip from 2918 east euclid place to dia airport - your driver was super friendly and a great communicator, i usually don't chit chat but your driver made it very easy to chat. the car was clean, he drove very well  and again very friendly.

Review Title: The drivers are professional and great
Review Body: the drivers are professional and great. now the prices are ridiculous. i take an uber to and from work everyday and lately they have been jacking up the prices because of the weather and because of high demand. now this company basically put the cabs and the livery services out of business, if you have steady clients that take the service everyday dont rob them blind just cause you think you could. its a disgrace and its wrong. we work hard for our money for some greedy company to take our money. do the right thing and charge the same amount everyday? if i take the service everyday and i've been paying from 14 dollars to 18 dollars but when you charge 26 dollars and then the other day when it was raining you tried charging me 60 dollars. highway robbery.

this illegal company is deadly and predatory, using massive deception and obfuscation as part of its trade craft. incentivizing dangerous and sleepy driving makes it extremely dangerous for its passengers and drivers! the low pay based on no overtime, few arbitrary benefits worth mentioning and unpaid hours waiting for ride assignments and no pay for time picking up passengers and any car expenses, make this company a menace to society!

drivers waiting around also wastes fuel, creates smog and keeps too many cars on the road for more traffic and accidents.

most drivers are not properly insured. breathe the word “rideshare,” and drivers will be hard pressed to get a loan or coverage. accident risks are too high!

in short, for drivers, the duopoly of lyft and über is just way too dangerous for far too little money!

Review Title: Uber engages in a pattern of dishonest
Review Body: uber engages in a pattern of dishonest, deceptive and fraudulent business practices. specifically, uber offers promotions to drivers offering additional pay for completing a certain number of trips. they then refuse to honor the promotion. support then invents fake reasons, which are demonstrably fake because each support person gives a different reason. it's quite clear that their primary intention is just to get you off the phone. screenshots will be forwarded to the ftc and other authorities. but be warned, this is a very dishonest shady company that refuses to conduct itself with any integrity at all.

Review Title: Ubers safety is to be questioned
Review Body: ubers safety is to be questioned. i had an issue with a booking whereas the driver was sick but still he accepted the ride and my friend was in the ride. he stopped the ride half way through and booked another cab for my friend. i contacted the customer safety and they just hang up on you. what if its a real emergency and they do this. how is it that we can trust this company for our safe ride of they are not addressing the passengers concern. uber already has a notorious record of safety concerns and price hikes and charging additional expenses. not at all good experience in any way. the company is just there to make profit.

Review Body: was in an accident as a passenger due to reckless driving by the uber driver and uber could not care less.  i had to fight to even get a refund for the cancellation fee they charged me for the ride.  absolutely terrible company with no regard for their customers.

i’m from cape town, south africa. i use uber daily. i’ve been on uber since 2014. i started out with a 4.98 score. i’m now at 4.6.

i am always waiting at the correct pick up
i never make my driver wait
i never eat or drink in their vehicle
i always greet and thank my driver
i always tip 20% (via the app)
i am always courteous and polite
i never slam my door
i always wear my seatbelt
i always rate my drivers 5, as i'm aware their jobs are at stake

it’s recently been brought to my attention that in south africa, if you don’t want your rating to drop drastically like mine has, you should tip — very very generously, at least upwards of 25% and it must always be cash. never via the app. it also helps if you offer to buy them takeaway.

essentially, if you are a tourist in south africa or a citizen such as myself, be prepared to *bribe* your driver extremely generously or risk your rating dropping drastically

uber south africa drivers generally score everyone a 3. this is based on the fact that they are frustrated with uber south africa not putting up their rates despite a substantial petrol increase in sa. so this affects their "take-home" pay

rule of thumb in south africa - people are paid very badly. tip - tip everybody, and tip very generously.
friendly driver, clean vehicle and timely arrival.
second time riding with uber. drivers have been polite and friendly. get me where i need to go with no issues.

Review Title: They make female passengers feel unsafe!
Review Body:
i hired an uber xl for an airport run
when the driver arrived, i had to ask him to park nearer to the house, because we had luggages, obviously.
the driver was rude & arrogant, from the start, but at that time of the morning, i had no choice.
he dropped off my daughter a mile off from the drop off point, knowing that she had luggages and it was raining! why would he do that?
what a callous and arrogant human being
he not only dropped of my daughter in the wrong place, he made her feel unsafe! really uber?
in this day and age?! is this how you treat female passengers?
i made a complaint immediately to uber, all i keep receiving is emails telling me to “reply above the line”!
i have done this. i have made several complaints, via email and via the app, no reply.
i see that the company does not care about the safety of their female passengers.
it’s all about money and profit before people.
i will start using an alternative company and like someone wrote, if i could, i would go back to the old system of hiring a cab!

despite booking and confirming

Review Title: First uber driver didn't meet at pick…
Review Body: first uber driver didn't meet at pick up spot and was messaging me that he was there which he wasn't. after replying,  he canceled the trip and left.
the driver was courteous made good conversation and drove safe

Review Title: I don’t know where to start I will come…
Review Body: i don’t know where to start i will come and buy a uber driver he then got out the car and assaulted me and tried to get mob together on the streets saudi arabia very disappointed unsafe drivers and not professional.

Review Title: £40, nothing delivered nothing refunded now ignored.
Review Body: i spent £40 on a delivery from uber - the shop added on an hour and a half to delivery, i contacted them asap and said please cancel this it's way to late. they didn't give me confirmation but hung up the phone. i recieved no cancellation confirmation nor did the driver try to deliver but it said it was delivered successfully which is an utter lie. i contacted uber on monday and was told that i can't get a refund as its been more than 48 hours. regardless of this, £40 paid for nothing, no customer service, no ability to escalate the complaint, just £40 spent for no goods or service just the joy of bad customer service from uber. would never order from then again appalling service. i have been in contact with them for 5 days and now all my attempts at communication has been ignored over every medium, email, social media and the app.
a bit of a lifesaver when i missed the bus home. pretty affordable considering it was a 25 minute ride. the driver - iustina - was great.

Review Title: I had booked a ride Saturday evening to…
Review Body:
i had booked a ride saturday evening to share with a friend
the driver canceled it and i was charged the cancellation fee.

the next day my friend ordered an uber to pick me up from my home to take me to my vehicle.
he was lost, so he claimed and cancelled the ride but she was charged full fare and the cancellation fee.

your drivers and app need to be more accurate and accountable to the drivers and stop charging unnecessary fees.

Review Title: Driver didn't seem to know exactly where we were
Review Body: uber driver didn't seem to know where we were   had to request 2nd time.  i thought address where we r would be known yo uber driver.  she cxd our first request. ? maybe she could t figure out address. bit of a hassl

thieves -
driver denies being paid - you are billed twice.
you cancel - you are charged
driver cancels - no penalty
driver says you were not at the pick up point - you are charged
heavily weighed against the passenger. many drivers also accept rides and then ask (pressure) for much more money. so many abusive practices so little protection uber support useless.
look at the 63% 1 stars!!!

quick to pick me up, friendly driver's

Review Title: I had a bad experience as the driver…
Review Body:
i had a bad experience as the driver cancelled my ride but i was standing outside the front with no car visible. asked how much cash do i have & he will do it for £20.00 cash. when i said no he drove off.
i think his name was zaid

Review Title: My trip was book from Meade street to…
Review Body: my trip was book from meade street to rosemore clinic for r15,then i added a trip to meul street.the driver never ended my trips and keeps on driving and picking up other riders with my trip still running.my trip eventually ended up costing r108,because the driver never ended my trip upon dropping me off in meul street.
car was easy to reserve, driver was on time. vehicle in good shape and comfortable. went smoothly with no surprises

Review Title: I order Uber a little to often and…
Review Body:
i order uber a little to often, that will end soon! because of the poor customer service each time i need assistance. when i need help, it's like pulling teeth to get it... they read two words and send you a response ignoring the other concerns.

they mark your unresolved issue as resolved...well i am not going for it... i am going to wait until i get all of the help i requested and then i am canceling my account. this is too much drama and i am not going to deal with it...

i prefer to take the bus and prefer to call a cab since uber customer service and the company as a whole are so lazy, rarely respond, rarely assist properly and quick to mark things as resolved to make it harder for you to get back to them since a resolved complaint means you can't just reply anymore, you have to start over!

uber has a promo code on your account and they will never inform you about it. the promo code is giving 40% off your rides if you use a mastercard. i have a mastercard and used my visa for the last few months. had i known about this promo i would have used the other card and entered a promo code.
i found out about this yesterday 11/27/2022 and the promotion ends on 11/28/2022.

you have 30 days to request for your payment methods to be changed to mastercard.

my very last two trips, i was picked up from home and taken to my destination. i ordered an uber after and selected my home to go home. while in the uber the driver made the wrong turn and that is when she stated where she was taking me. i told her the app is wrong since and i am going home. the distance was shorter so the fee should be less.

i sent a message to uber and it was ignored. i sent another one and i was told that i need to wait until it's no longer pending.

what was that?
a lie, that is what it was!
so i needed two things,

1-the last trip fee to be corrected since the app gave incorrect information and my trip ended up being shorter. i still want the fee corrected.

2-i want to use my promo code to get 40% off up to $25. so that should cover my last 8 trips.

i requested for that in details and it was ignored.

i got an email saying that they can't do anything while the trips are still pending.

3 was still pending. not all...
i am trying to meet this expiration and uber is trying to waste my time until the promo expires.

i sent another message to tell them something they already knew. they saw other trips know longer pending. they ignored it and only spoke on the pending trips and marked the issues as resolved!

i sent another email for being ignored.

i received the next email and it showed the last trip which is still pending, fee also not corrected. it showed a refund. they then charged my mastercard.
didn't they say, they can't help if it's pending?????

i was lied too by uber for their pleasure and cheated for their gain. fraud!!!

the one they refunded was the last trip.
why not all 8 that i wanted and requested to be changed to m/c after the promo code is added.

they refunded the visa, didn't correct the fee, charged my m/c without adding the promo code.
why even change the payment method, if you are not going to use the promo code i clearly stated, that i wanted to use??????????
lord!!! yep, this is the drama, i can do without!!!

uber is useless since they hire clowns who doesn't want to work and have terrible attitudes...

i will be placing a complaint with bbb and my bank until i am assisted properly.
i will not let this go!

i hate poor customer service, it really burns me up! they may never get another order from me.
i am the type where i pay for good service and if i do not get it, i stop doing business with that company. that is how serious i am about great customer service!

if i have to fight for too long, i get angry and end accounts. when i am done, i am also done with uber. account will be closed.

these days, i am shutting down drama.
i refuse to support a company or agents to pay their bills, if i am being treated like crap in return. it doesn't work like that!
you cannot be ungrateful, i cannot be treated poorly and i will not be ignored!

date of experience is 11/27/2022, i am adding it here since trust pilot has a system issue that has not been dealt with.

Review Title: All in all the service is good
Review Body: all in all the service is good. the only issue is when a scheduled pick up is set up our original driver cancels and we’re left with the app searching for another driver which is unnerving when we have a flight to catch.
my drivers were here quickly and very friendly. they drove safely and made me feel very comfortable. i really like using uber. very reliable. will keep using uber.
[egypt] very poor support, no convenient routes for shuttles, plus their drivers keep canceling rides just in the ride time which becomes a waste of time for good!!
on time pickup, comfortable mercedes and polite driver.
having used uber in more than one country i have noting bad to say about the driver or service.

trips are always safe. reliable and professional drivers. easy app and clear navigation. always picks up movement or exact location where the request is made/phone. find it very useful as some location don't give the exact number/place. big ups uber.

Review Body: i would like to appreciate and thank you for a uber mobile application. i get good facilitation service at a very nominal charges in india and in qatar. thank you for making my journey safe, secure, convenient, affordable, good seating arrangement , experienced drivers. thanks for your availability.

Review Title: I pre booked a Uber to go the airport
Review Body: i pre booked a uber to go the airport, the driver ( yulyan ganchov) accepted my booking and confirmed the ride.  at the very last moment, when he was around the corner, he cancelled my ride. i knocked on his window, as he arrived to the pick up point and he was literally around the corner, and asked whether he could still take me to the airport; he said that he could not as he got an other customer. very poor customer service, i have almost lost my flight because of this conduct.
such a bad service, the worst in london. they never have drivers.

trying to book an uber in staffordshire is an absolute joke. the company is useless and obviously managed by money grabbers.... just like there drivers.
i've attempted to use an uber driver for the last 4xweeks and every single attempt they haven't bothered to pick me up. seems obvious they only want to collect 'high paying trips'.
let me tell you uber uk... sort you company out. i certainly wouldn't run my company as bad as you do.
you really are a rip off company that has no idea how to operate your staff.
definitely would neved recommend your service to anyone...
no idea why anyone would use you guys....but hey i'm only a multimillionaire company owner... so hmm i maybe have no idea how to manage a company.
you are absolutely useless in the uk.. maybe you employ some proper staff that actually know what they are doing??,

Review Body: the driver was very punctual, polite, and helpful.  without asking he took the time to get out of his vehicle and help me with my luggage, i think in the last 20 trips he is the only one that would get ouf of the vehicle rather than just pop the trunk and sit inside.

after order a ride driver pulled up and wanting cash and wouldn't drive me so then was charged 6.47 cancellation fee and now i'm out on money company is trash and hire some trash people as well very disappointed i just want my money back and back on my card don't trust eventually it will back door you some way wish could give less 0 star they are stealing from people don't let them do it to you if everyone stops using the service they will fall and be held accountable!

Review Body: downloaded the app yesterday to book a ride ? which actually went quite well , ordered a ride back ? driver could not find my location tried to charge me ( not do good !!) but there cs department assured me i wasn’t charged ( happy days) today  i’ve had to report uber for fraud to my bank as uber eats took two unauthorised payments from me !!., safe to say i have deleted the app., if you have uber check your bank accounts.. if about to download don’t bother !!
