Review Title: Firstly your driver canceled as the…
Review Body: firstly your driver canceled as the trip was too short , secondly i waited for 1 hour and was told no driver.  bad service.  your uber drivers are choosing their trips which is unacceptable.

preferred to sit in the front passenger seat due to issues with my knees & leg room. when i reached out to open front passenger door, the driver directed me to the back passenger seat. if the front door is broken, this ought to be repaired unless the driver has other reasons unknown to me. i was given no explanation for his decision. no passenger should be told where to sit in a cab they've paid for. i couldn't complain because i already had a long day at work & just wanted to get home & didn't want to get into any argument about refunds.

apart from this issue, the driver was generally respectful & pleasant.
both the drivers were kind, made me feel safe and were good drivers who obeyed the rules of the road.

Review Title: I had two trips today and both drivers…
Review Body: i had two trips today and both drivers were most polite, helpful and pleasant to share my trips with.

Review Title: The service is either incredible or terrible
Review Body: the service is either incredible with true drivers being on time the cars in a lovely clean state and the fares being reliable and honest or you wait over an hour to be connect to a driver for no one to turn up when you need them and twice i closed the app but forgot to cancel the journey and the taxi turned up 1.30 minutes after frist trying to book then to receive a fine for the drive arriving and me not being there as it was it an hour ago and i had walked instead i just don’t bother with uber now for this reason.

Review Title: Driver was there in no time
Review Body: driver was there in no time, and got me to the airport safely and on time.

ordered food through them, when arrived i asked the driver to open the bags and of course it was short!

called them and 3 reps confirmed the story with driver but no refund or any solution to this!

why i order in canada but have to deal with slow minded people overseas??????
two trips that day, to and from a restaurant. both drivers knew the way and were very pleasant

great drivers

Review Title: I drove for Uber being a Driver for 3…
Review Body: i drove for uber being a driver for 3 years without any issues, now uber support wants to stereotype and judge me how i look, the customer service representatives are making all kinds of excuses, why i can’t drive for them anymore, they try to find things and make up excuses why you can’t drive for them after a while working with them, it’s just plain disrespectful and discrimination how they are treating me as a former driver, there customer service representatives are the worst, uber needs to rehire reliable workers for them and hire people, that don’t judge you how you look!!!

booked an uber in san francisco great friendly driver . arrived in vegas and booked from the airport arrived in minutes and excellent drop off at caesar’s.just booked the return to airport for tomorrow.

Review Title: We booked an Uber from our rural farm…
Review Body: we booked an uber from our rural farm to the ottawa airport for a 3 a.m. pickup for 6 a.m. flight. at 2.55 a.m. we were notified the driver was 5 minutes away. at 3:05 a.m. we received notice that no drivers were available. a zero rating for uber. thanks for turning the beginning of our trip into chaos in the middle of the night!
immediate response and friendly driver.

Review Title: This is dying !! Take note UBER
Review Body:
this is dying, cancelled pickups, scheduled pick ups 6xtimes standard costs. really £45 for a 2 mile journey. no one who cares will see this i am sure and by the time they do it will be too late.

drivers have had enough and are going to bolt and others but worse than that is the customer experience which is getting so bad that i question whether the structure of uber as a business is failing.

lets hope they fix it. it was great but i guess when you were subsidising every journey with investor cash it would be. now the hard work begins i guess for uber !

for me its used less and less and the scheduling option which was an extra £2 for a journey is now an extra £30. really ! you are better off not offering it. its insulting and that drives me away ! literally !
the quick response. the driver was pleasant. on time
driver turned up on time , clean car and very friendly

it took 4 uber drivers to get to me...one of them took over 15 mins and he didn't respond to my message. i had to "pay" a cancelation fee because he lacked communication and didn't pick me up. i had to use this service out of desperation. horrible experience. moshood from irving texas rhd0637 is the worst driver. do not recommend using this service. you also have no way of contacting uber directly. worthless.
fantastic experience using uber, all drivers interact and their cars are spotless
easy app to use and drivers were early and on time.

Review Title: The driver never picked us up
Review Body: the driver never picked us up, i am requesting a full refund.
driver was on time

i ordered an uber on the 15th to take me to the  airport. driver arrives. i hop in. driver says i have to finish off a previous ride. ??? (what?) i was suprised at this bc i've only used uber twice before. i said, no, just take me to the airport. i'm running late. he insisted to finish off the previous ride. i said no. he said, get the "f" outta my car "b" i said no "f'n" problem. i'm not expecting to get charged for this. i told him to cancel this ride. i called lyft. such a difference. never again will i use uber. hoping someone from uber contacts me about the refund. francis godschalk
so easy!!  timely, safe drivers!

i used to book uber for any rides required but not anymore. i was left with no ride when driver refused to pick me up at the pick up point few weeks ago. it took me 8 min to find him parked. as i approached the car, he cancelled the trip and charged me a fee. i missed my train and had to pay for another ticket. i tried to attend few medical appointments and tried to book a ride. last time was yesterday.  i missed the appointment as driver cancelled when he was 2 min away. 2 more rides were cancelled after that. definitely uber has become an unreliable service where drivers seem to pick and choose the rides. huge decline in the service.
as always, good and reliable service, polite and friendly driver
the driver was on time, courteous and knew where she was going.  the car was clean and safe.

Review Body: the vehicle was spotless. the driver was early and very kind and friendly.

Review Title: The driver showed up on time and was…very courteous

Review Title: Time announced by Uber should be correct!!! And this has nothing to do with traffic problems!
Review Body: if i order an uber i would like to get the real time until the car is coming. i waited twice half an hour. the time was announced as 10 minutes, then got more an more, then the first driver driving around fore and back cancelled after 1/2 hour, the second one seemed to have got two clients in between also after a waiting time of 10 minutes was announced. like that you cannot rely on uber to get somewhere. third drive on this day was perfect.

Review Title: My driver was awesome on night of…
Review Body: my driver was awesome on night of 11-20-22 he was friendly and funny

Review Title: I booked an Uber at the supermarket &…
Review Body: i booked an uber at the supermarket & it showed  that it was eight minutes away… i actually noticed that when the uber turned up, it kept on going, the driver didn’t even glance over towards the supermarket, much less stopped. when i contacted uber support, i could barely understand the speaker because her english was terrible & basically she was of no help. i’m now trying to get my money back because i was charged for the journey through paypal- thank goodness i’m with them. uber, you’ve just lost a customer- i wonder if bolt is any better…

Review Title: The app was easy to use at every point…
Review Body: the app was easy to use at every point in the process. the drivers were prompt, professional, good conversationalists, and good drivers.

great drivers.  website drives me crazy.  says it doesn't work then charges me.  so many charges on my credit card 4 2 trios.

i have used uber before and had good experiences. the service is quick and i like that the time and distance the driver is from you is displayed. this was the first time that the vehicle that was shown was incorrect and definitely not an uber comfort model. the vehicle was supposed to be a volvo xc90 model and when it showed up it was an old, rusty, damaged bmw and dirty inside.
pickup was very quick and driver, manny, was excellent! i know it's only a ride, but everything went exceptionally well. thank you.

Review Title: I am happy with all the services,
Review Body:
i am happy with all the services,
although there are some comments on few drivers, that are playing music very loud and not very convenient for passengers, and some have the heat very high that make the passengers uncomfortable

Review Title: I felt safe with this trip
Review Body: i felt safe with this trip. the driver was very cautious and careful. my eta was almost down to the minute. i have to admit i had a bad experience that almost allowed me to discontinue these services but, after my last two great experiences with these trips i’ve decided to reconsider.

i had a seriously bad experience with 1st driver alex, i requested a ride @7:15. this driver show up an hour and half late, when he arrived he pass my home i wave at him, apparently he did not see me and left and cancel my trip, i text him and call him never responded, he should not be doing uber, horrible experience, on the other hand i requested another ride,!this time eduardo was at my door within the time specified, i text him before he responded immediately , i wish you have more people like him, very responsible pleasant and caring, he takes his job seriously, i change my negative thoughts about uber because of his positive input, i was very upset with the first driver alex who is very irresponsible!!!!

literally the past 6 out of 10 rides have been very bad. we've had several rude drivers that act like it's an inconvenience to open their trunk so we can put groceries or bags, backpacks etc. then we've had a couple of drivers lately that their driving scared us. we were going to 1931 harvard ave a couple of nights ago and the driver after scari g us all the way to our destination turns on the block where we're going and runs the stop sign and we almost get t-boned. it's just been mostly bad experiences lately. not happy at all with the service we have had. just being honest. the night of the stop sign incident was friday the 18th on our way from 217 nw leanne lane to 1931 harvard ave we turned on to harvard ave. and there is one stop sign between where we turned on to harvard and our destination and this driver, ( arabic ) or from india he didn't speak very good english because when we told him that he just ran the stop sign it didn't seem like he understood what we were saying. i just wanted out of the car at that point. horrible and scary experience.

very efficient service but fails in that our driver could not pick us up from pretoria station (gautrain from airport) this was due to security worries of opposition taxi drivers threats to uber drivers. uber needs to approach the pretoria municipality to provide a safe pickup space and avoid us walking three blocks through a very dodgy section of town.
very quickly, exact pick up spot, clear instructions and safe. very nice driver. and great price.

Review Title: Driver was courteous and got us to our…
Review Body: driver was courteous and got us to our destination on time.

Review Title: The driver was as good as he could have…
Review Body:

my sole problem is with uber’s location processes.
when a user asks for a pick up or drop off, the gps seems to send the driver to an approximate location only.
on one occasion when the driver was dropping us off to our location, his gps directed him to the back of the building service/delivery entrance rather than front entrance.
on another occasion when i asked for a pick up at the same location, his gps directed him to side of the building and i had to wander around to find him.

we planned a 10-day trip away from home, so instead of parking our car in the airport garage and incur the daily fees, we reserved an uber several days in advance for peace of mind. we received a notification 45 mins prior to the time selected that our driver was on his way. we arrived to the airport with ample time and less stress. reserving an uber is definitely worth it.

Review Title: On Friday I requested a Ride,and it…
Review Body: on friday i requested a ride,and it arrived around 16:30 then the driver asked to use my phone since his wasn’t working to navigate to my location,on our way he asked me to pay upfront so he can pour patrol since i was going far and he didn’t want the car to stuck on the high way,on my app it kept showing that the driver is here and still showing a minute away when we got to my drop off i paid the remaining balance and went on with my day at 6pm a driver called me from the app telling me he has arrived to my surprise i responded i was already dropped off by someone else already and how was it possible that being that i requested around 4:20 and he’s only calling me at 6 then i received an email that i need to pay r19 because i cancelled a trip how is that even possible?? im rea disappointed in uber when i trusted it to be safe and convenient for days in need

Review Title: Uber still good… but needs to fix location mapping.
Review Body: uber still is the most convenient form of readily available taxis. location mapping does need serious improvement. despite having live tracking on, drivers seem to be missing pick up locations. also had a horrible experience with one driver who past me, then canceled the trip claiming i wasn’t at location despite me messaging him & telling him exactly where i was. such experiences doesn’t make me trust uber that much.

Review Title: I’m done with Uber…,going to Lyft
Review Body: driver took an hour to get to me when app initially said 20 mins. when he arrived he told me he couldn’t take me because he couldn’t get a return trip if he took me to my destination about 30 miles away (which i accurately indicated when i initiated the ride request. he canceled the ride & left me standing there….what the heck? i’m done with uber!! hello lyft!!

Review Title: Would be no stars if possible
Review Body: would be no stars if possible. i booked a trip the day before. it was from west palm beach to sarasota. i knew it was a long expensive trip but the uber app showed it with a cost of about 225  dollars. i was assigned a driver the night before my ride. in the morning i was assigned a different driver. that driver and five others cancelled after at first accepting the trip. this was already past the time i expected to leave. i had no idea if any driver would show up and take me to my destination. i finally got a driving service to take me at a higher cost. uber charged me a cancellation fee which i will dispute.

an absolute waste of time. a regular user, scheduled an uber the night before for 5.30 in the morning for a trip to heathrow. at 5.28 i receive a message saying that my trip was cancelled, without giving any other options to try and find another driver. absolutely disgraceful - tried to send a message through the help centre to complain, and just received a generic auto reply back. you would expect better service for what i have to pay these days on uber rides. i would give a 0 star if i had a chance.

uber is useful, when it works. but not when a driver accepts a ride and then does not turn up - that's a disaster, especially if the ride is for a hospital appointment. frustrating too, since it is not clear on the app how to challenge that. just have to wait.

scheduled a pick up yesterday morning for a 2:15 pm pick up.  received text messages all morning confirming.  well the driver never showed.  i could see the map and knew where he was but it wasn’t near me.  no phone # to call  the trip wasn’t showing when i hit help button so i could not communicate with anyone. hit the cancelled button after waiting an hour and a half for the driver. finally messaged them on facebook  they told me they would refund my 40.00. cancellation fee  well they charged me for 2 cancellation fees  why i have no idea but i was only refunded one fee.  i messaged them and attached a screenshot of my credit card screen and their own email to me showing they charged me twice and they are still telling me i was only charged once and they refunded me.  never again will i use uber. horrible customer service
los angeles,awful waiting times to connect for a driver.  also, their gps is so horrible!  on rainy days good luck finding a driver.  uber is no good.  better getting in debt with a new or used car.

Review Title: I tried joining to do deliveries but I…
Review Body:
i tried joining to do deliveries but i guess being a canadian who (god forbid) doesn't have a passport or my physical sin card. ( i was taught to memorize and get rid of actual card)
so because my drivers license isn't valid enough. i can't join. because all the other paper work i could use i don't qualify. i'm not a landed immigrants i'm not about to pay for another copy of my birth certificate (which is not photo proof)

Review Title: Uber isn't concerned with rider safety
Review Body: hey dara khosrowshahi, you might want to review how many times riders have been in the back of a car and ride gets cancelled. not by you, mind you, by uber. your drivers tell you to get out of their car because they have another ride to scheduled. you're confused because you weren't the one who cancelled it, but your driver tells you it's the app and it happens alot. then the driver tells you to get out again.  heaven forbid should you question the driver because they immediately start slinging cuss words and then proceed to come to your side of the car to attempt to drag you out. is this expected behavior?  your customer service is worse than motel 6. at least they keep the light on. all i want to know is why would your app cancel a ride while the rider is in the back of the car? and, why isn't your company concerned about your drivers actions that could have resulted in bodily harm???

Review Title: I ordered a taxi and was waiting for…
Review Body: i ordered a taxi and was waiting for the car the arrive. 1 min before car arrives the driver cancels and i still get charged for the trip. so i feel like i've been robbed as i did not receive the service nor did i cancel the service but i still have to pay for this. unbelievable and not acceptable as a company.

Review Title: You are at your own UBER doesn't take…

you are on your own uber doesn't take any responsibility .

whom to contact ?? if only police why we need such a service ??

Review Title: Uber app messed up and sent the driver…
Review Body: uber app messed up and sent the driver to different address!!then the address which i never entered appeared in my app!fair enough, it was close to my normal pick up point but sorry i never heard about that street! paid for stress and nearly missed my bus! what's wrong with the app!

hi,

i started applying to be a uber driver 3 months ago, invested $1400 in the process and still not able to start working.

money spent on:
-car inspection $150
-new brakes $250 to clear inspection
-commercial insurance $360
-new tires $400 to clear inspection
-police background check $100
-commercial plates $20
-class 4 driver license medical $100
-roughly 60hrs spent on providing everything to uber

i have tried contacting uber support for atleast 7 times after submitting each and every document, but all i got as response was to wait. its been 3 weeks since i submitted every single document.
they are clearly showing that they don’t respect my time and investment.

i use uber rides often and i am extremely disappointed by their overall service. i’m talking about both car ride experience as well as their “customer” support experience.
the uber customers come last unlike how it’s supposed to be when customers come first for them when it comes to an issue.
latest terrible example with uber.
i booked a ride from airport. the driver brings me to the wrong place. isn’t it obvious that it has nothing to do with me, right? i had clearly indicated the address for my destination. uber app recognized my address of destination and calculated the $$ total for my ride.
now because driver needs to turn around, drive few more blocks to find my correct address, uber charges me extra fees for that, seriously???
moreover at the pick up place at the airport i’m waiting outside by the door where sign indicates ”uber”. then i receive a phone call from uber driver that he had arrived. he had stopped away from their uber sign and making me walk to his car with all my luggage. meanwhile i was walking to the uber car, apparently i had to pay for a “waiting” time. wouldn’t this be logical that i don’t have to pay that fee? i was the one who was waiting for the uber car in the perfect place, well indicted, designated for uber and then driver made me walk to his car instead of driving into that designated spot.
this is terrible!

of course i sent an email to the uber support. and what do they say?
because i had submitted claims for ride adjustments before and they think it was too frequent in the recent past they will refuse to adjust this ride.
guess what, every situation similar to this one that happened to me in the past, unfortunately was too frequent, they made me a victim of their bad service and multiple drivers errors. as a small business owner i care about my customers and they come first when it comes to service. i care about my customers and will provide the best solution for any error or negative experience which my business may have caused to the customer.
uber doesn’t care about their customers and would make them victims of their terrible service.
and they’re getting worst day by day!

after my reply to their support department with this same complaint, they send me this automated message which says that i am just not eligible for any adjustment because i have had price adjustments before. “eligible”? so when they make errors the customer needs to be eligible to receive a compensation for that?
not funny at all!

i'm a driver. uber banned me due to a recent background check which had items on there that pre-date my employment with the company. the same items were present on my background whenbi stated driving for them in 2018. now in 2022 all of a sudden i can't drive anymore. no one will return an email or respond to my dispute request.

order did not arrive, when i tried to speak to driver such poor english, it was so difficult to communicate and the order still did not arrive, only a partial refund. the photo the driver submitted was a mc donald’s bag in the air so proved no delivery. i will not be using again.

Review Title: Used for first and last time today
Review Body:
used for first and last time today. had appointment at hospital and needed taking home. downloaded app, put in credit card details and selected a driver that was 9 mins away. 20 mins later still waiting for it to connect to driver so gave up and cancelled.

rubbish!

Review Title: Driver Blocking Junction & traffic being abusive
Review Body: uber driver parking in leicester city centre blocking the junction and blockind road, refused to move unless ' parked cars ' in front of him moved and being abusive. his taxi license should be revoked. reported to the council and police ( pictures sent ) and uber have no way of contact.

Review Title: Uber is not able to control some of the drivers
Review Body: i called for an uber ride, my wife had to be collected from uclh after an operation. the driver did not come to the collection point but 150 yards away. i asked him to wait a minute because my wife could not walk fast (she was waiting at the collection point). he said nothing just took off.  if i would cancel a ride, uber would expect me to pay a fine, the driver cancelled the ride after! he took off.  i complained but of course nothing was done and cowboys still will be employed by uber, obviously they are too greedy and incompetent to deal with this type of drivers, the law of the jungle rules...

absolutely disgraceful. we booked an uber 2 days in advance due to train strikes and our friend being pregnant, we wanted a secure stress free way of getting home from o2 brixton. first time using uber, booking was accepted and a driver was assigned so we headed out to our gig knowing we had a way home. driver was on his way so we stood outside in the rain so not to miss him and then 1 minute out he declined our booking (23:20pm) and the app went back to searching for a driver. this went on 3 more times with drivers accepting and getting 1 minute from our location and then declining. as you can imagine we were in a mass panic thinking we would be stranded in brixton, as each time this happened it took on average 10 minutes per driver. we were soaked and cold with a very stressed pregnant lady. finally after 30-40 minutes a 4th driver assigned and actually turned up. he was super nice and felt sorry for us as we were drenched and stressed and had a long journey home. £80 for that experience! would not use again or recommend to the point i've deleted uber eats as well, i'm fuming.

Review Title: The right driver and deliverymen do not…
Review Body: the right driver and deliverymen do not ride and deliver! in barcelona spain, the illegal driver and rider working on uber. robbery and hijacking activities happening every day. uber has no responsibility. if you try to contact them then they don't response.

Review Title: Charged  without refund for cancelled ride by driver without arriving
Review Body: i was charged, driver cancelled the ride without arriving. application says charged 0 but bank account says i was charged. i had no money left on my card, so i had to waste 2 hours walk. great scum service.

Review Title: Uber drivers do not have to return lost…
Review Body: uber drivers do not have to return lost items and uber lost and found is useless. i had to get the cops involved to get my laptop bag back with my phone, wallet and keys to my home and car. they allowed the driver to keep using the uber app and driving others while the driver continued to ignore communication from me and uber. they need a customer service phone number and better policies to protect their customers.

Review Title: If I could rate 0 I would
Review Body: if i could rate 0 i would. the uber company needs to be regulated properly.  the drivers are overcharging and incorrectly adding on surcharges. uber has refused me a refund yet said they will make sure it doesn't happen again. (note, it happened before yesterday as well) they are crooks and unethical. you definitely have to read their tiny print. awful & deceitful company & drivers!
you should seriously consider improving your tracker as it gives false locations. i clearly marked my location only to find out that the driver was sent to another road. i was not impressed.

Review Title: I asked my Uber to return to the point…
Review Body:
i asked my uber to return to the point of pick up (because i had forgotten some of my belongings-- and was willing to pay the travel fees) however, my uber driver didn't speak english, or at least enough to understand "return to the pick up point", they pulledover whilst i was asking and insisted i get out. me, not trying to cause any trouble, obliged. and found myself in the middle of nowhere, and yet further from my destination and things, as well as, i had to pay uber over $11 to do it.... i might also mention i have an uber one account o had to get another uber, given very little choice in the moment, but could not event contact anyone for help without additional fees.. the chat help costs fees???... i am deleting my account and never bothering with uber again. they will not refund or help, if they can help it, which they do
terrible business, terrible experience
always reliable, always great drivers, fast service. my recent experience with a hotel shuttle, made me rethink ever relying on it again. uber came to the rescue. thanks!

worst company. stopped using them a while ago because a driver was quite aggressive and inappropriate. i reported it and uber did nothing. last weekend a friend booked an uber through his app and i left my phone in the car. i realised it straight away and we tried to contact the driver, reported it to uber and uber notified the driver but he did nothing about it. we got no answer, no phone. disgusting how little they care about their customers and how they let their drivers get away with stealing from customers too.
rude drivers. breaking all rules on the road!!
im book a ride today. driver very bad .driver fight with me and ride start without me

first, let's start with operation cost, to keep the car fit for the roads and maintenance with taxes, fuel. 30 thousand a year. 2 years, the car is ready for the dump.
2nd taxi owner's family and friends make false reports, you will be banned eventually.
3rd noting left for the driver, except a huge amount of debit.
i work at the airport, and the uber drivers there are the rudest unprofessional drivers that i have ever experienced. i have over 200,000 miles of driving experience so i think my opinion is valid.

Review Title: Uber is shafting you all the way aroundUber is shafting you all the way around
Review Body: this review is basically for the people that drive for uber. the irs has just recently raised the mileage deduction to 62 cents per mile. that is just what the irs thinks it costs you to drive a mile it is higher than that i can assure you. any ride that you give that 62 cents times the total miles to pick up and then to drop off should be considered. i can assure you if you do not file a long form tax return for deductions you are actually losing money. don't even consider the tickets that you might get even if you are a conscientious driver,what about a driver that hits you and it's his fault. this is called  uninsured motorists and if you don't have a commercial policy there is a high likelihood if it is a severe wreck that your insurance will not pay 4 any damages. your personal policy might reject any claims. you might not need to consider this if you have no assets but be forewarned if you have assets then you better reassess your risk management criteria.im not even going to bring up that you better file  quarterly reports for your income tax and remember you're also responsible for the employer portion as well as the employees here this may include medicare deductions as well as unemployment deductions even though you are a contractor depending on your state of occupation. it will be around 15%. that is not income tax, that is taken after adjusted gross income. you may get away with skirting some of these regulations for months and even years but when i catch you you will be in debt for a very long time. pro  tip-  biden is in the process of hiring 84000 more auditors for the irs. pay your taxes. for all you uber riders go for it, you are getting one hell of a good rate. take uber sometime and then take a taxi for the exact same run you will see that the taxi cost much more and just look at the conditions of their cars. good luck and travel safe.

Review Title: Charged $250 for a cancelled Uber trip that…
Review Body: i was charged $250 for a uber trip that got cancelled three times. i never got my uber ride. the first driver a, cancelled the trip and adjust fare to give me a full refund, i got my $250 back in 5 minutes. driver b requested a new driver for the trip. driver c didn’t know how to cancel the trip or give a refund. so i got charged $250 for the second time and since he didn’t requested from his end he hit complete trip. now i’ve been charged $250 several times and can’t get my refund. they want me wait 3-5 business when it was instant 5 minutes transfer back the first time, when the driver a requested it. driver c was rude and didn’t know what he was doing. uber has the worst customer service.

worst experience ever order from mcdonald’s cost £7:27 from uber. the driver comes and give me 1 item but i order hot chocolate bacon flatbread and sausage egg muffins which cost £7:27. the flatbread only cost £149 so i requested a refund from urber. they sent a message saying they cannot refund me because the order was 48 hours ago. no 1& half hours ago. uber are crooks and i will be going to small claims court to get compensation

Review Title: Sp tonight very little battery left on…
Review Body: so tonight very little battery left on phone, book a cab and twice i go and meet at pick up point, twice the driver cancels it god knows why, but each time i rebook the cost has gone up from 12 quid sonethingv to the third time 19 quid something in the space of ten minutes, when the driver turns up he's at the wrong place not at the  pick up  point  so we end up aving a row ffs not happy.

Review Title: My driver is great.  We have gotten to the point where…
Review Body:
we have gotten to the point where corporations have figured out a way to do something more lucrative than slavery.

when you have slaves you have to feed them and you have to give them shelter and you have to buy machines for your business.

now we have uber, they pay an average of .50 to .65 a mile and the actual cost of gas and maintenance to drive is about .50 to .65 mile.

uber has figured out how to get people to drive for the actual cost of the car. they have a free slave who provides their own equipment and own living expenses.

it's shocking. uber drivers are wonderful, but uber is a very very evil organization. you must tip all drivers in cash double whatever is charged for it to be a fair wage.

not at all reliable!!! it takes forever to book a cab and when it does the driver cancels after asking the location!
countless experiences. officially swearing never to use uber!!

Review Title: This is the Tax Collector's Office
Review Body: this is the tax collector's office. uber needs to take copies of registrations verses making the driver have the original. you are asking for the driver to come into the office for replacement registrations which is causing us to print another decal. we can't print a decal without a form being signed and notarized and a fee paid. the form states the decal is lost. you are asking us to give the driver another decal. there isn't any reason you shouldn't be able to take a notarized screen print of their registration.

Review Title: Well for spouse of a Uber driver …
Review Body: well for spouse of a uber driver they need more money what y'all give in oklahoma for driver not enough ,because they go out risking there lives over people getting in our car over $4 a rider when they can get robbed, kill ,or hurt and ,not respecting our car the kids get in and our kids have to worry about there parent being out there for that much. i don't know if the owner ,or whoever in charge ever went out there and drive like they do to see what every driver experience what we see this is what a spouse worries about them being out there. i hope the big people reads this!

Review Title: Uber wont help you, even though they can
Review Body:
so all i wanted from uber, was the drivers number. just so i could take matters into my own hands and call the uber to bring my missing item for a reward, which i knew was in his car.
the worst part is that uber will willingly give your number to the driver but wont give the drivers number to you. if you call uber there's no way to even speak to a real human for that kind of info.
even though uber would have never have made money if it wasn't for us. so now uber is alloying the driver to ride around with my keys and knowledge of where i live, that's a security risk.

they don't even show the drivers profile in the trip section so you don't even know what's happening with the drivers background info, no license plate info. nothing. so now i'm stuck with a dumb response team who wont even answer me, just automated responses such as were sorry for your loss or whatever.

Review Title: driver steals your BLOODY FOOD ORDER…
Review Body: driver steals your bloody food order and uber wont contact the driver to see why he collected it then cancelled it !!!! leaving a vanubale house hold with no food yet you cant even speak to anyone or email to raise a complaint

Review Title: Uber charged me extra for a journey…
Review Body: uber charged me extra for a journey today after they gave the driver the information for pick up. they sent the driver to lidl in carter's green west bromwich and i booked them to pick me up at west bromwich cleaning centre.  i had to call the driver who told me that they sent him to lidl. uber then charged me. this company is downright dishonest and nothing but a set of thieves.
just awful. very rude delivery driver and lukewarm food. my last order from this awful company.
the worst service. we can see nearby car but driver is not resonding.whoever is accept request taking multiple ride at same time and trying to complete that ride first

Review Title: Driver didn’t pickup, journey charged but Uber won’t refund
Review Body: i booked a fare from malaga airport into the city centre. the uber driver arrived at the pickup point and decided he didn’t want to collect us, didn’t phone and wouldn’t accept my calls. by the time i was able to work out how to cancel the booking, he was half way into malaga, and i have now had a fruitless exchange of conversation with uber support who won’t believe me when i say i didn’t get picked up. even though i booked an identical, genuine journey on the same account 15 minutes later. i’m now out of pocket. appalling customer service.

Review Title: Uber has truly lost their way
Review Body: uber has truly lost their way, drivers wait and wait and wait, then uber cancels, bam you lose £6.66, when you complain, this is added back to your account as a credit.... this is a scam and theft at the highest level.... this has happening to me 3 times now & many of my friend - its an issue uber need to resolve or they will just loose market share to bolt

Review Title: Driver lied and got extra tip, support didn’t help.
Review Body:
driver picked up my mum from pick up point. half way, she left her purse back at the pick up point. the driver told her, that it will cost £5 to go back and get it and to “add it as a tip”.

when i looked back at my debit card, he already charged us the £5 extra via the app and got an extra £5 as tip. uber support didn’t do anything.

having had a lovely day in silvas (portugal) we wanted to return back to our resort carvoeiro so used our uber app. 1st driver accepted our request then cancelled on us then second driver accepted but as we were following him on the app he kept moving further away and our wait time getting longer until eventually he cancelled on us so then we spoke to a guy in cafe ingles to ring for a taxi. on arrival back to our resort uber then charged us a cancellation for the inconvenience to the driver ( what a joke) who had not turned up and got 2 text messages and a screen shot to show this. we will never use uber again wherever we are and both apps have been deleted from our phones. looking on here they are doing this to everyone and this must stop.

Review Title: You Cannot Cancel a Booking if there’s no Driver Available…
Review Body: why is it you can request a trip and set the pick up location and agree to pay  but, when uber cannot find a driver and more than twice the original waiting time passes by there’s no way to cancel the transaction without incurring a fee. uber, you are costing good customers money for a poor service and that’s simply not fair. if you cannot fulfill the contractual agreement you should allow your valued customers to cancel the request without incurring fees. it’s unreasonable to expect customers to wait more than twice the time your app initially states is needed to be picked up and even though they try to cancel the fare, a fee is taken from their account. very poor and enough for me to delete my account.

Review Title: Have had good riding experience on my…
Review Body: have had good riding experience on my way to work👍all drivers and on time👍

i recently employed the services of uber drivers on 2 occasions, a week apart. i was impressed with the ease of scheduling a ride and the updates about my drivers' details and whereabouts. both of my drivers were prompt, pleasant, polite, helpful with my luggage and good drivers. i must mention that i'm usually a nervous passenger but i felt at ease during my trips. their vehicles were also very clean. in future i shall not hesitate to use uber drivers again.

i tried to contact the driver that my train was 5 min late and that i will need 5 min to get the uber. but he didn’t answer and he cancelled my journey. by doing that he left a 19yo girl alone in london in the middle of the night. uber credited me a £33 cancellation fee. i had to take 3 buses to get home, which took me 2h. i contacted the client service to be refund but they don’t want to hear anything. it's pitiful to make money on the misfortune of their client.

Review Title: My travelling experience from Edwardville, IL to Bridgeton, MO and back.
Review Body: i traveled in uber on 10/13/2022 from edwardsville, il to bridgeton, mo and back to edwardsville, il. i had two drivers during my journeys. my experiences were excellent. the drivers were warm, polite and respectful. they drove the uber cars smoothly and peacefully. i arrived at my destinations on time.

Review Title: Appt is fairly easy to use
Review Body: appt is fairly easy to use. drivers were quick and professional.

absolutely disgusted with the service. i would never ever ever use them again. beware.

driver’s name: iulian based in brentwood. black kia optima.

your driver was so rude and really unprofessional when he turned up outside my door and didn’t let me in his car because i had my tiny little dog with me. i realised that uber had change their processes and provided an option of uberpets for those riding with a pet. i accidentally ordered normal uberx. i appreaciate that the driver didn’t want to proceed with the ride as he kept saying he couldn’t take me and said he would cancel the trip so that i can look for another ride.

he said ok to that and drove off. i waited and waited until he cancels but he never did. he parked his car on standby opposite my house for no reason and i went up to him with my dad to kindly ask him to cancel my trip so i don’t get charge and so that i can book another car. he said he didn’t have internet connection to cancel which was an absolute lie.

your driver was being really rude and shouted at me saying he already cancelled the trip when he clearly hasn’t because i could still see on my phone that the trip was still active. he lied and spoke to my step dad so rudely and nearly run him over with his car. absolutely disgusting behaviour.

after around 8 minutes of hanging around our house, he drove off and the trip was automatically cancelled and i was charged a cancellation fee of £6.62. this is an absolute utter bull**** as i never cancelled the trip and if he did cancel, he said i wouldn’t have gotten charged so i don’t know what the hell is this a cancellation charge is about. i later found out that this is because he received money when uber automatically cancels the trip after 8 minutes so it became quite clear why he was hanging around my house which was no way acceptable. uber took it that i never turned up for my trip despite me waiting and keep asking him to cancel the trip.

i then received a very snotty unpleasant email from uber customer service threatening to suspend my account if my behaviour continues. i’m sorry?

the driver clearly twisted and manipulated the whole situation and lied. before you come at me with such email, and only hearing his side of the story i would appreciate it if you email or phone me first to ask me what happens from my side. it is not acceptable to attack me with your unprofessional email, completely taking the driver’s side without speaking to me first. he was being completely rude and i am absolutely disgusted with the service i received today. i have used uber for years and years and never did i ever receive such disgrace of a service.

i would not be using you again as i do not appreciate to be treated like this. i would rather use a local taxi who respects me so much more than your company and drivers do. absolutely disgusting. i hope you change the way you work otherwise you will lose customers.

the driver was great, car clean, on time & friendly. only issue we had was drivers declining our drive. over last 6 weeks have used uber about 14 times and most times a driver accepts our drive then declines. sometimes this happens 3 or 4 times. last time ended up getting into a taxi.

i had jury duty on 10/4/22. i gad to be there at 10:00 in the morning. i had set up for my ride @7:00 in the morning. i was charge $31.40. the ride only took 15 minutes. i called uber again for the ride home and was charged$11.19. i asked his driver why the prices were so different and he told me if they don’t have enough drivers they will charge more. why should the customers have to pay more because of not having enough drivers. this is not the only time this has happened. the price of rides are different from the way going and cheaper going back. now you probably wonder why we take uber instead of the bus. the last one was an emergency. i was in a car accident and can’t walk or stand very long that is why i took uber to court. something needs to be done about uber. they are just as bad they say about the taxis. i think taxis are cheaper.  i hope you have a better experience.

Review Title: I have been fairly pleased with Uber in…
Review Body: i have been fairly pleased with uber in the past.  registering complaints on their site for non trip issues is impossible.  i had a driver show up to pick me up from the philly airport in a rav 4.  my wife, daughter and i had 4 bags.  i put 1 bag in the back of his suv and he said the bag was too heavy.  i said you are joking and he said no.  he canceled the trip and left us standing there.  i have no way to report this to uber because you have to have a trip to report anything.
love using uber.  dependable, on time 90% but can message driver if an issue develops.  i always feel safe as it’s so easy to confirm identification.

uber are simply awful. i booked a car, the driver arrived and i told him i'd be a moment collecting my things, and he said he wasn't going to wait and then drove off. but i was charged for the trip, even though i immediately booked a second car and made the trip. i claimed the money back from paypal, then uber took it out of my bank. i claimed that back, then uber took it again from my paypal account. they are disgraceful. i was abandoned at 11:30pm in the street alone, and then they keep taking money from my account. so the account has now been cancelled.

Review Title: Prearranged an Uber to go to the…
Review Body: prearranged an uber to go to the airport and after our departure time the driver said he was not available.  complete broken system for transportation.  people working for this company are not responsible and lack integrity to get the job done.

Review Title: Uber in Perth Australia is not much…
Review Body:
uber in perth australia is not much better when i read some other reviews.

i have been trying to resolve an issue with the uber app which is actually incorrect with a destination, and i think the drivers know this as they do not ask until you are almost there. only to then say to you that this is the wrong place so you will have to put in a stop and a new destination. so 15-20mins later i arrive at my desired destination with an extra charge of around $25. was not happy at all.

emailed uber support, and explained very clearly my issue but after a $3-4 refund they no longer wish to talk with me and say that the matter is resolved.
it's not resolved because they don't or refuse to understand the issue.

i can't stand organisations that will not communicate and just treat the consumer with no respect at all. i don't mind the drivers, most are ok, a few wacko's but uber itself, just shocking.
excellent service! the drivers we had were very professional and made us feel safe during our trip in san francisco. i highly recommend using uber!

Review Title: It is an efficient means of getting…
Review Body: it is an efficient means of getting around especially at short notice. my driver was also very knowledgeable

(so obviously just a phone in someone's pocket around me.) i was told that this is common practice and some kind of fraud. got charged for this, no refund by uber's so-called 'customer service'! never ever use uber - this practice, terrible drivers and bad cars also. just take a taxi. they're available everywhere and it's only 1 or 2 € more. it's absolutely worth it.

Review Body: #cairns #uber drivers take jobs keep you waiting 20 min then cancel & there's no option for feedback... don't take a job holding it for 20 mins if u don't intend to honour it #poorservice

Review Title: Delivery is always late, food is always cold, customer service is appalling
Review Body: delivery is always late, drivers are always rude, food is always cold. when trying to speak to support to get some help, am met with automations and excuses. tried several times to escalate a complain but each time i’m met with the same automated message. there is no way to actually speak to a human to get issues resolved

Review Title: My interaction with apps on a phone is…
Review Body: my interaction with apps on a phone is challenged as it is, and i did not find the uber app very easy to use.  the "now" button with the little, inconspicuous dropdown arrow for scheduing a pick-up time was one of my downfalls.  the first time i used the app (on 10/3) i must have lucked into hitting the dropdown arrow.  i wanted to schedule a pick-up at least a half-hour out, and that is what i was able to do; however, hitting that little dropdown arrow was not intentional.  when i went to use the app again on 10/5, i just hit the little button on the front, to schedule a pick-up and much to my surprise it went into an immediate ride request mode that i could not get out of.  i could find no way to get to a scheduling page.  after about 30 seconds i did find a way to cancel the ride request, but, of course, i had to pay a $6.00 inconvenience fee.  so, a slightly different button design for now vs. scheduled requests would be nice.  two buttons, maybe?  there were other things that confused me, too, so improvements to the app are in order.the two rides themselves were fast, comfortable, and expertly driven, and the drivers were obviously very knowlegable.  they were also graciously friendly and welcoming.  i will certainly use uber again when i next need to, but the app (and my use of it :-) ) needs a little work.

Review Title: Today I left my phone in a Uber car
Review Body: today i left my phone in a uber car, i had my two year old daughter and my hands were too full and i’m guessing it slipped out. i tried for two hours to reach uber support when agent after agent would need our chats without resolving the issue until they completely froze my account to where i could not even log in , they had no number to call and reach any one for help at all! i still don’t even have my phone this has been the worse experience even without an emergency there is no one to reach they would not even reach out to the uber driver for me i know it’s hard not having a car but i would not waste not a penny on this service they are so careless when it comes to customers i would highly recommend lyft .

Review Title: My first experience of using Uber…
Review Body:
my first experience of using uber wasn’t good at all,we was waiting outside chalk farm station with my 19 year old great niece after seeing a local gig trying to get her back to her halls of residence in woolwich and she was cancelled on by 2 drivers.
we just about caught the last train and made our way to liverpool street station.
then it got better a driver arrived within 8 minutes and we got her home safe.we then got another driver within 10 minutes wait to chingford and loughton with a very nice new driver who had only been on uber for 4 days,i gave him a 5 stars rating.
i had no idea that once the driver accepts you they can then cancel, this is not acceptable in my opinion and is very worrying for vulnerable people like my 19 year old niece.

the worst company of 2022. their customer and support service is the worst of any company that i have been dealt with. they do not have a landline to deal with those that want to become an uber driver.  how can a service company does not service to their employees? your driver is the driving force behind this company yet you don’t know how to take care of them. i try to do my background to be a driver with them for the longest time, and they still have not resolve this issue for more than a year. i have a perfect record on my background, i don’t even have a speeding tickets on record. i can tell management does not know how to run this company, in 5 yrs time this company will beaten by lyft just like how amazon has beaten out ebay.  this company is the worst of the worst they do not care about their employees.

drivers were all excellent, 5-star drivers. we did have one cancel last minute when he was only 400 feet away, but anither driver immediately picked up the trip and was there within 2 minutes. my only real issues are with the app - 1) it’s annoying and time consuming to have to use the back arrow repeatedly to add multiple stops;  why not just make it so you can do it all at once on that screen? 2) defaulting the payment method to paypal every time is also annoying and results in having to start over if it isn’t caught and changed to the correct payment  method; this is not only time consuming and frustrating, but can also result in losing a good priced fare.

do not take uber, uber is not a secure platform uber they rob drivers and rob customers when a customer asks for a trip and the trip does not start and uber already takes your money and if you cancel the trip and ask for another trip it comes back and takes your money and it takes 7 business days to return it to you, and from the drivers it takes from 25 to 40% for each trip uber does not pay the toll for the lga, jfk and newark airports, do not do uber is a platform that does not provide security to drivers or customers, uber forces drivers to take any rite and if you cancel the rite after a certain time it deactivates the application also happens with lift do not take those applications look for another method for your safety i know a person that she was stabbed taking a lift and lift and uber does not guarantee safety. i warn you, do not take those applications, look for private transportation and do not take those applications.

Review Title: Uber’s customer service as it  declines
Review Body: the 1st ride experience with a luxury lux, the car was a bit dirty, smells like someone smoking in the car.  driver was nice, although, he was not that attentive to needs compare to previous uber ride!  he was although respectful!  the music sound was not that great either.  i did not feel the ride of a luxury at all!  also, the ac was not on, the driver decided to open his window so, i did not like that air from outside coming in especially in the freeway.  it would be nice if he ask us at least to open the window instead.  it seems like he is saving gas money! 2nd attempt from sofi to dtla!  we got dropped or cancelled 3x.  drivers seems being sneaky and picking passengers up with self contract deal. 3- 4 attempts were unsuccessful, although they charged our card on file in which will dispute if charged since, we did not take the ride!  we felt stranded at sofi.  we were so stressed as the night falls and we can’t get a ride, until we found ourselves doing an unsafe practice, in which we contracted with an unknown driver for a ride ( uber/ lyft)!  we were so terrified, especially as this driver started using an alternative routes at inglewood!we were shook, and will now think twice before riding uber again ever! most definitely the service has gone down!  it’s unsafe!

Review Title: Got stranded in Dallas after a concert
Review Body: got stranded in dallas after a concert. there were no uber drivers available but the app kept telling me i had one scheduled then as time got closer i did not receive notification of a driver and the app just kept saying someone was coming. it was terrifying. we were in dallas for the state fair and had taken uber to the concert in arlington. at 12:30 am we had no idea how we were going to get back to dallas to our hotel. thank goodness a friend came in to dallas and was willing to come get us in the middle of the night.

friendly, knowledgeable
and polite driver. very impressed.

booked my uber to w3, cost £16.94.but i was on uber driver asked me to confirm address, and said i booked for w13. which is lie,i never booked for w13, so new price quoted £26.66. this is cheating, like every one they are also cheating customer but legally.

Review Title: Easier way to reach previous Driver
Review Body: there must be an easier way at least for a limited time one can reach their pervious uber drivers... even up to 1 month... can't get a hold of one of the drivers who was supposed to wait for me that i hadn't paid yet.

Review Title: Terrible and shocking customer service; lazy customer reps
Review Body:
terrible and shocking customer service for both uber ride and uber eats.

several times the drivers have diverged from the map and route which has consequently resulted in me getting charged double. i complained to uber about this, each time they took ages to refund me and not without me physically having to call them (so much for “quick and efficient customer support via the app”).

their uber eats customer service is even more shocking. i was delivered a completely wrong order, i contacted uber eats with all of the photographic evidence and they still refused to refund me (therefore clearly not bothering to check my images and corroborating this with the order receipt to see the clear discrepancy). they say one thing but do another - their aim is to only steal your money. they’ll ask you to follow the processes to receive the correct resolution, but won’t stick to the same processes and circumvent around these and the issues, as well as make excuses to accept their responsibility in failures of their service to avoid refunding you. in simple words: they are thieves.

their customer representatives are so incompetent and lazy, they’ll often just send automated scripted responses to avoid looking in to the issues and actually resolving the matter.

the app is poor
we was at emirates and kept getting cancelled
cheeky drivers should not be allowed to choose do your job or get another
black cabs had no decency to stop for a man and small child,shame on you and this is what you get and i’m happy uber has stung you thickle lot
we walked 10 mins to holloway road rebooked uber but the stupid app had our location at the old waiting place and wouldn’t update
ubers a cheap skate the cars are dirty i’d rather get a black cab but after yesterday i’ve change my opinion on black cabbies they’re all the same scabby cabbies

my car broke down i needed a ride to hardware store. the driver got to my location very quickly. when it was time to leave the hardware store another uber driver got to my location quickly as well. both drivers were willing to talk along the way. was very nice.
the ride was ok. the driver wasn't very talkative but he was an ok driver.

everything generally was great
service driver vehicle service excellent good work keep it up
thanks 🙏

Review Title: I'm very impressed with Uber and it's…

Review Title: Used the book in advance feature and it…
Review Body: used the book in advance feature and it worked great. driver (ronald) arrived right on time, app provided timely updates and the trip was uneventful, which is what you are looking for in a ride to the airport.

booked the first ride for £8 (including discount) however, after waiting 15 minutes for the app to find a driver, uber cancelled the ride was very disappointed. booked for the next ride, this time was charged £15.40  which was a big increase for me from £8:to £15.40 within 30 minutes. driver was very nice, but was disappointed with uber. i will appreciate a refund of my money for the inconvenience caused.

we used 4 different uber drivers. to drive extremely fast. and 1 had a grossly dirty car. the uber appt is really easy to use and very convenient. we will definitely use uber again. dates we used were 9/27-9/28

honestly the worst customer service i’ve had i years.

there’s no number to call, it takes so much time before you get to talk to someone and they say they’ll do something and they don’t.

i never received my order, tried to talk to them several times on the chat. it failed a bunch of times. at first they said they couldn’t refund me and couldn’t reach the driver, which is very convenient, then they confirmed they would refund me and send me an email confirmation and they never did.
nice ride, driver was very polite.
driver was very efficient
excellent experience- booking was easy. driver was courteous and his car was clean. he arrived promptly!

Review Title: Vince was an excellent example of why I prefer Uber.

Review Title: Called for an Uber driver the other…
Review Body: called for an uber driver the other day. the guy just passed me by did not stop yet  still uber took my money and tipped the driver. i was very upset. you have no phone number to get in contact with them. well i'll never use it again and it's mighty funny that when i paid $40 for a hamburger to be delivered they could find the address but when i needed a ride he couldn't find the address. i don't know. i guess these companies have so much business. they're too busy for business. i understand i won't be calling uber again!

as ubereats driver. they see us as numbers. everything is about money to them. greed is its fuel. they have no real support but chat bots that keep replying with the same copy / paste text. enough said.

i will never use uber again

arriving at my place i was charged plus 10€ it was supposed to cost

so, driver terrible, customer service, horrible experience.

do not use! pay the slight extra and keep safe people!!

Review Title: Uber is great and I normally don't have…
Review Body: uber is great and i normally don't have any issues. i have had drivers who will cancel my ride after i'd all ready waited about 10 minutes for them and was depending on them to be there at the time the app said. i have had drivers cancel my ride after waiting 15 minutes! this should not be allowed. cancellation should only be allowed up to 3 minutes after accepting a ride. people have places to go and this messes up everything. fix it!

bryan was an excellent driver. he was very engaging and knowledgeable of the routes around the city and to the venue he was taking us (red rocks amphitheater).

he was so enjoyable and his vehicle top notch quality that we booked him for our return trip.

i would recommend him to anyone for any situation. he is worth twice the price charged.

Review Body: the first uber driver was great. he had the van because we had 6 people.  the second uber was very rude. he never greeted us and his vehicle was not uber xl. we were very uncomfortable.
our driver robert was prompt, professional and had an awesome personality!

i recently used uber for grocery delivery after receiving a coupon. i use instacart weekly so thought i would give it a try. two items were refunded and the driver never asked if i’d like replacements of any kind and $23 of items were missing and one was so bad i don’t know why anyone in their right mind would even put it in a cart. i never received the $23 back from uber after messaging their customer service they just ignored my messages. i would never use this service again. please do not use their grocery services if considering. i completely threw away $23 and now need to go back to the grocery store because i don’t have enough food for the week.

Review Title: Very pleased with the prompt response
Review Body: very pleased with the prompt response, great drivers, ease of booking - i think uber is a good alternative to taxis, public transportation and hitchhiking.  the drivers seem to know the routes, are pleasant and easy to work with, and arrived at the stated time.  really appreciate knowing the driver's name and car before they arrive.  they were all courteous and helpful.

Review Title: Added an unwanted stop, then charged for additional drop off
Review Body:
ordered an uber in belgium. the driver took me to the wrong hotel. when i advised, he recalculated the route and took me to my destination, but uber charged me an extra 10 euros for an "additional stop" even though it was unwanted, delayed me, and wasn't a stop (ie nobody got out as it wasn't the right place). appalling service and daylight robbery on the part of uber
edit: after being asked to email uber on 4 separate occasions, i've given up on getting an employee with an ounce of common sense and instead have downloaded other apps.
poor driver service, incompetent customer service, zero effort to resolve issues, and a substandard performance all around.

Review Title: I have been using Uber for almost 2…
Review Body: i have been using uber for almost 2 years on a weekly basis. to start with i thought this app was great, had no issues through covid, but i have noticed in the last 6months or so the service is getting worse  , some drivers don’t go the route you tell them too so it takes longer to get to your destination. drivers accept your request then cancel last minute. it annoys me that the prices go up when there arnt many cars, it should be the opposite! should be cheaper because we are waiting longer for a taxi!  don’t like how it charges you like £1 extra if you stop at the shop and that you have to put it in the app, which over complicates things. just going down hill for uber in my opinion and i’m thinking of going with another taxi company. uber you are loosing a good £40 a week with me, best get some things tweaked

every uber drivers should  consider them self as uber personnel slave by driving 80miles for £40 this is clearly slavery plus uber steal from drivers they not aware of it because of busy time if uber steal £20 the least from 50000plus drivers who doesn't have clue about it imaging why uber worth 60billlion because of stupid drivers with slavery backgrounds
the driver was on time, very friendly, had a nice car, and provided a pleasant experience to the denver airport.

driver was bang on time, polite and friendly. very reasonable price, and payment is so easy!

sometimes drivers just sit in a parking lot and do nothing after you pay them to drive you. so you wait for thirty minutes for no one to come then you have to cancel and pay six dollars for their mess up. i don’t recommend uber to anyone who can avoid it.

Review Title: I had an order for some drinks
Review Body: i had an order for some drinks, i ordered 8 and the driver only brought 4, i asked him why only 4, he said that's all they had, i asked about the payment, he said that's not his problem and to contact uber eats. i have tried to ring them, speak on line with them and they've hung up each time. their customer service is shockingly below par. do not use they are awful, user deliveroo

Review Title: I got an Uber earlier and the driver…
Review Body:
i got an uber earlier and the driver was very weird throughout. complimented my smile calling it pretty and very nice and staring at me and smiling in the rear view mirror. we got to the destination and he said “you’re the most beautiful woman i’ve ever seen in the world no cap” etc etc. said he wanted to “tell me something disturbing” like ?????? w t f
reported to uber and called them but they love to try and say “did he touch you?” “did he use malicious words?” like what is all of that not enough to justify a refund and the guy being banned?

Review Title: Driver took way too long to arrive but…
Review Body: driver took way too long to arrive but the ride was good overall

Review Title: I had a trip earlier today and I…
Review Body: i had a trip earlier today and i accidentally put my destination like 4 mins away which was by a main road (motor way type)from what it was so i changed the trip told the driver and he was okay with it but he said it didn’t change on this phone then when he started to be rude, he then took us to my destination but then locked the door and told us we can only get out if we tipped him 5£ and left a 5 star review i have no money so i didn’t do he took us back to where i accidentally put the destination while swearing calling me names and being horribly rude so i being angry also started saying stuff back and you would then left us on a busy road calling us bi*ches. i am not happy with it at all!

Review Title: Ubers not good if your Disabled!!!
Review Body:
i like uber for many reasons. ease of use. able to pay with phone. safety of having records of the drivers incase they do something bad to you. what i hate is they don't compromise if your disabled. i ordered a uber today and the pick up marker went to the wrong place it was close to me but a fair walk down the road.
i rung the uber driver saying can you drive down the road a bit i wont make the 8 minute cut off point because i struggle to walk.
he didn't answer me about driving up and said something like keep walking i will wait here. i said uber cancels automatically you cant wait and we got cut off and i got really distraught because i knew i wouldn’t make it on time and will be charged for the fact my legs don't work properly.

i really strained myself and was in immense pain trying to make it to the end of the road sobbing and panicking all the way. just as i got to the point he was suppose to be there he was no where to be seen and i got the notice that my uber is cancelled and i got charged nearly £7 for the drivers inconvenience.
i got so upset that my disability that badly affects me always seems to affect uber. this is not the first time this has happened because of my disability. there needs to be something in place to be more helpful for people with disabilities its not fair.

if you drive for uber, they make up reasons to keep any referrals they offer you… they stole $700 from
me. 50 supervisors later and still they refuse to issue the referral after the driver i referred finished his trips

Review Title: Fist time using uber in the US very…
Review Body: first time using uber in the us very nice service and friendly driver thankyou

Review Title: I was in a hurry and ordered an Uber…
Review Body: i was in a hurry and ordered an uber well in time for my appointment.  i was cancelled 6 times by different drivers after being told my collection time went from 4 mins to 20 mins 6 times i had almost given up. finally a driver picked me up 1hour 30 minutes after my first request!  nightmare

today i have booked auto from my home to gandhinagar. it was showing 2 min away for 20 -30 min it did not come. it was an emergency. i called driver. no one picked. then i waited for another 15 mins. then booked some other and reached the destination. now they are imposing cancellation charge on me. their app does not has  complaint tab. where to complain

very bad experience , pathetic services.
forgotten my kid toys in the cab and tried many times to driver for returning them back but till now i didn`t receive it. requested many times on uber app to connect with driver but no response.
prompt pickup and drop off. both drivers friendly and professional. cheap fares. will definitely use again.

in lv, i took the uber from airport to the hotel. the driver did not say a word when we met. he opened the truck, but did not get off and help us move two heavy suitcases. he dropped us off at the door of casino. when i said i actually want to go to the lobby, he did not say anything and opened the truck. we had to remove our two suitcases on our own. he drove away

Review Title: There is lot of cancellation in ride
Review Body: there is lot of cancellation in ride. if we are cancellation you are charging. and what about you when after confirmation of driver still the ride are getting cancelled.
