Review Title: Very efficient and the driver was very…
Review Body: very efficient and the driver was very friendly and helpful. perfect service delivered.

darwin uber - charged us waiting time when we were the ones waiting! go figure - the driver was in the wrong place and we had to message him and find out where he was. hidden charges - admin fee and ntg levy now appearing on uber charges doesn't give you this information before you book, needs to be upfront so you can see your total cost.
excellent trip, helpful driver

Review Title: The driver indicated to me to xxxx
Review Body:
the driver indicated to me to get fxxx queensland rego 169epz after i beeped him to move his car and cross the street at king av and blunder rd durack at approx.4.30pm 18/09/2022. he then swerved in front of me to stop me passing him going north on blunder road. at the traffic lights he lowered his window and made derogative remarks to my wife.
she was very offended.

richard
everything ran very smoothly. driver peter was friendly and was a very competent and careful driver

Review Title: Yesterday I have taken uber ride from…
Review Body:
yesterday i have taken uber ride from sakinaka to chembur.when i booked the cab, the rent was showing 226 rs, once i have reached at my destination the cab driver told me the rent is 382 rs.

i was trying to reach uber customer care but their is no customer care contact available that you care reach immediately. uber app is totally fraud. very bad experience.

Review Title: I would like to address my concern…
Review Body: i would like to address my concern every time i ride with over i usually wait for 25 mins. before the driver arrive and it always says completing a trip nearby why most of the driver pick up a customer while she or he is completing a trip? why not give a chance to those available?

i was picked up late in the evening. as the driver pulled up to my house, i told her to pull up behind my husband's vehicle so she didn't block the side street. she drove a few feet further as if she didn't hear me - and proceeded to block the road. a car was waiting for her to move out of the way. she got very flustered - yanked my suitcase out of her trunk and took off. my backpack containing my wallet, charger, and epilepsy medication was still in her car. i managed to catch her at the end of my street - i was running, shouting, waving my arms. she either ignored me or didn't see me. i promptly called uber support which connected me to her. she wouldn't answer so i left a message. she never responded to me. i called her a few times the following morning before she finally picked up. her excuse was, she turned off her alerts or whatever when she went into the grocery store less than a block away from my house to use the restroom. she said she then picked up another passenger (her uber "app" was off so she never received calls or messages... but she picked up another client right after me....??). she said she realized the mistake when the passenger handed her my backpack thinking it was hers. i was frustrated but let her know that i could meet her in a parking lot or a public place near where she lived so she didn't have to go out of her way. she declined and brought it back to me that evening. despite all of this, i was still charged a $15 return bag fee. one of my medications was missing from the backpack. i wrote several emails explaining all this to uber support, and they just kept sending back the patented response that my driver had to go out of her way to return my bag. i will never use uber again.

uber charged £4.18 for a cancellation fee for a trip cancelled by the driver. contacted customer service who said the fee was to compensate the driver. agent eventually agreed refund. for any enterprise to charge any fee for a service that their employee/agent cancelled is ludicrous. uber used to offer a good service. no longer the case. won't be using again.

i was picked on 09/15/2022 from evergreen,calgary alberta canada to costco tsutiina calgary around 5 pm. i left my phone and i cannot log into my uber account as it require me to enter the code they are sending to my missing phone. may you please provide a number i can call you have this resolved or have the driver drop my phone at my residents were he picked me.
paris - driver was 26 minutes late and then cancelled the ride. kept telling us he was coming. no opportunity to get another uber or taxi in time to get to our trip.

Review Title: What a con! They cancelled and I am charged!
Review Body: ordered an uber for pick up in bristol outside the harbour hotel and spa. was initially told 2 minutes then after 2 mins it changed to 3 mins and went on like this for about 20mins then a message flashed up on my phone telling me the driver had cancelled. had to order through another company and wait another 10mins. this morning i receive a message from uber telling me i will be charged £4.05 for cancelling! i didn’t cancel! the driver did! what a con!! i replied to the receipt email which was returned as a no reply email of course! there is no way i can contact uber to complain directly as it’s just a list of set questions and answers.  so i am letting everyone on trust pilot know not to use them - beware!

Review Title: I’m new to Uber and I loved using it on…
Review Body:
i’m new to uber and i loved using it on beverly hills, ca all the drivers where very nice and professional. i especially loved the communication because i’m
not good with computers / phone etc. uber was easy to use and less expensive than a cab.
my driver, was very nice and got me to my location safely and on time !!

Review Title: I will never book an Uber again
Review Body:
booked an uber for a hospital appointment from sw london to central london. driver was 15 minutes late; no apology and he spoke very loudly on his mobile while shouting at other road users for the full hour’s drive.

coming back every uber who accepted the booking disappeared from the map seconds later. i was ill, in a wheelchair and desperate to get home. i had a carer with me so had to “walk” to the nearest main road and flag down a black cab. it was a smooth ride home with a friendly, skilled driver who wasn’t concerned about going “south of the river”.

will never book an uber again.
excellent communication and speedy pickup. pleasant driver and very informative.
the driver we had from orlando to palm coast return was excellent, he drove slower and was very polite

booked two trips in hurgada and both the drivers have been really professional and kind. definitely a 5/5 service
thank you to sherif and mohammad

terrible customer service experience i was charged 29$ for a driver canceling the ride before they even got there and customer service is unavailable or something there isn’t a phone number you can call and they don’t email you within 24 hours.

Review Title: if you are lucky with the driver, then everything is fine
Review Body: i use it out of necessity. it's like a lottery. usually a long wait and an uncomfortable ride. but sometimes there are experienced drivers. which leave a pleasant impression. on june 10 in berlin, lucas made my day. because he brought me to the airport in a short time

Review Title: Unethical and un professional service , no value of customers time,
Review Body: seriously fed up of uber.. i was almost waiting for an hour for uber even after pre booking…broad sun light you guys made me to stand along with my 4 years daughter on road…very un professional and un ethical service you guys provide… i pre booked my cab at 12 15… for pick up at 12 45 almost half an hour lead time was given but still 2 of the driver cancelled enroute to the pick up point … does uber have any sop’s for driver and do u really take any disciplinary actions against such incidences… and this is not the first time happening with uber many times i faced same issues  with your service.. probably this would be my last ride and i am going to quit from your hectic service

very bad service every time i want to use it or price is mental. never get uber on time especially in the morning. just uber driver cancelled my trip with no reason.. how many times i didn't even got a refund. all together would be like 50 pounds already.. very not happy

yet again uber driver in the estepona region left us waiting as he didn’t want the trip and didn’t want to cancel it. still uber charged us 5 euro even though we didn’t cancel. use bolt instead they don’t treat you like this

Review Title: I have two issues with uber lately they…
Review Body: i have two issues with uber lately they charged me for a ride i never ordered  and a few days later i ordered food and there driver  stored it and never delivered it and was still charged for bought the food and tip tried to contact and got no response from them at all so my point of view uber is just as  guilty as there driver angel in los angeles area

horrible uber customer service. for my very old cancellation fees due to bad drivers, they would not reasonably dispute. i will not go back to uber. they are just so incredibly stupid willing to lose a customer for $15. i am so happy that there is other options out there. even though that my company would have to pay more, but i am not giving a chance to uber until they can reasonable resolve my issue.
both trips...to and from the hospital...both vehicles were on time, clean. both drivers were very nice, friendly and most respectful and helpful. very pleased with the service.
drivers don t take jobs under 2 mile. shame

Review Title: Arrived early, pleasant and good driver.
Review Body: driver was actually 5 mins early which was a nice surprise. he patiently waited till we were ready. was pleasant and drove safely getting us to our appointment with plenty of time to spare.
good service! good price! gustavo is good driver!

Review Title: Avoid Uber all at All cost you’ll be paying more that they show You
Review Body:
uber shows you upfront what the cost of the ride is however when completed the charge is different from what was originally quoted by up to $1.50 difference (more) so trusting uber to provide correct information is incorrect and there is no phone number that uber provides to dispute the charge so you have to dispute it through your bank.
i would not suggest or recommend uber to anyone as i preceive them to be a tip off company
drivers are friendly but i would avoid using uber and find another transportation company in its placement

i don't know where too start from the drivers cancelling 2 mins before they get too you or the surge charging they do 7$ rides turns too 30$ rides the wait times the lame customer support uber is just not it anymore

Review Title: Excellent and timely service in a nice…
Review Body: excellent and timely service in a nice vehicle. driver was good.
everything went well. the only problem i had was deciding what to order. ordering was easy, the driver came right to my patio door, and the food was great.

Review Title: Once we got a driver the ride was fine
Review Body: once we got a driver the ride was fine.  the first driver was on the wrong street and had to make a u turn to pick us up but could not make a u turn.  instead he cancelled.  the second just parked somewhere and did not move or answer any calls.  the third was great but because of the 45 minute delay with the first driverswe missed the wedding ceremony.  the return trip was better.  maedot does not answer phones.  i do not have the name of the drive who could not make a u turn.

first time i ever used uber. at first i somehow ended up  scheduling a pickup and it was almost $40us. i asked a waiting uber driver and he said i should cancel that and select immediate pickup which i did without charge and the driver was there in 2 minutes and cost $13us.
great service!!  our driver picked us up at 5am from the hotel and promptly dropped us off immediately in the front of the airport in ciudad juarez.

terrible rip off company. drivers repeatedly cancel trips last minute and charge me, uber support either don't refund or put "credit" into my uber account rather than refund me!! i've been messed about with ubers for the hospital and other important journeys. thieves

customer support is totaly terrible. they are incapable to solve easy settings for driver. they answer once a month on my qyuestion. they gave me advice that didn't solve anything and since then it's been quiet.

Review Title: Driver cancelled last minute and Uber…
Review Body: driver cancelled last minute and uber just pretend they don’t know what i am talking about and make it difficult. if i had cancelled with them, they would be charging me. i am going to use lyft now instead, hopefully they are better.

Review Title: My driver was so welcoming and made me…
Review Body: my driver was so welcoming and made me feel safe. thank you for hiring exceptional people.

Review Title: Had a great experience using Uber
Review Body: had a great experience using uber.  the response time was quick & the drivers personable.  we felt comfortable at all times & will use this service again.
both the uber drivers that we used were very good, clean vehicles and very professional

Review Title: Dishonest company with despicable anti-consumer business practices
Review Body: manipulates prices (checked uber in uber app at ~0:45: €~36 > checked taxi prices on web > returned to uber at ~0:50: price raised to €73.24). charges you for rides you don't take because driver cancelled or never showed up. unreliable driver location, keeps jumping around. often stops updating driver location and waiting time. bs waiting times, says ~15min before you pay, then raises to ~30min or cancels afterwards. rides arrive and leave without you, must wait 1+ hour for another driver. can't review drivers who never show up. constantly charges riders wait-time fees when drivers stop at the wrong pick-up location (and sometimes leave the car, go to coffee shops, and wait for you there), denies refund requests, eventually reluctantly refunds after rider insistence and paypal pressure, and then claims the refunds were neither approved nor given by uber and blocks riders and demands they refund the refunds as "unfinished payments"/"pending balance" to resume using uber. calls you the wrong name and lies that you were not charged for certain trips and received refunds twice when both paypal and bank activity show that you were charged for all trips and no refund was credited twice anywhere.

Review Title: We have had great drivers here in…
Review Body: we have had great drivers here in savanah

***avoid avoid using this delivery service*** delivery drivers do not know how to use basic navigation and have no customer services training. i was very disappointed with delivery driver who came 45 minutes late, was lost and confused and couldn’t find my property despite my house being the first house. he lied saying he was stuck in traffic whilst riding a motorcycle. he was actually on a personal call and as a result my food was cold and ice cream melted.
also the delivery driver looked totally different to picture of the driver that was on the app.

Review Title: Very quick and easy to use…
Review Body: first time using uber love how quick we got picked up and how nice all drivers where
great drivers! professional and on time!

Review Title: Both of my drivers were courteous &…
Review Body: both of my drivers were courteous & friendly & they arrived in a timely manner.
very happy with uber!! my driver was on time and the price was great. car was nice and clean and comfortable. definitely would recommend!

Review Title: Uber refuses to act on scamming report
Review Body: driver charged 1 euro on top of the price as indicated by the meter. i reported this to uber support as it is clearly a scam and only received copy-paste responses. there are better companies that provide the same service. if i uber is keen on letting a loyal customer the spends 100s if not 1000s of $ a year go and refuses to address fraud reports so be it.

i live in loughborough uk recently using uber app is a nightmare , they are charging even once when the driver did not arrive and didn't answer my call and messages . and was charged twice after cancellation immediately because wait time between 15-20 minutes , this app should be shut down !!! someone should take them to court

Review Title: Very timely and actually earlier than…
Review Body: very timely and actually earlier than expected.  vehicles very clean and drivers very courteous!

Review Title: The driver for our ride to the airport…
Review Body: the driver for our ride to the airport made our trip very pleasant, with  pretty good conversation on the way.
prompt service, the car was clean and comfortable, the driver was polite and an excellent driver. i'm very happy i chose uber for my trip!

Review Title: Visiting my father in the last days of his life
Review Body: awesome all the way, i love the diversity of your drivers! brent was the best
our driver jose went above and beyond when a cell phone got left behind in his car.  he truly came thru for us.

Review Title: I have a complaint with your electronic…
Review Body: i have a complaint with your electronic messaging system. when the driver pulled me into the driveway, i hit the 20% tip button. when i walked into my house i had received a email from uber that said the fare was $36, there was no tip on the receipt that you sent me. this was probably three minutes after the guy had left so i was concerned that the driver did not get a tip and you keep on asking you know to read etc. however i had already raided him and given him a tip so i was concerned he didn’t get a tip i gave him another tip i would like my money back but further this has to happen to people all the time were you send an email that says this is your fair and they’ve already given a tip and they’re confused so they double tip please change your system if somebody wants to call and talk to me i’d be happy to talk to them thank you

disgraceful service, no customer contact points, waited 40 minutes for a ride, everytime a driver was connected to and was within 5 minutes they would cancel and i’d be stuck waiting for a new driver to be connected to. similar thing with the food delivery unable to find a delivery person (hah in london centrally, i don’t believe this.

Review Title: they don’t care if u’re late. No matter the reason. They consider it cancellation and charge on top of your paid fee
Review Body: we were late to exit the house because our kitten had some problems and the car parked 2 houses further down the road so the driver or uber conveniently said we were no show up and cancelled. obviously you are charged for cancellation  too on top of your fee already paid for the trip (even if we didn’t cancel) so this rule/ condition is making more money for uber and taxi drivers get paid without providing the service. win win but not for the customer!!!!

Review Title: My Ueber positive experience.The driver arrived as per the app and…
Review Body: the driver arrived as per the app and he was extremely pleasant throughout the trip. i enjoyed the ride very much and safely was delivered to my destination.
on time, very polite and helpful driver.  helped with luggage and was pleasant to converse with.

i cancelled an uber trip because one uber had not connected me with a driver and the nearest one was 7 minutes away,  the bus fortunately for me had shown up. at the time i had $100 in my uber wallet,  the trip was for $27. i looked at my account today and found the balance was $74. i've tried to get support from uber and the customer service officer comes back at me asking for a screenshot of my bank statement highlighting the charge  i respond by saying "let me do your job for you"  the money deducted came from my uber wallet, which will not show in my bank statement. unscrupulous,  uncaring and unbelievable behaviour.  be careful when cancelling a trip with uber check details immediately. this company doesn't care at all.

Review Title: The driver stole money from me and ran…
Review Body: the driver stole money from me and ran also he not mentioned that the ride is paid. totally misbehave during ride. please help me on this. driver was ridiculous and harassed me during ride.

Review Title: The driver was friendly and prompt
Review Body: the driver was friendly and prompt.  some of the music he was playing in the vehicle was objectionable due to its explicit language.

Review Title: Uber cancelled on me 4 TIMES IN A ROW
Review Body: uber cancelled on me 4 times in a row, waiting in the pouring rain with my 2 kids and wife after a 12 hour day at a hospital. its not the first time they've cancelled too. in total i must have had 20+ ubers cancel on me on various dates and locations. i will be uninstalling my app after this. pathetic company and useless drivers

Review Title: Want to complain about one of your…
Review Body: want to complain about one of your drivers, turned up late, had a bad attitude, really poor service, drives a honda civic

Review Title: I never received my $20 mothers against…
Review Body:
i never received my $20 mothers against drunk driving labor day weekend promo.
very frustrating and disappointing!!!!
the drivers were excellent your greedy company is lucky to have them.
customer service is terrible. charged me for a trip even though the driver never showed up then refused to give a refund. driver still kept the fare for the ride i never took.
drivers were friendly. the app was user friendly.
easy to use app. driver available quite quickly with app mapping route and progress to pick up. reasonable prices, friendly drivers, good qualty cars. excellent service.

Review Title: Great system for getting about in new cities.
Review Body: great system for getting about. sofar had good experiences friendly drivers and puntual arrivals. find uber especially helpful when you are in a city you don't know. transparency of prices and distances are helpful.
on time, excellent driving standard from a courteous and friendly driver.
the ride, the driver and the conversation went well.

uber is a scam. use lyft instead!
they charge riders ridiculous fares, especially during a surge (up to $400 for a 10 mile ride) but only pays driver $20, including promotions. their system is so antiquated, anytime you change your bank info it will put a freeze on your account for up to one week and no one in customer service speaks english. not helpful at all. lyft is the greatest ride sharing app ever designed! they have fiat pricing, better promotions for drivers, they never have these issues and are always able to resolve issues.
excellent service. the driver was calm and patient.
pleasant and enjoyable ride. driver was great.

Review Title: On time and a nice clean car.
Review Body:
on time and a nice clean car.
very friendly driver.
thanks

Review Title: The drivers are very nice and their car…
Review Body: the drivers are very nice and their car is clean. thanks.
the driver arrived a little earlier than initially told he would be.  and he was extremely accommodating when i asked him to make an additional stop

Review Title: Avoid this company at all costs!!!
Review Body: avoid this company at all costs!!!! my husband and i along with our two kids got an uber home last week and my husband received notification 2days later that uber were charging him £110 for urinating in the taxi!!!!! absolutely outrageous!!!! and when we tried to contact uber to dispute this , they had no interest in anything we had to say, just said the driver has said this has happened so that’s that!! absolutely disgraceful! as customers don’t have a leg to stand on with their customer service!!!! this is well known in america as vomit fraud.. beware!

Review Title: Uber is good to travel but worst part…
Review Body: uber is good to travel but worst part is even if the driver himself cancel the trip..again we have to pay for cancelling trip.why do you charge us for that?driver cancel the trip and customer will have to pay cancel trip charge.third class...i will never use uber again.
great experience, loved the driver will be using uber again, good job
called from heathrow t5. cab arrived before we reached pickup point. driver was curteous and delivered us swiftly home.

Review Title: I'm sorry to say it but is in my experience a very poor service
Review Body:
i'm sorry to say it but this is the worst app ever. and i believe that the unfortunate here is how bad the drivers are making look this app.
is a very bad service.
the drivers are very rude most of the time and they seem to not know the roads themselves.
they always cancel and take forever to find a driver and when the guy comes of course he has attitude or he will try to flirt. either one im not happy with.
i wouldn't really recommend it to nobody.
i myself gonna stop today and i will disinstall the app.
compliments to the drivers for rappresenting so well this app.

hello , my experience is a very bad one. my daughter is 13 years old and the driver tried to kidnap her and she was rescued by the crowd after screaming and opening the car door and waving to people to rescue her. my daughter is now traumatised. surprisingly i didn’t receive any contact or any kind of help from ouber support when reported for the incident. i won’t write any review about it , it is clear what kind of company of it! kind of making profit , irresponsible and totally irrespectable to their clients.
booking my rides was very easy and all drivers were courteous and professional.

Review Title: Our driver Ryan is the bomb
Review Body: our driver ryan is the bomb! we have a special needs son and ryan was excellent in communication with him.

Review Title: As a first time Uber user I was…
Review Body: as a first time uber user i was impressed by the ease to use the app and very nice drivers.

1st time i've used and the last..complete scammers and i'm taking ad ice now to take through a small claims court.
all this because of a cleaning fee that i feel is very,very excessive and they will not provide the cleaning receipt to me so i can see that the driver had paid the said amount for professional clean,which was never needed.
i'll stick to ringing a taxi and wait rather than trust this scam again...no thanks

Review Title: I was asked for 10 dollar cash to take…
Review Body: i was asked for 10 dollar cash to take a tollroad. jose kept pushing eventhougrh i didnt want it. uber used to hire clean and in good conditions cars. also, decent drivers, lately that have changed.  drivers are asking personal questions and giving inappropriate  rude commets. cars are dirty and in bad shape.

both drivers on the day i used uber were prompt, polite and helpful, and  their vehicles were clean.  they both drove smoothly and safely. the second driver could not stop at my designated spot because parking was blocked and single lane traffic was heavy.  he drove to a point around the corner closest to me and phoned.  i thought that was exc ellent.

Review Title: Every driver I had was friendly and…
Review Body: every driver i had was friendly and very polite i have had 15 ride something different for me. i will definitely be using your service again.
thankful for a reliable driver who got us to austin airport safely and on time.
patient driver, nice and steady.

Review Title: The taxi arrived promptly and the…
Review Body: the taxi arrived promptly and the driver was courteous. it was a positive experience.
uber really good, safe and so helpful when you need a ride. drivers are all so kind since i started using uber.

charging riders extortionate fares and pay drivers a minimum wage only to satisfy their legal obligations to make it legally binding seems to be the approach to their business model. this has resulted in many demotivated/ experienced drivers unwilling to put up with sometimes 45% commission charged by uber leaving them with little income….the company is desperate to recruit new drivers as they are losing all their drivers to competitors.
clean, friendly and good driver.

my friends and i ordered an uber for £54’09 after a concert. the driver insisted on changing the route because and i quote ‘i want to avoid traffic to be able to get in a few more rides tonight’ and because of the drivers change of route that we did not request uber is now charging us more money. i did not request a change in route and somehow i’m being charged more? i’m giving them 1 star because i can’t give them less.

Review Title: Trust UBER they will get you there.
Review Body: i have found. all drivers are very professional. they know the best route. and the conversations are so interesting and informative about my local area. i will never use another company as a service for transport.

Review Title: Used this service very often over the…
Review Body: used this service very often over the past week. every driver has been fantastic and only had to wait up to 3 mins. very happy customer.

my driver was great! he was friendly, polite, and on time (even at 0430)! he drove safely, signaling and such. the vehicle was well-maintained and comfortable. using the app was easy, the updates about etas were spot on and helpful.

dear uber, the price should be standard at all times base off distance traveled, and taxes surcharges, it should not increase because of your incapability to find a driver. it's not my fault you couldn't find a driver willing to pick me up, yet 3 drivers rejected my ride. i know they are driver partners and not employees,  but if your drivers are rejecting rides, it means it's not worth the money they will earn from your company for said ride,  which makes it ubers fault for the lack of compensation. then they wonder why nobody tips, im not going to tip when uber is already charging more then the ride is supposed to cost. in my mind, the tip is already in the upcharged fare. i'm an employee of my job, not a credit card to use at your disposal.

Review Title: The driver was very friendly and was…
Review Body: the driver was very friendly and was very smart with her conversations.
drivers were on time, helpful and very efficient

booked an uber and the driver called me to tell me he made a mistake and that he wasn’t coming. i was confused why he didn’t just cancel the trip but thought he was maybe just being polite by calling me. i ended up cancelling the trip myself since the driver wasn’t doing it and i really needed to book a new uber. turns out i was charged for it. i’ve just spent the last 15 minutes trying to dispute the charge and look for a contact email. there’s nothing. pretty ridiculous and shady that they don’t have a way to contact them. so now i’ve been charged unfairly and have no way to contact them. avoid uber

regarding invoice #zwlquose-03-2022-0000937
i was charged $10 for a driver cancelling my pickup minutes after i placed the order. i ordered a pickup from the international terminal tullamarine yesterday morning tuesday august 30 at 07:29.
i haven't used uber since 2019 and had trouble with the app and wasn"t familiar with the new uber pickup arrangement at tullamarine.
had i known all i needed to do was order a car curbside i wouldn't have tried to schedule a car for 08:15. it would have been more convenient for everyone.
i'm also sure the driver was able to pick up a fare seconds after cancelling my pick-up. mind you the driver ignored my request to be picked up at 08:15.
i don't see how the driver was inconvenienced and don't see why i should be charged $10 because it was "more convenient" for the driver already sitting in the pickup line.
i also didn't receive a code i could use with any car.
regards,

mark byers

Review Title: Uber drivers used provide a great service
Review Body: uber drivers are prompt and get the trip done with no fuss, and are affordable.

Review Title: The drivers were always plesant and…
Review Body: the drivers were always plesant and helpful with information on tourist spots. we only ever had to wait up to five minutes. cars always clean. a pleasure to use them

i had a comfortable and relaxing ride home. apart from our initial greeting, the driver only communicated with me when i gave him some direction how to pull into the driveway.
this scenario worked well for me because i was able to enjoy my ride in quiet. i liked that the driver respected my space.

Review Title: On both trips (to and from venue) both…
Review Body: on both trips (to and from venue) both drivers were very quick and helpful.

Review Title: Ja ne parle pas la France
Review Body: ja ne parle pas la france.  ja etudidie la france don le ecole d'secondar mas n'east pas reguarde bocuape et j n'est pas excribe boucoup a votour documente.  j parle bien impure.the driver was very good and the vehicle was comfortable but we were charged $1.98 for waiting.  we should not be charged as the driver went to the wrong address.  we were at a hotel and he did not go to the hotel but some other address.  we would like a refund of the delay fee.

Review Title: Every driver had a very excellent lay…
Review Body: every driver had a very excellent lay back feeling. my coworkers are at awe at how fast the drivers arrive. about time they arrive to their cars i'm out of the parking lot. oh what joy 😂. thanks i use uber as my own transit it's simply beautiful every tip i give is from the heart ❤️‍🔥
ali was interesting, respectful and a great driver.  a bright spot in the day.
car arrived on time and at stated pick-up location. he was an experienced driver and delivered us to our desired location. could not ask for any better service.

Review Title: This app really saved me in Spain
Review Body: this app really saved me in spain, with a great driver in sevilla.

i have experienced an unpleasant pattern in portugal recently: drivers abandon you after 20 minutes of waiting. first they don’t hurry to you, once you text them to understand what is going on they ask you to cancel the trip. when you are waiting for a taxi with a baby in your arms for 40 minutes not able to understand if each next car will finally come, it feels worse than just annoying. i would really like to be able to give some kind of feedback to those not coming drivers, so that they are motivated to be more responsible.

Review Title: I hired two Ubers on Sunday
Review Body: i hired two ubers on sunday, both drivers arrived promptly. both drivers were friendly, courteous and expert drivers. i rate their service as excellent.

Review Title: First time ever used the service the…
Review Body: first time ever used the service the driver was prompt the car was clean and comfortable and the driver drove very safely

was impressed. the app showed car registration , driver and time. it arrived exactly on time. driver was so nice and helpful. i’m an older person and he went out of his way to give me extra care. i would highly recommend uber. thank you

Review Title: We were in London England on August…
Review Body: we were in london england on august 6th.  used the uber app to call them and gave them the google maps location.  they went to the wrong side of the market and called us.  we told them that they went to the wrong side and the driver said it would take another fifteen minutes to get to us.  we told him to forget it because there was a taxi there that could take us.we got charged 13 pounds on our credit card for his mistake.  there is no way to contact uber to dispute the charge.  we feel it was their drivers mistake not ours. we were on holidays and time is valuable to us as well.  no consideration for us at all.  we will never take uber again.  if you are in london england the taxis are excellent and usually cheaper than uber, they are everywhere.
riding an uber is like a whole experience especially if you're new in a country. drivers are kind, and will let you know anything new about the place.
no problems with any of my drivers.
couteous drivers, clean vehicles, informative, easy to use app.
chris was a great driver and provided excellent information about the lake tahoe area.
the driver was very help full and accommodating as we had had some difficulties trying to get the booking set as a multiple drop. it's unusual to have such a helpful person as 2am.

this company was so great in the beginning and has now lost so much, i now primarily use other services after being very impressed by uber in the beginning. what the drivers are doing now, and especially in portugal i have noticed this, is accept a ride, then half way before the driver arrive, the driver manually cancels you. this happened 5 times in a row for the same ride, extremely annoying since you have to wait each time. they accept, then cancel, accept then cancel, a 5 minute waiting time can grow to 30 minutes du to this behavior. makes it so i avoid the service.

over charged for the ride.
i ordered an uber for my mother from sandton gautrain station to my house the cost of which was r171. when my niece and my sister arrived at the gautrain station, they called me to ask where the driver was. i had sent them the information about the car ( i sent them a screenshot)) and estimated time of arrival at pick up point. as i was still talking to her the driver called to ask where they were. he told me he's by alexander forbes as they not allowed to pick up from gautrain station something didn't know. as he was talking to me, i heard my niece talking to him also. to my surprise i was charged an extra r67 which was indicated as time. i assume this is waiting time. the total cost was r232, i added r20 tip. if i chose pickup as gautrain and the driver stops somewhere else, why should i pay for that? they were waiting for him as per my request and he was waiting somewhere else for them. i'm very unhappy about this. i wanted to lodge a dispute but your app doesn't have an option for over charging and my bank couldn't assist without a dispute being lodged.

Review Title: A great service and very reliable
Review Body: i mainly use uber when abroad. previously las vegas and more recently paris. i have been very happy to use uber and the service has been great. recently got charged a waiting charge but driver didn’t pick us up at the correct spot. i got refunded straight away when i contacted uber
very clean car. courteous driver

Review Title: User friendly for the apps and the…
Review Body: user friendly for the apps and the driver is very politely

Review Title: Wouldn't use again the driver cancelled…
Review Body: wouldn't use again the driver cancelled my car but still took the money for inconvenience! so i was stranded and money down. there's no way to contact to try and get my money back would never use again don't waste your money or time!!

Review Title: Uber drivers are getting greedy and…
Review Body: uber drivers are getting greedy and dubious. i agree that this may be general and applies to some but the fact that all drivers around auckland international airport are now rejecting jobs costing around $50-$60 - and encouraging you to book a comfort car instead (and grabbing it) is apalling. i told my brother to cancel the booking and i would pick him up. had he installed ola or other apps we would have tried them as well. i have uninstalled uber and will try others from now on. knew it would only be a time before corruption comes through. 😡
clean car, great driver, fast service

Review Title: Everything about my ride exceeded my…
Review Body: everything about my ride exceeded my expectations.the driver was friendly, efficient, and he went out of his way to accommodate my disability.also lately my drivers have acted as if they  were exhibits in a museum, not looking my way ,making conversation or even asking if i needed some special help due to my disability.my last driver was really special and i hope to run into more like him.app is easy to use no problems  there.
booked uber to go to the airport & driver was very professional, arrived on time and helped with our bags.

i just ordered a ride for an elderly friend. driver went way above and beyond and i was going to tip him accordingly but uber put a limit on the tip i could leave and no way to contact him or leave a review comment for him; only a star rating. let your drivers be tipped what customers want to tip!

Review Title: Terrible company the problem with uber…
Review Body: terrible company the problem with uber it's got to big now.  they allow drivers to cancel on you last minute. high prices absolute rubbish

booked a pet uber, waited 20 mins, drivers kept cancelling , utter waste of time, pathetic company won’t be using again , hour walk.
thanks uber my ankles are bleeding just because you run a half cut company

Review Title: Driver saw me and cancelled my trip.
Review Body: booked a ride with uber. the driver messaged he was there.  i wrote i was coming and took the elevator down to meet him. as i was approaching the car the driver cancelled my ride and sped off.   i was about to be late for an important meeting, so quickly booked another- for $70 more than the original booking ($47). i had no other option to get to where i needed to be on time- so took it.  i contacted support and their response was unhelpful, and copied and pasted from what looked like a bank of standard responses.   uber’s lack of accountability for their drivers and their behaviour had driven me away from using the app.  will revert back to taxis moving forward

do not use this company. i used a taxi from uber once and since then the driver has been stalking me parked outside my house for an hour at a time everyday. when i challenged him he threatened back. seems to be some sort of cult individual and very disturbed.

i have used uber a few times in the past and had no problems. i needed to use them to get into london while the trains and tubes weren't running last week. i paid around £40 for the outward journey, all good. the return journey was a disaster, the driver couldn't find us and we eventually found him after about 20 minutes. we asked to add an extra drop off point which was 5 minutes from original address. i expected there to be a higher charge but ended up being charged over £100 for the trip. when i questioned this the next day after reviewing my booking, i was told i would've been made aware of this charge when i added the second stop off to our booking, i was not made aware. i found the customer service unhelpful and unsympathetic. i will not use any of ubers services again, i will spend my hard earned cash with a better provider.

Review Title: No-Show for a scheduled airport drive
Review Body: my friend scheduled a ride for the morning to the airport, which was confirmed by uber. 30 minutes prior to the scheduled pickup, uber reported it would be there on time, and it continued to do so right up until the scheduled time. at the scheduled time, it said it could not find a driver. i had to drive her to the airport at 4am, which was very inconvenient on a day i had to work. if i hadn't been there, she would have missed her flight because of uber. i will never use this rideshare company.

Review Title: I was picked up at a restaurant by…
Review Body: i was picked up at a restaurant by uber. on the way home my girlfriend got sick in the back of the uber. i apologized and asked the uber driver what i should do. he said he had no insurance for this and his car was new. i felt horrible. he asked i give him 150.00 in cash and he could get the car detailed. i did this happily and apologized again. he then put a claim through and i was charged 150.00 again. he was insured for this and blatantly lied to me.

Review Body: driver arrived on time

i ordered a car for 3:35 a.m. from downtown redmond, wa. to seatac airport. i ordered it at that time of day not to watch planes take off but to make a very early flight and give myself time to avoid the stress that comes with getting to an airport gate these days. i was at the front door of my hotel at 3:25 a.m.when i was notified the driver was still over 30 minutes away. he did not arrive until 4:01 a.m., putting me 26 minutes behind my schedule. this was an is inexcusable. that he got me there in 25 minutes doesn't matter because he arrived at the hotel when i should have been arriving at the airport. i  tip everyone well but for this guy -- not a dime. and by the way, uber billed my card twice and i will take that up with amex. i did not need the stress this fool caused me. there was hardly anything on the roads at that time of morning. the only reason for him to have been late is that he didn't give a damn. airport runs need to be on time.
the experience is so great,the uber drivers were always arrival at the time

my wife and i stayed 18 miles from navy pier in chicago and used uber instead of taking our car. we left our hotel prior to 5 pm and paid $50 plus. upon return (after 5 pm) our driver circled the pick-up spot and charged us a waiting time fee. even though, i texted him prior to let him know i was disabled and had a small service dog.
he couldn't speak english and took a longer route so the return trip (after refunding the wait time fees) was still over $70.00. it was a very disappointing trip.

Review Title: We were upset that we waited over 25…
Review Body: we were upset that we waited over 25 minutes only to find out that the driver had cancelled our run.  that was annoying!  the driver we finally got was good, though, so overall the experience was favorable.

i recently took a ride with uber. the ride was about 45 minutes. costs was $45 plus tip $7. i left a gift item in the uber driver's vehicle.  it took 24 hours and several support agents before uber was able to get the driver to respond to me about the item. the driver let me know that the item was found under their seat and that was it. i tried all of that day to see if the driver would return the item and provided my address and increased the charge to bring it to me, but no response.  finally i asked for suggestions to get the item back and no response.  beware of these drivers. they are not honest. no integrity at all. what comes around goes around.

i booked an auto for a distance of 2km and the charge was 93 rupees. i understand that inspite of being selected digital payment i had to pay in cash as driver told without cash payment he would cancel the ride. i book ride as it was really needed to reach on time and driver took the advantage of it. also i tried to change the payment mode to cash during the ride which was impossible to do. as i already paid the driver more than the amount showed in uber, again i have to pay uber app to further book my rides. as uber customer support said i anyway selected digital and have to pay in app. finally i ended up paying 188 rupees just for 2kms.

Review Title: On 08/17/ 2022 I confirmed I ride for…
Review Body: on 08/17/ 2022 i confirmed i ride for newark liberty airport from my residence. the driver arrived & as he saw our two  luggages, he asked where we were heading to. so i told him i already gave the address to him when i called for the ride: the driver claimed his car does not have the paperwork to drive to the above airport. so we cancelled the ride & called for another uber. however, when i checked my email, to my surprised i was billed for the cancelled ride. please let me understand why i should be penalized and charged a cancellation fee due to the lack of requirement of that particular uber proprietor. may this feedback helps improve the standard of issuing business licensure to drivers. thank you.

i just started using uber. my experience so far has been excellent service. the drivers cars are clean, smell good, and they are very nice. they drive smoothly so thank you all who are uber drivers. and i also accidentally dialed 911 on the uber app and i have no idea how it happened, but they went crazy trying to reach me so it's good that they take that seriously incase there was a serious problem. i just let them know it was a accident, and they thanked me for confirming it and i went about my day. so thank you uber people's...... peace to you.

my driver, c, was right on time, very courteous and we had a nice conversation.  he is good people.

useless & unprofessional, arrived at the wrong location & when we realised the driver was 50 yards plus up the road we tried to get to it, my partner fell over ripping shorts & injured her knee, the driver sent a text which i responded to but the pulled away before we could get to him. this is not the first time they have been some distance up the road & then cancelled the trip before we can get to them. so angry this resulted in my partner hurting herself over their stupidity & lack of basic customer service.
great experience with uber will be using this service again very soon. the driver arrived very quickly as well as got to my destination in a timely manner. 👌
ride was fine. driver was pleasant. he took a good route. everything was good.

the drivers have all been great and accommodating. the app is clunky and pops up unnecessary junk while using it. the gps is awful. if i put in an exact city address, why is uber insisting that i pick a corner? twice i was unable to proceed or had to proceed erroneously because uber made up corners for me to choose that didn't exist. i then had to message the driver and tell them where i was. my suggestion to uber is that when i tell you exactly where i am, believe me the 1st time.
the drivers arrived on time, the cars were clean, and they were polite van’s courteous. they took the recommended routes and drove safely. i was very pleased.

i have just started using uber for work and have found it to be extremely efficient. every driver so far has been very friendly and helpful. i’ve been able to leave a five star review for every driver i’ve had this week. if there is one frustration, it’s seeing a driver assigned, waiting 10-15 minutes and then seeing another driver assigned. usually another 10-15 minutes for the second driver to arrive but all the drivers i’ve ridden with are very good.

Review Title: Wait time in last many trips has been…not so good
Review Body: wait time in last many trips has been more than 7-8 minutes. the map on the app is not accurate, hence the drivers on arrival park at a different place and immediately start the waiting timer without waiting even for a minute. because of the inaccuracy of the map, the customer ends up paying the waiting charges which is very unfair.
that driver was professional. an respectful.

Review Title: I'm paying for Uber one and no drivers…
Review Body: i'm paying for uber one and no drivers are picking me up even though i have 5 star rating. several times the uber has accepted my booking then cancelled at the last minute. twice i have been made late for work. i have also had several bad drivers, one was so tired that he was swerving in the middle of the road.
give your drivers more orientation please...
just the facts.  my uber requests  and pick ups were very fast.  the cars were comfortingly clean.  the drivers were cordial and professional.
great ride, wonderful driver!

Review Title: I made reservation a few days prior to…
Review Body: i made reservation a few days prior to the drive to lax airport . who ever was suppose to drive me cancelled and it was alittle stressful because i kept getting notifications that uber was looking for driver even 15 prior to being picked up very dissappointed
app worked great, driver was polite, and. at was nice and clean.
i love uber! always nice vehicles pick you up and nice drivers

Review Title: Danny was my recent UBER driver
Review Body: danny was my recent uber driver. very kind and personable. felt very safe. he found my location and got me home!
car arrived within 5 minutes of request. friendly driver, comfortable car, direct route to airport

Review Title: Not if you have a time deadline
Review Body: i was provided uber credits from tesla service and had to pick up my car by 7pm. i summoned an uber at around 6:15p and the driver was predicted to arrive at around 6:30p. at 6:30p the app still showed he was 4 minutes away and he was still not moving. getting frustrated, i canceled the ride and summoned a new driver. he showed to be approximately 20 minutes away. he showed up just before 7p and quickly took me to tesla. fortunately there was still a service rep there after closing. i’ve learned not to expect a flawless and timely pickup.

great experience! this is the first time i tried uber and i was blown away by how easy it was. the moment i downloaded the app and requested a ride, i received a response within 7 minutes by an available driver! the car was very clean and the driver very courteous. i will definitely use uber again!!!!

Review Title: Charles Webb is a great Uber driver
Review Body: charles webb is a great uber driver. he was couteous and kind. i really enjoyed my ride with him!

Review Title: Very reliable time management...no delayed wait times.
Review Body: very reliable driver ..right on time...no time delay.
all the drivers have been very friendly
always very very satisfied with ubers prompt arrival, friendliness of the drivers, and getting to my destination on time.  also the price is always very reasonable...so much better than a taxi.
drivers polite, good, seemed to be older cars.
hi, i took uber from frisco, tx to dallas love field on aug 16, 2022. stephen was my driver and he was nice and we had good conversation. thank you stephen!!!😊👋

Review Title: I reserved a ride ahead of time for a…
Review Body: i reserved a ride ahead of time for a medical appointment. my driver arrived early, got me to my appointment on time, and was both professional and friendly.
both of our uber drivers were there quickly, were personable and had pride in their city. they gave us tips and dining and activity suggestions. the cars were clean and comfortable. we felt safe.
i travelled by uber on 17th early morning and the driver was excellent. extremely kind. overall i find the uber drivers very helpful and kind.
i have enjoyed each of the uber drivers i’ve met here in the detroit/warren mi everyone has been so accommodating and nice uber does a good job screening their drivers
friendly driver. clean, comfortable vehicle. great experience.

Review Title: Uber Ride Comparisons Between Los Ángeles and Las Vegas
Review Body:
as far as the uber, rides i have taken in las vegas have always been excellent!! the pricing is acceptable, but even better, the drivers are professional, friendly, and take well thought out routes.
unlike uber in los angeles, the prices and especially the drivers are the worst!!! i was not only born in california but i also drove for a ride share, therefore, i know my way around. i gave a 20% tip in los angeles and the driver sent a second request for additional tip! he didn’t say one word to me and didn’t offer to take my carryon small luggage to the curb… and i’m a 73yo senior. i am betting he was upset that i told him how to find the freeway entrance from my house because people often miss it! unbelievable!
great experience... driver was prompt and personable.

Review Title: I enjoy the rides I take with uber.the…🙂🙂🙂🥲
Review Body: i enjoy the rides i take with uber.the cars are clean,the drivers are nice.good conversation along the way.
drivers are good.  their vehicle are good.  your software sucks.
great driver, super clean suv
the driver was early , very very professional. hope i get him the next time
very quick pick up.  friendly and efficient driver.
good experience from pick up.  also return.  drivers excellent.  returning my left behind bad seemed a bit costly.
excellent experiences with uber. all drivers maintain a spotlessly clean car and are very accommodating, helpful and friendly.

booked uber this morning to take up to the o2 area at 6pm. 400m away according to the app and suddenly the driver has a change of mind and cancels the fare! now stood around hoping the next driver arrives or we miss the start of the event!

Review Title: Driver arrived at exact time requested
Review Body: driver arrived at exact time requested, was very helpful with luggage and a pleasure to converse with during our 35 minute ride.

my driver was i believed was leroy
he was most helpful in taking time when i got to my destination to double check online for me if i was at the correct address for a very important interview, i have a lot of respect for uber drivers who don't just drop you off at a location, but will actually check for you to make sure, even though you are the one that imput your destination address
massive thanks leroy.

i love uber, we are traveling across canada in a motor home so we sometimes need to park the motorhome. 80% of our stops have uber drivers it makes life so easy. whether i am grocery shopping or going out fir dinner we generally can count on uber.
i love the uber app , you can see all details about the uber driver , but i still don’t know why i been charged the fee when the driver called to cancelled .

Review Title: The driver was friendly and positive
Review Body: the driver was friendly and positive.  talkative but not too talkative.  drove safely.  got me home directly.

Review Title: Uber is complicit in nationwide drug…
Review Body:
uber is complicit in nationwide drug trafficking. i have personally observed riders being allowed to use their platform to traffic narcotics. i have also observed such riders using very fake names, which uber allows - names which advertise that they sell drugs.

uber has cheated thousands of drivers out of promised covid sick pay. drivers and restaurants regularly report being cheated by uber.

endless surge fees. dangerous platform for drivers and riders alike.

driver was fine. cost was issue. for a 31.5 mile drive, cost almost $90 during low traffic period. i drive this route myself many times, should not have been anywhere close to that cost. i expected $40-45. when checked on other sites for cost, all similar in price (including uber-x) of $41.99. i understand tolls & state surcharge but total price of $87+ was ridiculous. will not use uber-x again from this location if this is the case.
nice, fast, and courteous driver.

Review Title: Both Uber rides today were great
Review Body: both uber rides today were great.  courteous, safe drivers got us to our destinations quickly.
prompt pick-up, friendly driver chris, very respectful and courteous.

Review Title: Driver was courteous and overall good…
Review Body: driver was courteous and overall good experience.
i had a pet with me, before picking up i send message to inform driver about my situation, usually most of the drivers would accept my dog with me, i very appreciate their kindness.
this was my first experience using uber. it was so convenient. the drivers were friendly and courteous. i was very impressed and would definitely recommend this service.

Review Title: I have no problem  with the driver
Review Body: i have no problem  with the driver, my 20min or less ride was 31.99 , that is my problem

overall my experience with the app and drivers was positive. we did experience a driver who accepted the call but who then drove passed us and canceled on us which was very annoying. we suspect he realized we were headed to the airport and didn’t want to leave the area, not sure, but was disappointing…

both my uber drivers were friendly and professional. their cars were clean driving was safe. as a female with luggage, they were kind to assist me in loading and unloading. waiting time was minimal to and from miami international airport.

uber is always available when i need it. on time and very clean. let's you know exactly how many minutes away while counting down the minutes, shows exactly where your driver is and you watch them driving straight to you on the map!! it tells you your drivers name and what they look like as well as what they are driving. they are always very nice and get me where i'm going safe and on time.. absolutely love uber ❤
great ride! had driver take my grandson home and everything went very well. accidentally did my tip twice, but it was worth it!!
the drivers were great, it just seems uber has become too expensive.  i don't really need rides often (only when on a vacation) but if i had more time to spare i would have taken a taxi or a lyft.
every driver during our nashville vacation were great.
the driver was nice,  but he was speeding. he almost got us into an accident pulling out of my street.
smooth process from booking to delivery.  driver was courteous.  pricing was reasonable.
great driver, very polite and alert

Review Title: Both drivers today were pleasant and…
Review Body: both drivers today were pleasant and personable. they drove quickly but safely. thumbs up.
great driver. great conversation 10 star's

Review Title: I had two trips with Uber.
Review Body: i had two trips with uber.to and from the airport.  my 1st trip to the airport was a nightmare.  the driver did not speak english. he was late, i was afraid of missing my flight.  my return trip was vastly different.  it was on time efficient and pleasant.most of my experiences with uber have been great. nothing is perfect all the time.

Review Title: I wish there wasn't a limit of tip
Review Body: i wish there wasn't a limit of tip.  that's disgusting!  i had a very short ride with a very good driver who made what $2 or $3?  why can't i leave a $20 tip?  probably just a way to keep your driver's starving.

Review Body: the driver was prompt and friendly. the ride was comfortable and the driver found the quickest route to get me to my destination.

Review Title: Great experience using Uber in Toronto…
Review Body: great experience using uber in toronto canada!  we traveled from the us to canada for a wedding and took an uber multiple times over the long weekend.  all of our uber drivers provided excellent service.  they were very patient with us not knowing our way around the city very well for some of the pick up points.  always courteous and professional.  thank you so much!

Review Title: I had a positive experience as usual…
Review Body: i had a positive experience as usual using uber services. my rides were on time and the vehicles were clean and the drivers were very friendly. i used the uber app and the process could not be easier.
driver extremely helpful and polite. very safe driver.  he does great job
my wife and i parked at our hotel and used uber for all our travels in nashville, a three day stay. very punctual, convenient and courteous drivers.
driver arrived quickly and safely dropped us at our destination. i appreciate our uber drivers.

Review Title: I waited for the driver at my location…
Review Body: i waited for the driver at my location for at least about 5 min. he went to a parking lot across the road, where there were so many cars. i had to go there and look for his car. took about 2 min. he charged me a late fee. not happy about that.

the driver was there within 2 minutes of when i opened the app and requested a ride. driver was polite, drove well and safely, car was clean, i arrived at my destination in plenty of time. overall, excellent experience as usual

Review Title: I booked a ride the night before  to…
Review Body:
i booked a ride the night before to the airport in the early morning and up until 4 mins before arriving ( which a driver was assigned) i got a “ sorry no drivers in the area, your ride has been canceled “
which is weird because they had a number of drivers in the area … just bad services .

Review Title: Driver drove away when I was reaching for my stuff and lied about it
Review Body: driver stole my stuff, lied about it. admitted he has it after i reported it to the police. driver said he can’t send it back now, i’ll have to go to his house and pick it up (which is 1 hour car ride, i can’t take the train as it takes 2 train rides, 1 bus ride and a walk). so i asked uber to either have it send back, or arrange a car for me to let me pick it up. but uber refuses to take responsibility as they are dealing with it as a lost item. i said “but it’s not a lost item? he immediately drove away with my stuff in his trunk, when i was reaching for it. and he lied about it.” uber said “then you should find police”. but the police asked me to find uber.

Review Title: Uber informed me that there are no…
Review Body: uber informed me that there are no available drivers nearby. after i ordered taxi from another app, suddenly i got info that my driver is coming. when i cancelled, i got charged for cancellation.

uber are not what they once were. i used uber for the first time in a while the other night and i was shocked and frustrated to have every single one accept and then cancel on me. i’m not sure why as my rating is good, maybe they are looking for better jobs? what’s more frustrating is uber takes the money and then often doesn’t return it until upto 30 days later as pending payments. so now i have number of pending payments on my account, money which is on hold that i can’t use and need. i never managed to get a driver in the end and had to get bolt instead.

Review Title: Had to pay a cancellation fee .Very unhappy
Review Body: booked a uber in melbourne.waited 20 min. no response from the driver i tried calling him and my call was ended by  the driver .i couldn't wait any longer so had to run to a taxi rank

horrible service! can't get drivers, they cancel on you constantly, you get charged exorbitant cancellation fees, pricing is being manipulated by the drivers resulting in massive surcharge rates even in non peak times.  customer service via app or website for disputes or refunds is extremely limited and poor. i will never use them again and recommend no one ever does. use an alternative, even the old taxi's are better price and service these days (and that's saying a lot!). this has happened to me over and over again, i'm done.
i'm a new uber user. i've now used in ohio and texas. the app was easy to learn and drivers are polite and professional.

Review Title: My driver was promptly on time and…

Review Title: All the drivers we had in Puerto Rico…

good luck to you if you have a complaint, it’s like talking to a brick wall.

Review Title: I pre ordered a ride to the airport…
Review Body: i pre ordered a ride to the airport from quantico va to dca at 10:30. he arrived at 11:10 stating it was uber’s fault as they set the schedule for drivers to leave at a specific time and he ran into terrible traffic causing his 40 minute delay. the driver drive fast to make it on time for my flight but it was a stressful time.

uber is a recogisex peoples transportation company.
uber dies business around ellispark rugby stadium on a regular basis.
i expect uber to be aware of the internet challenges in that area, as we experienced today, hence expecting uber to make the contact details of the pickup driver avaiilable to the customer beforehand.
today we were stranded after the rugby match due to no internet connection.
the bad part is that uber already have ylur money and after 10 min just cancel the reservation.
we had to work our own way out of this situation.
we were not the only people that experienced this - 4 other couples were also stranded and had to make their own plans.

i expect uber to change their app and supply at least the driver's contact details when confirming the driver.
crap, used to be good now they make you wait, then go to the wrong pick up, then cancel. drivers are rude.

Review Title: The driver was very accommodating with…
Review Body: the driver was very accommodating with items from my storage unit. exceptionally helpful & pleasant.

Review Title: Driver cancelled ride, left me stranded
Review Body:
ordered a cab to take me home from the airport as it was showing as being only 4 mins away. driver phoned me straight away asking where i was going to. when i told him he hung up and immediately cancelled the ride, offering no explanation as to why. app said it was connecting me to other drivers but it couldn’t find any, despite numerous other ubers pulling up and sitting round doing nothing for 5/10 mins. drivers were dismissive when i attempted to get help and just waved me away when i went to their windows.

my journey was only 3 miles but the driver clearly didn’t want to take it and earn such a small amount. so why accept it in the first place?! clearly cherry picking his jobs. left me stranded at the airport and i ended up walking home in the blazing heat with my luggage on one of the hottest days of the year as no hackney cabs were about and my phone died. thanks uber, won’t use you again.

ridiculous!! drivers are irresponsible, this is the third time when i booked a cab via uber and driver asks me to cancel ride saying we are two drivers if you want to ride will come otherwise cancel your ride.. one of the driver name is binod... ridiculous services i ever had, i travelled with my 9months old baby and uber always disappointed me and felt ki mother's like me can't travel without our personal convenience..after so many bad attempts with uber , i will never ever book the cab via uber..
at the time of booking it showed 258 and final payment was 438 . driver said i have to pay whatever charges app shows .
your drivers were courteous and professional but i wish you would time-stamp the tip payment.  thank you.

Review Title: UBER DRIVERS MAKE THE CORPORATION WHAT…

Review Title: The guy who drove us from Quakers Hill…

horrible experience. when everything is going well it’s fine but if you ever encounter a problem with uber in france as i have - they will never help you.

i got picked up by a driver who didn’t know the way and got lost even using the gps and got very agressive and started using foul language and blaming me for choosing a difficult area he didn’t know (although he’s the one who accepted the request). he ended up wanting to drop me on the side of the street unless i change the location and when i did it was 5 minutes away from where we were and uber added another 25 euros.

when i spoke to uber they did not have an accurate tracking system and have completely dismissed all the facts and were very dismissive. never got a refund of the 25 euros on top the initial 25 euros. their customer service was horrible kept denying the facts and turns out they don’t even have accurate tracking systems.

will never use uber france ever again.

Review Title: No customer phone number for riders
Review Body: i ride uber for just about 3 miles, i was charged for $42, also charged waiting time, actually, i did not have any waiting time. there is no way to find customer phone number for riders. it just has a phone number for drivers. no customer phone number  for riders means uber dose not care about real customers- riders. i will not use uber again. uber service is really bad,

Review Title: I used Uber Send - driver stole everything
Review Body:
i used uber send to send a stereo speaker system to a friend about 10 minutes from my house in mazatlan mexico. driver has taken the package and i cant get any help from uber. they only let me message the driver once, after that i cant send him another message. he does not reply so i have tried with uber help, but they don't seem to do anything either.

if you have anything important, do not send it using uber send, because the driver can keep it and there is pretty much nothing you can do about it.

i have to know try to deal with the police and see if they can do anything.... uber send is horrible !
very clean ca, courteous driver and very quick to pick us up.

4.8 star passenger rating with 200 plus trips - job - working the government.
when trying to order an uber i was informed on the app there was an outstanding payment, which was odd because the money had been taken out of my account.
i called uber customer services 5 plus times and everytime i called they said the following
please hold the line for 2-3 minutes while we look into this issue.
and then after thanking me for holding the line they informed me they would need to raise this with the "specialist team" who you cannot phone because they have no direct line.
the response i recieved was that there were several instances of fraudulent behavior on my account and uber has a zero tolerance stand on this, which means my account has been "restricted" (cannot use uber for rides)
i have not been been given any example of fraudulent activity and the specialist team will no longer respond to my messages.
although the cs team were very polite they are all scripted to give the same reply and do not have any ability to help because "they do not have access"
i can account for every fare, and i have been nothing but polite to every driver which is evident in my rating.
what a disgusting way of treating long term customers, accusing them of fraudulent activity and then saying we will not be replying to any further messages.

Review Title: So on 7/28 I canceled my ride because…
Review Body: so on 7/28 i canceled my ride because the wait was 30 minutes then on 7/29 my driver was going 80 moh texting the entire ride almost hit the back of a car then almostvside swiped another car due to not looking before switching lanes to get off at exit. i have reached out to uber every day about these charges which shows in my account 0.00 but on my online banking i was charged . uber keeps saying they refunded the money my bank which i also call constantly say no yhey haven't now uber has stopped responding all together then yesterday both my cards were charged. uber is awful they steal your money. unfortunately use this god forsaken company everyday. . i would stay away from them but unfortunately  left cost twice as much and cabs here are slim to none getting one. the drivers for uber are aldo always picking up a ride then cancel right before they pick up they should not be allowed to do that. they also when scheduling multiple stops will try and leave after first one.

unfortunately taxi drivers tend to accept trips and then cancel it in hopes of the customer switching to regular taxi services. ridiculous. drivers who accept and then cancel a certain amount of trips for no reason should be blocked.

Review Title: I booked an Uber auto on 6th aug 2022…
Review Body: i booked an uber auto on 6th aug 2022 to reach my college. normally it would have costed me 30rs but as i dint had cash and only had online mode of payment i decided to book an uber auto in double the price. after reaching the destination the auto driver refused to have an online mode of payment and on the app also i wasn’t able to make an online payment even after informing about the situation to the driver he started yelling at me on the road and started abusing. wasn’t expecting such service by uber. hoping to take action against it so no other person should face such situation.

i'm always impressed by how quickly i'm able to be picked up.  i would estimate 97% of the time, a driver arrives within 4-6 minutes.  i've never had an experience in which i felt uncomfortable or unsafe. always been treated with kindness and respect.i'm impressed with the wide range of options available.  such as being able to choose either to be picked up immediately, or wait ten minutes and receive a slightly lower price.

Review Title: Your driver's I had the pleasure ride…
Review Body: your driver's i had the pleasure ride with was people friendly and very polite           thanks uber

1. wed. aug. 3rd we booked a ride from the tavola restaurant at 1829 robson st. vancouver at 10:05 pm. we were in front of the tavola on time. the driver reported that he had arrived. i could see that he parked on another street about 100m away. while wondering about this and it was raining, i tried to send him a message. he read the message and again told me that he had arrived. then the next message was the cancellation fee. i could not respond in the form of a cancellation as there was no button to do so. i ordered a new ride, which worked fine.
2. thursday august 4th. while driving my own car on a highway, i received a message that my driver had arrived at 1875 robson st.. i had never booked this ride. neither is the restaurant there nor anything else that concerns me. my wife tried to inform the driver and cancel. he only said we could cancel with the app, which we could not find. a second driver came a little later and we had the same game.

i was charged ca$5.25 twice for cancellations that were not my fault.
bottom line: 1. the app should have a clear and easy to find cancel button.
2. i want my money back (2xca$5.25=10.50).
3. i stopped activating my payment method to avoid upcoming tours that i didn't book.

just not reliable.   how can a service say a driver available, so you confirm, then they accept and quickly reject the pick up leaving you not knowing what’s going on.   i then called a local cab company and got a prompt service.    so disappointed i cancelled my account - just not reliable enough for me

Review Title: The ups and downs of Ubering
Review Body: i think our last uber ride with regina in south bend, in was great and she was wonderful. however, the ride before that, two months ago in san jose, ca was a nightmare. the driver took a wrong turn and added an extra ten minutes that were unnecessary. then uber tried to double charge us for the ride by adding a 100% tip. c'mon uber, is that honest? i don't think so. we hope our future rides will be drama-free.

but the driver didn't show up and he himself cancelled my order.
i complained with uber who just typed a formal sorry message and status of my complaint was resolved.
then i replied the below given message but still no reply from uber.
because of your driver's carelessness my customer's flight would have been missed. moreover we had to rush to the airport by rash driving. could have been an accident. just to conclude that my first booking on uber and i found that uber is not trustworthy and not consistant at all. wouldn't advise others to book with uber henceforth

Review Title: Taxi was booked to carry 4 people …
Review Body: taxi was booked to carry 4 people (one adult and three children under 15) we had waited 6 mins outside our set location for the taxi to arrive. when the taxi arrived we flagged it down, the taxi driver said he can't take 4 people in his car.  the police had pulled up said the taxi was illegal.  the taxi driver never even communicated with me, just took off.  i had to book another taxi from a different firm. when i checked my email, uber had charged me cancellation fee.  going to cancel use of uber ride, i'm not willing to put up with such bad service and get charged for it.

Review Title: Dishonest Drivers (drivers trying to cheat on Uber)
Review Body:
yesterday, july 26th, my husband an i arrived at the guadalajara airport and called an uber to take us to ajijic. the first and second drivers told me, on the phone, that they would take us only if we went off the uber app because the trip would be outside of the metropolitan area and that what uber pays them is not worth it. as soon as i rejected the offer, they hung up on me and another car/driver was assigned on the app. because of that, we kept waiting for 20 min for them. the third driver, mr. cesar armando, arrived within 8min and was very efficient and professional. he brought us to ajijic with no problems. we were even more upset when uber charged us for waiting time,
when my husband and i should have been the ones compensated for the hassle and wait. thank you, irnalba reis
