Review Title: If you want to be late (and ripped off) take an uber
Review Body: if you want to be late - take an uber.  drivers and the company have zero consideration for customers.  in london, drivers frequently accept jobs and then park up waiting for surge/better pricing.  i have walked 1km to meet a driver to see him doing just this.  it happens a significant percentage of the time - uber is well aware and could not care less.  drivers will park and hope you cancel in order to take £5 off you when you cancel.    they could not care less if you are late.  company and drivers without any morals whatsoever.  will not be using again after the latest uber let down!  terrible terrible drivers - starts using local taxi companies instead.

on a recent trip to europe, i left my luggage in an uber car in oslo, norway while rushing to catch a train to stockholm.

uber customer support contacted the driver on my behalf, and i received an initial response from the driver indicating that he had my luggage. however, for some inexplicable reason, i never heard from the driver again after that - despite having told him that the luggage contained some important (and expensive) medical equipment - i.e. my cpap machine.

for approximately 3 weeks, uber customer support doggedly continued to contact the driver in an endeavour to get a response from him and, more importantly, arrange for the retrieval and return of my luggage. in the end we finally managed to get the contact information for where my luggage was being held, and the luggage was successfully retrieved.

kudos to the uber customer support team for sticking with me and this case over such a long period of time, and for ultimately helping me get the information required.

i have used uber a couple of times and was very happy with the service i received.  as we had an appointment i scheduled a pick up for peace of mind and to be sure we arrived on time.  i received a message to say the driver was on time and then, later,  another message to say he would be with us in 25 minutes which was too late for our appointment.  then another message arrived to say our ride had been cancelled.  i ended up asking a neighbour to take us as by that time there was no other alternative if we were to arrive on time.  needless to say i will not be using uber again.

Review Title: No show with my Reserved & Confirmed Uber
Review Body:
i reserved an uber, 2 days in advance, to take me at 04:20, from kennington to heathrow airport to catch an early morning flight.

the booking was accepted and confirmed but no car showed up, and from looking at the map on the app, there was zero cars available for miles! as it was evident that no uber was available, i cancelled the booking and was instantly charged the full amount.

foolishly i tried to book via the app, numerous cars showed as being available, but each accepted and then cancelled, so with time ticking by, i cancelled the request, and was charged again - even though there were no cars available!

i contacted uber to reclaim the £100+ that i had been charged - and was informed i would have to wait for them to decide whether they will refund!!!!!

why-oh-why does uber accept early morning advanced bookings, if they are unable to assign drivers - it’s unfair to put their clients under such levels of stress - especially when transport options are limited at 04:30 in the morning, and flights are involved.

i did manage to find a zip flex car, and drove myself, and with a lot of luck, managed to negotiate security at heathrow - but i was the last person to board my flight!

Review Title: The app was simple to use
Review Body: the app was simple to use. our driver was prompt and helpful. great experience.
driver was very accommodating. excellent service.
excellent service usually they come very quick and the drivers they are very nice people very recommended
excellent driver very impressed with the knowledge of the san francisco area
the vehicle was clean, comfortable, and the driver was very pleasant and we had a nice conversation.

i pre booked a trip the day before and waited the following day at the arranged time. after waiting an extra 10 minutes with no sign of a driver the trip disappeared from my uber app. no apology. nothing. how can you rely on a mini cab firm that makes you wait 10 minutes beyond the booked time and then doesn't show up? i won't trust uber again.
uber is a joke, drivers repeatedly refuse jobs or take and then cancel!  all while uber pre take funds and take days to release! service has really gone down hill and is not fit for purpose!
we have only taken uber four times.  the experiences and drivers have been very nice and enjoyable.  we look forward to many more uber rides.

quick, clean
safe driver

wish i can give 0 stars. i have been attempting to sign up to be an uber driver for a couple weeks now that i officially have my one year of driving experience. multiple times some of my information such as my driving record and social security number does not go through and keeps asking me no matter how many tines i input the information. seriously, what is this? whoever runs these apps should be fired since it is obvious thatbthey do not know what theyre doing!! they obviously do not know how properly manage an app for it to run properly.i should have been driving on the road by now! it's obvious that uber hires app runners that don't know a damn thing

Review Title: Used to be good. Now utter rubbish
Review Body: drivers ignore shorter journeys because they only want big fares. have had to walk miles several times now as drivers just keep cancelling. uber used to be a great service but now it's pointless and a waste of time to even try to get a car.

i had to get a taxi to london recently and immediately thought of uber.  never really used them before but i had the app as i once almost used them.  i ordered a pick up in the morning at my house an hour in advance.  got close to pick up time and one of uber driver called, claimed he did not know where the destination is, which is stupid as it was highlighted in the app.  anyway, told him and he immediate realised it was in central london and wanted to cancel the booking.  i told him i'll pay the concession charge and he relunctantly agreed to the pick up.  i was tracking his arrival and all of a sudden it disappeared and my booking was no longer there.  no trace or cancellation.  as a result i booked a local cab and ended up being almost an hour late to my meeting.  what terrible service, no explanation and no easy way to get a response or complain.

Review Title: I call a Uber to go to the bus station…
Review Body: i call a uber to go to the bus station and the driver wasn't here after 20 minutes of waiting!! i decided to get into a taxi that drove by because i didn't want to miss my bus... guess what? they charge me for the late driver 5.75$!! it's not normal in montreal to wait 20 minutes for a uber!! people going to the bus station have a bus to catch!!! they credit me the amount of 5.75 so i give them 3 stars!

Review Title: Charges are very very high… drivers…
Review Body: charges are very very high… drivers forcefully ask to cancel rides and we are liable to pay cancellation fees.. no updates on customer care… they take long routes so that fait gets increased…

tried to get an uber in paris tonight. so many drivers tried and didn't accept and those that did cancelled. ended up on the metro. not the end to the perfect evening i was expecting. come on uber sort you service out or i'll look for better apps!

Review Title: Driver cancelled Uber decided to send…
Review Body: driver cancelled uber decided to send another one . i'd already got a bus. why am i paying these dirty scum thieves a cancellation fee??

michael did us right. great driver, car clean, smelled fantastic. dropped off right at the front. never felt unsafe with any crazy driving.
thanks for making it easier for 2 old rock and rollers

very easy, considering i was concerned about availability and how quick i could get a ride since there was a concert in hartford but both drivers i had picked me up within minutes and the ride was just fine.

Review Title: I joined Uber thinking it was a…
Review Body: i joined uber thinking it was a wonderful way to get around and cheaper . i booked in advance the night before i had an important appointment. i even made the time to arrive 10 minutes before my appointment. i got ready for appointment when it was time and uber taxi was on the way . within 2 minutes of it supposed to be coming i was cancelled on! if this was a job interview or something where my taxi was late or didn’t come wouldn’t be an acceptable excuse this is horrendous! start charging these drivers , they should be penalised . not ok to cancel like that when some of us rely on such transport to get anywhere . i’ve honestly lost hope in uber . i have disability too and sometimes drivers are waiting at the top of the road far from my door so again seriously poor service . sorry but i don’t trust uber taxis for anything. this needs fixed
driver don't call and west your time because uber has the worst customer service!!

Review Title: Drivers not ready for short rides
Review Body: drivers keep on cancel the ride. its frustrating and waste of time

a little bit of sun and you guys get greedy. how is 4 minute car drive £20.10? i don’t understand that is ridiculous it usually costs £5 so not sure what uber is playing at. not to mention drivers will always accept the job and then moan at how far it is, why accept then? they always cancel when they’re like 2/3 mins away i’m all fairness they should be charged for that cause if the customer cancels we get charged. uber was supposed to be the better alternative for taxis but they’re absolutely rubbish
drivers constantly cancel trips after minutes waiting, they even cancel trips at the pick up point... will avoid using going forward. no respect for costumers.
timely pickup and kind and courteous drivers.

Review Title: This Uber driver was extremely nice and…
Review Body:
this uber driver was extremely nice and helpful. he made me feel safe and comfortable.

i would definitely recommend him!

regards,
kathy mauck

i ordered an uber for one of my employees and his wife that were. staying in a hotel and needed a ride about 90 miles to my office. the driver accepted the ride said he was 9 min away and then sent me a message if i could send him a $40 tip as he was only going to make $40 off the ride. i sent the $40 to walmart through moneygram cash pickup we’ll he picked up the cash and then he canceled the ride. i couldn’t believe it. my employee and his wife were checked out of their room and waiting in the parking lot for this pos. i complained to uber told them what he did and i got a whopping $5.50 credit on my account. they can keep their money and now i am using another service much better than uber. they pride themselves about passenger and rider safety may they should concentrate more on not hiring theives.

Review Title: My driver went over and above what was…
Review Body: my driver went over and above what was expected from an uber driver. she was awesome and i loved her

Review Title: For six times confirmed and canceled ride
Review Body: no star at all. for six times!!!! our ride was confirmed, accepted and in the last minute the driver decided to cancel the ride. without any notice or any explanation from uber. we waited for 30 minutes with this repetitive pattern. horrible service. can’t imagine we’d be in real hurry. there should be some assurance for customers that the driver will show up. thank god for liftago, uber should learn. at least some taxi service works.

scheduled pickup for 3.30, driver arrived at 3.25 (excellent).  instead of screwing around trying to increase the mileage the way the local cab company does, she took the fastest route as per the mapping app.  got me to my destination ahead of schedule in a clean, comfortable, air conditioned car (unlike the local cab company).  and it cost the same as it would have with the local cab company.

Review Title: Thanks to all of your drivers
Review Body: thanks to all of your drivers, such a great job:  albert, andrea and delilah, very confident and great conversation, please keep it up and be safe !!! 👍👍🙏🙏

Review Title: Use the local taxi service instead
Review Body: we used uber in albufeira. there aren't many drivers so connecting with a driver can take time. one time a driver connected then eventually messaged to say he couldnt make it - i'm still waiting for the 12.50 euro to be reimbured. similar experience in viana do castelo - very few drivers and still waiting for 5.24 euros to be reimbursed. my advice: use the local taxi service instead.

joe

Review Title: My driver had me over 43 euros quoted a…
Review Body: my driver had me over 43 euros quoted a price i accepted whacked an extra 43 on uber are ignorant don't respond and take your money without consent

Review Title: Uber drivers in Rome cancelling trips last minute
Review Body: we were in italy during a taxi strike and a very hot july so had to rely on uber. every single trip we scheduled was cancelled by the drivers who obviously were canceling lower fares for higher ones, almost always canceling minutes before arriving after a more than 15min wait. this you uber is really disgusting, gross behaviour encouraged by an application that does not allow you to see who your driver is so you can't even rate him/her. the customer is left at the mercy of the driver who callously leaves their would-be passenger stranded in favour of a few more euros. capitalism at its worst - fueled by uber's lenience in allowing the drivers to cancel whenever they want without any punitive action. both uber and uber drivers should be ashamed of yourselves. boo on you all. disgusted.

Review Title: Think twice about using a surface in…
Review Body: think twice about using a service in the billericay area as the drivers do not accept your booking and give you a run for your money this is not professional

and to top it off delivery drivers who cant speak english so the number to call them is useless 😑

Review Title: I just got back from a European trip…
Review Body:
i just got back from a european trip and the thing that hit me the most is how uber has changed the world.

instead of getting ripped off and being confused by non-english speaking taxi drivers, you get a negotiated price and move on from there. it's a phenomenal service and has changed foreign travel for the better.

all taxi services should be gradually integrated into uber.
fast arrival, comfortable drive, nice driver.
driver was professional, friendly, and responsive…
excellent, both drivers were nice.

Review Title: Reserve a ride hours in advance - why bother?
Review Body: reserve a ride hours in advance. come time near our pickup, noticed the driver was parked and not moving. waited 10-15 minutes more until it was just past the time we scheduled. so i called the driver to ask if there was a problem still being parked. our ride was instantly canceled. our ability to contact that driver was blocked. i would not recommend this “reserve” service.

Review Title: book a proper company if you need to be on time
Review Body: booked well ahead, assigned driver and then they cancelled for clearly a better fare. tried another 3 times and they all did the same.  all customer service can say is that its logged.  totally unreliable, left me and 3 others with trying to find a cab at 11pm. recommend you use a proper company.

Review Title: Beware of relying on uber or lyft in…
Review Body: beware of relying on uber or lyft in alexandria, la. especially if you arriving or departing aex. 3 times within the past 4 months uber & lyft have left me stranded at the airport at midnight. didn't have drivers available for an early morning flight from my home in pineville to aex. even tho i had scheduled a ride with lyft 4 days prior to departure. and one time it was 3:30 in the afternoon on a weekday and i had $300 worth of groceries i just purchased from walmart thinking i wouldn't have a problem getting an uber or lyft but i was left stranded again. the ride share services are kind of useless in central louisiana. always have a friend on a standy-by. don't rely on the service of uber or lyft here.
no problem at all, very quick pick-up and very obliging pleasant driver.

Review Title: A driver tried to rip me off
Review Body: a driver tried to rip me off.  messaging he would not come for uber fare but only for 5x fare.  then he cancelled when i didnt agree to 5x uber fare.
my driver was courteous, friendly and got me to my destination with professionalism.

Review Title: Had a little delay connecting with the…
Review Body: had a little delay connecting with the uber.  i didn’t realize they were limited to the upper level at the airport for pickup.  i was waiting on the lower level, but the driver was attentive and helpful and next time i’ll know.

Review Title: Hit and miss in Ireland - go Bolt instead
Review Body: recently went on holiday in ireland and sadly found the uber service to be hit and miss. getting from the airport to our destination, we were able to get an uber no problem (friendly service and even gave the driver a tip). however our return journey was a different matter and a complete 'nightmare'. needing to get to the airport to catch our flight, we tried booking uber again, only to find the app having trouble finding a driver, even though the map showed a few in the area. we got connected to a driver three times and in each case, they cancelled on us (presumably because they either didn't like our location, or they got a better fare)? this delayed us by an hour and made the journey back more stressful than it should ever have been - one driver even asked us to cancel the booking as we were too far (only 8 minutes away)!!! and tried to pass on a 5.00 euro cancellation fee, which we declined. as we had seen a couple of 'bolt' taxis in the area, we downloaded their app and booked them instead,  thankfully we had allowed enough time to get to the airport, things could have turned out very differently. will look to use bolt first in future.
the extra security such as  (driver id/pin code/vehicle id) was of a great help.

Review Title: Uber cancelled my ride and charged a fee
Review Body: i have just been charged a cancellation fee because my driver did not turn up. the app showed the driver 100 metres away for several minutes and the driver never came any closer. the screen displaying location dissapeared and i was charged a cancellation fee.

Review Title: Car and driver were on time
Review Body: car and driver were on time. the car was clean and spacious.both uber trips both to and from were equally good!

Review Title: Deleted app - joke of a company
Review Body: deleted app  have given it sufficient time for review but ultimately decided i will no longer use uber : tired of unreliable waiting times which made me miss some important meetings. tired of the ‘customer is always wrong ‘ philosophy. tired of spending whole trips on the edge of my seat wondering if i’ll make it alive to my destination; considering half the drivers drive like maniacs . tired of not feeling safe when i get a late night weekend drive home ( hint : that was your ups folks , really what the f@@.rides cancelled for no apparent reason after a 20mn wait . non existent customer service . a complete joke

twice acepted bookings and then cancelled due to 'no driver available'.

on april i took trip from washington dc to maryland. trip went pail i paid the driver $27.40 for the trip. uber charged me twice. after multiple complaints on their app as i could not get a live person they refunded me. now 3 months later my app is showing that i owe the tha $27:40
i tried to communicate but can’t get anyone and their help app is useless. i am very disappointed

uber price is going up , but is services going down. last time driver charged me £11.00 extra they refund but is not acceptable because many people not check back. also many time when i try to book uber driver accept then after they cancel. i am using minicab more confidence.
nice driver, almost on time .
extremely courteous and safe driver. immaculate car. it cannot get better than that.
no issues with the drivers, but the app and the company suck!  and suck entirely!!  no customer service, no help, chat unavailable (midday on monday) as i try and find out why the app isn't working!

Review Title: My driver was courteous and friendly
Review Body: my driver was courteous and friendly. i enjoyed riding with him. he was a very good driver also.

i order some breakfast sandwich through uber eats and driver ate the food! they put 2 charges on my cards and i have to wait 3-10 business days for refund!
stay away, i wish i'd read reviews before using this stupid service! not worth it!!!

Review Title: Uber ratings andUber ratings and reviews on drivers is very deceiving reviews on drivers is…
Review Body: uber ratings and reviews on drivers is very deceiving. drivers that are top rated and cancel your trip after waiting over 30 min just disconnect and you can no longer rate them. driver nur wouldn't answer my texts and kept going farther away and finally canceled

after waiting for the first uber driver who was going completely out of the way and almost double the distance i canceled that ride and got a new driver and his maps were off too. i had to guide him to where we were going. this isn’t the drivers fault this is a fault with uber for whatever direction application they’re using.

Review Title: UBER DOES NOT CARE FOR CUSTOMERS. Use black cabs or bolt!!

driver accepted location that was within the congestion zone. he drove me around longer intentionally and then dropped me 2 minutes before congestion time zone was up at a 20 min walking distance from the location i was going too. made a complaint and they gave me a refund and said that’s that basically. worse service! use bolt!

i would give a zero if i could! use black cabs or bolt! don’t waste your time.
very impressed with how easy the whole process was.  drivers have been very prompt, nice and personable, cars have been clean, well-running, and smell nice.  really happy with the process.

Review Body: both drivers who picked me up and dropped me off at the airport were courteous, excellent conversations and professional. i felt safe and very happy with both uber drivers. always happy to use uber as the most reliable, cheapest, timely and safe way to travel. keep up the excellent work uber!

never any drivers available, tried to charge me £28 for a trip that usually costs £8, like we aren’t all already struggling with the costs of living, rip off.

driver was on time, got me to my destination safely. only downfall to the ride.. i felt nauseated from the odor in the car.

Review Body: cosmos was a great driver and very friendly. he was careful and took me safely home. hope to ride with cosmos in the future. thank you!

Review Title: Very nice and polite driver and he sure…
Review Body: very nice and polite driver and he sure knows the city!!

Review Title: Uber charged me for its own fault
Review Body:
i feel like uber's service has been getting worse over last few months, however, what happened today was completely unacceptable.

i have book a taxi from a hotel to an airport, the driver arrived at a different spot, not in front of the hotel, it took a couple of minutes to me to realise the the driver is not going to the hotel and then 2-3 minutes to find the car, only to see him leaving the place and saying he cancelled "the job". i had to rebook the taxi the second time. and wait for taxi to arrive the second time.

what is even worse instead of apologising for the inconvenience uber charged me:

"to compensate drivers for the inconvenience, a fee is charged if the driver has to cancel after waiting for more than 5 minutes at your requested pickup location. to avoid this fee in the future, only request when you're ready to go."

i cannot even dispute the fee because uber's sites constantly show me the follwong error for the last few hours:

"something went wrong. please try again later.
sorry, an error has occurred but we have been notified and are looking into it."

it appears to me that the time to try out alternatives just has come.

Review Title: Our driver was excellent and her…
Review Body: our driver was excellent and her vehicle was roomy and clean.

Review Title: The driver was on time and patient…
Review Body: the driver was on time and patient waiting for third rider. good ride and conversation.

Review Title: Sheraton Atlanta to the airport Everything was great after the driver…
Review Body: everything was great after the driver found me. there was a miscommunication about the location for pick up. once i text the driver that i was in front of the hotel and not the car rental place. we were at the airport in 12 minutes! he dropped me right at the door where i needed to be for american airlines. he took care of my luggage.

i hired the uber rideshare on saturday 09/07/2022 and included 3 stops. home to pick up my dinner and back home. when i entered the car the driver wasn't even wearing the mask and didn't follow proper covid-19 protocols whereas the cases have again on the rise. so it is compromising the rider's safety , mental health and well being. the car also had problems with the tyres and diskpad. uber blocked my account on false allegations on behalf of the driver. customer service never contacted me. so a decision has been made uber as a company should be closed down and there is zero tolerance for pathetic customer service
short trip,  uneventful, driver was on time, courteous and a safe driver.

Review Title: I left a pair of shoes in the back…
Review Body:
i left a pair of shoes in the back seat, and called the driver about 10 minutes after i got out and realized what had happened. no call back. called again later. no call back. called customer service who said they couldn’t do anything, and to contact the driver. contacted the driver, who did nothing.
they absolutely have a record of every single rider and have a record of who the rider was after me and simply gave me the run around and did nothing. will be changing to lift after this.
drivers name was safir.

Review Title: I have never had a bad experience with …
Review Body: i have never had a bad experience with  uber drivers.always  polite and helpful. i will continue to call uber.

don't know if anyone else is having the same issues as me but i've been experiencing this for the last few months that i've been using uber ride taxi service.

so here's what happens - you launch the app, click on 'ride' and select where you are going etc. you see the price of the journey and agree to the booking. the app then connects you to the driver of your price choice, in this case it was £8.50.

the connection process takes forever and often does't connect, so naturally you assume that there is an issue with the app and cancel the connection. (i believe this is because the driver who uber is connecting you with isn't accepting the fare). you then start the booking process again only to find that the same car that had originally priced your joinery is now £16.50??? you also see a list of 2 other vehicles that have almost doubled in price too. how is it that within a few seconds of a booking the price can soar to almost double? clearly there is something going on here!

it is unbelievable!
the drivers pay for the car, gas insurance, energy, their precious time and everything to drive people around! however, uber is taking 50 to 65% of the money that the customers are paying!
if this is not a crime and highly abusive company, the meaning of fairness and law do not have any value in the united states!

fantastic drivers
fast pick up times
informed and supportive
great driver.  even brought back my phone i left. but hate hidden fees.
both drivers i had today were courteous, helpful and timely.  i appreciate the good condition of their vehicles as well as their kind personalities.  thank you!

Review Title: My driver was friendly and the car was…
Review Body: my driver was friendly and the car was very clean. i entered the wrong address for my destination but the driver took me to the correct address with no issue. i really appreciated the service as i am from out of town.

worst experience...... i just booked an uber auto and at that time the waiting time was 9 minutes i waited for 5-7 minutes but the auto was not even moving ahead i called the driverr and asked how much time you will take he juat said i won't come you cancel the auto from your endd...... i won't cancel..... i didn't cancel the auto and even that driver was not canceling the auto...... i can say the worst service from uberr......

my ride was nice, my driver was also. she didn't help with my luggage but that was ok to. my only complaint was i left hercar soaked from something not visible on the seat. i advised her she apologized completely and was very sorry. i still wanted to leave her a tip ( $5.00 ) but for some reason it wouldn't go through. i tried several times.....it wasn't her fault the seat was wet it came from a previous rider with children and by seat being dark she would known unless that rider told her prior, but i could tell when i told her she was just surprised as i was. ( seats were darkgrey or black)  especially getting out of an car so very clean. i would ride with her anytime. sorry my tip couldn't go through.

some of the drivers has been very professional.
some of cars needs needed to be refresh due to the smell.
other than that ,i have been very pleased with the service.
diabolical. drivers regularly cancel to pick up better fares leaving elderly customers stranded. customer service is a joke.

Review Title: Uber has become a terrible company
Review Body: uber has become a terrible company - 5 of their drivers cancelled on us today and 3 yesterday  - the quality of drivers - sadly is terrible - their service is so bad it is shocking - i realise that london is short of taxis but i have never had such bad taxi service anywhere in the world - we have resorted to black taxis - much much better and reliable and are not half as rude as uber drivers - beyond belief -uber will never be a successful company until they give much better service

Review Title: DONT USE UBER I tried to book an uber friday could…
Review Body: dont use uber tried to book an uber friday could get no joy from the app , but guess what credit card charged , but far far worse on saturday i booked a ride royal albert hall to my hotel card charged again , about 5 mins prior to apponted time msg saying driver will be with you , however just after msg saying no drivers available. stranded had to hop a bus which was packed out to the roof , but so bloody glad to get on it had to walk half mile to hotel wife with arthritis , never will i use uber again in the words of ian paisley  never ,never,never .deleted app .

i just spoke to lien this morning and she was nothing but helpful , originally i was calling to complain about a driver and someone i had previously talked to about the issue who wasn’t helpful at all but today lien listened and made sure that i was left happy at the end of the call to the point that i wasn’t even even upset anymore. shout out to lien.

Review Title: All drivers are respectful and willing…
Review Body: all drivers are respectful and willing to help you about our destination.

Review Title: I got charged for the driver canceling.
Review Body:
i got charged for the driver canceling my journey and yes i got the money back eventually but i then had to book another taxi which obviously took a while to get to me,
and cost me more money than i was quoted the first time round.

why does the customer get charged a fee for cancelling a journey but it’s ok for the driver to cancel and let you down last minute??

i deleted the app and will not be using uber again. if i could leave 0 out of 5 stars i would.

Review Title: I can not recommend this company
Review Body: i can not recommend this company, i ordered a ride after going to the vet with my pet. the driver took a long way around following his in car gps instead off the normal route that you can easily take. he then asks uber to check the trip fare straight after and charges me more because he chose to drive a ridiculous route around. i wrote this back to uber saying i did not agree showing the evidence speaking for my case. talking to uber support is talking to deaf ears. all you will get is easy copy pasted templates back as answers. i do not belive someone actually bother to check the issue you're writing about. stay away. there is definitely better companies out there that deliver the same services
driver was nice & friendly.
very rude and arrogant drivers. i will never use them again

very bad staff like drivers..no controll on driver..system also collapse..
will not book in whole life

Review Title: The app is pretty easy to use I was…
Review Body: the app is pretty easy to use i was able to book a pet ride really easy.  the driver arrived promptly and was courteous.  he was a decent driver and manipulated traffic without incident.  he dropped me off as i requested in the alley at the rear of the house.  nice driver friendly service.  my only complaint is that his car was not as clean as i would have expected basing that on other cars/services i have ridden with.  i tipped in cash which he really seemed to appreciate

Review Title: Once a Loyal Customer Now Turned Sour
Review Body: i booked an uber earlier today and was assigned a driver who was competiting another trip two towns over from where i was. after the driver accepted the trip and made me wait 15 minutes he cancels the trip. another driver picked up the trip a few minutes later only to advise me he picked the trip up by mistake and asked me to cancel that trip as he wouldn't be coming. on my third attempt finally connected with a driver who was very unfriendly, didn't acknowledge me when i got in his car, was one his head set the entire time on the drive.

Review Title: We used Uber to get to our destination…
Review Body: we used uber to get to our destination and to get back to our hotel. both drivers had good customer service and nice well kept vehicles.

Review Title: Once again the taxi escaped before I…
Review Body: once again the taxi escaped before i leave the building. my exit is at the back of the house and i didn't see the car.  the driver didn't wait, but i lost the money from my account, not for the first time. terrible service.
my driver was excellent.  his car was very clean.  the only reason i didn't give 5 stars was that the trip was a little pricey, considering the short distance.

most disappointing! i had a work's meeting in london for 2.00pm on thursday the 30th of june arrived paddington 1.10 from swansea. went to uber's bay. i was asking for a lift from 1 30pm, after giving my card details there were conflicting messages, 11 minutes,6, 8 round in circles.... after messing about with them for 40 minutes i got a message saying: we could not find a driver. your booking is cancelled!! it was 2.15 pm by then. i took a black cab. by the time i arrived 3.15pm, the meeting i travelled for was all over. no apologies for the inconvenience and expense. poor service. i will never risk relying on uber again. i am going to delete the app and all their emails. what a waste of time that was.

Review Title: Had 5 drivers cancel tonight in short…
Review Body: had 5 drivers cancel tonight in short order, two cancelled to my face as they pulled up and discovered our address was 25 minutes away.  too unpredictable and not worth the stress of wondering whether ride is real or not.  going back to taxi services.

great ride, on time, car was clean.
the driver was professional, polite, and helpful.

the trip was scheduled 1 hour in advance. 10 minutes before 2 drivers canceled the trip and then kept on saying “no drivers available”. 10 minutes after the scheduled hour we had to go to the metro station and then take the bus to the orly-paris airport. bad thing to do to someone! we can’t trust uber. i will never ask for your services again.

Review Title: Pre-booked Uber cancelled after booked pick up time
Review Body:
booked an uber in advance as there was a train strike and i knew it would be hard to get home from my night out.

a driver accepted and the rate was confirmed. then at the pick up time, the driver details disappeared and all i got was a message saying connecting you to a driver. 15 minutes after the booked pick up time, the trip was cancelled.

i was left in the middle of nowhere with no way to get home.

shocking service. i called to complain and apparently there is no email address for complaints. the only advice they gave me was not to pre-book an uber in future. as if i am ever using uber again!

safe driver.

horrible customer service. impossible to reach customer service and when you do, they leave you on read. i literally use them as my last resort as it’s even pricier than taxis now. there was an instance where i called an uber, app indicated a waiting time of 15 min. 45 min later it indicated 22 min. like with all the developers working on that stupid app they couldn’t indicate the real wait time?? i ended up canceling and taking the metro. other instance is when i reserved a car like 6 hours before my ride only for 3 drivers to cancel on me and uber telling me there are no drivers available. terrible app and unreliable drivers. taxis are better

Review Body: my driver didn't show up despite numerous texts between us explaining exactly where i was and i stood out in the heat and humidity for 25 minutes.  i was out front of the hotel at the reception/valet area and she was at the back of the building at the loading docks.  then she canceled and i was charged a $10 cancellation fee.  how preposterous!  i want my $10 back as the driver is obviously incompetent.

Review Title: I was discriminated against because I’m…
Review Body: i was discriminated against because i’m a black man. had paid for a ride to and back from my dialysis facility for treatment, the first driver i had no problem, second driver saw that i was black then cancel my ride then lied and said that i cancel,then charge my card the cancellation fee.

Review Title: Driver looted 50 rs and uber looted 36 rs
Review Body: driver dropped us before the exact location so when we started the ride it shown 183 rs but because he dropped us before the exact location so in his app it shown 126 but he said we still have to pay 186 which i agreed. since qr code was not working so i paid him cash,but he didn't showed up this and my uber kept showing me i have to pay rs 186 which includes 3 rs waiting charge which was a lie coz driver dint wait.after repeated complaints also uber gave me 150 rs and not 186 rs. so the thing is driver took somewhere around 50 rs extra and uber itself looted rs 36.i would request all of you to boycott this fraud company. it's rating is already 1.something let's aware people.
our driver was so helpful and so nice

this app has made me late for work so many times. if drivers take too long to come to you so you end up waiting then being cancelled on last minute and it is the fault of the company not the driver more often than not. this has happened to me countless times at this point. why have this software feature? today i had enough and  i called support and was offered £5 which won't even cover the cost of 1 trip. i have deleted the app and suggest you do the same. maybe then they will change once their profits are hurt.

Review Title: Being a driver for uber is so poor in…
Review Body:
being a driver for uber is so poor in london it's unbelievable, lowest paid in the globe, for a job to maidenhead they charge the customer £72 then uber take nearly half so the driver is left with £32.
why can't they just charge the driver £100 rent for the week and let the driver use the app with the full price of a job.
absolute liberty what this company is doing to drivers.

pick up was quick

only downside was it was my first uber experience and i thought i would just pay like a taxi so gave the driver enough to cover the drive and rip but then was charged for the trip through the app. my fault, so didn’t rate down.
just being there when i need a ride is enough for me but excellent, friendly drivers is always a plus & i get that whenever i use uber rideshare.

uber in malaga spain

not sure if uber is connected with this but it looks like somebody is selling the mobile numbers to scammers.
people be aware and carful

uber where do i start. i got stranded an hour from home, it was 145 bucks but no one took the ride, so i had to try again.. ibooked again a few minutes later and one one took the ride cut there were no uber drivers around. i looked at my account it said 290 was missing and all of a sudden i had a negative 10dollars in my account. why do they take out money when i didn't get a ride then say it'll be back in in 3-5 business days??? i'm stranded with no money now since they took it out and i didn't even receive a ride!!! the worst experience ever!!! they should only take out the money once someone except the ride. there an inconvenience!!

i took uber from miller av in mountain view to milpitas and i was to be charged $26.25 and marie the uber lady took the wrong exit instead of exiting 237 calaveras blvd she took 880 towards oakland, i reported to uber but they still charged me for her mistake.

so beware of uber, even if the driver missed your exit and exit somewhere else and come to your address even if it is their mistake they will charged you.

the ride from home to gp appointment at 4.7km costs me > nz$36. that’s exorbitant. a ride in the local cab would have been approximately $26. the driver arrived exactly as booked (i watched from the window) but claimed he was 3minutes earlier. it shouldn’t be my problem if a driver chose to come earlier than booked but i was surcharged for it. after 2 correspondence uber closed the case so no further communication despite issue not being settled.

i have had a good experience with using uber. i have only been using uber for a week and i had an issue with one driver. uber reimbursed me for it while being very apologetic about it.

really disappointed with the service the auto which i have booked was no ka03 af8992 i have waited for more than half an hour but the auto has not reached the pick up point. the location which was showing was near to my pick up point like 1min but still the driver has not come for pick up and not even cancelled and no response for the calls and messages as well and location which was showing was near to my pick up point so i only went to the auto lication but there only auto qs there driver was not there if it is the case at the night how the girls has to travel and what is the safety measures the uber has taken and it was really disgusting.
excellent ride, excellent driver! keep it up

i ordered an uber. i then waited outside the hotel. the app then told me my trip was cancelled. the driver then appeared and told me very rudely to take it up with uber.
to add insult to injury i was then charged the whole fare even though i had not cancelled and was waiting in the correct place. the app is totally rubbish sending me round the houses to then tell me the page couldn’t be found. utterly rubbish service!!
do not use uber

Review Title: I hope this saga is not over yet so I…
Review Body: i hope this saga is not over yet. i gave a temporary 2 stars but would like to see the outcome before making a final decision; nevertheless, i cannot write this without giving a rating so it is a temporary "2."  on june 16, i contacted uber at about 3 o'clock. the app indicated an uber was arriving in 2 minutes so i threw on my coat, my shoes, grabbed my purse. instead of filling a water bottle, i sprinted to the elevator and then out of the building and waited for the car because i did not want to miss my ride even though i was very thirsty. when i got downstairs, i checked the uber app. it said arrival in 3 minutes even though the driver should have already arrived. after another minute, it said the uber was going to arrive in 5 minutes then 7 minutes. at that point, something fishy was happening and i would now be too late for my doctor's appointment so i tried to cancel. the app forced me to pay $5.00 in order to cancel even though this was totally uber's fault for pretending to come pick me up and then just disappearing off the map several times. completely unacceptable and unprofessional. while i was looking at the app, i noticed that the ubers would disappear off the app and then different ones would reappear and then the driver would decide not to fulfill the ride demand and disappeared from the app probably to go somewhere closer/ more convenient instead of coming to get me. this seemed to happen several times and it was so confusing. it was a very bad experience. i think not only my five dollar cancellation fee should be reimbursed but my doctor's missed appointment fee should be reimbursed as well.

i was in a car crash whilst an uber passenger. firstly it was not the uber drivers fault. but, the care factor from uber was 0.
ended up in hospital with multiple injuries, had left a bag in the wreck and insurance said claim from uber they claim from the at fault driver.
nothing, no help no follow up
silence is obviously ass covering, given the lack of safety features in the uber contributed to my injuries
absolute scum
overall good experience: clean car, prompt pickup, polite driver.  i wouldn't say the service was exceptional since it was not hence 4 stars instead of 5.

Review Title: Uber driver was helpful and courteous

Review Title: Uber Drivers will Wait or Cancel Last…
Review Body: uber drivers will wait or cancel last second  to get higher rates when surge periods draw near or are coming into affect…i have waited several times, up to 25 minutes, only to have them cancel the ride when only 2 blocks away…when i try to rebook the price is 3x the amount i had originally booked it for. uber sucks. no recourse or way to talk to anyone because it’s all automated responses in the “help” section.

incredibly poor work ethics. i used to take ubers for everything, but it’s been simply impossible to book an uber ride for months now. the status never changes from ‘finding your driver’. it appears that the drivers only want to take the most convenient rides for them. i’ve completely lost confidence in uber. you cannot rely on it for an appointment or an airport ride because, at any point, your ride can be simply cancelled.

overall my experience is good with uber the only problem which i mostly have is that when driver does not want to take my ride after accepting it, he asks me to cancel it so that he would get any fine but i get the fine. also, there is one more issue which i am facing now a days is that ride usually arrives at the location and i get the notification about arrival after 5 minutes which is very annoying because the ride stays on the waiting and then i have to pay for the waiting charges.
uber is a huge business and i can understand that you make happy to masses so it's fine but sometimes it annoying when the drivers keep cancel the rides.

Review Title: All the drivers that i have been riding…
Review Body: all the drivers that i have been riding with are so reliable and friendly and wonderful, that you will always want to ride with them over and over again.

Review Title: Our first Uber ride was great
Review Body: our first uber ride was great!  we loved the communication from the get go.  we utilized reserve a time.  i received a response with driver and car description.   gary was on time and his car was immaculate.   he drove perfectly and confidently.  got us from point a to point b in the blink of an eye because time flew while enjoying his conversation.

my mother in law has just had the most horrendous experience with uber taxi service. she literally just got out of the uber taxi, realised she left her bag on the back seat and tried to phone uber to get in contact with the driver. it took uber over an hour to sort this out and when she did finally contact the driver, he had informed her there was no bag left. her phone, wallet etc was in this bag and as a result a huge amount of grief cancelling cards phone contracts etc.  uber and its staff can not be trusted. stay clear.

Review Title: Worst very worst no safety for women…
Review Body: worst very worst no safety for women driver abuse words n cancel trip in middle of the road and say to get down....if we call driver he ask destination if it is far he cancel trip

Review Title: Uber could not provide car yet charged me multiple times....
Review Body: i scheduled a trip based on a move and needing to drop off cars in a warehouse in a zone said to be serviced by uber. after driving 28 hours, i requested an uber back to the airport to ho home and get my uhual. for 2 days uber said they had an uber. after waiting 30 minutes between each request they said they had no cars available. yet they charged my card for each request. i had to find my own ride to the airport. i would not trust uber or use them again unless in a big city with lots of uber drivers!

my driver was well dressed, courteous, a good driver, car well kept and clean.
no complaints, just compliments.
driver was polite and accurate.   picked us up within minutes of request and dropped us exactly where we needed to be.  car was spotless

Review Title: Trips were easy and quick to get
Review Body: trips were easy and quick to get.  friendly drivers

Review Title: First driver had strong tree air…treated right when had to cancel
Review Body:
first driver had strong tree air fresheners. i got sick. he cancelled my trip for me so i wasn’t penalized. great.
second driver robert was perfect. clean car. good comfortable ride

i was in scottsdale and ordered an uber to pick us up at our hotel.  the drivers car was a complete pit.  we hesitated to get in the car as there were empty soda bottles and trash all over the seats!  unbelievable.  he started picking them up but we told him we were canceling the ride.  i was charged 5 dollars for what i don't know and don't have the energy to contest it.  uber is a rip off.

your drivers are wonderful and they get me to my destination perfectly. they are willing to accept shortcuts which is also a nice feature. however your app needs updates it’s glitching as has caused me to be late on many of my requests.

Review Title: My Uber experience was very good
Review Body: my uber experience was very good.  the driver on time and pleasant to speed with.  his car was meet and clean, and he drove very professionally.

it’s terrible how drivers keep cancelling the ride and we have to pay for it. drivers don’t even have patience to wait for 5 mins. money doesn’t grow from trees stop charging us for their mistake. sometimes i feel like telling everyone to stop using this because it’s so unfair and horrible..
drivers should not know the destination or they’ll keep cancelling.. what if there’s an emergency?? so useless u guys are..

drivers are exploiting functions to either overcharge clients or even charge clients without delivering any service. often times i pay fees because drivers accept my trip and just sits in one place, waiting for me to cancel the trip (which costs the fee). ultimately this app lets you pay someone for no reason other than wasting your time, making you late and still not getting you to the destination…

Review Title: Will never breathe Uber’s way ever again.
Review Body: when i say that i have had enough of uber, they have sent me to my breaking point with them. even after all the late driver arrivals, constant driver cancellations, pickups that exceeds the desired pickup time, outlandish prices for a 10 to 15 minute trip, and the lack of support and competence from the customer service team, i have always held on and continued to grant them chances after chances. yesterday, a line was drawn, in this line had something to do with money. i scheduled for a ride 20 minutes before the end of my shift, promptly got charged for the ride, only for me to return to the app and realize that they never even processed the ride! immediately checked my upcoming rides, and to no surprise, nothing was there! it was as if i didn’t schedule or order an uber at all. after 5 minutes of trying to figure out what the heck went wrong, i reluctantly paid another 30 bucks, just so i can get a proper ride this time. in total, i had to spend over 60 dollars for just one ride! ridiculous! i immediately requested for a refund with customer service, only for those blokes to sit there and tell me that i was never charged twice and that my case wasn’t eligible for a refund. how the heck are they gonna tell me what was charged to my card or not?? it’s money coming out of my pocket! obviously, i threatened to take legal action over this matter, so i’m waiting on a response from them. i’ve gotten over the money part, it’s the overall principle that rubs me the wrong way. you don’t steal from the customers that are paying their hard earned money for your services. might be time for me to shift on over to lyft, because uber has burned all the bridges necessary with me. i’m done with them.

Review Title: Uber is the most unethical and…
Review Body: uber is the most unethical and unscrupulous company.  i will never ride with them again. shady drivers with cars reeking of marijuana.  but my beef is their billing practices.  twice in a week they have double charged me and stolen money from my unjustly.  when you pay a charge with a card it is debited from your account and paid. uber gets that money right then. there is no need for them to place another charge as a hold when they have been paid. last week i added a $25.00 gift card to my uber account and i had $25.00 in what is called uber cash to use. i took a ride that costs less than half of my available uber cash so it was covered yet they placed a charge on a card attached to my uber account and when i messaged them they said they couldn't see the charge although i provided screenshots. they also tried to say someone else must have used my account without my permission.  they tried that on me on both occasions and i let them know no one but me has access to my account.  they caused me to have a mental health related relapse due to the upset and constant going back and forth with them only to get nowhere.  caused my bank account to go into arrears and i couldn't eat after leaving the emergency room yesterday because they stole my money. so beware people.  if you value your hard earned money take lyft.

1 star is too much.
no customer service here: only interested in taking your money. £6.22 for getting in and out of the taxi as the driver was so rude and unhelpful saying that our destination was incorrect so wouldn't take us even though we had paid. i have tried to contact them for a refund with no luck. disgraceful.

scheduled a trip with uber, but my assigned driver never showed up. gurvinder, bmw2906, gray toyota rav4 refused to pick me up nor would he cancel the trip on his end. he told me to cancel the trip on my end and pay $9.00 cancelation fee. i was stuck in the rain with out a ride. horrible driver, terrible experience.

uber is turning out to be a nightmare. it take ages to connect with the driver, and once it has connected the driver is so far from the pickup location that he cancels it. why not connecting with the nearest driver? sick of booking the rides again and again.

Review Title: Uber has found new ways to cheat…
Review Body:
uber has found new ways to cheat customers at the time of booking they show rs265 and when you reach your destination that time it will show rs314

when we ask driver about this they are like talk to uber i don’t know

what a service and brilliant way to cheat customers 👏🏻

very bad, i'm always late for work.
drivers have the'n option to cancel the trip when they think it's unsafe. booking in advance doesn't mean that they will pick you up. gives you a false sense of security. drivers has told me that some guys cancel you trip when they get a message on there whatsapp for a private trip and can pocket the money for themselves, rather than getting paid by the person they work for.

it seems that some vehicle owners drive themselves now because of this.

this service is still bad and i'm going to use a different provider. uber will never improve as they always leave a backdoor open for anyone to cancel 500m away from the pickup point so the driver can do a private pick-up. and you can't even review the driver as he never picked you up.

another service provider that is actually a disappointment in the country of theves.

Review Title: My last driver is a real go getter and…

the vehicle was clean, the driver polite, and the journey safe. just like it should be.

Review Body: the ap is a bit difficult for seniors. also, i noted to a driver exactly where i was and i'm thinking because of his lack of english reading he couldn't find me. i waited 40 min not understanding how to get another ride..finally somehow i was picked up.

Review Title: They arrived to the correct address and…
Review Body: they arrived to the correct address and on time. the cars were clean and comfortable. the driver was careful and took great routes to get us to our destination in a timely manner.

Review Title: Used UBER in Las Vegas several times…
Review Body: used uber in las vegas several times fast pick up courteous drivers with clean cars. 5 star service. thank you

i had a fare accepted for a range of €44-58 at naples airport. the driver didn't set the meter and said a fayre of around €50 would be okay mid journey.
when we arrived at the destination, he demanded €80. we negotiated down to €70 and appealed with uber who were no help.
they sent me guidance which says the fare is inclusive of other charges and must be agreed at the start of the trip. neither of these things happened and yet they've refused to help.
will never use again, will go with a better, trustworthy firm.
the drivers twice cancelled their services and uber credited my card for the cancellation.

Review Title: Driver was friendly and had a clean…
Review Body: driver was friendly and had a clean safe vehicle. he paid attention and drove well

Review Title: I left my I phone in my Drivers car…
Review Body: i left my i phone in my drivers car (david: driving a  ford fusion license plate (hunybr) in eugene or. i immediately realized that i left my phone in the back seat of his vehicle. as he was driving away i tried to flag him down but he continued to drive away. i have made several attempts to contact the driver through uber and uber have been very unhelpful saying "we have contacted the driver if there are any updates we will let you know" i will never use uber ever again. david has made no attempt to contact me regarding this issue. i have filed a police report because at this point i have reason to believe that the driver/david still has my phone 2 days later

Review Title: The driver came very quickly.  He was very nice and helpful!!
Review Body: the driver came very quickly, but there was confusion as to where he was located and i was located. therefore, i was charged a “wait time” fee. didn’t know that exact existed, but now i do. overall, very thankful to have a ride in an unfamiliar place.

driver cancelled ride, i didn’t. i was late for my appointment. i can not pay $5.00

they cheat on drivers. they cheat on price and they always look for loop hole to justify their cheat. thats why many people take uber to court and uber always loses the case. company app has been designed unfairly and algorithm cheats on every trips.

Review Title: The best company in Galveston Texas
Review Body: living in galveston texas, uber is the best company to go with! the drivers are always very friendly and safe, as well as punctual. i've never had to wait more than 20 minutes for a ride. they really are a lifesaver in a town with precious little reliable transportation. i will never call a cab company again. the cab companies here are a nightmare!

Review Title: I use to be a driver for uber until I…
Review Body: i use to be a driver for uber until i was in an accident while make a delivery i tried to reported to uber and you know what uber did they deleted the trip i was doing just so i wouldn't have prove that i was working with them during the accident and they locked my account without a valid reason without an explanation. now its been 8 month since my accident and uber will not provide me with my tax forms i have contact them through email and phone and all they tell me is that they can't help me. uber is the worst company to work for they are very sketchy and if you have an accident with them good luck with that. uber literally fk up my life in so many ways.
arrived quickly.very friendly and courteous driver.

excellent turnaround time for pickup. i only had to wait 8 minutes for my ride to show up at my pickup location. my driver had a clean car and a nice personality. i will always use uber when i need transportation.

Review Title: Uber and Lyft used to be good…
Review Body:
uber and lyft used to be good companies, always straight forward with waiting time and rates.
now, it's a nightmare. i am talking about how, after having pushed out taxi companies and van rides, they are now totally taking advantage of the public.
their rates from airports are outrageous, way more than what taxis used to cost, simply because they play on offer and demand.
they pretend the prices usually drop after rush hour and the airport crowd thins out, but they don't. i experienced it first hand.
what's more is that now, the indicated waiting time is almost never the actual time you will wait, as it changes once you confirm the pick up.
and more than once, i was simply dropped by the driver before he even reached me!
uber and lyft are slowly but surely turning into the same greedy racketeering operations as any big corporation. and that's a shame.

unsafe, untrustworthy and inconsistent. used to be useful however now ruined by drivers competing for surge pricing with no accountability for cancelled fares leading to likelihood of being stranded despite journey being accepted.

Review Title: Had a terrible journey with a hostile…
Review Body: had a terrible journey with a hostile driver. complained to uber who gave a generic response. replied asking for a actual response to my message, they just copied and pasted the same generic response! not once but three further times! customer service is shocking. thanks uber for forcing me to use other apps.
uber service in kolkata is very very very pathetic. most of the drivers are non senses, they too much of attitude
80% of drivers are loosers. clearly not vetting the people who apply for jobs. charge and overcharge and then do t arrive.

Review Title: Our Uber from the Houston Hobby airport…
Review Body: our uber from the houston hobby airport was delightful. the driver helped us load our luggage in the vehicle. he had soothing music playing. the vehicle was clean and comfortable. he even unloaded our luggage at home and carried it up to the porch.  will definitely uber again instead of parking at the airport.

the ride and driver were fine.
what really upset me was the crafty way uber used my (supposedly) $10 credit. we ordered a ride from the airport to our hotel. it was a short trip that started out costing $12+ prior to discount. we excepted the ride and it said driver would arrive in 8 minutes. then as we waited uber cancelled the ride and gave us other options starting at $34. that's just bad practice and was sure not appreciated by me! sad and cheep uber!

Review Title: I always have a pleasant experience…
Review Body: i always have a pleasant experience with uber. my drivers are courteous, helpful, and read my mood.  they can tell if i want to talk or just have a quiet ride.  i appreciate also how fast they arrive to pick me up. thank you so much!!!

i am not going to use uber anymore; the threat language you used in your email to me is not acceptable
a very courteous driver. ample room for 6 riders. vehicle was very clean and comfortable.
driver was on time, polite. did his job perfectly
on time, professional, friendly, great driver. thank you

Review Title: My driver was very professional a very…
Review Body: my driver was very professional a very nice young man

to have paid for a price and then to find out i was charged more as the driver decided to take long route as he was getting frustrated and angry with little bit of traffic is disgusting as i wasn’t told by driver and he decided to u turn it before i could say anything. and then to find out i was charged more what i was to anyway is disgusting. several times i’ve had problems and it is now to point i will not be using uber ride again

Review Title: They don’t even deserve one star
Review Body: they don’t even deserve one star. i moved to another state and kept getting errors when i submitted new documents. after months of this, they said i had to start over because they didn’t update what they needed to on the back end. now i have been trying to get them to delete my accounts for months. i’m still getting driver notifications. most incompetent customer service i have ever experienced and that if you are lucky enough to get someone on the phone. don’t drive for uber!
driver was very friendly, engaging and had a very comfortable ride.  would use again and recommend to friends.

i usually order comfort cars. my experience has been very positive. drivers are nice and personable. cars have clean and smell pleasant. i have plenty of leg room. all have been positive and safe drivers.

Review Body: i have had great experience with all uber drivers, friendly and helpful.

Review Title: It was great to use Uber in Chicago
Review Body: it was great to use uber in chicago. the driver to airport was really nice. we couldn’t have driven in the traffic there let of known where we were going.

a little late to the uber party, but just downloaded the app for my trip to vegas.  super easy, super quick pickups, friendly drivers with clean vehicles.  made getting around very easy and stress free.
the whole process was effortless!!  my driver, cetin, was outstanding, on time, personable, gracious and helpful!

excellent service.  only issue i have is that  passenger is charged  for having the driver wait for them.   however if the driver shows up late the passenger doesn't have any money taken off his bill.

this would have been a 5 star except for my having incurred a cancelation charge due to operator error.  i was trying to "schedule" a pick up rather than an immediate pick-up.  driver was fantastic!!!

i like uber very much, i jave uses it for a hand full of times, the cost is affordable, the service is good, and it gives everyone a way to save and an easy way for the drivers to make an extra dollar, i recommend uber indeed.  however; in mexico, different story, for instance, from the aiport in guadalajara to my destination, the taxi is 430 pesos uber is 400, not worth getting uber, i rather pay 430

Review Title: Driver left us standing in the rain and forced us to pay for us not to show up.
Review Body: taxi is the way to go! never going to use uber again. the fee is slightly less but the experience is night and day. the only thing the app lets you review is the driver for fulfilled drives.

Review Title: Very Good Drivers never had a bad one…
Review Body: very good drivers never had a bad one always so friendly! always come in a reasonable amount of time

Review Title: I've been charged a "wait time" and the…
Review Body: i've been charged a "wait time" and the driver was in front of the wrong house. 3 houses away from the pick up address.

i was taking an uber upon arrival at airport, there was a lot of traffic, but even when i had the 4 digit code somebody else took my ride and left me without the option of requesting another ride, i had to wait until the driver made his first delivery to come back and pick me up

Review Title: Uber charges very high fees on…
Review Body: uber charges very high fees on maintenance, reservations and such making the trips unnecessarily expensive, the drivers don’t get that money. also when you check more than one time the uber algorithm will increase the price automatically.
not a great service. tube strikes then have had one driver after another cancel on me. don’t take on the work if you can’t handle to volume of people wanting to book.

i have rated it 1star but that is 1 star to many. we ordered an uber to pick us up near the o2 in london at 11pm to take us back to hotel at canary wharf. waiting at the pick up point we had a call from the driver telling us to meet him at a car park a 15 minute walk away. an o2 security guard spoke to driver explaining we didn’t know our way and to pick us up at the designated point. eventually he got there and told us our booking been cancelled. we missed last train and walked back to hotel in rain. spoke to uber support about the cancellation fee they charged me even though they cancelled, they said there will be no refund and they hung up on me when i was pleading my case. very rude and unhelpful company. i will never use them again.
while in chicago on the weekend of june 5th i relied on uber to get around and i received excellent service! it was convenient and our driver was very professional.

otto was our driver. he was kind and professional. our ride was safe and comfortable. otto introduced himself right away. he even called my phone to let me know they perfect spot at the airport to meet him. it was all so easy and pleasant. we would look forward to driving with otto again!

Review Title: Dropped off in the wrong place in Paris with my 11 year old son
Review Body:
paris france feedback: booked a trip from near the palais de luxembourg to the musee de l’orangerie. uber accepted this trip. the driver took an extremely time consuming and complicated route (and seemed to struggle with where he was going, using google maps or similar). he stopped on rue de castiglione and said we had arrived. i challenged him to say that we had not. when he showed me his phone, the destination clearly said musee de l’orangerie. he then refused to take me and my 11 year old son any further. the destination in the booking now says the road where we were dropped. i have no idea why … it simply was not where i had booked and agreed.

so in short, we were taken somewhere we didn’t want to go, then left on a road we did not know. and charged for it. it was extremely worrying, when taxis and uber pride themselves on getting people to destinations safely and courteously. on this trip, we were made to feel really very uncomfortable. not an issue we have ever had with uber in the past.
masked, even in texas!  comfortable car and nice driver.

Review Title: My driver picked me up within 3 minutes…
Review Body: my driver picked me up within 3 minutes and was extremely nice and knowledgeable about the area i'm staying in, went above and beyond, thanks man.

me and my wife recently had uber to pick us up from a hotel in roanoke va., and drive us to rocky mount va. henry was our driver (which i tipped generously) had a nice ride to rocky mount which is approximately a 25 mile drive. upon arrival to our destination henry says just give us a call, and we will take care of you when you’re ready to be picked up. after enjoying a couple of hours at our venue, i use my uber app to request pickup service. immediately get a message of no drivers in your area. this goes on for approximately 45 minutes. my wife is nervous, as we are stranded. there are no cab companies around. i was solely depending on uber for the ride back! to make a long story short, the locals at the venue tell us that uber doesn’t pick up in this area. we were left stranded by uber. would have been nice to know before they dropped us off!!!!

Review Title: Had a pleasant trip recently with Diego
Review Body: had a pleasant trip recently with diego.  he was kind and good natured, carried an upbeat conversation.  his car was clean and he was a safe driver.  i would possibly caution to be careful about the style of music played.  it wasn’t offensive to me but might be to others.  had typical offensive slang and strong cursing.  again, i was fine with it but others might not be.great trip overall!

andrei was an excellent driver, car was spotless, and he was very helpful with the uber process, as i had never uber'd before. i will not hesitate to uber again in the future. service and process was above and beyond my expectations.
timely arrival of driver.  friendly, polite driver.  safe, comfortable drive to our destination.
drivers always professional and friendly. no concerns about safety.

Review Title: Uber was a lifesaver when our car broke down
Review Body: our ride arrived quickly. the driver was polite. the car was clean. the cost was fair.
my driver was very nice, even helped me with my groceries. very polite and personable.

Review Title: I have been using Uber about once a…
Review Body:
i have been using uber about once a month. all trips were excellent except this last one. the driver could not find the location ( the atlanta airport car rental building) after waiting for 25 plus mins, the driver called and said he could not find the location and suggested that i cancel. i did and rescheduled with another driver but i still got double charged with no one to call and talk to about this. customer service is hard to get hold of and still trying to find contact info to remove the charge.
all other trips have been good

Review Title: The ride and the driver was great but…
Review Body: the ride and the driver was great but i’m not sure why i was over charged. i tried to use my voucher but it did not work.

Review Title: Drivers are cancelling ride few minutes…
Review Body: drivers are cancelling ride few minutes before pickup, thats is bad practice , just happened to me twice in rotterdam, at the end walked back...

Review Title: Irresponsible Uber, abandoned us in town!
Review Body:
i’m very involved in the drag community in bristol.

i had taken my younger sister, 18, to her first show. after at around 1:30, we decided to leave, she was fairly drunk but still able bodied, not spewing and able to talk.

i spent over 2 hours trying to book an uber. one uber driver finally accepted our ride, when he pulled up, he looked directly at me. i smiled to him and waved, as soon as he saw me (i was 100% sober as i wanted to ensure my sister was safe that night), he sped off down the road!

i chased after him (a friend of mine who owned the bar was looking after my sister) but he continued to drive off!

this is absolutely an appalling thing to do. regardless of what we were doing that night, my sister and i were stranded in town till 4am! my sister got very upset and overwhelmed, thankfully by chance, my best friend came to pick us up.

again, appalling!!!

i couldn’t even get his name or details as the app had said he cancelled the ride, so i can’t even report him. hopefully this review deters people from using this service!

Review Title: Worst taxi company i ever seen.
Review Body:
worst taxi company ever,
i have tried for taxi booking and search for near by cab has take too long and still they not find any & then i have booked ola taxi.
now their cab driver calling me that i have reached your location.
how can they do that, without confirmation of ride their driver came my location ??
now they are demanding 15 percent charges of unbooked ride on my next ride
so i recommand everyone that never use such fraud company for taxi booking.
in last 15 days i have also seen many more incident with my friends also.
one of my friend had paid cash to uber ride & still they show your payment is pending.
so i think that if this issues are not sorted out by uber they will be thrown out of market very shortly.
my ride was online, the car was clean and comfortable and the driver was friendly.

Review Title: MH01 DR 6888 Blacklist him from Uber
Review Body: first of all driver did not come to location. later when we reach to him, he said dicky door can not be open it is stucked, when i kept my luggage on seat, he said his seat will tear , he was giving many reasons. later he said he will not go cancel the trip. i don't understand if he doesn't want to go then why would i cancel. why uber is like this with such misbehaving drivers. he was supposed to slap my brother. later that dicky door also got opened. the trip got cancelled by driver then why passenger will pay fine. i would highly recommend to blacklist that uber guy. it was worst experience till date. i am using uber since long.
