Review Title: I have done 4 uber rides in the last 3…
Review Body: i have done 4 uber rides in the last 3 days and all were perfect! the drivers professional,  cars clean and they knew exactly where to go! saying a lot for boston! and all quick and easy. i am a fan.

corrupt company, discriminatory management policies, unfair hidden policies towards drivers the very drivers that without them uber won’t even exist. this company should really be wiped off of the face of the earth sooner than later to allow other better decent  competitive companies to grow and serve better our communities around the world. their systems cheat on estimating the ride fair while charging the difference, and for drivers my best advice never make uber your only source of income even with all thier gimmick pension scheme etc because with uber its a zero job security anytime for any false claim by any rider they will block you out and you will never get to know why! very unfair and corrupt company.

Review Title: SCAMMERS. WILL SEE YOU IN COURT.
Review Body:
booked an uber for a 46 mile trip. on a busy friday and confirmed my booking for £159.
get home and i’ve been billed £339. the response when i called uber was the price was ‘updated for the average price in the area.’

nobody informed me of this and if this was the case i would’ve absolutely not got an uber home but probably an all inclusive holiday to spain for a week instead. they have referred it to the ‘specialist team’ but i’ve already been told they won’t be able to do anymore. we ordered an exec so nothing special.

i have already quoted on the app the same journey, at the same time on a friday night and the price still says £159.

not to mention the driver asked for my phone towards the end of the trip to ‘make sure there’s no extra costs’ and this happens. he has a dashcam so it will all be evidence unless he deletes it of course. he was driving at midnight with my phone in his hands. uber couldn’t give a damn about this either even though it’s a criminal offence to drive while using a phone. stupid me shouldn’t have handed it over.

absolute scammers and i am seeking legal advice to get some money back. i will take them to court of i need to.

stay away from this company.
many great uber rides recently. very convenient and the drivers were all personable and professional.
all drivers were courteous and professional.
hire more drivers from 20:00 till 24:00!!!! :(

absolutely shocking customer service will never use them again. my delivery never arrived spoke to the driver twice and could not understand him also given the fact im deaf and wear a cochlear implant will not refund me any money given the situation, im appalled at their response just cannot believe it! don't use them bunch of jokers!!!!
bad, said connecting to driver someone would accept then decline and mess you around. waste of time

Review Title: Such a wrost experience I have got I…
Review Body: such a wrost experience i have got i wanted to take my grandmother to hospital very urgently but the app was showing connecting to driver it took lot of time it didn't work
terrible. would have preferred to give 0 .. won't load nor connect a driver. no issue before but sooooo poor now

i lost my phone in an uber on 5/27/22 in pearland, tx. the driver confirmed that he had my item but never returned it. i would highly recommend not using uber. they are suppose to provide  public service to its riders. very disappointed. i had to purchase another phone. horrible experience. the driver's name was hector.

Review Title: 0 stars if I could- fraud and scamming
Review Body: 0 stars if i could. my philadelphia driver waited for us to leave the vehicle, not even at our destination, and must had spread squeeze cheese looking stuff all over the front and back seat and inside doors of his vehicle. which doesn’t even make sense given every seat was taken so someone was sitting in the seats he very obviously left his finger marks in and uber charged me $183 to go straight to the driver for a cleaning fee, imagine that. then refuses to speak to me and their app is “malfunctioning” when i go to leave a negative review.   financial fraud exactly as outlines on their driver accounts for submission of false cleaning fee claims.

Review Title: The app is horrible and the drivers are…
Review Body:
the app is horrible and the drivers are too!
the itinerary to when my uber was arriving was wrong! it said 4 minutes and he apparently had already arrived.
i rushed to the uber within a seconds and he had already cancelled.
this is so unprofessional. drivers are so rude and always cancel on you within seconds and not to mention that it takes so long for any driver to accept your ride. mine was at 40€ and i still had to wait for 1 hour.
there are no drivers and the few ones you have always cancel within seconds of waiting and are rude while it takes literally so long for customers to get their uber.

i will never use uber. the reason is i was trying to get a price for a trip and next thing i know they tell me it's booked and a driver is onthe way i said cancel immediately.
now they want money to cancel.
what a fraud!!!

Review Title: UBER needs to stop taking clients for granted
Review Body: i have used uber when i need a quick drive to the airport and never had an issue. i called an uber and told it would be 20min. over an hour later they finally assigned new driver? i was completely stressing out and ended up missing my flight. i contacted  support and their response was "oh sorry." not sorry we caused you to miss your flight and cost you money, we'll undo the charges. honestly, felt like a huge screw you from a company who does not give a **** about their clients. they have grown too large and couldn't care less. horrible customer service.

Review Title: Final goodbye to Uber and unprofessional transportation service
Review Body:
i was told to leave rudely by uber driver today after he found out that my ride was to gatineau, a region that uber doesn’t service. drivers can’t get ride back from there thus don’t want take ride to gatineau. uber hides destinations from drivers to take business, results in driver's frustration being put on customers.

the worst was i realized that i was being rated as a customer. i’m willing to pay more for taxi to get better service and privacy.

uber drivers are not professional and often emotionally protective. a common thing such as the speed of closing a car door can cause the driver reacting offensively. i was told to close the car with more strength one time just to be scold at for closing the door too heavily the other time. am i paying for my ride to submit to personal possession problems?

uber should not exist as it is ineffective, expensive and irresponsible as a middle guy, who takes no responsibility on creating a new segment of transportation market that is creating increasingly frustration for all parties.

Review Title: Drivers have confirmed pick up few…
Review Body: drivers have confirmed pick up few times and then cancelled( or not even cancelled but not appeared after us waiting for a longer time ) but money taken out of our account anyway.

attn, uber ceo, your company is run by fruads like you. while booking you show some price and later at drop you ensure the the price is twice. you put your auto drivers cancellation of book is ngs on us
and you have appointed. rowdies as auto drivers to snatch our money. have some sense, ceo of uber. do you give service to extort money from your customers. i am advising others to not use your service. infact it is not service you derive it is extortion.
booked taxi 2 hours in advance. was told 10 mins before no drivers available. terrible customer service after waiting so long

Review Title: So about my mum’s stolen suitcase
Review Body: can we have a word please…my mum’s suitcase gets stolen by one of your drivers and you try and just shoo her off? no, no, no…sorry, she has a very much present son…who has time.

Review Title: uber is ripping off their drivers
Review Body: as uber driver they take most of the fares and gives us peanuts for the trips.

seemed simple... one-way trip that i booked on uber app. once confirmed on app, texted driver exactly where i was standing. she replied acknowledging info. eta was 20 min. i was tracking her vehicle on the app, and car went off grid. after 30 min, i could see vehicle approaching my home. one thing missing...never picked me up. i text 3x asking what was going on? i was ghosted, but did get msg "your trip is complete"...plz rate/tip!! tried calling uber. nope. had to order another uber ride. i spent $50 for a $15 trip. the worst part is uber as a company. it's nearly impossible to file a complaint, and when i  did file with a screenshot proof, the robo response said "maybe a family member or friend used my account". no accountability, no follow through, no reimbursement. i lost money and an hour at dinner time. web site is not user-friendly and it's impossible to talk to an actual person. terrible experience.

Review Title: The drivers are very rude and…
Review Body:
the drivers are very rude and mannerless. donot care about customers convinience . they just want their money without working worth it . no etiquets in talking to customer .
raj one of the uber driver is very rude . riding in the eastern sides of mumbai . with car numbermh43bg2907.

Review Title: Just a big lie they take all the money…
Review Body: just a big lie they take all the money and leave drivers the scraps. don’t fall for it not worth it at all. will ruin your mental health!

Review Title: Uber is fraud site where if you book…
Review Body: uber is fraud site where if you book ride from pune to borivali, uber drivers  drop you at vashi by stating that stearing problem.then uber support ask to pay full and then refund you 100 out of 2000 rs.please do not use uber ride

this review is strictly on customer support. my colluige left his phone in the back of an uber when we were being dropped off. immediately after calling his phone and getting no answer i let him use my phone to call customer support. after explaining multiple times the help we needed the rep kept putting us on hold it to hang up on us. after 20 minutes we finally got another rep on the phone who once again could not give us an answer on if she was able to reach out to the driver for us. she kept repeating that she could send us an email later on. this experience was frustrating. all of the information they provide to us as customers on our uber driver and they were not able to call the driver of the car that we just got out of? as of now we have had no follow up from customer service. thankfully after calling his phone multiple times did the driver finally answer and bring us the phone. thank you to him, however customer service for uber needs serious work.

beware
uber charge you with no services, drivers not coming or coming & left the location immediately,

terrible service. i live in zone 4 london (greenford) and at night never find a driver who accepts me to go back home from central london. finally, i need a cab. so uber is useless for me. drivers just want to work short rides in central london!!!!

Review Title: I have had it up to here with Uber
Review Body:
i have had it up to here with uber. for the past 6 months, i have been unable to connect with any driver. no matter my location, no matter the distance, uber will not connect me to a driver.

i have been stranded in places while uber drivers a mere 2 minutes away refuse to take me home, or even take me to the nearest train station.

i am disabled and at first being able to rely on uber which was cheaper and more easily accessible than regular taxis was amazing. but now i'm just being refused. i have no idea what's going on.

this is unfortunate but a lot of drivers are very bad and disrespectful!! some of them don't even help clients when they carry bags, or they just cancel trips at last minute ( happening all the time...) if they don't want to do the job so just do something else! this is awful

on february 4, 2022, i headed to the airport with an uber driver to charge far more than the usual $ 107, ( about 70 $ is usual) ,  the forecasted snow storm was rain. there was no traffic problem getting to the airport. the problem was with the driver who got lost. he drove me into some kind of freight operation and he had to figure out how to get to the airport from there. i had to help him. he didn’t know where terminal three was. i had to help him with that. we took a very long time to get to the airport slowing me down for customs. it’s been a lot of time and effort trying to contact uber on the app and got an unsatisfactory response. do it tried contacting uber on my telephone but couldn’t find them. i couldn’t message uber from my app either and couldn’t find out how to do that. while on my trip away from canada. months later uber decided to charge my credit card with a zero balance. my credit card contacted me and asked me if i authorize that charge i said i didn’t then they had to cancel my no credit card. once again i couldn’t get a hold of uber to find out why they made this o charge on my credit card when i wasn’t even in the country the cancellation of my credit card created plenty of problems including extra charges from my storage area and no cell phone when i returned my back into canada. it was a highly stressful event and i still can’t speak or have this situation explained to me about uber because i can’t get hold of them. i am very discouraged by uber and i’m not giving my credit card to them or any other transportation company on an ad hoc basis. they can’t be trusted and you can’t get any consumer satisfaction from uber when they make these major mistakes

1) i booked a ride from my place to the airport. i was all ready. 5 minutes later, got a text from uber saying they re-assigned a different driver and the rate was more than i originally charged. i was being tricked.2) a week later, i booked a ride from the airport. the driver took a tollway which i didn't ask for it. after he dropped me off, i immediately checked my bill.  i found out he charged me $14.95 for the tollway.  i was so upset. i contacted uber, they difn't bother to repond my complain. becareful when booking a ride from them!
mostly cab driver harass even uber don't listen customer they don't on ac they mis behave cancel the requests does not take and drop on drop locations worst services ever

Review Title: I tried setting up as an “Uber eats”…
Review Body: i tried setting up as an “uber eats” driver. somehow the account was set up for uber not uber eats. i tried contacting support by phone. i got through to a call centre worker in timbuktu who couldn’t speak english and couldn’t help. trying to get a response out of uber is nigh on impossible. finally the response i got was i would have to open a new account with a new email address and phone number. i’ve lost patience and closed the account. goodbye uber.

they hired this man/woman profile picture a guy the driver reminded me of baits motel remember that guy that wore his mom's clothes  yeah totally then no seat an definitely over the speed limit that's the type of ppl uber hires an lift hires ex armed service ppl thats ex killers

what happened to uber?!

they used to be great but they are appalling now. i have spent hours being told a driver is only minutes away before they routinely cancel and then eventually cancel altogether... then occasionally they charge me a fee for the privilege of waiting for them on the side of the street for an hour or so.

they are quite frankly embarrassingly bad at this point.

big fraud in trip cancellations. drivers are cancelling trips and users are automatically charged without any notification.  i book a ride, driver accepts, i wait 5-10 minutes. driver calls me to tell me he is too far and ask me to cancel the trip, and i get charged for that. if i dont, driver will "transfer the ride" to another driver, who will take 10 more minutes and might eventually do the same. its a neverending story. in the meantime customers wait forever or are forced to cancel the ride and get charged. there is no way to give feedback about this on the app. unbelievable.
unprofessional drivers that instead of improving their manners mostly...give customers bad feedbacks.

Review Title: Uber have completely forgotten what they were supposed to stand for
Review Body:
i avoid uber like the plague these days, as does pretty much everyone i know, and looking at the reviews on here, everyone else does too!

their customer service is completely non-existent - literally no one to speak to. they constantly make mistakes in their systems - i once even had another uber customer call my mobile to chase up their taxi because the system had given them my personal data to a complete stranger as the driver's number. can you speak to anyone about it though? of course not. uber eats are just as bad - constant mistakes and issues, and there is nothing to be done about it.

what astonishes me is the point in uber was to create a community-based company that provided a service that was about the people - customer service, helping people get from a-to-b safely without ripping them off, and providing jobs where people could be in control of their own livelihood and working week.

gone are those days - they have honestly now become the nameless, corporate monster, the company that is doing the ripping off, and it's the local taxi companies that have become the underdog that deserve support and our business, because they treat you with respect, courtesy - and humanity!

Review Title: After being given an 8 minute wait for…
Review Body: after being given an 8 minute wait for pick up, the wait time remained between 8 to 10 minutes for the next 15 minutes. i finally called the driver who told me he didn’t know when he can get to me. it sounded like he was giving other rides in the mean time. i cancelled the ride and rescheduled my medical appointment. thank heavens i didn’t have to pay for a late cancellation! no more uber for me.

although i have used uber in several countries very efficiently and with great positive experience it seems that in portugal the service, the reliability and the credibility is far behind the expectations i have. if a ride is below 10€  you will get no access. but they won't tell you. they kept me waiting for 1 hour and then i was told that there us no driver available. bolt and others were able and i was still waiting. so uber in portugal-no go!

rip off, 1.6 miles £12.55???
drivers sat around refusing fares, which i would argue is false advertising... then price is magically hiked from £5.90 to £12.55 ...all for just a 4 minute ride. i've deleted the app....the world has gone mad!

Review Title: Poor Uber service with no support
Review Body:
uber driver failed to pick up at agreed point as ordered on the uber app, who then sent a text to meet him 200 yards away in the rain which led to charge of extra waiting time plus leading to longer route to destination.no apology received either from the uber driver or uber support team.
time to delete the uber app and use the competitors’ service.

uber support is an oxymoron. they couldn’t connect me to a driver, then i called them on the helpline, the woman was completely unhelpful and recited the terms and conditions for getting my money back - not what i asked in the slightest. i wanted to get some actual help and had to set up a twitter account to contact them. all their responses are automated. dreadful company. support your local taxi firm.

really bad service, they charge you before they find an available ride and if they don’t you’re just stood there waiting with no drivers confirming for ages. then if you cancel and try again they’ll charge your account again. absolutely ridiculous. i have waited for an hour with drivers making me wait 9 - 10 minutes each time, only cancelling when they were 500 meters away and the process begun again. never again will i use uber in london…

poor customer service, horrible attitude of drivers and uber customer care could not respond even after several attempts to report about a particular nasty driver. driver supports reporting about uber when he is working for uber itself. unprofessional and no work ethic in 50 percent of these drivers.

Review Title: I have travelling from last one year…
Review Body: i have travelling from last one year but they suddenly change the route. even if i take the shorter route they charged me for the longer one. all the payments are computerized nothing with the drivers please do the needful as soon as possible

absolutely shocking service first time using uber taxis, never again booked 3 hours in advance 5 minutes before it was due cancelled taxi saying no drivers available and still took the money out my husbands bank

my driver was prompt, friendly, and helpful.  my beef is with the emailed receipt.  it only shows what the basic charge was and then asks if i want to tip the driver.  i already added a tip on the app while in the car, and my credit card card sent me an emailed alert for the tip charge.  uber's emailed receipt is very misleading.

Review Title: Recently in San Jose del Cabo and left stranded in the night
Review Body: recently in san jose del cabo and took an uber to cabo san lucas.  when we left to go back (9:50 pm) we took an uber.  the driver pulled over in a dark area on the side of the road and cancelled the trip asking us to leave his car.  there was a language barrier so we never did find out why, but my fiancée was very frightened.  we were able to take the public transit back to san jose.we used uber several times and had difficulties but this was a seriously bad situation.  be careful

**worst customer service at uber call centre **i  recently have been using uber a lot , as my car had broken down. the uber drivers located in brentwood are not reliable, they pick a fair and drop it and it takes me 20mins to get a set driver. i called uber to complain about it and i had one of the csa’s hang up on me as she could not answer my questions truthfully. her name is maddie worst customer service advisor ever. she had no clue about her job.

Review Title: This company is FULL OF CRAP. I hope they get SUED.
Review Body: i ordered my food at 9:04. my delivery time was supposed to be at 9:40, 10:10 at the latest. at first i had a make delievery driver, then it changed to a woman delivery driver on a bike, then it changed to another woman, then it changed to another woman. my order was done and waiting to be picked up since 9:50. i contacted uber regarding my problems at  10:15. my fourth perosn that finally picked up my food and stole it , canceled my order. i waited for my food for two hour. they offered me a cancellation with no charge but i did not want that because that means i would have to reorder my food, wait for 4 more different people and wait an extra 2 hours! that’s 4 hours waiting on 7 items!!!!! that is ridiculous!!!! i will never order from this company again!!! this was my first and last time. you guy service is horrible!!!! i hate this company and your lazy lying ass workers
atrocious service. uber has no solution for constant cancellations faced in delhi. uber drivers routinely ask for location, cash payments and cancel if their asks are not met.

if i could give no stars i would. my uber driver picked me up and was talking on the phone with someone. he had l plates which is nz learners licence and was still talking on the phone while driving. when he went to drop me off he almost made the wrong turn on the motorway and quickly indicated to try and get back on the motorway even though it wasn’t safe. he stopped at the wrong house upon arrival in which i had to explain to him to keep driving. i gave him the right address too. i emailed to advise i do not want to pay for this ride but they were not happy to waive the fee. i’ve been a uber passenger many times and this is my first complaint. i will not ride with this company again. awful experience and awful customer service.

my driver took every small road he could out of glasgow,.what should have been a 35 mins journey ended up.being 1 hour and 20 mins. he got lost and was unable to communicate with me.  he took.my phone off me as be could not work out where he was and needed my map. he then pressed confirmation on my uber app which i  increased the journey from 50 to 62.00 i called customer services in the car as was alarmed at what happened  and uber said to call back when i got home. an hour later of callimg waiting once home and they never even replied which they said they would. i will delete the app but i would urge people not to use uber especially women.on their own. customer services were no help at all

rip off company, i ordered a cab through uber and kept receiving error messages try again, after 4 attempts without success my friend suggested bolt, so i ordered a cab through bolt, after 2 minutes i received a call from the driver saying he arrived, we took the cab, then after few minutes i received another call from another driver saying he's from bolt and he is at the terminal waiting for me, then i realized the cab i was in is from uber, so i had to pay £10 penalty charge to bolt, and then uber charged me an extra £9 for the wait plus airport charge, and uber was £8 more expensive than bolt, i'm so glad there is another competitive company to uber that i can use in the future, uber never again.

1st time using uber all accepted etc, got details of driver then day before my ride they cancelled it! would not let me rebook at all, will never use again or recommend to anyone else to use. had to hire a car for my ride to orlando airport , not impressed

Review Title: If I would have zero rating option I…
Review Body: if i would have zero rating option i could give it to uber india. service is so pathetic. drivers are illiterate and abusive. ask location where to go then cancel the ride after waiting for 15 20 mins. i need to go to hospital on urgently but uber make my day hell.

Review Title: Taxi goes to wrong address and I'm charged cancellation fee!
Review Body: let down twice by uber recently.  first time driver went to the wrong address, he phoned me, i told him where i was but he just cancelled the booking without letting me know, i was then charged £4 cancellation fee, complained next day, said they would refund it but instead i got a credit note.  decided to use them again only so i could use the credit note, booked 2 hours in advance, booking confirmed but it disappeared off the system at the time of the booking, without any notification! phoned to complain next day and requested refund of £4 as i do not intend to use them again, was told it was outside the 30 day limit for this. will stick to the local companies in future!

Review Title: driver texted whilst driving me and my…
Review Body: driver texted whilst driving me and my friend at 10:15 pm and we are 15 years old

yesterday used your service and was awful. i don't know where uber drivers getting driving license, but trip was horrible. he made three attempts to change the lane and all was unsuccessful. one time he tried jump in front of bus. moreover i have been overcharged because on the road was a bit traffic. in the past i have tried avoid this company, but now i will delete my account.

Review Title: So I get in this Uber car and the…
Review Body: so i get in this uber car and the driver says hold on, got to s***. this idiot took me for a ride 8 mi down the road like his a$$ was on fire. i just held on to the o s*** handle and prepared myself to dive for the floor. he pulled into a convenience store and bailed out. left the meter running on my expense and when he finally emerged and got me to the bank that i was trying to get to, it was closed. i spent all that money for a death ride and didn't even accomplish what i needed. i tried to summons another uber to get back home and one wasn't available. i was stranded. fortunately it was getting to be the time of day where people were getting off of work and i was able to get a hold of somebody that could come get me and take me back home. good job on wasting what little money i have ,uber. i just used uber eats last night and got buffalo wild wings. it was terrible. it was late and everything was cold and the burger was bloody and the bottom bun was completely mush with blood. fries were totally cold and soggy. at least i had a half a dozen wings that i could warm up in the microwave. that was the only save for the total disaster.

uber is garbage. it used to be good but now it is utter rubbish. every time i book a ride a driver will accept, wait ten minutes, then cancel on me. what the hell is the point in having drivers if they are just going to cancel? i was late for a funeral even though i kept requesting ubers for over an hour and the rides just kept being cancelled. thanks for nothing.

Review Title: Be aware of drivers with road rage
Review Body:
be aware of drivers with road rage and drivers that do not know who has the right of way.

plate: lcg9728

not knowing the right of way can cause accidents and potentially death. right turns don’t stop signs (pay attention) and also left turn with no stop sign nor lights yet the person straight a head has stop sign.

i noticed the driver drove and cut off 2 driver with the right away.

one vehicle was turning left at an intersection towards the car that was turning right-no signs nor stop light

the person going straight had a stop sign-uber driver that cut off two people

the person going right had a stop if turning left sign

the person going left onto road that right turn driver is leaving had no signs nor lights

worst service at all. drivers cancelled after accepting 6 times in one day. they infact don't care about the urgency of the passenger. professionalism is just in the tales. i am totally disappointed would prefer to walk next time rather than catching an uber.

Review Title: I didn’t have any trip with this driver… and i was charged
Review Body: i didn’t have any trip with this driver . the driver according to the app notification arrived at 03.42  . ( i didn’t see anyone out of my apartment) the app showed he was waiting till my reservation at 3:50 . i was downstairs at 3:49 . the driver was not there.  i had to call another taxi . i would like to give a completely negative feedback to the driver in basel switzerland because i was in late for my trip  and i want my money back .

Review Title: My daughter has left her purse in an…
Review Body:
my daughter has left her purse in an uber that took her into the city centre an hour ago. she had mafe many attempts to contact him

why had he not picked up the phone. are you employing dishonest drivers?

it's eid! please speak to your drivers, she had £120 in cash and her cards in it!

gave 2 stars because the cars were immaculate and the drivers were pleasant enough. two short trips today (1.1 miles and 3 minutes each way) each way have cost me a total £16!! tats an hourly rate of £160, extortionate even for a bank holiday. first and last time uber user 😡

Review Title: Uber Pet refuses to carry a small pet…
Review Body: uber pet refuses to carry a small pet dog . i booked an uber pet , then driver showed up and refused us . uber say it’s up to the driver . which begs the question - why have uber pet ?!

Review Title: No refund for their careless delivery driver?
Review Body: i ordered a cake for my sister's birthday, she had two celebrations.  on the first day the cake arrived with no problem and the delivery driver made sure that i was the customer. the next day she had friends invited over and i ordered the same cake (thinking was nice cake) however they called me to say that the delivery was outside. i went outside and i didn't find the delivery guy, i called him several times to ask him where he was at but he hung up every time. i walked all the street back and forth and no sign of him. my niece arrived and saw me outside and helped me to look for him but he was nowhere to be found. i called again and same thing, no answer from him. i reported it on the app. they said where gonna look into it and asked me if i got the delivery. i said no, i didn't and on the app appeared as it was delivered already. they said they were going to look into it and guess what, their reply was at 3 in the morning. obviously i didn't see it until the next day. i texted them back to say i haven't received anything and i have a proof that i called him with no answer on his side. i explained so many times and they still say that they won't refund because he apparently waited 7 minutes but as you can see by now it's not true! and they won't refund but mostly i'm upset because was sister's birthday and she didn't have a cake but also because was their fault and they won't assume responsibility for it. disgraceful! if it was deliveroo they would have fixed it rapidly. i didn't know how bad uber was until now that i used the service.

Review Title: It's been a very bad horrible…
Review Body:
it's been a very bad horrible experience ,we wanted to go to airport but the u er drivers have cancelled 5 times .
we cannot relay on uber and wait we couldn't get the flight also that day.
i would request everyone pls don't go with uber,go by ola or any other cab service.

Review Title: Uber in Manchester has the worst level…
Review Body: uber in manchester has the worst level of customer service. you consistently cancel pick ups when your drivers can charge more money and its disgraceful. tonight a £13 fare was cancelled 2 mins before pick up and a rebooking went to £28 for the same 8 mile journey, inexcusable

Review Title: Uber is proper crap everytime they…
Review Body: uber is proper crap everytime they blocking drivers account for small reasons how do they expect to drivers to earn when they gonna block they account all the time 😡

Review Title: Cabs do not arrive on time and drivers…
Review Body: cabs do not arrive on time and drivers have cancelled trips so many times causing lot of inconvenience

Review Title: Driver was good and car comfortable but…
Review Body:
driver was good and car comfortable but
1 i booked a two stage journey and only the 1st stage registered so driver couldn't continue and we had to call a local car.
2 somehow uber locked my phone and i could make or receive calls for 24 hours.
next time i'll go back to my usual minicab firm
horrible customer service, a driver stole my phone. no one at uber to help

uber got very expensive lately. a lot of drivers want $40 and up dollars what use to be like $24 plus. lately my experience with uber drivers are not so good a lot of them cancel my trip where they are only like 5 minutes away. overall prices are way too high and too many cancelations just before they supposed to pick you up.
many time i booked a bike ride from howrah but ,after cab/bike driver asked about fair and cancle the trip in 08 - 10 min.

Review Title: Very worst service driver always ask…
Review Body:
very worst service driver always ask for extra payment if billing amount is minimum they don't want to go.
this very worst experience now i booked 3 rides for delivery my packets but all 3 drivers ask me for extra pay.

Review Title: The slowest driver on the planet!!!
Review Body:
the slowest driver on the planet!!!! ridiculously slow what should have taken me no more then 1 hour journey it took me 1,40 mins. would not roll his window up i was absolutely freezing the whole time , turned the heating on but switched it off then and happily sat in his bubble jacket and crawled along the roads for 1 40 mins! the most frustrating journey of my life. absolute joke
😂 a driver even slowed down to shout out the window at how slow he was going! this is on a wednesday night ….no weekend traffic,it’s embarrassing. a young girl trying to get home and it’s taking nearly 2 hours awkwardly sitting in the cab absolutely freezing waiting
to get home!! he got lost and didn’t know how find an alternative route when we bumped into a crash and started asking me to tell h where to go! how is this man actually transporting people around london what an idiot,one of the most fast paced places in the world and he can’t tell his left from his right 😂😂 i don’t understand uber what are you playing at 🥾🐸
very bad experience! want to go to work waiting 10 minutes and the driver cancelled one minute from here i think uber play with people is not a trusted company

pathetic service by uber. 400 was my fare on distance was 12 km was total distance, on destination uber driver showing 103km and charge 1800. i just contacted uber support they did not support it, just deny to adjust the fare. even on invoice calculation was wrong. that is not the right way to tackle the customer.

Review Title: I booked an SUV to airport from…
Review Body:
i booked an suv to airport from malkajgiri to airport. the fare it displayed is rs:1200/-
i booked it. driver called me in 5 minutes & enquired about the drop & fare. i told him that, the drop is at airport & fare generated is around 1200/-
immediately
the driver said “no, i can’t come for this fare”
i disconnected him & adjusted with my hatchback.
just think over friends, if any of our friends who are not having any car could be in serious trouble when it’s an international flight.
never trust uber & co servic
es......




regards

kanthi kumar
malkajgiri
hyderabad

Review Title: Vry bad experience with uber.when I…
Review Body: vry bad experience with uber.when i booked the uber cab they just show me only 353 fare but when he dropped at my destination he charged 567 almost 214 rs extra .and driver said its not our fault it's company's fault. actually they cheated. i m vry disappointed just for these kind of people's are in india vry shameful uber group

Review Title: If I could give -5 stars I would !
Review Body:
if i could give -5 stars i would !!
just come out of hospital and i am diabetic. did a grocery order with uber as had 40% code.
ordered healthy stuff. driver comes and instead of 4 bags of heal hy delivers on doorstep 1 bag of sugar crap, sweets, crisps, chocolate , energy drinks.
i get hold of customer support and tell them i need food as blood sugars dropping. they say sorry we will refund, takes 3 days , go ahead and reorder. however i don’t have any more money, the reorder is £47 instead of £33 as it won’t let me use my discount. they refuse to help me, refuse to refund my service charge and delivery charge !!
and leave me with no food !!!
worst company ever and uk government should get their licence off them as you only have to look at the reviews.

absolutely shocking, ordered an uber and they are supposed to be domestic pet friendly and taxi driver refused to take my little yorkie terrier. they are not pet friendly at all, so don’t be fooled people. it’s up to the individual driver if he accepts the animal or not. shocking !!! i will never use this company again

Review Title: Completely fed up with their app saying…
Review Body: completely fed up with their app saying drivers are in the area to pick you up in 1-2 minutes away, to magically increase when you actually book.

Review Title: I booked a trip an hour beforehand
Review Body: i booked a trip an hour beforehand and received confirmation after confirmation that my driver would be on time or within my window. however, my driver is not on time instead they are almost an hour late. if i book a ride ahead of time, i damn well should have that ride on time. i am very disappointed.

Review Title: I think everyone in the UK regularly…
Review Body: i think everyone in the uk regularly has their own awful experiences with outsourced call centres but uber could possibly compete with the worst of them.  being a merchant i called into the support line and got through to a guy called ahmed, who was possibly the smuggest little pr!ck i've ever spoken to on the phone.  the complete lack of problem solving skills, the poor english language skills, the poor attitude and inability to listen, the lack of empathy and desire to serve - honestly just rotten.  it makes me feel bad for humanity that we don't even want to help each other anymore.  as usual, i will have to be the driver to fix this particular issue (won't go into details here) as if i don't already have enough to do running a small business.if you're going to outsource a customer service function to india, the philippines or wherever is the cheapest place nowadays you really need to ensure they are adequately trained to do the job.  these robotic operatives basically just try to "push" you away and don't actually use problem solving skills to assist you effectively.  these centres basically just aim to answer your call as quickly as possible and hit you with a generic cs script.  there is no desire to serve or help.

if i could give one star, i would. i took a 50 mile journey from edinburgh to glasgow and they charged me £399!!! i initially accidentally chose a destination that wasn’t correct and o my cost £30, but then i had to change the destination in the driver after i had been collected and was already en route. the new price wasn’t available but the driver told me it was “just a little more.” and then when i get back i see an email with the receipt for £399. the journey was less than an hour. i have complained but these bandits have refused to do anything other than offer a £17 refund. they are a joke. don’t ever trust this company. use any other app but there’s.

Review Title: Uber simply does not work anymore
Review Body: uber simply does not work anymore, its failed in london, if by a miracle you can get a ride, they will only take you about 5 miles otherwise its not worth it for them. in central london trying to get a ride out watch as drivers reject and reject your request.

Review Title: The uber cab never showed up even 20 minutes after scheduled time
Review Body:
i booked a ride a day in advance. the driver called five minutes before the pickup time to say he will be ten minutes late. although i was running late for the meeting i said i would wait for him as there was no time to book another cab. he never showed up even after 20 minutes. i had to cancel my meeting.
in my experience, uber is a very unprofessional and highly overrated company.

i attempted to book an über but it couldn’t connect to a driver so i changed the time scale and tried again. it still didn’t connect to a driver yet charged me for both of the journeys. i’m trying to get a refund but uber aren’t replying to me i am livid

Review Title: Absolutely shocking needed to get to an…
Review Body: absolutely shocking needed to get to an aged parent who had a fall. agreed a 14 minute wait paid the money now 20 minutes later and and still connecting to a driver and another 20 minutes wait if this one ever happens- why bother i won’t ever again

i would like to take the opportunity to personally thank you for your best customer  service adviser miss jocil, who helped my initial process of joining as a uber driver   with uber . miss jocil is excellent & out standing.many thanks & much appreciated for uber.

Review Title: Uber worst service driver cancel the…
Review Body: uber worst service driver cancel the request as if they are the owner of uber. why register when you don't want to work. useless uber

Review Title: Most ridiculously app...today I lost my…
Review Body:
most ridiculously app...today i lost my phone but didn't get driver details to connect to him.
i want a call back from your support team.

Review Title: Very worst experience I had with uber…
Review Body: very worst experience i had with uber ..call is not connecting property to the driver ...it's really very irritating things happened in the morning

Review Title: App says and shows that driver is in…
Review Body: app says and shows that driver is in pick up point. basically with me, but actually he is god knows where. then they cancel my ride and charge me to compensate driver. what a heck. he’s not with me and i have to pay. this is happened many times and i’m now won’t use uber anymore. this is scam. using bolt or normal black cab better. useless company.

i can see drivers around me and spend 15 mins watching them reject my journey while the app says ‘connecting you to a drive’ ‘2mins’. it’s not 2 mins it’s 20 and this has being happening more and more over the last year. i’m out.

Review Title: Booked service and the driver arrived…
Review Body: booked service and the driver arrived 11mins later. very bad service

Review Title: I usually give 5 stars because I've yet…
Review Body:
i usually give 5 stars because i've yet to have a bad experience. drivers are polite. cars are clean. pick up and drop off locations are on point.
however, after yesterdays subway shooting in manhattan, uber gouged their prices to double the trip fare. there was no "cap" on surcharges.
i can handle fuel surcharges and all the fees but i cannot accept being charged double fare for a 20 minute cab ride.
this may be the end of what once was a beautiful relationship.
shame on you uber!

i've been using this service daily since covid 19. last night will be my last time. an uber delivery man was blasting his music and appeared intoxicated he took the order to the wrong house. when i reached out to him he cussed me out and hung up. uber did not care. i will never put myself in a dangerous situation like that ever again. so disappointed in how i was treated by uber and this driver. the guys dangerous and i can guarantee i wont be the last complaint about this individual. never again.  very disappointed. uber you can keep the 4.65 you gave me for a 30 dollar hamburger 🍔

Review Title: I've been using Uber for about 4 years…
Review Body:
i've been using uber for about 4 years now and the prices keep going up and up. whenever i ubered to my college a few years back, it would cost me around $8-$10. now when i check the same location, it's $17!
another bad experience i've had is having rude drivers. a lot of them would talk really loud on the phone, not say anything when they drop you off, and some would even blast music. overall it's extremely convenient but sometimes, you're better off just taking public transportation.

Review Title: I guess competition is not on the list…
Review Body:
i guess competition is not on the list anymore and caring for customers isn't a thing. there are not so many options if you travel and it's easier to have uber everywhere. hoping you have a good experience. today i had not. the driver didn't know where to go and he was asking me for directions. since i was new to the area i couldn't answer and actually that was the reason why i ordered taxi in the first place.

normally i am ok with uber but not today

Review Title: Mid afternoon drivers refused to switch…
Review Body: mid afternoon drivers refused to switch on the ac. they claim not workinh

Review Title: Uber Eats charged me for food delivery…
Review Body: uber eats charged me for food delivery i never received. driver has arrived to the wrong location and cancelled my calls multiple times.

Review Title: You have such a bad services first of…
Review Body: you have such a bad services first of all most of the driver charging 50rs extra that too in cash to switch on the ac and second thing you guys are charging double of my trip daily and i emailed you thrice but no respond ...and now you guys are charging triple of my amount daily .....you mother fuccker i go court this time then you will get to know what you guys are actually doing with all your customers...
enjoyed my uber experience. always nice and courteous drivers. i highly recommend uber anywhere!!

Review Title: I have always  been picked up when …
Review Body: i have always  been picked up when  they said they be at my pick up spot. never had an unfriendly driver. i'm happy with uber. but i  do tip with cash so yea they need to fix the app with personal feed back. cause the app just thinks i never tip.

Review Title: Not so much Über as oh dear!
Review Body: outgoing driver stopped 3 times in first five minutes and seemed unprepared for the journey. coming home driver parked over a mile away from pickup point and i was physically unable to get to him so phoned to give him another pickup point by which time he had made his way to the original pickup point. waited for him to pick me up at the place i told him i was but he didn’t arrive and the next message said my ride had been cancelled because i hadn’t got to him in time. ridiculous as he was to blame but i’m £55 out of pocket and stranded in london needing to get to essex. first time using über thinking it would be reliable and sadly i was wrong. lesson learned and won’t make that call again.

Review Title: Not sure why Uber is not taking any…
Review Body:
not sure why uber is not taking any action on the improvement. as nearly 90% of population giving bad reviews.
i had bad experience today as well where the drivers cancelled the trips after knowing about the location. worst experience ever

arrived at london euston, ordered a taxi, no confirmation of either acceptance of job or details of vehicle.

minutes later my phone rings, it’s the driver of my unconfirmed taxi telling me to meet him in eversholt st,

i ask him where is eversholt st in relation to the exit of euston station, he reply’s i have no idea, i don’t know this area, but he tells me he’s driving a grey kia, i google map the area and find eversholt st is to the left of the station as you exit, i arrive just in time to see my uber ride load up with two other people and drive off, my subsequent requests for a taxi are met with “oops we have a problem”, i abandon the hope of uber fulfilling its commitments, and walk 45 minutes to my hotel.

the next day uber send me an email, telling me that they have charged me for a missed appointment, you cheeky shower of bast.rds, your drivers don’t have a clue where they are, and you have the audacity to charge people who are let down by this dreadful system, i’m deleting your app you hopeless shower of crap

i arranged a ride to and from baptist eastpoint ( be) for a friend this past week. he had never taken uber and is somewhat cognitively “slow”. the ride to be went very well. i was able to text the driver to explain the situation and he worked with me to wait for my friend to come to the car and insure my friend recognized his car and took it to be.
on the return trip i wasn’t as fortunate. my friend said he was on the “ first floor” which i noted in the notes. i contacted my friend when the car arrived and saying he didn’t see anyone he said he was at the surgery center entrance, which i know from experience is on the lower level in the back of the building. i contacted the driver via message and asked that he drive around to the lower level entrance. i did not hear back from the driver and promptly received a notice of the ride being canceled, which i was charged for. the second attempt went better as i had the correct location from my friend.
up front i tried to explain in the notes about the situation so the drivers would understand it may take a few extra minutes for me to let my friend know they arrived so he would go outside to the car. i also apologized for any inconvenience and tipped generously.
i understand the second driver may not have understood english as well and possibly didn’t understand what i was asking. or it could have been for other reasons that he left.
it was unfortunate that i could not be in town to take my friend but i tried to make arrangements for him as best i could. you know the saying “ no good deed goes unpunished “. 😂 i don’t know how to improve the process for arranging rides for others but perhaps it could somehow be made simpler. this was all extremely time consuming for me communicating between my friend and the drivers. i hope this helps you in some way.
thanks

Review Title: Do not use Uber full stop, they steal ur card details
Review Body: do not use uber full stop! they use ur card to steal money from it. they use ur uber account to make bookings for a uber then cancel it so they can charge you for cancellation fee. a absolutely disgusting way of stealing money from its customer. the drivers are obviously under payed and this is how they make up for it. i complained and they said i did it all on my account. they refused to refund me my money. they took money from my card more than once and owe me over £15

Review Title: Dumped on the M25 hard shoulder at night !
Review Body: my 22 year old daughter ordered an uber at 10 pm last night to go from a friends house to home. after 20 minutes she realised they were going the wrong way and had got onto the m25. when she asked the driver where they were going, he replied hounslow (home is northwood). the driver refused to turn around or to drop my daughter to a petrol station, instead he pulled over on the hard shoulder of the m25 and asked her to get out. my distraught daughter then hid in a bush and called me. luckily we have an app where i could see her location. the police are now involved and have said this is happening more and more. after that harrowing experience, uber have said they will look into it but sadly the help line is is indonesia where they didn’t even know what a hard shoulder is. uber is meant to be a safe experience; my advice is never get in uber as a lone female. disgusting!!!!

Review Title: I lost an item in an Uber drivers car…
Review Body: i lost an item in an uber drivers car and was wrongly charged for a trip i did not take , i called uber customers service / support team and spoke with paolo . he was very kind & patient & really listened to me while i explained the whole ordeal  . i wish i could give him 5 stars , brilliant       service🤍🙂
the most idiotic and tantalizing registration process… i have been struggling to be an uber driver for 20 days. inconsistent messages, stupid call center agents… omg! it’s like a hell or nightmare…

tonight the person i was with ordered an uber, the driver “lori” messaged her and said sorry, i’m in narragansett and i refuse to pay a double toll to pick you up in newport.  ok, fine. my friend then messaged her “can you cancel the drive so i don’t get charged the $5 cancellation fee since you are drunk g from narragansett? 16 minutes until she got to us and 10 minutes went by and she hadn’t moved nor cancelled the ride. presumably because of the cancellation charge. ridiculous. i told my friend not to cancel because it’s not worth the $5. who does that? not to mention the woman i have received time and time again that will call me up and ask if i’m the only passenger, if i only have one stop, if i’m wearing a mask, how far away i’m going. i tell her every time it’s just me, going home, my address then for her to hang up on me and cancel. i don’t get it. i’ve been using lyft more often because these people with uber are getting ridiculous and after a tiring night at work the last thing i need is that grief.

Review Title: This company no longer travel from…
Review Body: this company no longer travel from central london to surry at night.  the drivers complain they are not making money and can not afford to drive the distance.  unprofessional

Review Title: All I can say is ride Lyft instead of…
Review Body: all i can say is ride lyft instead of uber they charge more than lyft and a lot of times the drivers make less than lyft drivers. i know uber needs money to operate but they don’t need over 50% that is a rip off to drivers and customers.

Review Title: Driver didn't turn up for confirmed…
Review Body: driver didn't turn up for confirmed booking at 5.15 this morning forcing me to call for another one or miss my flight.  by then the fare had almost doubled.  very poor service uber.   can't you tell customers if you can no longer honour a booking?  what is the point of having a booking service if you can't actually make it happen?

Review Title: If I could give zero today I would
Review Body:
if i could give zero today i would!

8 uber drivers cancelled on me. i’ve had 1 or 2 before but 8 is epic!!

amritpal, toyota corolla 154yqk.
tuvshinbayar, toyota camry 799wee.
mohammad, holden cruze 619bw6.
rahul, toyota corolla 459aw5.
kadirhan, toyota camry 626ycg.
muneam, toyota camry 931bl6.
john, kia sorento jon267.
burak, toyota camry 579ywr.

thank goodness for dylan!!

first one booked at 4.30pm. 45 mins later i finally arrived at my destination.

these were complimentary ubers booked for me by city subaru as my car was serviced today. this is the high quality service that uber is providing to a corporate client!! appalling.
unreliable! delayed by an hour. kept changing drivers and waiting periods for one same request!!! delayed by an hour!

having booked an uber, the driver cancelled seconds before pickup.  when rebooking, the price was considerably higher.  moments before the second driver was due, the app flashed up that our journey was completed and the money taken.  it was complicated to complain but we eventually got a refund.  the helpline told me how to leave a review and having got to the appropriate section, the driver had already given himself 5 stars. we will not be using uber again and are warning everyone we can about our experience.

Review Title: Took my money without asking for…
Review Body: took my money without asking for consent. the driver was able to claim this under "cleaning fee" post-trip event though there was no problem when we left the vehicle. the company does not have any processes to protect customers.

Review Title: Give your employees basic language training.
Review Body:
drivers in middle east are non educated indians pakistanis and nepalis mostly and they will give you a hard time communicating. even if you don’t speak a word on the way and end up just handing out the cash payment, you can miraculously end up in a situation that will cost you 10-20mins of your time because they are bad communicators and uneducated. it shows uber’s lack of attention for social responsibility (stress and not to mention the other major issues your drivers can cause) also their incability to manage a well established corporation through training their employees (essential for your non educated drivers) i dont care if anyone takes my criticism into consideration but if you do not it will eventually lead to dissatisfaction of some and i believe you will be using your cheap labor strategy to losing customers and adding more customer service employees (extra cost) to backup your failures in management (especially in gcc countries). even the best companies apparently have a lot more to do.
2 stars for utility and ease of use.

Review Title: When drivers cancel the app leaves you…
Review Body: when drivers cancel the app leaves you under the impression that a new driver is arriving. which is not true, because they keep canceling. you easily waste 45 minutes waiting for a ride before you give up.

had a driver called jakob. he sent us to the complete wrong place to where he was parked he was quite nasty to us made snarky comments when we got to him and cancelled our ride and took the money. this was a horrid experience others we have had were lovely but this one driver was nasty and rude and even tho we got to him was before the time limit before it cancels he told us we couldn’t get in and he was nasty about the whole thing.

ordered from mcdonald’s through uber delivery, caught the delivery driver with my food inside the visitors toilet . i did not collect the food . very very unfortunate! i heard a lot of complaints about them

uber in hyderabad is worst. firstly it takes 15-20 minutes to search one auto and after that auto drivers keep on cancelling the rides. what is the use of this useless service . all our society members call local auto wala, we hv taken their numbers. we call them 20-25 minutes before going somewhere , and they come on time. they are much quicker and reliable in their service. why wasting tym on this worst app , i hv deleted my account nd uninstalled this app. thats what it deserves.
this app doesn't deserve are tym and money.

Review Title: egregious  bad Attitude of the drivers
Review Body: egregious  bad attitude of the drivers. went to order a ride and the map telling the driver to drive around in the wrong way to pick me up and when i get into the car the driver is in a bad mood when i try to explain that it’s not anyone fault that the map on the uber app isn’t tell you where to drive properly and when the driver drops me off at my destination location demand a cash tip i didn’t have any cash at the time it was early morning i said i tip though the app after to find out i was rated 1 star. also rides keep getting canceled before pick up my rating was 4.9

very unreliable! my first two rides were great! my most recent request met with three drivers canceled and i missed my medical appointment! i requested the ride well in advance and it was confirmed! i understand about the price of gas, but jeez! not trustworthy! guess i’ll try lyft or rover! cannot trust uber!
drivers push you to cancel instead of actually driving. they have you waiting like +30m for a ride. what a joke. try didi or beat instead.

what a toilet company. they must scrape their drivers from the dregs of the barrel.

ditched uber some years ago after they left me stranded in london late one night after cancelling repeatedly.

decided to try them again last night. same thing. i was cancelled eight times. in london, in freezing conditions. my battery died so my friends attempted and they too were cancelled on four times. luckily a black cab came along and so i swallowed the cost. i would rather put money in his pocket anyway, than this bunch of back alley chancers.

how on earth uber hasn’t done something about this practice yet is beyond me. talk about an embarrassment.

the sooner this company is gone from our society, the better it’ll be all around. it can’t come soon enough and will be thoroughly deserved.

fortunately i do not use uber more than once every few years. the fees are ridiculous. i am all for the fuel surcharge with the cost of fuel. however booking fees of $7. reservation fees $6.
waiting time charges 13 cents, airport surcharges $3, green future and green surge charge $1. how do you request a ride with out booking(lol)? drivers don't assist or even get out of the car. i feel bad for drivers. the only people making money is uber
absolute disgrace. driver left us standing and charged us anyways. first and last time attempting to use uber. want my money back and driver sacked

Review Title: Overcharged by driver and Uber support…
Review Body:
overcharged by driver and uber support was unsupportive.

this is the third time this has happened in the past month.

uber support just keeps sending the exact same responses from a response bank, and is not answering my questions.

the worst customer support from a ride share company i have experienced.

Review Title: What some uber drivers are doing is not…
Review Body: what some uber drivers are doing is not acceptable  i ordered a uber driver and it got cancelled just when it was 1 minute away from the pick up point, and it happens quite often now specially in slough, i have to get to work and i nearly late every time they cancelled the driver, i m waiting outside looking at the uber app and it says your uber has been cancelled, this is not acceptable, i will be reporting uber regarding their licence to operate in slough

absolutely terrible. called me to tell me they canceled the order because of driver having issues with vehicle which is fine, however they didn't offer any compensation and did not send out any other driver to deliver it.

Review Title: Yeah I have a disability sometimes my…
Review Body: yeah i have a disability sometimes my legs don't feel that good so i will catch a uber down the street and back probably a mile and a half round trip and the drivers are always really nice polite and i always make sure i give him a nice tip i just like the service

most of the uber drivers in my area are lovely. what is very bad is the set price compared to what you pay. you can book an uber with the price of £10 then because of traffic you're actually charged a hell of a lot more. local taxi office does not charge you for traffic, i suggest using local cab offices.
also, i have booked taxis in the past with no one accepting and have been late to work and appointments on multiple occasions. i will be using local taxi firms from now on

Review Title: Dodgy company, no phone support, avoidance of paying promotions
Review Body:
in feb of 2022, i needed some extra cash and a promotion was running to sign up and complete 30 deliveries in melbourne to get a sign up bonus of $750. i completed this by 30/02/2022. i did not receive the bonus.

i contacted the support number who advised that my sign up date was december 2020 (when i looked at signing up but didn't complete the process) and that i was registered in mornington peninsula.

my drivers license, car registration and my national crime check that was supplied, all had my melbourne address so they have registered my city incorrectly.

my sign up date (according to the email sent in june of 2021, advising i could not sign up until my national crime check was completed) could not have been any earlier than the 12/02/2022 when this was completed and my uber account was activated.

i have called 25 times, had over 20 generic emails stating that my sign up date was 2020 and my city is registered as the mornington peninsula, i've had 3 promised phone calls from the escalations team and have had no answer as to why these details are incorrect, rendering my eligibility for the promotion, null and void.

the uber support line will not support you. you will be told it will be escalated and you will receive the same generic email every time. when you respond to the generic email, they send the same generic email again. this has been continuous for 10 days now with no resolution in sight.

be very weary about signing up to be a driver. they will do everything they can to avoid fixing mistakes or contacting you back. there is plenty more completion out there these days so i strongly suggest working elsewhere.

zero support from uber, zero respect from uber and zero stars from me.
food was cold, driver rude an after contacting uber support with no help, zero customer service. shocking level of service!!!

never, ever use this complete rip off of a company. i’d rather crawl with 2 broken legs than use this completely useless, poor excuse, of an organisation. dreadful in respect of the word. drivers are an absolute embarrassment.

used app to request a ride only to find out the driver picked up a different person and uber had the gaul to charge me for the trip.  it was extremely difficult to navigate the app to find out how to file a complaint and get a credit.  i have no idea why uber doesn't fix this problem.  all they need to do is assign a 3 digit number for each ride and request the driver to ask the passenger for that number to validate the passenger is correct.

Review Title: They don't care about drivers and…
Review Body:
they don't care about drivers and customers.
robots working there for sure.

Review Title: Driver took extra money and didn't…
Review Body:
driver took extra money and didn't deposit to my wallet
support won't help

Review Title: You don’t put the AC on
Review Body: you don’t put the ac on . the drivers demand extra cash for turning on the ac.  however, we as passengers are paying the charges in full yet missing out on the necessity of air conditioning in a car in these humid days in kolkata. they call you and ask about your drop location, mode of payment and then cancel immediately. how long on earth are you going to cheat the customers this way?

this is a review for my first time using uber ( or any ride share for that matter ). i was picked up at halton honda very quickly, the driver haider was lovely. the ride was quick and easy. consider me a convert to uber. thank you haider.
embarassing drivers, embarassing cars and embarassing and totally unprofessional customer service.... stay away!!

such a pathetic service. we had
booked ride from pune to mumbai ,unfortunately the tire got burst
and we had to stop the vehicle in
between. we were made to wait in
the cab for 1.40 mins just bcoz
driver dint have necessary
equipment's and he was waiting
for his friend to get stepane once
we got it he repaired it just to
drop us half the way. bcoz he had
to give stepane to his friend
