#boycott #uber in india, need a genuine quality service alternative.
if not, i will ensure to bring investors to start a sincere alrernate and throw uber out of business. i have better plan to execute.
most attrocious, ugly service standard.
after travelling to more than 15 countries; i find to get an uber in delhi is at mercy of drivers. they will call to ask where to go, then disconnect, it's daily, every minute with every passenger in delhi at least. yesterday, i had to wait for exactly 27 minutes at the maurya hotel, delhi, with 8 cars cancelling my trip, finally no uber car came, i had to finally take a limousine.
at aiims, last week visited 3 times, waited for minimum 15 - 20 minutes each with multiple cancellations by uber. i could observe, many many patients, were suffering from uber refusals, desperate.
i can see it, feel it!! but, media houses don't have interest in these genuine situations.
i have never seen even in a 3rd world country where drivers call like goondas and decide to serve or not. elsewhere, they are not allowed to call customer to dictate terms.
but, only in india, they are privileged.
only in delhi: the cars are never cleaned, they are dusty, sticky dirts, interiors with no hygiene standards. you don't see that condition even in a poorer country.
what is the public awareness in delhi by higher educated demography people, where is voice of public???
we pay very high money, but, get treated so bad??
the uber customer service in delhi is deadlog, they are definitel nit doing job, for what they are paid by the company.
where is election busy, greedy delhi government responsibility??
transport minister @advocate kailash gehlot, is that not your priority for public
@prabhjeet singh of uber, ratan naval tata
manish sisodia arvind kejriwal advocate kailash gahlot nitin gadkari , the economic times economic times hindi hindustan times the times of india uber uber headquarters - bgc taguig arnab goswami times now indian express abp news india today zee news pmo india

Review Title: I got delivered another person's order
Review Body: i got delivered another person's order, totally wrong and did not receive anything that i ordered. i called the delivery driver straight away but got cut off, he didn't even answer the phone. i got in touch with uber eats and gave them photographic evidence and all they said was 'sorry we are unable to help you at this time but please leave a review'. the next day i went to the store itself and all they said was that i need to go back to uber eats because they receive the money. uber eats have ignored my messages, emails and don't answer the phones! disgusting service, especially at hard time like this. proper rip off! the food i received didn't even come up to half of what i ordered! shame on you uber eats, can't even employ people who can read and these were the words of the store who had received 5 phonecalls in one day regarding uber eats from customers receiving wrong orders!

Review Title: Terrible service provider ! This should be banned now.
Review Body:
extremely rude and disrespectful drivers bordering on aggressive behaviour.
they have begun to treat customers with extreme rudeness and the last driver even went so far as to trying to threaten physical violence on us.
had to board a flight or would have lodged a police complaint!
the drivers don’t even accept destinations they don’t feel like going to or if payment isn’t done in cash.
there is no customer service or support and one is left at the mercy of a few “bot” provided assistance.
much rather give my business to local cab companies or competitor service providers.

Review Title: Driver keeps on asking via msg
Review Body: driver keeps on asking via msg, where is the drop! it happened to me so many times, and top of that they want us to cancel the trip. driver name: devanshu jaiswal (hr38aa9678) pathetic service

junk. drivers keep cancelling. one just refused to pick us up since he only wanted 2 passengers. impossible to complain or give feedback on uber. finally deleting this app that has caused so much trouble.

actuall pick up location: indhira gandhi inyernational airport

actuall drop off location: mayur vihar phase 2, delhi 91.

actuall fare 995.

but we reached mayur vihar 2, driver charged 1783rs by saying due to some technical problem it happend like that. we complained through the uber app but still they have not refunded the amount. when we called thier customer care, they are not at all responding properly.

such a worse experience we had.

Review Title: First I must say I'm reporting this…Uber Aggressive Drivers
Review Body: first i must say i'm reporting this concern in relation to my travel on the 22/03/22@06:50. the driver arrives i inform him that i cannot follow his sat navigation because i cannot use the express way. he drives down the road pulls over and said 'get out cos he is not going any other way', i was so shock at the way he spoke to me and shaken too. i will never ever us a uber taxi as a woman again. this is the second time and it's the last. too many aggressive drivers and aggression towards women. i feel unsafe and in protected. they normally have a good service but lately the drivers are becoming far to aggressive. rather worse i had to pay £15.00 pounds for the 1 minute drive and was only refunded £5.10. shame on ubar, oh my name is pauline and i was traveling from handsworth wood birmingham. i have used there services from 2018, but never ever again.

the drivers are slow, look at their phones while driving, and consistently drop me off across the street and expect be to jaywalk across the street to my actual location because they can't be bothered to make a u-turn.

driver accepted the job. he then said he had arrived but was actually 9 miles away. he had our postcode. also, he could barely speak english. obviously i canceled the job. uber shouldn't take illiterate people even though they can drive.

Review Title: Uber drivers and their cancellation fun
Review Body:
had to go for shopping related to purchase of bulk items for school function, booked one cab ,it showed 21 minutes after 15 minutes of waiting,cab driver cancelled the trip .next driver also cancelled.tried with uber auto ,same they keep cancelling.
if they can't take trips ,then why are they working for this company.
useless drivers and useless app....dnt feel like going anywhere with uber because of fear of not getting cabs on time

Review Title: Left my phone in an Uber
Review Body: left my phone in an uber. tracked the phone to see the uber driver was still active on an airport run. he has not returned any calls or messages. uber has also failed to contact him. why doesn't uber stop the driver's source of income until he responds to uber. surely this is a driver obligation to respond to riders and uber itself.

drivers are not available, 30 minute se wait kr rhe hai, kabhi koi accept kr rha hai, kabhi koi ride transfer kr rha hai, anyone picks up a ride somewhere, asks to cancel after some time, customer care is also not available, ghanto wait kro, cancel krne ke bad charge alag se jud jata hai, only loot jari hai...koi system nahi hai...so disgusting

drivers are not available, 30 minute se wait kr rhe hai, kabhi koi accept kr rha hai, kabhi koi ride transfer kr rha hai, anyone picks up a ride somewhere, asks to cancel after some time, customer care is also not available, ghanto wait kro, cancel krne ke bad charge alag se jud jata hai, only loot jari hai...

i made the mistake of booking a schedule ride 20 hours before i needed to leave for an important photoshoot in the centre of london. i live in sw london and had a few cases of gear with me.

it was very important that i arrived on time as a number of people were relying on me. the taxi did not arrive, then 10 mins. after the appointed time i get a message to say, sorry we could not find a driver! this is absolutely appalling. i then had a mad panic phoning all the local taxi cabs to try and get a ride. i'm just glad it wasn't a plane i needed to catch. i will never use uber again!

Review Title: i have just deleted the UBER app from…
Review Body: i have just deleted the uber app from my phone. the drivers leave a lot to be desired, on the last two ocassions, two extremely incompetent drivers failed to turn up. they cancelled the trip and i got charged, how is this possible? i  am  never going to use .them again

Review Title: I did not experience any problem using…
Review Body:
i did not experience any problem using uber in europe this review applies to uber nyc and i'm no longer using this company in my life
we had two previous episodes when their drivers were intoxicated and refused a ride to my disabled partner
in another words two serious violations uber was refusing to explain remedy or action taken against the drivers we experienced a third situation yesterday in a very short time the driver went to a wrong pick-up address we sent him a message and still in the wrong place flagged him from a block away ad when arrived he cursed at me and my partner (disabled elder) while speeding up in a dangerous way while we were about to open the door he canceled the trip and uber in a fraudulent way charged me for his cancelation as we all know took me messages and phone calls to get my money back and report this crime outcome none due to privacy our life means nothing to uber no longer using uber and taking steps to get a legal action against uber due to discrimination and criminal behavior of his driver

rubbish
why can uber drivers hover nearby waiting in case a better fare turns up, and then after waiting for a ride your request is cancelled? if you cancel, you are charged. no wonder we prefer bolt??

Review Title: I can understand higher prices for the…
Review Body: i can understand higher prices for the ride during popular hours yet its difficult to accept that it takes ages to get the driver to pick up the order while i see them close to me. very unpredictable services. one time i had a great ride with one very kind driver. i guess the experience you get is totally depending on your luck to get a nice driver. the rest is very poorly organized

Review Title: My daughter left her purse in the back…
Review Body: my daughter left her purse in the back seat of an uber while on spring break in florida. she immediately tried contacting the driver but she never answered the phone....it has been 24 hours now and still no answer or call back! i have tried to contact uber but there are no phone numbers and my emails have not been answered. how does a multi billion dollar company get away with not having a live person to talk to? ill walk before using uber again!!

shockingly bad customer service.
booked a ride in poland (1st time user) driver said at destination that the fare had not gone through on paypal and requested cash. found out on return to uk that the fare had been taken. contacted support and all they said was to use the app to raise a complaint - which i did 3 times! after advising that i'd done this the advisor then said we cant help and put the phone down on me - twice! absolutely crap service uber!

Review Title: Very very poor show several drivers…
Review Body: very very poor show several drivers accept then cancel others nit even accepted poor poor show if they accept they should be made to stuck to it :( not happy 12 hour shift then 1hour to try and get home

Review Title: I was charged extra because the driver…
Review Body: i was charged extra because the driver took longer route. i paid the money in cash to the driver but was asked to pay via app as well later. i tried contacting their customer service but it seems there is no customer service for uber

charged because the deiver couldn't locate me!!! he didnt even call and asked.. their drivers follow google maps blindly..if you don't know a city/ town then quit driving. just a nuisance and inconvenience.
because of this driver, i got late for work.

@uber south africa, poor show!
you keep hiking prices for riders but you don't give those increases through to your drivers. my brother in law is now forced to look for alternative employment as he cannot afford the fuel anymore.
shocking, i had two drivers cancel on me, how can they charge me for a cancellation when i can't get reimbursed for them doing the same...! utter crap and will not be doing that again....crap service

Review Title: My friend called an Uber for me he has…
Review Body:
my friend called an uber for me he has an account, i don't, half way through the journey the driver said my friend had cancelled the fare, phoned friend he had done no such thing, driver called head office to ask for advice, the woman on the phone insisted i was to be thrown out of the cab in a desolate area at 4.30am.
driver refused and took me home he wouldn't accept money for the fare so i gave a massive tip, driver said he will probably be suspended for 2-weeks.
it beggars belief that a woman could suggest this is done to another woman, i was very fortunate with this driver but intend to report the woman at head office to the police if possible.

the worse service ever.
not enough they are wasting your time with search your car for like 5 minutes, than after another 5min of waiting driver is cancelling the trip and again same story
last time it shown me estimated price £24 but it didncharge me £54. and when i maid complai t why they said just because.
now i am waiting for iber 20min and ended up booking bolt

in vegas. i really needed two cars because it was 8 of us but the app wouldn’t allow me to book two at once but anyways. the first driver comes pick up half of us and wait till he got out the hotel parking lot and asked them to pull up there mask but since my sick aunt the only one who has one. he asked them to get out his car and left. he was fishing for fees without the drive. i cancelled my trip hoping i can get my money. fyi uber make sure they have mask before they even get in your car.

Review Title: Today is 11/03/2022 and I done my…
Review Body:
today is 11/03/2022 and i done my background check on 05/03/2022 but still today i can’t go online and when i reach with there agents thay didn’t guide or solve problem properly and disconnect the call.
it’s very bad service provided by uber to there driver.

Review Title: I wonder if anyone else has had this…
Review Body: i wonder if anyone else has had this experience.  in the last few months i have left 5 items in an uber ride, 3 expensive hydra flask water bottles, a pair of sunglasses and one coat.  once i got inside the airport i realized and reported this to uber.  each driver contacted me back and stated they did not find any of my items in their vehicle.  i'll bet there's some significant side business selling items on ebay for these drivers.  while my fault i left them, shame on them for lying and saying they never found them in the car.

Review Title: If you order and they are unable to…
Worst costumer and driver service I…
Review Body: worst costumer and driver service i ever had. i just opened a driver account and they're holding my earnings because they see a mismatch on my bank details that doesn't exist. don't use them

have an important appointment with my doctor in gp. paid uber and reserved for 11,55 to 12,05. they confirm with the driver, car plates, hour but they didn't show up. amazing. the refund didn't happen. uber: my first and my last experience.

tried to book an uber. time kept going up and up and then it would be cancelled and start searching for another driver.  despite me ringing g the drivers.  this happened 3 times.  i am deleting the app

Review Title: I think it's b******* that the…
Review Body: i think it's b******* that the customers are allowed to give you a bad experience because they're missing items out of their stuff we're not allowed to look in their bags due to covid so i don't think that's right uber needs to do something about that cuz at the end of the day we're arguing with them when it's not our faults we do not bag their food we're just the delivery drivers i wish they would understand that and uber needs to do something for we don't lose money or lose experience because of that b*******

i booked my uber for the airport the night before.  received a confirmation.  the next morning i received a message that driver was 6 minutes away.  waited in front of pick up address and 1 minute later received a cancellation.  i couldn't booked another uber as none available.  how is it that uber requires a 4 hour cancellation notice and passenger gets a 4 minute cancellation notice

worst customer experience ever. booked cab today for o2 arena and driver took me to greenwich peninsula. uber technical error automatically changed it. so driver told me that i have to change my journey. so i did and it cost me over £34. on top of that i had to walk 15 mins due to this disruption and long wait. if i wanted this kind of hassle then why not taking public transport? this is a new way of making money by uber. fraud. when i reported this to customer service they are pretending that i changed the trip that’s why i paid extra money. fraud and thief.

horrible service yesterday i booked uber and got conformation that driver will arrive in 13 minutes. after 5 minutes they changed the driver and said new one will come in 20 minutes and again changed to another driver and finally the new driver arrived after 30 minutes and it was just close to 2km drive with driving time of about 5 minutes. not a dependable mode of transportation with horrible service  no apology and they charge way too much for a short distance ride

Review Title: The taxi was 6 minutes way and then I…
Review Body: the taxi was 6 minutes way and then i waited 40minutes the taxi driver arrives i said i waited along time very defence saying i just got here despite a long wait for a 6 minute . he was happy to cancel because he has argued long enough to just a basic rate. do not use . new and better companies

so if a customer cancels they get charged but if your drivers cancel it's fine. after midnight, when the tube is closed. very safe for a woman, thank you very much. it's not the first time this happened in central london.

whatever is an option, to ride a horse, crawl on hands or walk for miles - better to do it because what might happen to you is that you're charged 100% more than the price indicated on requested ride, you might be left by the driver in the night to wait for 20 minutes in the street, you might be dismissed by some rude and untrained service person who works god knows from what den to tell you to file a complain with local jurisdiction for asking: why was i not charged what was shown on request ride cost?

support small local drivers wherever you go, uber became the bottom-shelf service and they will feel this soon, cause how much can you endure as a service provider that provides a very bad service?

the wrong driver showed up  and her english was so bad i could not understand her but got into the car because she arrived on time at the right address.  4 blocks later i found out she didn't know where i was going and wasn't scheduled for me.  the real driver showed up and left and i was charged for the full fare.  uber claims on their "blog" to have a phone # and customer support 24/7.  that is a lie!!!  i followed all their instructions and nothing led me to telling them what happened.  they have no customer service that i can find.

what is the point of ‘scheduling’ a pick up so, quote from their website…“if you're expecting an event you just can't miss, the app lets you schedule a ride up to 30 days in advance, so you don't leave anything to chance” and then cancel it when already told a driver was on his way and there’s no one else nearby!! 🤬
they should arrange it with a driver beforehand so it can’t be cancelled. might just as well take pot luck when ready to leave.
luckily i left enough time to get to my destination by mainline crowded train then half hour wait for a taxi but not at all convenient with luggage, especially on the day between the tube strike when tube lines were still suspended.
i checked while waiting for the taxi and uber would have charged £33 - the black cab only charged £16.50!! greedy or what!!
not a happy bunny!

Review Title: One of their drivers ran over my cat…
Review Body: one of their drivers ran over my cat and killed him and drove off. i was there. i saw it happen. uber have blocked my email address because i asked for insurance details.

Review Title: A bit of a wait but to be expected at…
Review Body: a bit of a wait but to be expected at busy times.  driver was very polite and price was pretty much what i've paid with other firms.

1star is too high. i booked a scheduled trip hours in advance and the booking was accepted which surprised me somewhat given the tube strike. you of course know the rest. right up to the minute the driver should have arrived the app behaved as if all was going to plan. then no driver was available and the trip was cancelled. i tried again. the fare went up 50% but again no driver available. i tried once again and this time the fare had doubled. i really should be old and wise enough never to trust internet based services like uber. they’re approach to service is pure mendacity - it’s built into the way it operates - basically treating their customers with contempt is actually written into the code that runs this self-serving service! ok - so having risen early, showered and having drunk my first cup of tea i’ll reset and work from home today - oh and my first job will to be to delete the uber app from my phone! 0 stars is my real score

driver drove past my house. drove to township and parked. after 30 mins i had to pay to cancell the ride.
i have the screenshots to prove it.
i instructed my staff not to use uber anymore
this was not the first time.

scumbags. drivers gps wasn't working so i kindly gave him my phone with directions. they charged me over double because 'we had chose a different route and kept the driver waiting' both complete and utter lies. i will never use this scam of a company again. do not use uber, your bank account is not safe with them.

Review Title: Uber as a company is greedy
Review Body: uber as a company is greedy. they take 50% of the cost from the rider! the driver is the one handling the car/gas/wear/customers and makes so little. i know for fact uber overpays contractors and others to travel the world in luxury while they hand out pennies to the ones who actually do the work.

driver had a near accident, sped up.
avoid.

Review Title: As soon as the driver picked us up he…
Review Body: as soon as the driver picked us up he almost crashed other vehicle and start driving super fast. we asked him to slow down but he didn’t then we asked again and he started arguing with us saying that we couldn’t teach him on how to drive because he was doing that for over 10 years. next, he stopped the car and asked us to leave in the middle of the way. we refused to leave and asked him to keep driving following the limit speed of bc.  he kept being so rude, and just when we said that we would call the police, we started to drive again towards the destination. lastly, when we arrived we mentioned that we would report him. he threatened us, saying “think about what you will do, because i’m watching you.” we are so upset with our experience with uber.  it was not only the worst customer service experience but he also put our lives in risk, plus my mother-in-law that has high blood pressure and she started not feeling well. i use uber almost everyday, but now how can i trust uber, if we don’t know what kind of service we’re going to get? so, how can uber guarantee the quality of a good customer service and at least a safe drive? moreover, after he’s threatening, how can uber guarantee the safety of the passengers if the drivers know the people address?

Review Title: Ok this is for Toronto uber company
Review Body:
ok this is for toronto uber company, they deducted money on my account even when i didn't ride with them, i try to dispute it, they refunded 2 but chose to keep the rest of my money, so my bank tell me to report them to the fraud squad and cancel my card. goodbye uber you lost a good customer that use to tip your drivers.
from my family and i.

once great now awful. lately it takes ages for a ride to be accepted and sometimes just times out with no acceptance. riders get charged when cancelling but drivers don’t. waited over an hour last night for a ride after drivers cancelling continuously. eventually used a different taxi service.

at 2 pm i scheduled a ride of four 415 at 3:30 i got a message saying my uber driver would be here at 4:15 the schedule time here it is 440 and the map says that my uber driver will arrive at 5:05 pm my shift at my job starts at 5 o’clock i will not be to work until 535 how is this acceptable it is not no possible way on the app that i can even get in touch with any type of customer service it is very irresponsible of the uber driver to pick up another ride just to make a few dollars and caused me to be late this is unacceptable completely unacceptable

once good now shocking  ..   uber has lost all control of its drivers.  boookings will be accpted and cancelled without any reason given.  a pick will be offered for say 8 mins and then it will extend and extend until you have to cancel.  you may be charged for cancelling and then have to fight for a refund.   please uber give up and leave london

Review Title: The Uber driver in Cairo couldn't find…
Review Body: the uber driver in cairo couldn't find my destination he couldn't follow map on his mobile..he left me on the street refusing to find my hotel...uber customer service is f....joke ...i am single europeen woman left at night in middle of cairo with no understanding of arabic

Review Title: I booked a UBER on holiday in Fort…
Review Body:
i booked a uber on holiday in fort laudedale and left my mobile phone in car i tried all day to contact the driver through my find my phone app when he finally answered the call he said he heard the calls i made for over 5 hours when i finally met him in a taxi i booked to follow him he more or less blackmailed me to pay him for giving me my phone back!!!
dont use uber

Review Title: Booked an Uber with a 24 minute arrival…
Review Body: booked an uber with a 24 minute arrival time. after over 50 minutes where the driver parked and looked at cars i was picked up. couldn’t cancel bc it said i would be charged bc driver was on the way! driver admitted to looking at cars  while i waited. i contacted uber expecting at least a 50% refund for my inconvenience and total lack of disregard of my time. i was told too bad and given a $5 coupon for future use. use a cab or lyft terrible customer service… only worried about the almighty $$ for them

my daughter's friend booked an uber from her house, the driver phoned and said he could not find the house, his english was not very good.  he did not come and collect her and charged her £4 which was taken from her saved card.  the uber driver did not say he was not coming and when they tried to phone the driver he had blocked them.  another friend was charged £16 for a 5 minute car journey.  i have never used uber personally and never will.  you cannot even speak to anyone to complain.......terrible and unsafe service.  i stick to local taxis that have an office and operators on the phone.

less than 1 star. left us waiting at a restaurant from 4 mins to 18 mins whilst we watched the driver on the map take a wrong turning going in totally the wrong direction. we cancelled then tried to re book and the fare had doubled and the cab was still 10 minutes away. we ended up walking for 30 mins in the pouring rain and howling gale. they really don’t care!!
this is uber in limehouse, e london.

Review Title: Needed to be somewhere for 13:30 tried…
Review Body: needed to be somewhere for 13:30 tried to prebook a uber 2hrs prior to this site wouldn’t let me i then put a request in for an uber taxi 50 mins prior said it was connecting to a driver 14mins away then it went 20/17/27/14/18 and so on for 50 mins which is ridiculous how can you plan a journey with such a cowboy outfit it’s pot luck!as been a five star customer this means nothing spoke to customer services absolutely useless take your money before ride is confirmed my advice stay clear of these fools and book a local taxi firm i know there a little more expensive but you get an honest reliable service i will never use uber again deleted app so no more business off me uber

Review Title: Don't use! Rude service money grabbing terrible service
Review Body:
if i could give a minus 10 i would

we waited over a hour for a taxi and then was greated by the rudest taxi driver ever.

refused to drop off my friend on the way to my house. would never use again if you paid me
i tipped the driver . uber charged me double the tip 😳…. do not use if possible

do yourself a favour and book elsewhere - today i order a taxi from another taxi company - uber was superbad and four drivers accepted and then dropped the journey request, so now i wont use uber as they have terrible service.

i think it is absolutely ridiculous that i had to pay $29.00 for a trip that i take daily that is usually $12, because there was a snowstorm.
i also think its crazy that the driver doesnt get the right percentage of pay for the trip. #pricegouging.
this driver is risking his life driving me into work in a major snowstorm and uber is making money. that makes as much sense as me taking rides with your company anymore.

pay the drivers what they need to be paid.

Review Title: Charged for a trip destination I did not order !
Review Body:
i cancelled my trip as the driver had wrong destination for me, i got out 1 block away & got slugged $20. i’ve msged back & forth with uber for a refund & these absolute illiterate people will not issue a refund & won’t actually address my issue!! they just have some stupid generic response & completely neglect the reason for my request due to they’re systems error !
unbelievable, a blatant disregard for the customer & straight robbery of my money !
disgusting service. even after i told them i’d write a review for this theft they continued to send they’re generic robotic responses refuses my refund.

Review Title: I have been an Uber driver for over 6…
Review Body: i have been an uber driver for over 6 years and the entire time, i have been abused, stolen from and ignored by uber. their overall trustpilot rating is a long overdue indicator of what i have been through with uber during a significant portion of my life. i've remained with them for six years solely because of the flexibility they offer to log on and off of the app whenever i need to. this is because drivers are supposed to be independent contractors, operating as an independent business entity but this is absolutely not the case considering the unprecedented control uber has over its drivers. as a long-standing driver with uber, i can back up all of the seemingly outrageous claims other drivers have made against this horrific company. if you are a passenger who had a bad experience with a driver, i apologize but i also want you to understand that drivers are treated horribly by this predator company, and therefore have very little incentive to perform at normal standards, let alone go above and beyond. when they pick you up, chances are they are already not in a good place emotionally or financially so please take this into consideration. i urge anyone thinking about doing business with uber as a customer or driver, to think twice and look at other alternatives. thanks for hearing me out.

appalling service from uber eats. delivery driver didn’t deliver to my address so takeaway didn’t arrive and uber eats refused to refund my payment.

avoid using

Review Title: Driver left me at 1st drop off location…
Review Body: driver left me at 1st drop off location ( this is my second experience like this) and did not drop me back home, left me in the rain , it was literally chucking down with rain. i checked my pockets to realise i left my phone at home and i had to walk 30 mins back home in the pouring rain, clothes were soaked, make up ruined, hair like a wet dog,  i literally had to cancel my plans for the day.  i uber everyday and all they offered was £5 goodwill. i won’t be using uber anymore. this is embarrassing, uber is a joke.

Review Title: Idk what’s with Uber and Lyft
Review Body: idk what’s with uber and lyft. but at this point it’s just needs to go. drivers are rude.  rides are very expensive it’s to the point where everyone’s better off just getting there licenses and driving. very very ridiculous

pathetic is the word. riders are always under time constraints while booking a cab and my driver kept me waiting while he said he is coming. i kept waiting and he kept moving in the other direction and he never answered the call again. he dint deny, he dint cancel he dint showup. there is no option to report this in the app. if i cancel i ll have to pay a cancellation charge too while i am the one who got late for my destination. pathetic

Review Title: Asked if I was vaccinated against my rights as an American citizen!
Review Body:
i stupidly hired uber.
i was asked by the driver if i had gotten a vaccine, and when i got online to complain there was just preset options that didn't allow me to state my complaint in my own words.
one option was actually if the driver himself wasn't wearing a mask, with no option to complain about me, the customer being required to wear one of those filthy, disease spreading things at the risque of my own family getting sick from the coronavirus!
more over, what if i had got robbed or raped? how would i file a complaint besides hiring an expensive lawyer i can't afford?
uber is a recipe for robbery and rape.

very bad service, the drivers do as they are moving to come then they keep changing from driver. because of this i was twice late for my work. on 25-01 and 10-02. when i cancelled i get a message that they charge me  because the driver was on his way  this is a big lie. i feel robbed.  i want my money full return.i live in spain but see that the payment of 10,-- i did in advance is on an account in amsterdam? i am so angry!!!

horrible experience driver named baba rajesh turned off his gps blocks from my house never showed to pick up my daughter than cancelled the trip! and he charged the account when he was the one that cancelled the trip and turned off the gps what in the world no issues before this always positive experiences but this was just horrible then tried to contact uber no response and now the account is blocked!!! what is going on they block you when you tell the truth???

Review Title: I like to use uber the only problem I…
Review Body: i like to use uber the only problem i have is when i look to request a uber ride the price is fair when compared to others apps. but then 5 minutes later when i look the price has  doubled. stating that it's less drivers. i don't think it's fair to do that especially if i'm needing a ride in a hurry.

Review Title: Drunk driver kicked me and my 3 year old out of car
Review Body: the driver kicked us out the car 2 minutes after we got in and said he was not happy with us in his car when we was being nice to him. he stranded us in the middle of no where. my 3 year old was with me. it was freezing cold. we sat there shivering as we waited for another uber was a 45 minutes wait but we couldn’t get on the bus because there was no near by. absolutely disgusted with the customer service and my friend was waiting for us at our destination. this is an absolute joke. very disappointed with this driver. he was behaving as if he was drunk. absolutely terrible.

Review Title: You guys have the worst drivers
Review Body: you guys have the worst drivers, worst attitude. kindly take people’s reviews seriously before your own drivers ruin your company. i had tons of bad experiences with uber drivers. one of them is today’s experience. i booked cab and was waiting for the driver, as soon as the driver arrived and i entered the cab he turned off his engine and told me to book another ride that his car is faulty. imagine he immediately canceled the ride and as soon as i get down the car he start the engine and leave. seldom, i write this kind of reviews but i believe that he did this kind of horrible behaviour to me because i am a foreigner.

Review Title: Uber driver endangered my life at 9PM
Review Body:
it was 9 pm, pouring rain, and i had a bag and a box of groceries. i had been request the service for over 10 minutes on other apps to no avail, and for some odd reason i decided to try uber. i have been taking ride-sharing apps for many years with very few negative experiences. however, the experience i had with uber tonight definitely makes me want to rethink getting my own transportation.

the first thing the driver did once i got into his car was ask me why my drop-off location was so far, basically insinuating that he might just cancel the ride on me. bearing in mind it is 9 pm and raining, i was feeling especially vulnerable. he reluctantly asked for a few more indications and sighed. i was already feeling uneasy. at about 10 minutes from the actual drop-off point, he said okay we've arrived. i was stunned. he was actually trying to drop me off much sooner in a very unsafe area while it was raining, at 9pm at night. i panicked and said, "this is not the drop-off point sir please take me to the drop-off point."

i was concerned as he reluctantly continued driving to the destination, obviously worried now that this man was just going to leave me wherever he felt like leaving me.

as soon as we arrived at the drop-off location he proceeded to overcharge me for the trip and although i protested i obliged to pay a little more.

to my surprise this narc reported after this entire ordeal that i had actually underpaid him, and i swiftly received an additional charge to my phone.

this man was willing to place my life in danger and yet not happy with that also decides he wanted to screw me over with the app as well..

way to go uber, you really do know how to make a person feel safe.

Review Title: I'm uber driver now gas prices going…
Review Body: i'm uber driver now gas prices going too high should increase driver rate . earning is not insufficient. make around $65 in 4 hours plus spending gas to much ⛽️ 😠😠

Review Title: I downloaded Uber Rides App tried to…
Review Body: i downloaded uber rides app tried to book an uber to come i had four drivers confirm and then cancel . i find it disgusting that they confirm , you are waiting then they cancel . i had arrived in london and we wasted 40 minutes. i had to find an alternative taxi company. i thought uber was meant to be good what a load of s***

Review Title: Uber is not a good company to work for
Review Body: uber is not a good company to work for. they treat their drivers like they are expendable. they deactivate my and others account wrongfully by saying i had to many undelivered orders but fail to mention that the orders could not be delivered and uber support instructed me and others to do this. they deactivated our accounts for following instructions. they are a bunch of crooks and do not care about their employees. do not use or work for uber!! door dash and lyft are the best options 😁....please spread this post everywhere and get the word out, put an end to uber.

just booked my first uber! they took the money straight out my account! spent 10 minutes staring at the app apparently searching for a driver and then suddenly the money went back in my account with the possibility of 48 hours to clear! take the bloody money once you have confirmed you have a driver so i booked a local firm that arrived within 2 minutes and was £3 cheaper! stick with local! i hate using these new apps including just eat! your going to pay more because they need to be paid! much easier when you could just phone your local restaurant direct!

i was stranded this morning, 3 uber drivers cancelled on me because it was too far 🤷‍♀️ and i was super late for work, but then marshall decided to make the 25min drive to get me . thank you so much marshall

well i booked an uber today to get to my uncles funeral at gilrose. it turned up and refused to let us use the front seat. there were 4 of us so i had to get the bus and was late for the funeral. we were all wearing masks including the driver and restrictions have now eased so what is the problem. i use uber a lot but i won't be from now on. you have lost a good customer.
i am so angry and upset that i missed the beginning of my uncles funeral!!!

Review Title: Lost Uber driver charged me a wait charge
Review Body: uber charges customers a “wait” charge when the driver arrives at the wrong address. i had to direct the driver to the requested pick up address and had no idea he was charging me extra because he was lost! this seems like a scam to me! from now on i would rather call an airport transportation company than trust uber’s scams

in the uber site there is wrong information the phone number does not exist, it is impossible to call them on the number provided. misleading information.


"of course, you can always contact us directly. we operate an uber support line for riders and drivers 24/7. just open the “help” section and select ‘call support’ to be connected to our support team via the app. you can also get to us the old-fashioned way by simply calling +27800172956 – our support team will be ready to take care of whatever issue you’re having."

wow just wow, never really used uber before, £9.20 at 19.30 to get into my local town 6 miles and 23.30 to get home cheapest was £28 and was £35 at one point. had no choice to pay because half the leeds taxi drivers were striking and these robbing barstools are taking advantage of it. £30 worth of fuel will get me 250+ miles. first and last time i will use these criminals the government needs to look into this kind of public theft. no sympathy at all for taxi drivers now

and i lost out
how’s that work

if i could rate uber with zero stars i would!!! i booking a ride with the app, 6 min before pickup i get a call from the driver asking where i’m going, he then cancels. uber assigned another driver who cancels…. this happens another 3 times then uber refunds me !!! this doesn’t help when stranded at a station with kids at midnight and need to get home after a holiday! absolutely disgusted that drives can just cancel at will cause something better came up!

uber is trash. they hire anybody and they lie. the drivers don't know their way around and rely heavily on gps which takes you every where before they get to you. when they can't find you, they cancel the ride and say its because you weren't wearing a mask. you never got to my location. i will never use uber again. no integrity. i waited outside my location with mask on. he never found me because gps addiction.  the drivers and the condition of the cars in terms of cleanliness has gone down. back to the regular cabs for me. the absolute nerve to expect tips too.

used to be a good cab company! now don’t even attempt to pick you up! today was my third awful trip with uber in a row! they showed up outside, i walked outside and from the time it took me to open the front door and get into the street i watched the driver driving away and the cancellation email said apparently i wasn’t wearing a mask (which i was)! not that the driver stuck around long enough to even see! then got an email saying this was my fault for not wearing a mask, what a joke! maybe uber should check the integrity of its drivers before accusing its customers! will not use again!

wearing a face mask protect others around you and that they are sorry if my trip got caught cancelled if i was wearing a face mask.

this is an awful service that takes advantage of those handicapped. i tried to be patient but when the driver is over 20 minutes late makes my delivery only to come back to my door 3 times! he says my id was expired and it's obvious that i am vision impaired. from the reaction of my service animal i was not safe. the order was placed thru 7-11 and when i called after the delivery persons second time at my door they couldn't help me. they said they don't know the delivery company that brings my order. i said well how do i find out who it is and they said they didn't know. my sister came over and called uber and they were rude and snotty and told me to call 7-11. i could go on but i won't i just wanted to make sure that people with disabilities are very careful!!!

Review Title: Zero Stars, if that was an option
Review Body:
i would give uber zero stars if i could !! i use to be a regular user of uber for rides (before covid) and uber eats (during covid). now i refuse to use them because you cannot speak to of give feedback to an actual person. they don’t give a f about customer service, as long as they feel they’ve “done right by the customer”.

what tipped me over the edge is when i was at home with my sister’s 3 week old baby (while she’s at work) and i ordered food for myself. the driver arrived at my house at 7:12pm (which was already late considering i ordered my food at around 5:35pm). i noticed he was just sitting there for a while, so i went outside and saw his car parked in front of our neighbours’ house. i approached the car to see if he was in the car and he was sitting there arguing with someone on the phone. i decided to go back inside and wait then at 7:21pm received an email notification saying my food had been delivered. when i went outside there was no food anywhere and the driver was gone.

i wanted lodge a complaint in writing with uber, but there’s no avenue for that on their stupid piece of s**t app. the automatic response on the app claims that i’m going to receive a refund for food not delivered, but i’d also like to be reimbursed for time wasted waiting around for this poor excuse for a driver (i have have very pleasant experiences in the past with the vast majority of their other drivers) who sat in his car for no reason and didn’t end up delivering my food anyway.

if you get a driver named salah who drives a toyota estima, then cancel because he will take 20 minutes longer to deliver, sit outside you house for 10 minutes and then never drop off your food. good luck !!

Review Title: Uber is supposed to help with rides and…
Review Body: uber is supposed to help with rides and make it easily accessible and affordable. to raise the prices on an already busy night is outrageous. to charge over 70 dollars for a 15 min drive is insane. if there aren't available drivers is one thing but to charge that much is robbery.

Review Title: One of the worst cab service in Kolkata
Review Body:
one of the worst cab service in kolkata. in last few months i have observed whenever i book a uber cab (90% time)...within 2-3 min a expected call from driver and they will ask few questions and those answers suppose to be fulfilled the criteria of the driver. now a days i fill like whenever i book uber cab 1st i have to clear that interview to board the cab. those common questions are:

1. where should i come? (they can easily check in app itself)
2. where is the drop location? - my drop location should be preferable to the driver.
3. what will be the mode of payment, its either online or cash? - it means driver want cash for that ride.
4. what is the amount its shows for the trip? - if we book the cab in without surcharge they will not allow for that ride.

after your answer it driver will decide to cancel or continue. the probability is 75%-25%.
chose current location, driver turned up 5 min walk away and then charged waiting time, the system is flawed

Review Title: If I could leave less than 1 star I…
Review Body:
if i could leave less than 1 star i would. one of the most stressful things i ever done was to use uber. i thought it was going to be simple and straight forward. how wrong was i?

had to take a taxi/uber from london euston station to nearby kingston upon thames. i was with my partner who has severe learning disabilities with extreme anxiety disordser.

looked at the price and timings of the journey and thought happy days, 4 minutes away and £35. uber driver cancelled twice, and un be known to me, even if the driver cancels the journey, you the customer gets charged £6 conart**ts.

the driver who eventually did turn up was very pleasant, the car was very clean and we felt very safe.

a day later i got charged a further 50p for using a green energy car plus a further £1 for fees and tolls.

what a f***ing rip off.

you can claim back the £6 if the driver cancels by ringing uber, but you must tell them to refund your credit card not your uber account.

Review Title: uber pays 0.70 cent per mile,it pays…
Review Body: uber pays 0.70 cent per mile,it pays less than minimum hourly rate,net uber pay is less than 5.00 per hour.uber is absolutely a slavery in 21th century,net pay 5.00 per hour,real face of uber (uber deducts 55 % of your fare),if ride pays $50.00 ,driver get $22.00),this is true,all uber says before you start is a lie,uber management is buch of compulsive liars.

Review Title: On what planet is this acceptable
Review Body: on what planet is this acceptable? you're at an airport, it's late but you only need to go 2 miles. you call an uber. you wait 10-15 minutes for a driver to be found. you wait another 10 minutes and realise he's not moving. you can't contact him. you can't call him. it's approaching 30 mins, it's dark, it's wet, it's unsafe. yet, you (the customer) cannot cancel. absolute joke. uber.....only works when the driver is going to get paid handsomely.

Review Title: Uber is no longer what it used to be!
Review Body: uber is no longer what it used to be. hostile, unprofessional, and obviously disgruntled drivers!  from getting your pickup address wrong with no apologies, to hiking charges for very short trips. an asian driver used the f-word on me last week, and the driver i had today was hostile and rude, even though i was extremely courteous to him. needless to say my ride arrived very late. also, i had an issue once, and called customer support. the girl i spoke to was not only clueless, but kept me on the phone for almost an hour without getting the issue resolved. i'm highly disappointed, and will definitely not be using them again.

uber has gone down hill since lockdown, drivers are so assured that they will get customers that they can pick and choose their destinations after the customer has already paid. this has created an influx of lazy and greedy drivers who decide to abandon you after you’ve already paid because it’s an easier journey for them. don’t expect a lift from cardiff bay to cardiff (10 min drive) unless your willing to pay +£30 (£30 isn’t enough for these lot). i think there needs to be review on the current drivers who choose where you go and when. until then uber is an utterly useless app.

no cars available majority of the time or it takes forever to find a ride. surge pricing happens everyday no matter the time so expect to pay $30+ to go a few miles. i have had drivers show up late or the pin not moving for 20+ minutes. getting charged extra to be late to work is a slap in the face. rarely ever will there be cars in your actual city so expect to wait 20-30 minutes and yes, they charge extra based on how far away the driver is. scheduled rides are useless. i have had a scheduled ride cancel on me. or they will show up 30 minutes early which only works if you can leave school or work early. my advice is to book an hour early and hope for the best. i have been a few dirty, smelly cars or with reckless drivers. 1 star only because lyft always gives an hour wait time so i don’t bother.

terribly slow service, ‘if’ drivers accept your request there are then lots of cancelations, leaving you waiting almost 30min in some cases for a driver. uber, you have lost your touch. using bolt from now on!

Review Title: Greedy app, only cares about money than customer satisfaction
Review Body:
the drivers who service for this app are mostly dodgy asians and pakistanis who like to waste your time cancelling on you or declining fares, either because of one or more of the following: laziness, greed, and/or wanting to take shortcuts and do as little as possible. in fact, i got so fed up with how many unreliable drivers wasted my time making last-minute cancellations that i had to use bolt instead. i had a whopping 9 drivers in a row decline my fare, just to show how bad of a service this app is.

was doing shopping at ikea and needed an uber to help carry furniture. drivers (mostly greedy and unreliable asians like i've said) will purposely cancel on you if they know their customers are being picked up from ikea or any other furniture store. why? because they're lazy, greedy and just want to do the littlest of work. they know anyone who does big shopping means they need to take the time to help customers put their items in the minicab; and for that reason they just like wasting your time cancelling and declining trips.

what is the meaning of this app? it baffles me why they recruit lazy and unreliable drivers to work for them. drivers that don't care about customer satisfaction and just want to take shortcuts. and this is not the first time i've had such a poor and unreliable experience with uber. another time i booked in advanced a trip for £20 at 8am. next day when i was expecting the uber, they just silently cancel your booking at last-minute without warning you and to book that same trip again they charged a whopping £57. absolute pathetic... not planning to ever use this app again.

Review Body: left my phone in a cab on the website say 100% free to return by a driver now i have to travel to collect my phone just now i ben charged £22 for a trip a driver cancelled??????.

Review Title: Have $141 in wallet that uber claims as invalid payment form
Review Body: have $141. in wallet of uber cash.  uber app will not let me access the payment method.  claims invalid.  have used uber gift cards and app in ct, sc,fl .... when had to fly to colorado to my dying son, app failed to allow access to payment method,  so now planning funeral and attempted to use uber ride again for a test of 1 block.  again not able to use the wallet balance of $141 claims it is invalid payment.  i have no record of every signing up with an email address or password years ago.  now i can't use it have check 2 potential email adresses.  have not changed phone #. now i'm asking for refund  of entire wallet.  wants email and password.  even sent me text "responded to issue"  i responded back.  where.  i want out of uber and i want all my money refunded to me by usps in the form of a check.  i will not give out credit card or bank accounts.  that's why i buy gift cards.  up until my son was dying i had no issue with using and had 5 star rating.  hey uber see this, call my phone number.  unless you have no phones, because you do not offer csr phone number for other than drivers instead of paying riders, i'm nor posting my phone, email or anything, i don't want every one reading this to have it.  look me up by wallet balance uber cash 141.61.  uber failed test to get a ride today and can not be counted on for funeral involved rides.  thanks so much uber for not being there when ride was critically needed and son dying

Review Title: Uber keeps 66% of the fare charged and rips off their "partner drivers"
Review Body:
i took 11 uber rides last month, and i asked my drivers what they were getting paid for my private ride, and i found out that uber only pays them between 30% and 35% of the fare. what a rip-off!!!!

go ahead and find out for yourself and ask your driver next time. when uber came out, they said they would only take 25% of the fare.

if you read the articles written about uber and lyft, and it looks favorable in the reviews, they are the ones publishing it and putting it out on the search engines.

i will not use rideshare companies as often, knowing they lie about what they keep by an extra 30% difference. my drivers told me that they pick up around 10 to 15 rides per day and make around $150.00 per day working ten or more hours per day. that is not economically sustainable when less than 15% of the passengers tip them.

look up uber reviews 2021 on google and you'll see published crap making these ride-share companies a great way to make a living.

read this crap below....
high earnings potential: uber estimates that drivers can earn up to $1034 per week (including $90 in tips) driving for around 50 hours per week.

ubers delivery service is absolutely shocking. the drivers are useless and very rude. they arrive late and blame you for not being able to find your address, even though you give them specific instructions.
and when you receive cold or bad food they refuse to refund you.

Review Title: Read complaint below but Uber does…
Review Body:
read complaint below but uber does nothing to help me.

dear sirs,
i had a very terrible day. it started out with me going to work. the uber driver picked me up at 7:55am. then and he dropped me off a few minutes later because he said that he didn’t want to go that far and i was stranded in the middle of nowhere. he told me that he only had 30min to get to work so he left me miles from my destination. his license is above.

i am very unhappy with the situation because it caused me to get to work at a different time. i don’t deserve to pay for this route. when the route was reserved $60 was put on hold and i won’t get that for days which leaves me $60 short. i also believe i should get $100 credit for travel.

he should be fired.

you never drop anyone off until you get them to their destination especially if you have a problem with going that distance.

the customer service at uber were not helpful.

i called the first time when i was stranded they took my information and they said someone will text me or email me or message me back within 30 minutes. no one did so i kept calling back. i called back as many as seven times. they kept apologizing saying we’re sorry but there’s no one for you to talk to and that we can’t help you. i simply trying züngelt to work and you don’t have a method of helping people stranded except “we’re sorry and we will write a ticket” but in the moment i’m stranded and trying to get to work?!

it’s sad that your company was saying all we can do is write a ticket up for you and expedite it.

i was constantly promised that someone would contact me today.

no one did- this is a terrible system.

the first time i called they said that they make a ticket, the second time i called they said sorry we will make a ticket the third time i called they said sorry i will make a ticket the fourth time i called they transferred me to accounting the fifth time i called they transferred me someone they picked up the phone but never spoke.

it was a terrible experience for me today.

i need for you to please resolve this matter with me asap. thank you for your time and attention.

kindly
edh

driver in wrong place, refused to come to the right place, spent so much money with uber, now using bolt. uber is intent on giving the moronic driver money for not being intelligent enough (or bothered) to work out where the customer is and coming to pick them up. third time uber has been in the wrong place in the last couple of weeks, other drivers came / found the right place, this idiot thinks it's the customers problem. joining the masses who have given up on uber

of course a driver was found straight away for me within 30 seconds of me searching. if i could give no stars i would this company is a joke. i will use bolt from now on as they don’t extort money off people.

one person said it would be refunded. the next person it couldn’t be refunded. totally incompetent, unprofessional company. rather deal with just eat.

what has happened to uber?

having experienced a very impressive uber pretty early in their journey in the states and other cities in the world it’s quite stark how bad ‘the service’ become. easily outperformed both in terms of price and service by local taxi firms now. the most cynical thing is how many times they accept a fare only then for no drivers to accept. this is despite me having a good review score and the journeys not being excessively far. this app was designed to save people time, not waste it.

avoid.

first time using uber services. i was on vacation in las vegas and made arrangements for their services. price quoted was $28.47. this driver had not a clue where she was going and literally went in circles trying to find the destination. she was way off course! with my help we found it and we were off to the airport. she drove very erratic which was extremely dangerous. needless to say i missed my flight home and had to be put on stand by on both connecting flights. oh...and did i mention i was charged double from the original quote?! i gave a bad review and received $21.00 back. that wasn't a complimentary refund, it's what i was quoted in the first place! they just fixed their fk up! i should of been completely reimbursed for the stress and for missing my flight home! i had to change routes and also had to change the time to be picked up!! never again!! first and last time!!
your drivers suck. they drive around without ever show up and without any way to talk to a customer service. where is the chat and where is a telephone number?! awful!

Review Title: I had requested a ride to the airport…
Review Body: i had requested a ride to the airport and was quoted $81. the driver had no clue how to get to the airport, even with the use of a gps. he did not speak english and i kept telling him where i wanted to go. we drove in circles in an industrial area, which was very stressful. finally, i pulled out my gps, only to find out that i was still a 12 minute drive from the airport. using signs, i directed him to the airport. uber charged me $113.57 for the trip! when i complained, they said they would make an adjustment for the trip, which i have not received. when i go into the app, to tell them that i have not received the adjustment, i keep getting the message that the adjustment is done. i will never use uber again.

also app has gotten worse and worse about proected wait times, going from 2 minutes to 6-8 only when driver is identified.

just an awful company. not only do they treat their drivers like scum, but they also treat their customers like scum. i redeemed a promo code for $15 off. it said it was valid in the united states. i took a trip with uber and was not given $15 off. i complained to support and they said that promo was only valid in new mexico. where does it say that? nowhere. and the customer service is useless. never using uber again, sticking to the bus.

terrible service and over charging.  they are committing fraud, by giving you a price, which they hold on your card  then charge what they like once the journey is complete.   i have asked for refunds and also reported the unauthorised payments to my bank. never ever will i use this fraudulent company again.  i would not recommend them or their drivers to anyone, stay away from them!!!!
driver was ok, but what happened to uber? booking fee? wait fee? what a scam! i will never ever use uber again

Review Title: I would like to preface my review with…
Review Body:
i would like to preface my review with saying that my review is in no way geared toward uber drivers. the majority of uber drivers i’ve had the pleasure to know have been kind, and respectful.

i used to love being an uber customer; prior to the pandemic.

i was fortunate enough (and very grateful) for being given $5, or up to 50% off some of my rides within the first 1 - 1 1/2 years of using uber. since march, 2020, i’ve noticed the offers slowly fade away. i no longer see any incentives like what i saw the first 1 - 1 1/2 years of being an uber customer.

the other day, i was running behind for work in the morning (i’m a healthcare worker), so didn’t think to double check the pricing before booking a ride. i just booked my ride to get to work as quickly as possible, where i would be arriving with no time to spare.

a ride that would regularly be between $19-21 cost me a little over $56 after taxes!

i’m not sure if these price increases are related to the pandemic or not, as uber claims it’s surge pricing.

i don’t understand how uber can get away with these prices. it doesn’t feel okay to me. however, i don’t drive, so my options are limited when i’m not able to take the bus.

i would highly recommend taking the lesser-known lyft ride service over uber when opportunity allows, as lyft seems more transparent with both their customers/drivers.

Review Body: i reserved a taxi for after my theatre show. uber app showed as accepted but no driver details. i checked if this had updated during the interval but still showed the same. after the show we made our way to the pick up location agreed at which point the reservation on the uber app disappeared. disgusted at the service!!

Review Title: Worst Uber service. Not recommended at all
Review Body: uber services in india got massively degraded. multiple cancellation, driver asking for offline drop, cash demand, worst cab condition, no ac, very very heigh pricing most of the time in any day etc. what not. india need serious alternative. traveller now a days understand uber is not at all reliable and helpful. drivers are also complaining about their payment and huge cut off and no sparks. so over all it is uber management issues and lack of visionary leadership quality. best of luck uber. not sure how long people of india will consider you as a serious alternative at transportation service.

Review Title: Avoid Uber London.. not what is was
Review Body: uber london.. ordered an uber, said it was coming, we watched and waited.. saw it coming and then the driver went straight by.. got a message saying he had cancelled (quite obviously working for multiple firms and got a better job judging by the numerous screens he had).  price has now gone up, new driver allocated, waited then her stopped, time went up by 10 mins, he had obviously picked up elsewhere.. and the time went up and up until we cancelled and then they charged us £6! then we had a message saying the driver had been unable to pick us up as we did not have face-coverings, which was an absolute lie and insult.  what’s happened?!?  uber used to be reliable.

Review Title: There are many issues related to…
Review Body: there are many issues related to booking of a cab. there is no reliable and trustworthy customer support to resolve the customer complaints. when ever i book a cab the driver cancels the booking after confirmation and i am charged for the trip which i never took. whenever i leave a review on app they never respond. this is very unprofessional..

uber are now taking full advantage of being established.  their prices are now no longer competitive.  my friend ordered an uber yesterday evening and when the driver turned up, he refused to take 4 people despite it being booked.  so he took 2 and the other 2 had to get another taxi.  uber wanted a minimum of £11 for a 2 mile trip and yet the local stevenage taxis cost less than £9, actually know the area and are far more friendly.  i am going to delete my uber app as i am fed up with them turning up in the wrong place, not knowing the area, being unreliable and more expensive than local taxi firms.  people need to stop using them and start using their local taxis.the mere fact that they have got a nearly 90% rating of 1 star and yet have neither contacted the reviewers, made a comment, or made an attempt to improve shows clearly that they are all about making money with no care about customers or their reputation.

Review Title: Super bastered driver hired by uber…
Review Body: super bastered driver hired by uber owner.

tried numerous times to book a ride on a night when i urgently needed to be at my destination by a specific time. i planned ahead, made sure i gave it a generous two hour window, tried the uber app that was pre-installed on my phone, tried numerous times to get a driver and every time i attempted to confirm my pickup, i got an error message and nothing on there was nothing on the app that provided any option to work around it. it was my first time trying to use uber, and well, i can't say i'm shocked to see all the negative reviews in light of my experience. sounds like they need to pull it together and get a lot better at what they do.

Review Title: Driver turned up in a Nissan Note for 4…
Review Body: driver turned up in a nissan note for 4 people and we are supposed to sit in the back i said that was not acceptable and he was aggressive so i said to go away then uber charged me and added on waiting time !!!! what an awfull company and awful drivers avoid at all costs

Review Title: Worst courier I ever seen it is bad for…
Review Body: worst courier i ever seen it is bad for customers and couriers driver

Review Title: Very bad company uber they are not good…
Review Body: very bad company uber they are not good with the drivers
crap this happened 4 times driver accepted the call then calls me to cancel the ride cuz he don't wanna drive here ..this service is very sad now

like most of complaints, the problem is if you get a confirmation and said the time the driver supposed to pick you up, you have to wait until that time and if they cancel you’re stranded. you can’t rely on uber that someone will show up unlike taxi. a little pricey but for sure someone will be there. all the same even if you are in the us or europe their system are all the same.

i booked an uber on 11/15/21 for a ride home from the airport. after a long flight i was looking forward to a relaxing ride home. the uber drivers car recked of marijuana so i had to endure that horrible smell from the northside of jacksonville, fl to the southside.
uber needs to periodically check their drivers cars to ensure a safe and comfortable ride for the customers. evidently they only vet the drivers on the initial application for employment.
if i could give a half star i would.

Review Title: Generally don't use uber if your in a rush!…
Review Body:
generally i use uber when i'm running late, the issue i tend to find is that in london you can wait till upto half a hour or more even for them just hopeing one of the many drivers avalible will collect you. and with each time they dont accept your journey uber then says is a surge and increases there rates there isn't a surge its one person trying to get to work! so you then wait 5mins again adding to your journey time just so the app can then see there isn't anyone searching for a cab in the area. i do hear bolt penalise there drivers for being on the app and refusing jobs and tend to accept more work! uber drivers id say are unreliable in the early mornings! and avoid trips they don't feel like doing(central london).....in the waiting time you can have already have made half your journey on public transport! terrible experiences over the last 2years or so early mornings and speaking to customer services they only say drivers are on the app but not working....they are your employees and we are your customers wanting a service! i'm in a cab right now unhappy that i waited 40mins and am now half hour late for a meeting....again!!!!

this morning
driver accepted started driving
5mins later 2mins before pick up
driver cancels (no penalty for him ofcourse its not like he providing a service we are to rely on other way around we are penalised with a fee for waisting there time!)
searching flips between 8 cars local
no one accepts
booking cancelled reopen up
fare is up by £5
search keeps searching flipping to each driver again
cancelled fare up again
wait 5mins
fare back down open app try again searching driver accepts after another 5mins but a 9min wait....then watching driver not move
driver moves slowly picks up eventually

in car you realise you paying to be late and that public transport will get you there faster then uber ????
what??? my driver waits 1min for me to lock my house and he cancels. then uber charges me 6.25 dollars.  never go with them

utterly useless and arrogant customer service. total lack of interest and ownership when they totally screw up. yet if customers are 5 mins late we get fined. i was kept waiting outside for a driver who was 15 mins later than the agreed time as he was still completing another fare even though he had accepted mine. uber completely dismissed my complaint and blamed it on traffic. i’ve now deleted their app.

Review Title: You can’t always rely on Uber
Review Body: you can’t always rely on uber. if you booked ahead of time there’s no guarantee if there’s a driver willing to pick you up. waiting for them close to your time and their reply will be no drivers available.they only pick up certain areas. i think taxi is still accessible.

terrible service, can’t get any drivers to drive you, was in central london on a monday evening, lots of drivers around, waited for 30 mins only for every driver to not want to accept the job, whatever happens to business in the current climate, extremely disappointing!

Review Title: My driver was on time and got me where…
Review Body:
my driver was on time and got me where i was going on time. but i didn't not need to hear his shiite
views about police. that's all he talked about for the whole 20 minute ride. if you got pulled over 11 times like you said, that might be your issue. but don't talk to me about how bad police are the whole way home, cuz i don't agree with you.
i'm glad that we have the protection of the police officers we have. try doing their job, uber guy ..... no one asked you.....
ordered, paid extra, took longer an xl uber because there were 5 of us. one way  no issues back home barely fit all 5 of us. the driver seemed surprised there were 5 of us. not impressed.

driver was aggressive, shouting and swearing at us because my friend had lost his mask (this is after the uber policy specified mask as optional). anyway, the incident ended with the driver opening the doors and threatening to assault us. we had members of the public assist. if safety is a concern then uber is not the right platform to use. the company didn’t care about the incident when raised to them. they simply care about revenue not customers. tfl need to reconsider the licence.

Review Title: I used the schedule a ride feature
Review Body: i used the schedule a ride feature. just like advertised by uber i scheduled an early morning pick up at a relatives house to catch an early morning flight. i chose the premium black car service to ensure that i would actually be picked up on time. professional drivers!!  nonsense. no show by uber. no way to call the company or check where my ride was. had to wake up my hosts and get a ride. can’t imagine what would have happened if i did not have a backup ride. no notice from uber. no contact from uber. no help from uber. will never use again.
very bad experience i asked for a ride they changed the driver 3 times every chang happened before arrival by 5 min then i had to wait 15  more min for the new  one and so on for 3 times

uber is terrible service, we just waited 15minute for a cab only to have it cancelled with 1m of arrival, uber needs to start giving credits to those customers and penalising those drivers (significantly)
this is not the first time this has happened

i used uber for the first time and when i tried to book to get back home i couldn't get a driver after trying for an hour and didn't have any money on me as you pay on account. had to try hard to get hold of customer service who said i've been unlucky and keep trying? turns out they don't collect in the area i was in??
also the identical trip on another day was £9.00 for a two mile trip even though it was £5.82 previously?
terrible customer service who read from a script and don't seem to understand what your saying and totally unreliable with huge price swings

Review Title: Sorry I won't be using Uber again…
Review Body:
sorry i won't be using uber again unless i am really stuck.
i pre-ordered a car to take my mother to a hospital appointment, so far the job has been passed from one driver now to another driver. the first driver seriously going nowhere near our house.
my mother is now late for a ct scan!
use addison lee, at least they turn up on time and when booked.

customer service is practically non existent, i haven’t received a response on my request after three weeks waiting time, even though it said they’d get back to me when a customer service representative is available and i left three messages in the thread. there seems to be no other way to reach them. in addition i had an issue with the driver and they didn’t react to it, showing they don’t take the safety of their passengers seriously. won’t be using them again

extremely frustrating.
everytime u book the driver calls bck/sends message to check destination.
cancels himself or delays so u cancel if he dosent want to go to that destination.

this is in new delhi india
what kind of a system is this.

every ride has busy surcharge.

becoming one of the worst service ever! i have been a client for the past years and realizing that the service is worsening day after day it is really sad. i have pre-ordered a ride for the following day. the app says i have an upcoming ride but no driver ever showed up…not only your rates are higher them before, now  your service has become a disaster!

awful experience...  needed to catch a flight and arranged for transport a day before, however once the time arrived as car said 15 minutes away, driver cancelled and it went thru 2 more drivers before the 4th accepted.  almost missed flight.  avoid, schedule a taxi/limo service next time unless leaving a bar/restaurant or something quick with no set arrival time needed.

discrimination: on october 26, i contacted an urber driver to transport my daughter with a disability.  i left chad, the driver, a message concerning my daughter and her disability.  i asked if he would be able to pick her up after her appointment.  there was a lack of communication on reaching back to me.  my daughter called and said chad kicked her out of the car and would not take her to the appointment.  i have been in contact with urber to file a complaint.  needless to say they thought refunding me the fee would suffice.  my daughter was devastated, and did not understand why she was kicked out of the car.  shame on you chad for your lack of humanity.

customer service and services completely useless, to not use at all...for a 7 min drive you have to wait 10 min for a driver to accept it and 15 minutes for them to arrive and when you cancel it cos you dont need it half an hour later they charge you cancellation fees.
terrible
so unreliable!! keep on cancelling and drivers arrive so late
