Review Title: Its time to look back at the back cab
Review Body: i booked an xl car because i had 2 large pieces of luggage and 3 medium  .i  thought i booked to be picked up at the exact address  and made sure there was parking available.instead i  picked a near by street  just round the corner.a pick up point changed the last minute , i message the driver explaining i had luggage  and i could not go find him and leave  my belongings unattended. i could not carry 6 pieces of luggage . from the app i could see he did not move, he did not try to call me  . he made no effort to get in touch . he pocketed £8  for making no effort to get in touch in any way or form. in trying to book another  i found that the price was significantly cleaper  only to be cancelled  by the driver  without any explanation or apology. after 45 mins in the rain  i found a driver who was willing to accept  the trip  .using a black cab recently  ( idendtcal trip) as the one described above  cost me half the cost of the  uber charge.

uber and bolt remind us how good normal taxis were. their prices were fixed, you booked them and they turned up. in london there are never enough drivers so the prices are always extortionate. one minute a journey is £4 the next it is £24. time to delete these apps and go back to using telephone numbers.
worst service, the drivers cancel without reason. will never prefer uber !!!!

Review Title: Wish I could rate at zero
Review Body: wish i could rate at zero. bad drivers, bad rates

Review Title: Every time I get an Uber I would have a…
Review Body: every time i get an uber i would have a driver cancel on when i wanna get a ride from work to home and the. the drivers be wanting to take their time and not actually start driving or just not wanting to give others ride and y’all should be able to get more drivers out on the road that way it can make the experience better instead of running low on people and start having people that are close by the areas that the people are requesting from instead of having them to wait minutes for the driver to drop someone off that isn’t close by to them

Review Title: Not reliable!! Yesterday I needed an Uber because my…
Review Body: yesterday i needed an uber because my car was in the shop. i couldn't get a car. today i needed to get a ride to the car rental. two uber drivers cancelled on me. i don't know why. i got a ride from another service. i won't use uber again. they're drivers are unreliable.

uber has dramatically gone downhill! the pickup times given when deciding to book are completely off! it will give a drop-off time pre-booking, which helps decide to use the app, use another app, or find another form of transportation.

then, when you select ok, it finds a driver (sometimes taking 5min or more), and the drop-off time changes dramatically. and after it does that, it won't let you cancel without paying a fee! that is ridiculous, and dishonest! it has happened the last few times, every time!

if the times were accurate, or you confirmed booking once it finds a driver and update drop-off time, then it would be fine. but, the way it is now, you have to either- be late to appt when times are wrong, pay the fee to cancel and get other transportation, or never use uber!

terrible!

one star is too much! the app is inadequate and the service worse! don’t tell me one minute that a driver will arrive in two minutes, he’s 700m away and than cancel without informing me! i only found out by burbling through the app myself! i have always managed without uber; i was better off! i have deleted their awful app and will not subject myself or my family to the stress provided by uber! avoid like the plague!

Review Title: How are these cowboys still in…
Review Body:
how are these cowboys still in business? they cancelled my trip 2 mins before it was scheduled and then charged me a cancellation fee, stating that the driver had waited 8 mins! then when i rebooked, the price jumped from £33 to £55.

unfortunately they left it so late to cancel the trip, that i had no other option but to rebook with them.

thieves. will never use again.

Review Title: Uber taxi smell of food everytime
Review Body: i have noticed recently since covid a lot of uber taxi stink of food. i have stopped using them . i have just been told by someone that uber drivers do food deliveries as well as taxi. this seems to chase away a lot of customers. remember ebay was bigger than amazon 10 years ago

Review Title: Uber pays peanut to driver and uses a…
Review Body:
uber pays peanut to driver and uses a surge scheme to lure people to drive at the expense of the passengers randomly.
most trip offers pickup are over 10 km away and up to 23 km away, in my experience. those passengers that luck out, will pay $5 for going 3km trip (include ubers cut) others may pay more than twice the cost of hailing a taxi.
for uber driver to make any money, you need to be ready to put 500km a shift.
here is the breakdown
you get $0.70 per km, drive 8km to pick up point, drive passenger 5km, pay $2 for gaz, spend 25 minutes for the cycle off waiting/pickup/drop to get $3.50. you need to add wear and tear, insurance and maintenance, good luck with that.

wow. its just bad review after bad review. i'm really surprised this company is still in operation. i knew that someone and up with a great idea. took the company public so it went on the stock exchange and made millions. but it seems they made their money and now don't give a schit. uber is a shoddy company with a terrible ble service and now creating a bad reputation for themselves. and the crazy thing is, it seems they don't care. the future of taxi was going to be uber but not anymore. i at first hesitated to use uber as i always had trust and got to know many drivers in the local taxi firm. they have their own apps that works just as well if not better than uber. reliable and friendly service so why choose uber in the first place. well i was seeing how cheaper it was and becoming for me when i started using in it. this was only over a year ago, and what's happening. a massive price spike, can't find taxis on the app anymore. drivers refusing job's because the fair isn't good enough. with all the negativity now surrounding uber i'm sure there are far less people using them now but who am i kidding. we are a nation of complainers but we still carry on don't we. well i'm for sure will be going back to local taxi service.

three consecutive times uber has charged for what they call "wait time". on all three occasions, i was standing outside waiting for the driver, even once i waived the driver to the curb-- despite this, i was charged a wait fee. on another occasion, i was told a white camry would be arriving, but the car was actually a black camry. this caused a few minute delay and of course i was charged a wait fee.

as rider i've been looted on every ride ( unexpected cost) when the drivers arrive at wrong pickup location or take longer ways the rider will be charges!!! no customer service telephone line only texting !
as driver even worse no transparency on earning no credibility and weird drivers support

i used to use uber in beguining but stopped because they are unreliable. the drivers cancel trips if they don't wanna to do it and blame it on you , the waiting times are never accurate , they charge as they please which in end let me think that's better to take a black cab that at least is safe and reliable .

Review Title: Uber is horrible Customer Service sucks
Review Body:
uber is horrible customer service sucks
i was a uber driver, these customer service reps are rude, i got hung up 6 times of 9 times i called about my documents after driving for them since 2017

Review Title: Fare doubled without notice because of driver shortage!
Review Body:
booked a taxi for my daughter so she could go to a party. it was only 2 miles away but the weather over the weekend was horrendous. when we booked the taxi on the app the price for a single occupant was confirmed as £6. when the journey was completed the price that was charged to my card was £12.71!!
£12.71.....for 2 miles!!! a journey that would cost £5 with another taxi firm or 80p on the bus.
when i contacted customer services they told me 'that was the price.' it was because they put their prices up due to:
a) being short staffed of drivers and
b) to encourage more drivers to work
there was no option on the app to cancel the fare so in essence they could charge you whatever they wanted.
so not only was the pricing inaccurate to the app, it was also misleading and double the rate. as a result, and a point uber refuse to accept is, the customer is in fact the ones that are being ripped off as a direct result of them being short staffed. they have admitted that they had to raise their prices to encourage drivers to work.....but at the customers expense and slyly and without prior notification over the app.
if i went to a shop to buy a £6 top but when i got to the till i was charged £12, this would be misleading the customer and potentially in breach of advertising/pricing regulations. even so, as a customer, you wouldn't stand for it and demand to be reimbursed for the difference.
in this instance, uber claim to have done no wrong and stand by their decision to double the fare without notice, with no justification and will not offer a refund.
i feel their service is disgusting, underhand and extremely unprofessional. if they could only understand it from an oap's perspective. someone who doesn't understand technology or may be vulnerable or a little slow. this a clear violation and a target on innocent people. how many more people are going to get ripped off or overcharged and how many of those won't even notice??
such a terrible service and we will never use them ever again and implore anyone else to find alternatives. don't use uber!

absolute joke. £34 for a 9 minute journey. drivers cancel seconds before it's due to arrive. i have deleted the app altogether and found that bolt are not only much more reliable but are more than fair with their prices even during peak times. disgusting how this company takes advantage of its customers. never again will i use or recommend them!

disgraceful. booked an uber in london for the next morning to take me to the train station to get to the airport. uber said on way your driver is 2 mins away so ran out my accommodation only for them to cancel the booking with 30seconds on the clock. then price had gone from £8 to £25. appalling disgraceful  nearly missed my flight and i had to run 2 miles to the train station at paddington. deleting app never using again. scumbags.

no drivers.. any time of day or night there are no drivers to accept you ride.. 4 times i tried and no driver would accept a journey from east london to central london when i had a hospital appointment..not reliable.. use something else that is reliable!

terrible don't order from them, waited over an hour for a simple mc donalds breakfast after a night out and they changed the driver twice in the space of an hour and then cancelled the order for no reason. you had one job 😅

Review Title: My last drive consisted of the driver…
Review Body: my last drive consisted of the driver blasting music in my ear without askint me if rasing the volume to max was ok and blowing smoke into my eyes. i wasnt the one who ordered the drive but if i was i would have asked for money from her for a tip.

my uber driver cancelled my trip while i was standing outside 45th st and 17 ave. i was literally standing right there and he waited 2 min, said he couldn't find me and cancelled my ride so i had to pay the 5.25. i don't mind about the money but this company is shady. i won't be donating anymore money to these crooks.

Review Title: I wish I read the reviews!
Review Body: i wish i read the reviews!! i had had some bad experiences with uber in the past (wrong route, huge delays, incompetent drivers) but at least they would show up. today i pre-booked a ride to get me to the station (in cambridge, and the app kept saying my car was 3, then 2 minutes away. then the trip literally disappeared from in front of my eyes. no notification, no "your trip was cancelled".. it disappeared! car never showed up. thankfully a normal black cab arrived and it was free and took me to the station in time to get my train... the joke is that uber would have costed £15, and the black cab was £7.95!!! never again

still waiting for a response to my complaint several weeks ago. i used to trust this company and liked the speed and reliability.  however, my recent pre-booking experience where the driver accepted the ride and cancelled minutes before arrival left us stranded and ruined a night out with friends.  uber has lost another customer!

Review Title: Uber are trying to rip off passengers…
Review Body: uber are trying to rip off passengers in london. i had a trip that was 7 miles from soho and they charged me £117 which was never confirmed when i booked the trip . the driver when challenged advised that it was the centre and not him making the charge. this is at best criminal and trust the mayor of london will review ubers business practices and their continued licence in london..do not use them
uber drivers my god, i don't believe.

Review Title: I only gave 1 star because there is no…
Review Body: i only gave 1 star because there is no 0 or minus. i took uber ride about 10 minutes trip. the upfront fare was $13. and after i got off, the driver charged me $47. can you belive this for 10 minutes ride? uber app doesn't have any route to call to customer service. this is a total scheme and i want to open a dispute officially. any suggestions?

uber driver accepted our destination .. didn’t turn up didn’t answer his phone and then after 10 mins cancelled our ride.  he then charged us a cancellation fee of £6.00.  i disputed the charge and instead of refunding my money uber decided to give me a credit.  great way to steal money from customers.  try bolt instead.

Review Title: Uber charged me twice the cost they estimated on the app. £35.82 for a 9 mile journey that they estimated to be £18.
Review Body:

they sent me a message saying the driver was on his way and the amount would be £17-22. thought that was bit cheeky but decided not to cancel as i needed to get to my destination on time.
then i had a message when the driver had arrived that the cost would be £21-28!
finally, to my shock and horror uber chose to charge me £35.82 (!!!) for my ride, though the driver informed me that it was coming up at around £17...

i needed a driver asap to pick up my motorcycle from storage. i ordered early enough for someone to get here. took 17 mins to finally arrive. i told the driver to hurry as he was already late. he took his dear sweet time like a nice sunday cruise. got to the storage unit just after it shut. i had to then pay money to ride with this same idiot all the way back home again because he can't be somewhere on time.

next time i'll consider a taxi at least they are diligent and on time.

you are only eligible for so many refunds. which means if you have already received refunds for forgotten items and your driver does not respond to your message to make sure you receive extra sauce that you paid for this time, you will not be receiving a refund.

customer service always responds with the same “ i apologize for the inconvenience caused to you. we're glad you got in touch. we are here to help you with your concern about the missing items in your order.
i've made a note with the restaurant about this issue and be sure that your feedback has been heard regarding this matter.” any time you message them.

horrible.

if you have the choice to order delivery through another company, do so.

Review Title: Uber is a REAL WASTE OF $$$
Review Body:
uber is crap.
a 1.4 mile trip use to cost me a measly $12 or less about 3 months ago; now they charge an exorbitant amount of $35.50 to travel to the same drop off. i’d rather walk the 40 mins there or hell just go back to the old days of leaving an hour earlier than needed to catch the bus for $2.50.
why would i pay for a tank of gas just to go a mile and half? outrageous.
don’t even get me started on the attitude of most of the drivers too. rude, incompetent, oblivious. more often than not they don’t even know where they are headed or how to get there, having to ask the rider for directions. the past 5 cars i rode in, were borderline disgusting. unkempt and cluttered. one lady even had hard old goldfish and crumbs (from her kids presumably) all over the backseat floorboard.
the drivers are always late, even if you schedule hours in advance!! i will never, repeat-never use uber again after seeing prices like this. does uber honestly think the average person can afford to live and pay those prices to get to and from work!?!

Review Title: I used to pick Uber over the local taxi…
Review Body: i used to pick uber over the local taxi company's. uber drivers used to have nicer cars, cleaner and be more friendly. now uber are the local taxi company's. such a shame as they had a good thing.

driver was rushing,

he was asked to back off to give more bracking space.
he got rude and it was the first time anyone told him he was driving dangerously.
he didn't finish to the drop and then said i was drunk. isn't that why i called a cab.

Review Title: Uber driver stole my Canada Goose jacket
Review Body:
our uber driver stole my partner’s £800 jacket!!! before my boyfriend had the chance to lift the jacket out of the back seat when we were getting out, the driver put his foot down and drove off with the door wide open!

we tried to phone his number used on the uber app however he only gave 10 digits in the number and therefore it doesn’t work. this itself seems suspicious when makes us think he does this kind of thing often.

we have contacted uber who have been absolutely useless to say the least. they claim to have phoned the uber driver who stated that there was no jacket left in the back seat, and uber thinks that’s the case closed. we have now contacted the police instead and will be looking to get cctv from outside the shop where he drove off.

for everyone’s awareness, this took place on fri 22nd 2021 in edinburgh. the driver’s name is hafeez ahmad, his car was a toyota prius and reg plate was wn16 nvx. his uber license number is ph1996.

uber need to take responsibility for this and crack down on who they are distributing licenses to!

Review Title: Uber charged for waiting fee when…
Review Body: uber charged for waiting fee when customers are waiting and drivers are late. this is ridiculous. how come they charge customers when drivers didn’t even reach to the destination. they charged me $12 more because driver was late. that is how they make money.

ordered uber to get to airport 1 minute before pickup driving canceled , said in email we were not wearing mask , but the driver never even came to our house , total lie . had to drive ourselves and pay $112.00 for parking , do not use this company totally unreliable
real bad, yes it's cheap.. but arriving time on app is not accurate and driver can't see the messages u send. they needs to work on it. cause as a customer i don't want to stand outside.

Review Title: This company is getting worse and worse…
Review Body:
this company is getting worse and worse day by day. drivers are almost never at the pick up point and you have to walk around the area to find them. bare in mind though that this only happens late night/early morning. probably this is when the lowest paid drivers go out…in any case, there more professional companies out there (eg. freenow etc). choose wisely!!

one week later; further issues. the driver took the wrong customer, i saw him leaving the pick up spot and called him. once i managed to speak to him (he wouldn’t pick up), he said that he took the wrong customer and that i wouldn’t be charged. however, i got a receipt and still was charged fo a ride i never took. still waiting for a response/refund from customer support. i take rides 6 times a week and only with uber i have such ridiculous issues. rubbish and unprofessional. i’ve had enough.

horrible!!! i scheduled my ride hours in advance then they cancelled on me at the last minute making me late for work! then they had the nerve to still charge me for the ride when i'm not the one who cancelled it the driver cancelled on me!!
no availability of uber drivers, been kicked out of a car because we were 4 (and not 3 as requested by apl) but it was a normal 5 seater

normally we enjoy uber.   until today!  driver parked around the corner of my home didn’t pick me up in front of my house.  was horrible at keeping a steady pace. either slammed on the brakes or sped up.  heavy perfume, had a mask but didn’t wear it. her questions to me as soon as i got in the car was “did you know the name adam was aribic? am i aribic or what nationality am i?

worst app ever. the driver always picks me on the other side of the road which is dangerous. when you bring the issue to uber all they do is give you $5 credit as a charity. most of the drivers are so not fit for driving & the company is going down is its standards.

Review Title: Such a worst service can't even give 1…
Review Body: such a worst service can't even give 1 rating but there is no other option....never ever get uber book on time and when it books people just disconnect the cal and cancel the booking or else they will never come on time and when ever we call driver will be busy on another calls such a worst service....i think it's better you can shut down your company!!

Review Title: Shoddy and impersonal. No customer service.
Review Body:
booked a ride to a friend's birthday bash several hours before pickup and received confirmation by email. less than 10 minutes before due pickup i received message that no driver was available for my booking, so it was cancelled. no time to arrange alternative so was forced to drive us and drink lemonade all evening.
such a poor service and marred my first, and probably last, uber experience. book with an established local taxi firm is my advice.

Review Title: Driver drove past us without waiting
Review Body: driver drove past us without waiting. i replied to the text message to say we were at the pick up point. driver sent another message which i took a minute to read because of rain on my glasses. driver then cancelled the cab. i was charged £4 for the cancellation which the driver had done, not me. hailed a black cab which was actually cheaper than the uber. i disputed cancellation fee and got a message to say it would be reimbursed, but instead of being paid back through paypal it went into my uber wallet, meaning i have to use uber again to get my money back. terrible service and a ripoff.

i’ll never use them again & downloaded the amber app

Review Title: I couldn’t hate this app more
Review Body:
i couldn’t hate this app more

5 ubers in a row cancelled after each making me wait 5-7 mins for them to arrive. one even waved at me as he drove by.

the app is pointless as you can never get a taxi when you need it, drivers only care about maximising fares because uber take too much in fees because they can’t figure out how to make a profit

i will never use the service again, deleted

this happened to me twice. i requested an uber choosing to pay by visa not cash and the driver shows as if it’s arriving then they move away and go into different directions then they cancel the trip from their end. then, for absolutely no reason you’re terrible app charges my visa card for 13 egp because your driver decided to cancel my trip after waiting for him more than 10 minutes.
the worst part is that even after this happened there’s no way of reaching anyone, no number, email or web-chat or even any simple way of logging a complaint. i had to ho through complicated and unclear steps to dispute my charge which was said to be refunded however i discovered amount was deducted from my account and this situation happened twice to me.
you are simply ripping people off for no reason and you don’t even have anything remotely related to customer service. i will never stop giving bad reviews on you all over social media

uber is a complete joke. i have been using uber for years and always use the service. i had been in a uber and spilt a slight drink on the floor and seat- this would have dried as it was water. the uber driver said absolutely nothing i apologized for this - no reply.

i then get a notification that they have charged me £110 for a cleaning fee!!!! i spoke with customer service and they have been no help at all!
this cleaning free is absolutely outrageous how they get away with this i dont know!

the driver was rude and could have just said no worries it will dry!

i actually take an uber daily to and from work today as i had  the driver pick me up i had to make a second stop so i put the information in the app the driver refused to take me to one of my added stop  i had to pick up a few things from the grocery store his comment was i hope you’re not gonna be in here fooling around too long i simply stated to him does that matter i pay for the service so you’re supposed to wait he continue to be rude and unprofessional so i told him just take me home he was like well i can’t just take you home you have to change your route so i took off the added stop uber charge me an additional price i put a complaint into uber they call themselves  trying to resolve it with giving me five dollars cash back not in my account but so that i can use it towards their services  of course  i told them that their driver was rude and unprofessional the comments that he made were unnecessary they sent me a response and said the driver said you weren’t wearing a mask really i’ve spent hundreds of dollars with you this company i will no longer invest my money and or in  people that do not care about their customers so again another bad review for uber
worst experience with uber driver, rude and tricky!

Review Title: ive only recently started using uber…
Review Body: ive only recently started using uber taxis and so far i have found them extremely reliable and the drivers chatty and friendly i wished i had downloaded the app sooner. however please make sure u have the pin number for the trip as the driver might ask for it when u jump in the cab

Review Title: I was completely disgusted at the level…
Review Body: i was completely disgusted at the level of service received the other night. i was left 2-3 hours on my own in the middle of the night in town. i ordered several taxis that was cancelled several times. i was shocked to find out from customer services that the driver can decide at any point in the journey not to come and collect the individual ! i was approached 5 times by different males during that period of time and felt very vulnerable. your service i feel puts vulnerable individuals at risk! when i spoke to someone i was told that you do not have have a safeguarding policy even tho you should be safeguarding young men and woman and your website claims that’s something you take very seriously! unfortunately i do not agree. i also felt that the pathetic attempt to provide a £5 credit on my account was disgraceful ! i do not want money ,  sort our your service and smarten up your act uber !

Review Title: Second time this happened when using…
Review Body: second time this happened when using uber...driver never shows up, however he starts trip as if i’m in the car on the way to my destination.  when i see what’s going on, i try to cancel it but get charged for the trip anyway.  trying to dispute the charges is useless since their moron techs, whom i’m pretty sure are all bots continuously respond “we double checked this trip for you, but since it was completed or close to your destination it isn’t eligible for a fare adjustment or refund”.  what a scam!!

terrible month of service.

i have used uber for years, i use it almost every day to get to work, however recently i have had the worst experiences ive ever had with any company.

one day i was taking a trip to work and the driver asked if he could take a call, and i said yes thinking he was going to use headphones or a handsfree device, instead, he picked up his phone to take the call. breaking to law in doing so. he then took the call, swerved all over the road and thought nothing of it. no apology, nothing. i reported this to uber and they gave me 47p credit as a result. 47p credit for their driver placing my life, and others in danger.

i decided to give benefit of the doubt, as i had never had an issue before and treat this as a one off.

this was until last week. i was away in another city for a gig staying at a friends house, we decided to get an uber back after the concert to save time as it was late, and there was a surge on, and the trip would be £25. this was steep, but understandable as it was late, so we went ahead with the journey. everything went well. we arrived back at my friends house and then the following day, when we were working out what time we got home, i referenced the uber journey to show the time which we got home, to find out that i had been charged £41, as the driver hadnt ended the trip when he dropped us off, instead he had driven back into the city centre, and only then ended the journey.
once again, i reported this to uber to try and get the £15 that i had been overcharged back, the driver refused to refund me, and so uber only issued the overcharged balance as a voucher.

dreadful customer service, take my money for no reason, and then refuse to give it back!

so, if you use uber, expect them to either try and kill you, or to steal your money.
honestly, id rather walk from now on.

unbelievable poor driver support very unprofessional people.
i’m working whit uber for more then 3 years now. never been like this before.
one week i’m waiting for specialist team to approved my insurance:(
7 day’s…..bolt except my insurance lest then 30min freenow 30min ola-3hours
uber unbelievable need more then seven days to do that. they broke their own agreement of seeing the documents will be approved less then 30min but can be up to 12 hours
max 48 hours in same case.
but no we’re i can see that 7 day’s.
unbelievable poor driver support uber has at the moment.
for this 7 day’s!!! i call them spend more then 5 hours on the phone whit online supervisor’s very unhelpful.
i’m really disappointed ☹️
0 ⭐️ driver support team.
that’s way many drivers are choosing to work whit other companies…better pay better driver support!!!
that’s way all this negative feedback from customers are coming up on trustpilot and many more places.
people say the fish start’s smell from the head.
i haven two kids i’m paying rent for the car i’m driving every week £230 rent.
i lost one week of work…..but the stress given me by uber support team is 5 🌟
unbelievable poor driver support specialist team what ever they being called.

Review Title: No drivers, company cancelling my booking
Review Body: this is the 2 nd time in a row that no drivers accepting to come and pick me up (happened couple of times in the past as well).  the map shown plenty around the area where i live, 1min, 6min, 8 min away and so on. i requested before night, even not the last minute to make sure i ll have a taxi. very disappointed with this service attitude.  oh, and i am not the only one, my colleague had the same bad experience, that cause her being late from work.

Review Body: what a absolute disgrace all uber drivers should be prosecuted for corruption and fraud

Review Title: An Uber driver insists on blocking all…
Review Body: an uber driver insists on blocking all building exists while waiting for his passenger to come down, even if there’s plenty to spots to pull over he always stays on the road lane causing a traffic jam. when being politely asked to do pull over not only does he refuse but starts cursing and and gives his middle finger. last time this happened he was driving a chevrolet black color with plate jut i70 (florida)

company is very unreliable. we used uber for business and they are hardly on time. drivers are clueless about the trips ahead of time.

Review Body: your drivers are either lazy or greedy. what other explanation can there be for all your drivers cancelling on me and none of your drivers accepting my trip last night. i wasted an hour trying to get a ride from central london to north london last night, prepared to pay up to £35 for the privilege. had to get a night bus home eventually. it's a joke that you consider and call yourself a taxi service.

totally disgusted drivers taking money…
totally disgusted drivers taking money and pocketing it i placed an order from mcds hx realise i’d put wring postcode followed instructions on app and called the number guy said no problem wait for the driver to call the order never arrived i then get a call of personal number very abrupt and rude saying his was mcdonald’s salterhebble i was replying on the app but he didn’t evan have it on 20 mins it took him to take my postcode i live in elland five mins he was demanding i pay five cash which he stood counting it in front of me if i wanted my food or he was guna leave it there on doing soo food was cold not all there and not got too eat iv asked for a receipt for cash payment over a week ago and i’m been ignored iv read your policy and there is nothing to say u demand cash and refuse delivery i’m a type one diabetic this could of been worse i’m still awaiting feedback

i think they suck too and i'm a driver. i give everyone 5 stars unless rarely i get a rude person then they get 1 which i only gave once in 4yrs. but they screw the drivers over too. they offer these bonuses but you have to do a certain amount of trips. so what they do is give you long ones so you wont have enough time to get all your trips in before time runs out. pretty slick. not to mention the navigation sucks, it tells people your not there yet when you are outside. they keep you from seeing how far the rider is going. they tell you the house is on the right when it's on the left. some times they give like 6 bucks extra for 3 consecutive trips . what they do to me is slip a long trip in the 3 because they know i dont want long trips . i wont accept the trip then they tell me i dont get the 6 bucks . big deal. the list goes on. you cant talk to anyone in this country either with an issue . they dont want to hear it so we talk to somebody in the phillipines and you get the standard answer we will check into it and nothing gets fixed. when a company is huge they dont care because they know you need them.
absolutely shocking customer service and driver attitudes

i had been using uber for 11 trips without incident. each driver had given me a 5-star rating and i had done likewise. in all cases i had been sociable, been at the meeting point when they showed up, hadn’t been drunk, hadn’t been rude, never had an argument with the driver, never slammed a door etc.

then i discovered my ranking had gone down to 4.63 because one driver decided to give me a 1-star rating for no apparent reason. i referred it to their customer services and asked them to investigate it since it was clearly an outlier.

it matters because your rating can make the difference between getting a driver and not. this is a serious safety concern at the end of a night out.

they didn’t even bother to investigate it or establish a reason for such extreme negative feedback. all i got was a generic one-size-fits-all copy and paste from “mike” at customer services trying to justify their ratings system as fostering “trust” between drivers and customers. so “trustful” that they can’t even be bothered to investigate the problem.

well, now they can have a 1-star rating themselves. at least i can actually justify it, unlike their upholding of their driver’s malicious treatment of a good customer without explanation.

there are always better and cheaper local alternatives in your location, who probably also pay their drivers better.

boycott uber!

Review Body: i ordered an xl and did not realize that is not for 4 people. i was stranded down townat 10:00 pm because the uber driver would not let us sit in front seat. what part of xl made me think they would not carry 4 people! uber left 4 people stranded downtown  at10;00 pm because some one can’t sit sit in the front seat!! really!!!  uber is off my list. scared to be stranded fowntown!!!!. even though i made reservations a day ahead!!!!!!! really.

Review Title: I don't want to give no Star rate
Review Body:
i don't want to give no star rate. i experienced september 6th uber driver canceled my ride. because he went to wrong location. i reached out to uber for refund they still charged me. since i couldn't reach anyone, i filed a complaint with bbb. i just got a email from bbb. they refused to respond back to them. uber just emailed me just now saying. they only refund within 30 days. well hello, i reached out to them same day. not only that october 6th, i emailed uber on day 30. they just don't want to refund me back. charged that day 3 fares third one was supposed to be my refund.

over 1h waiting. they changed drivers 3 times!!!
drivers cancel whenever they want and uber might ask you for a fee even if you cancel because you're sick and tired of waiting.

the driver run over my friends foot whilst on the phone, the company decided to miss call me 10 days later at 9.30pm then tried saying they’ve tried to contact me twice after only being bothered about the situation after i said the police had been called. they only work because people don’t want to talk to another human to order the taxi.

Review Title: One Estimated time scam too many
Review Body:
it’s weird that on iphone app store they have an average score of 4.6 but when you select “most recent” reviews it’s just page after page of 1 stars. makes me a little suspicious of the integrity of that scoring system. and it’s interesting that it’s one star here.

i use cabs when i’m getting trains so i don’t miss them, otherwise i’d walk or get a bus. i’m often on a tight schedule and the whole point of using a cab is speed. so accurate and honest information is crucial.

consistently uber says 2-3 mins wait to be picked up, i accept it then says it’s connecting to a driver which can take 2-3 mins alone. then the timeframe moves back to 11 mins and keeps going up.

it’s so consistent it’s obvious this is no mistake but deliberately miss leading coding. as in they’ve got no drivers but want my fare, so give a misleading timeframe and give the bad news slowly hoping once committed i wont cancel because there is a penalty fare. it’s an extremely poor business model, it assumes the customer is stupid and won’t notice the dishonest and punitive way their being treated.

as i result i cancelled and found a local firm just but i ended up getting to station with literally minutes to spare. by the time i’d got a ticket, i had to run up and down flights of stairs, and down platforms with bags and literally got on the train as the doors were beeping. covered in sweat, stress levels up and very happy wasting best part of 6 precious minutes thanks to uber.

at least this time they didn’t try to charge me £5 as they have in the past.

but it’s annoyed me enough to delete the app and leave negative reviews.

Review Title: Uber makes me as a joker
Review Body: i never face this kind of situations from any apps never and ever on  1-10-2021 i booked uber bikes from  pg to office  i was about to reach office before 1.30 i booked bike around 12.03 and booking confirmed  it was showing 10 minutes and he telled me to wait outside and i waited 9 minutes after he cancelled  then again transferd to other driver then booking confirmed  showing 6 minutes and he called and asked me dtop location and everything and he talled me he talled me to come  some other location i took 5 minutes to reach there once i reached there i called him not picking the call  trip was cancelled then two cab again booked and cancelled. i was about submit important shipment papers in office  still m facing the problems because of that after all yhis i keep on contacting uber teams and explained all problems what i faced  these irresponsible uber teams not giving proper reply till now. i have all proof of the incident what i faced on that dayone of the carzy thing is these shameless people paying cancellation charges from public   i paid more than 10 times cancellation fees if they reach near by my loation while cancelled shameless shameless  i want to share this   to public

Review Title: Drivers calling they are too far. Why they accept the route?
Review Body: i almost every day ordering the uber. the problem is firstly long time when the driver is accept the route. then many times the driver calling, and says that, you are to far, please cancel the trip. i told them i not gonna cancel the trip, if you want to cancel, you have to do it. the last driver who is called me, says that, if he cancelling that is not good for him. of course, if i cancelling uber charge me. this is wrong. i ordering, they accept the route, then don't want to do it? if i cancel they charge me. just waste my time. not fair. please do something.

Review Title: They cancelled my taxi a minute before…
Review Body: they cancelled my taxi a minute before it was due to arrive claiming they had no drivers so i rebooked and it instantly gave me a driver but changed my price from £10-£14 up to £17. absolute crooks i will not be using again

Review Title: Worst experience have with a pre-booked ride
Review Body:
i booked a ride in advance using the app. the booking was accepted and around 30 minutes before the ride i got notified of waiting at the location whilst uber was looking for a driver.

one driver accepted when there were still 12 minutes to the booked time. however, he was 7 minutes away and refused the ride. (i assumed because he did not want to wait 7 minutes)

uber notified me of “no available drivers in the area”, so, my pre-booked ride got cancelled and uber advised to start a normal search.

i started a normal search and a driver accepted it in a minute or less and he was only 1 minute away.

how funny is this?

the pre-booked ride was £12.00
the normal search was £22.00

isn’t this misleading a customer? i thought my ride would have been £12.00 and i was relax since i had a pre-booked driver to pick me up. instead, i had to pay more (£10.00 more) plus i had to hope a driver would have been available.

then i realised that there were plenty of drivers available - it was the price too cheap - why charge a customer £12.00 if you can charge £22.00? get him on-board with a cheap option first, then raise the price.

unbelievable

Review Title: Driver asking more money so i said ill…
Review Body: driver asking more money so i said ill be paying online so he cancelled my trip.but you people charging for your driver fault

Review Title: The worst of unaccountable, indifferent corporates
Review Body: awful company: you can’t book in advance but their drivers can accept your fare before they’ve dropped their previous passenger and keep you waiting a long time. sometimes they accept the fare and then just sit waiting for you to cancel so that they can collect the £4 cancellation fee.  try complaining!  you’ll get a standard reply and if you respond on this you’ll find your “enquiry” has been closed down. the very worst of anonymous, unaccountable corporates. avoid.

it is horrendous. how can a ride that i pay for almost every weekend change from around £9 to £24.65. i really had great respect for uber and drivers but this disappointed me. uber’s price surge is a reap off🤯

started off good , but now very unreliable , just uninstalled the app as will no longer be using. drivers pick and choose whether they come for you, they accept the ride and keep you waiting,  then they ditch you.    very poor service , this has happened on to many rides.  i would advise using a different service.

i can't even talk to someone.

Review Title: Uber uncooperative with police investigation and aids in the runaway of a 14 year old child
Review Body:
﻿ i have a grave concern and i want to bring my experience to others knowledge.
﻿i want people to understand the seriousness in the dangers of uber and their poor business model in aiding the trafficking of young girls in major metro areas.
my 14 year old daughter who looks young for her age ran away yesterday. she stole my cell phone, downloaded the uber app and hailed an uber car to a country, private, heavily wooded road with no houses. the uber driver picked up an obvious young minor with several backpacks on her in a wooded area, took her across county lines and dropped her off at a train station in a very urban area.
when detectives and police contacted uber to get any information on my missing child, they refused to cooperate or release any info on her ride, destination, pickup location or even what she was wearing.
the city she was dropped off in is a major child trafficking area and uber was careless, unsympathetic and uncooperative in helping locate my missing 14 year old daughter. when a child is missing, time is of the essence in a safe recovery and not only was uber uncooperative but also hindered our precious time in locating her.

i want everyone to be aware of this! i want uber’s policy to change regarding missing child investigations. there business priority should be the absolute safety of both passengers and drivers and that means being transparent when a child is missing with the help of a careless and improperly trained driver. their drivers should be highly trained to be able to discern at risk children and child trafficking signs.

i’ve reached out to uber and their official response refers back to their privacy policy. their website policy shows age verification required on all pickups and no riders under the age of 18 without an adult. obviously neither of these safety measures/policies were followed with my daughter.

do not use. terrible service now. pre ordered to get to an important appointment this morning. the driver was running late and then suddenly cancelled. disaster. used to be fairly reliable and prompt but now awful.

Review Title: Never pre book an Uber driver for the…
Review Body: never pre book an uber driver for the next day they have let me down every time

Review Title: I used Uber until I switched to Lyft
Review Body:
i used uber until i switched to lyft. recently i was in paris and used uber to get around. many drivers arrived quickly, picked me up at the location i requested. but i had few drivers that would cancel on me and uber charged me 7.20 euros even though driver never even came close to my location. after 2 charges i just started using taxi and the price was pretty much the same.
no more uber for me.

Review Title: Charged over £5 more than they have…
Review Body:
charged over £5 more than they have charged before for same journey extras for up front payment and time, queried this with them was told it was the dynamics of the journey and the time it had taken over normal time complete crap it was the quickest i had ever made that journey just jumping on the current fuel situation and getting every extra penny they can get i am a nhs worker wasn’t long ago they couldn’t do enough to get us to use them.
even used there drivers name instead of mine in their e mail

Review Title: Uber is fraudulent company don't use them
Review Body: uber is fraudulent company i'm giving them a star that they don't deserve that don't pay drivers they steal our pay tips and to make matters the customer services kept me on call for more than four hours for my missing earnings for trip i drove more than 40mins and finally hang up on me my last week earnings was 578.71 but uber had the boldness to pay me 538.85 what height of wickedness they make you drive 10 miles 20minutes only to get paid $3.85 because the customer only need a 9mins 2miles ride when ever you do a reserved trip the slash your pay into two claiming it's service fee and mind you have driven 53miles and over an hour trip only to get paid $31 leaving your home early in the morning  don't use uber service my best advice for customers is tip your drivers with cash or better still transfer the tip to drivers directly uber is a fraud finally i'm going to sue them for their fraud

i was an uber driver until yesterday and they wouldn't pay me what they owe me. since september 6th i have been missing sporadic trips in my pay. uber sent me 42 mile round-trip to deliver some applebee's food one night and midnight and that is a $25 trip!! and just no money in my cash out account! for eight trips they owe me! for eight trips and i've been on the phone for hours for a month trying to get my wages that i earned and they never paid me to this day they did not pay me for eight trips my family went hungry for two full nights because of uber and they don't give a damn they will shuffle you from customer service rep to  customer service rep.  the last time i was on the phone with uber it was an hour and 45 minutes and they finally just hung up on me without giving me my money and i was not cussing them or being ugly they just won't pay me that's what you get when you work for a company that the owner is pakistani because they don't give a damn if they pay you or not that's why they have so much money because they're not paying their freaking employees for monies earned. don't patronize uber because they're not a good company they let me and my daughters go hungry and they didn't give a damn and they still don't give a damn. don't use them!!!

worst app ever. none of the drivers accept my order no matter where i want to go short or long distance they refuse to take any trips.
you you have destroyed this for both riders and drivers

Review Title: Uber is a complete rip off
Review Body: uber is a complete rip off charging $20 dollars for a 3 min ride...which is a 30 min walk. they charge you for canceling trips but nothing is done when uber drivers cancel your ride, uber drivers accept the ride call and ask where you are going and if it isn’t convenient for them they cancel...so they can waste your time with no penalty and if we cancel we are charged. uber continuously raise their prices and it’s getting ridiculous- people joined uber because it was cheaper than taxi services now they are becoming just as expensive if not worse! i have had it! i have no vehicle so i have to rely on uber but i’m sick of being charged a ridiculous amount for such a short distance a gad damn 3 min walk should not be $20 or $15 that’s absurd af! now i have to choose between walking back and forth to work for 30 minutes or switching to lyft or maybe even consider taking the taxi again might as well, what is the point of taking uber when they keep raising their rates. they are ridiculous!!!

Review Title: Cancelled a scheduled pickup then wanted 3 x booked fare
Review Body: booked a scheduled pickup with my 15 year old lad from the o2 to get home quickly from a concert for a reasonable night’s sleep for school in the morning.  the trip was £24.  the driver cancelled just before we got there - we weren’t late.  rebooking said over £90… disgraceful.  i will never use uber again.

absolutely disgraceful company that charge a fortune for a short journey. had a couple of bad experiences with them. once i had a ride booked but cancelled, but the driver came anyway and put the meter on for the trip i had cancelled and changed me for the journey i didn't take! another time i got an estimated fare of £12 which ended up being £36, three times as expensive and uber support were so unhelpful. avoid at all costs.
literally doesn't work, cycles through 10s of drivers that all decline the fare, and otherwise the price can jump from £7 to £27 in a matter of minutes, absolutely awful.

Review Title: Would write in the minus if I could
Review Body:
would write in the minus if i could. after a busy day ordered my children mcdonalds. at 17.45. was supposed to be delivered 18.35. 7pm latest
from the time i ordered till 7pm i had 2 drivers meant to have been picking up my order then didn't.
i then got average time of 7.10 then changed to 7.20
i kept trying to cancel my order which you can't actually do on uber eats!!
between 7.05 and 7.10 i got a notification to let me know my order isn't being delivered which is what i wanted in the end but to not have an option to cancel if goes over latest time os ridiculous. had to go get my childrens food at 19.10. should have been told from early that then can't deliver!

uber used to be great and very reliable. however, it is now extremely difficult to book a ride. often drivers accept and cancel, or the request times out entirely. this seems to be the case now for others i have spoken to, also. it's very disappointing. it's no longer a reliable app to use.

Review Title: Order food on there app wait 30 minutes…
Review Body:
order food on there app wait 30 minutes to then be told your order is cancelled even though it shows on the app a driver is supposed to be waiting to deliver it .
to make matters worse they then email a £5 discount coupon like that’s going to help .
bad bad company, don't help drivers.

Review Title: Terrible service and app - charge doesn’t reflect what they said
Review Body: last night i opened the app to check for fares. the app specified a fixed fare of £9.61 for my trip, which i was happy with. i click on book my trip. a driver accepted the trip but cancelled, so the app automatically selected another one. the driver was awful, drove quite carelessly and fast (to the point he made feel dizzy and sick) and when i got off the car, i received a notification from my bank saying i had been charged £27!! as usual, the app doesn’t help you reaching out to anyone and it’s all based on fixed answers that don’t reflect the problem. this is ridiculous (and i suspect it has happened to me before). if they don’t give me my money back this will be the last time me, my partner and family will ever use them.

Review Title: I'd give Uber 0/5 if I could
Review Body: i'd give uber 0/5 if i could. on about four occasions on nights out uber couldn't connect us to a driver. even when a driver accepted us they'd cancel after 3 seconds.

Review Title: Used for the first time yesterday
Review Body: used for the first time yesterday. booked a cab, driver in wrong place, wouldn’t come down to where we were so driver cancelled the booking and i get charged a cancellation fee! shocking service!

absolutely ridiculous uber drivers constantly reject trips which means you wait there for 15+ minutes before giving up and getting a taxi. they use to be so reliable and now it's a waste of time. i can't see myself catching an uber in the future after this has happened the last 3 times i have tried to get an uber.

terrible waiting times, i have had numerous requests cancelled because no drivers and its happened more and more in the past months. managed to get cars on bolt!

really gone down hill uber service

Review Title: I'm a uber driver in London,the reasons…
Review Body:
i'm a uber driver in london,the reasons why it's taking passenger a long time to get a taxi.
1.uber has put up commission from 20%-25%from the drivers.
2.uber giving out jobs 15 minuites away for a £3.75trip.thats why there is many cancellations.
3.it use to be nearest driver for the job,that worked very well,but because of the 25% comission most drivers will only use uber during surge times.
4.september 28 2022,uber drivers strike 24 hours not using the app.

Review Title: As driver trying get something fix it…
Review Body: as driver trying get something fix it like pull teeth. i got one issue fix took 5 call to get resolved. this is second issue work on. there no hubs to go too. i could get anyone fix my account for information that wasn’t valid anymore. ask speak someone that could correct issue. i couldn’t remove lost or stolen card of the app. the rep wouldn’t refer me to some that could. good business is all about good customer service. take care of drivers and customer is how you get repeat business and good workers. i’m not sure why heads of this company ignore the issues of bad customer service. this was all wrong before the pandemic.

worst experience with taxis. i preordered a taxi for early morning. five minutes before it was scheduled to arrive the driver cancelled. i was left without any taxis and almost missed my flight due to the incident. very unreliable and irresponsible, will not be using again.

Review Title: I ordered dinner through UberEats las…
Review Body: i ordered dinner through ubereats last night a little before 7pm.  they said it would take about an hour.  nearly 2 hours later they cancelled my order because they had no driver.  that left me without dinner last night.  i complained online and they told me to “contact the driver”.  there was no driver and it was uber that left me hanging for 2 hours.  i have asked to file a formal complaint and speak with someone in charge and they refuse.  i will never use them again and will share my experience widely.  shame on them.

i called an uber, i was matched with a driver who was 2min away and for 8-10min the car didn’t move in the map. i texted the driver. asking if he was on his way, got no reply. when he finally answers he says that he was 30min away that i should cancel the trip. all in all, almost half an hour lost, ended up taking a cab. uber drivers are doing this more and more, when they don’t want to accept a trip. when you call an uber these days it is not certain anymore that they will come. unfortunately this is not the first time this happens to me.

Review Title: If it was possible to go less than one…
Review Body: if it was possible to go less than one star i would. unreliable when it suits them and happy to be eager to please when they are going to get a juicy big fare - market forces i guess ultimately. but market forces so very clearly swayed in favour of the app’s operator and the drivers rather than even any pretense at providing a reliable service and that’s the bare bones of the experience from a hitherto reliable and regular customer.

horrible. i had an accident with the nutter london driver who was showing his attude towards me and even locked his car up when i wanted to go. all what they did just let me know that experience would never happen again. imagine they still let him carry on and someone will be next. clearly don’t care about customer safety only about money

Review Title: In the app if a ride cancels on you it…
Review Body: in the app if a ride cancels on you it shows they are reconnecting you to a driver it doesn’t do that now. i didn’t know the driver canceled and i went out and waited before i realized it they necked. it stilled told me to go wait at pickup spot but didn’t assign a new driver

uber was very unprofessional. i ordered a meal that was never delivered, the driver called to tell me that the restaurant was closed, and to cancel my order to get my money back. the order was $21, and i was charged an extra $11 or tip, fees,et,. after waiting an hour for my food, uber would only refund the $21. when i asked why they said because the restaurant already made my food, but this was false, because the driver who had 500+ positive reviews told me the restaurant closed and could not make my food. 5 service agents cancelled on my conversations, several emails back and forth, and uber refused to give back $11 for an order and service never provided. highly don't recommend. no support number available, they will keep giving you the run around, and refuse to refund you a service they don't provide.

Review Title: Uber drivers keep cancelling my rides…
Review Body: uber drivers keep cancelling my rides after i’ve been waiting 5 mins. additionally it’s taking longer and longer to find a taxi. lastly uber taxi won’t collect me from sw london and bring me into central london. i’m done. won’t be using them anymore

Review Title: Putting flowers in the taxi after my…
Review Body:
putting flowers in the taxi after my fathers wake, the drive asked “how much longer, your costing me money.” i explained about my fathers burial and i had just been at his wake, (i’m dressed in back putting the flowers saying dad in the boot. he then replied, “i don’t care, this is costing me money!”
uber customer care do not care, never had such a bad experience in my life!! avoid, delete the app & never use!!! awful!! the driver and customer support!!

Review Title: I have been driving for Uber the keep…
Review Body: i have been driving for uber the keep raising money for passengers but lower the drivers payment which is bad, and also after working my whole body out with work uber refused to pay me the refused to let me cash out all they could say to me is that i over worked for the week,how is that supposed to be my concern ?? did they not see me over working ? why did they not alert me,now is time for me to get paid they are holding my money,someone should tell them to pay me my money i need to take care of my self nd my family for the past 2 days now we hv no food and no money for rent that’s why i spent all this hours working to get the money i needed now they are not wanting to pay me,
terrible company! the driver did not show up. he canceled trip and charged me. i contacted uber. they said they would refund me. they did not! i will never use them again!

Review Title: We need to rid the uk of Uber
Review Body: we need to rid the uk of uber. used to be good but now awful. advertise one rate and then double it when they take it from the card. driver was speeding too - doing 50 in a 30. only got a half refund when i threatened to go to the police.

Review Title: Time for the government to step in and make Uber provide more structure!
Review Body: i get uber does all they can to save on overhead.  but not having customer support accounts for most of their issues.  in fact i have no doubt if they did have customer service many of then issues other have had including myself would have been quickly resolved.  i also think for ethical reasons they should be required to have 24 hours customer service.  not to mention it would bring a sense of accountability to all the drivers.  my issue however has always been billing.  be it using gift cards, or my card not working even though there is plenty of money there.  nothing more frustrating than counting on using the service only to find out last minute your getting a payment error code!  clearly they are a cheap company who only cares about making money.  this is one business in need of some serious government oversight and regulations!

Review Title: I’ve been driving for Uber for 4 years…
Review Body: i’ve been driving for uber for 4 years now. and they keep raising the prices of the rides for the passengers but they continuously keep lowering the fares for us the drivers and the gas prices keep going up. not only that their costumer services can never fix any issues you might find while using the app. i used to love driving for uber but they’re not what they advertise they keep 50 percent of the fare and i have proof of it. it’s very sad

Review Title: Why does anyone ever use uber
Review Body: why does anyone ever use uber, their drivers always refuse fares, possibly the most over hyped useless services around

Review Title: Don't give permission to cancel ride by driver without any reason
Review Body: facing issue since long. i whenever i try to book cab, cab drivers asks my destination and cancels the ride without any hesitation. sometimes even without asking they are cancelling. uber service is going poor day by day. waited 1 hour but not found any suitable ride.

Review Title: The most f****g useless company I’ve…
Review Body: the most f****g useless company i’ve ever seen. constant cancellation of service. long wait time. rude drivers. total waste of time

Review Title: Good morning! I have a complaint to your company and the driver of car number 771929. I called a taxi, lost time, as a result, I did not receive a PIN to confirm the trip and the driver kicked me out
Review Body: good morning! i have a complaint to your company and the driver of car number 771929. i called a taxi, lost time, as a result, i did not receive a pin to confirm the trip and the driver kicked me out of the car and deleted this trip.  it’s not my fault that i didn’t get the pin and i was late for work. and for this trip they debited money from the account

Review Title: left my cell phone on the backseat of…
Review Body: left my cell phone on the backseat of an uber. can not contact the driver without a phone. have sent multiple emails and just getting the runaround. bad customer service. no phone number to try and call. now have to buy a new phone cause cant contact the driver to get my property back got zero help

ordered a car, got a text 12 minutes, 20 minutes later, no cab phoned uber, told my money would be refunded. had to disturb a relative and contact the coach company and say i could not make it, they kindly replied they would wait whilst i made other arrangements, relative kindly got us to the coach and we were able to have our holiday, on the return trip we contacted a company “carlton cars” prompt pick up, polite driver .

the order never arrived

on two occasions now we have placed orders with sabirs via uber the first time it arrived 25 mins later that it was supposed to. the driver told me he had two other deliveries before mine which he was delivering for a local takeaway (not uber) when the food finally arrived it was cold, giving them the benefit of doubt thinking it was a one off of we ordered through them again today on a priority order and it didn't arrive at all although uber was telling me it has i phoned the takeaway and got nothing but a bit of back chat telling me how the order had been sent out twice with uber drivers. i kept getting messages so and so is taking care of your order now then a few seconds later i would get another message saying so and so is taking care of your order and then finally uber was showing a chap named rashid was on the way to me with my order and a few seconds later i got a message saying enjoy your order but the order never arrivedi contacted uber but still no response from them and i have been charged. i then had to order through someone else

i've been using uber services consistently for over 7 years. most of the drivers are rude and the restaurants through ubereats have gotten so bad, food be wrong or not good and it shouldn't be that way with how much it costs!

i have booked 2 ubers on 2 different occasions and confirmed and excepted and both times driver is a minute away and has cancelled on me. i booked an uber 15/09 was told 6 minutes suddenly 2 mins to go cancelled by driver booked another uber obviously price increased was told 9 minutes waited after 7 minutes checked the app still said 9 minutes phoned driver said will be there in 2 minutes. waited 15 minutes rang driver refused my calls and went to cancel uber were charging me £6.00 i think it has grown to big and their service is absolutely useless and i think they should be thrown out of uk and we show go back to normal taxis. speaking to other people they have had the same experience. i waited 30 minutes and no uber i finally ordered a mini cab it came in 2 mins paid couple of pounds extra but at least came.
uber you are absolutely useless

Review Title: A-hole Uber drivers have no right…
Review Body: a-hole uber drivers have no right rating my worth as a human being over nothing but where i need to be picked up despite me waiting politely & considerately for the jerk to arrive.

terrible service, do not schedule bookings, uber will cancel and tell you no available drivers then when you try to book at the time the price doubles, complete rip off and now late for hospital appointment.

Review Title: Uber is great until you have a customer…
Review Body:
uber is great until you have a customer service issue ... a driver in chicago failed to pick us up, than lied and said he drove us to the airport. uber billed me to spite my multiple customer service claims explaining what happened.

the customer service feel like a robot that does not understand what has happened. a huge frustrating waste of time and $4x.xx

probably half my rides have ever pick me up on time they are allowed to cancel trips when they are literally a hundred feet from picking me up there are picking rides good they have no way they can make on time and they already have a 10-minute leeway but they picked the end of the leeway to judge their time which is usually wrong if the customer cancels he gets charged but if ever cancels the customer gets screwed there are actually a pretty pathetic company and should have more control over their drivers that should not allow these kind of things to happen to their customers especially one that spends $70 a day to go back and forth to work you should have reliable service i usually tip very well from this day forward if you're late you get zero tips and 1 star

Review Title: Uber take booking then cancel at will?
Review Body:
i used uber on saturday for only the 2nd time and it was very frustrating. it appears that the driver or uber have the right to cancel a booked cab at will?
it took 3 attempted to get a car and it was up to me (th customer) to keep an eye on there behaviour for some reason

Review Title: Quoted me one price then added…
Review Body:
quoted me one price then added additional fees and my driver would not follow the map. paid $3 dollars more.

they will get you. i should of used lyft. at least the price quoted would have been what it says it cost.

Review Title: Politically active in a way that isn't…
Review Body: politically active in a way that isn't appropriate for car companies. used to be an uber driver...not i avoid it altogether.

Review Title: Not that this will be picked up..
Review Body:
not that this will be picked up... because it is obvious it won't!

shocking... booked in advance (a day before) and then right before collection they "couldn't find a driver so cancelled my trip". fortunately my colleague booked one immediately but as it was to another location i still missed my train!!! had to get another driver from that location, nearer... probably the first time he'd driven in the city. even with the use of ways... wrong lanes meaning unnecessary hold ups. a 6min journey too 45mins! but at least this one turned up.

still, train missed!!!! nice one 👍🏼

had worst experiences with uber drivers, who cancel the trip as soon as they get to know the drop-point location. they have a tendency to genuinely waste your time, absolutely miserable and unethical services. shut down uber. shut down your fake services.

Review Title: The driver did not lift a finger to…
Review Body: the driver did not lift a finger to help us load the suitcases into the car, and i am a disabled person. he was standing next to me and was smiling. the car was terribly dirty and the light upholstery darkened with various stains.

Review Title: Never met a single Uber driver who’s at…
Review Body: never met a single uber driver who’s at least know how to be polite. shame on the quality of this poor low rating company. pathetic.

Review Title: Uber has gotten extremely bad in my…
Review Body: uber has gotten extremely bad in my area which is denver. the wait times keep getting bigger (probably because the drivers are underpaid and are ditching the service) and the prices keep climbing up.

i ordered an uber on sunday. it showed up as being 12 minutes away. i watched it counting down to 1 minute when i was told that the driver had cancelled. i had to start the process over again and the same thing happened. after 4 failed attempts i eventually succeeded in getting a cab via bolt. this seems to happen with uber on a regular basis and they can't be relied upon. i met a friend at the end venue who told me that she had pre-booked an uber earlier that morning. it failed to turn up and they ended up having to take a train, uber are a disgrace and don't deserve their licence. i won't be using them again.

Review Title: Have booked a Car for a business trip…
Review Body: have booked a car for a business trip at 0700 in the morning and when they should arrive i got a mail no driver available! that s a no go for such a big company, better to book a local taxi driver maybe more expensive but will move me to the target

Review Title: If uber don't have command on the…
Review Body: if uber don't have command on the driver. driver always ask to cancel the trip because they want only offline drive cancel the uber ride we will go by offline.if you are disagree then they will will not go anywhere and talk like a very bad.if uber want to improve the services.kindly ask to those driver after reach to th location how ride automatically cancel.worst service ever i faced this issue 5 to 6 times with uber.

horrible company.  i scheduled a ride to the airport.  uber never showed up, despite confirming my upcoming scheduled ride 30 i’m tired prior to pickup time.  10 minutes after the pickup time the app informed me there were no drivers in the area, leaving me to scramble for a last minute desperation attempt to get to the airport.  i nearly missed my flight.  why would a company allow you to schedule a transportation, confirm that transportation, and then inform you once it’s too late to make other arrangements their failure of their service??? app deleted, never again

Review Title: We had the worst driver in Perth on…
Review Body: we had the worst driver in perth on saturday night. 🤬

use to be food service in my area, but not any more. this is the second time i've been late for my train because the wait for a driver to arrive is too long. i have been trying to get a driver to pick me up and drop me off my station for 20 min! will not be using this service again
app showed ‘finding a driver’ for 15 minutes. i cancelled. charged me £6. rubbish.

Review Title: I am 74 years old and I need a ride in…
Review Body:
i am 74 years old and i need a ride in a sedan, not a minivan, van, or suv.

i cannot find a way to tell uber that. i am most disappointed that they don't have a customer service phone number on their app.

they need a way that riders can have a profile with their specifications as to the vehicle that picks them up.

i'd also like to have a way to request my favorite drivers.

uber is not flexible and it is not easy to use for all of us.

and they do not pay their drivers well.

this is just my opinion based on my observations. their drivers are some of the most lazy, ingnorant and unsafe drivers around. i haved on several occasions their drivers making illegal u turns because they're too lazy to drive around the block to turn around. and in the process have nearly caused accidents, hit parked cars and have nearly backed up and have hit pedestrians. and to top it off have an i don't give a crap attitude if you say something to them about it. i don't know if this is a nationwide problem. but it happens a lot in downtown syracuse ny.

Review Title: Unreliable service as drivers pick and choose
Review Body: ordered a uber, got sent car reg and could see vehicle tracking. waited 10 mins with 4 mins left. all of a sudden it tells me no car allocated and then i get a new car another 15 minutes away. while waiting my original car turns up and collects someone else, obviously thought it was a better fare so cancelled mine. rang uber and told drivers can do what they want and basically told by kyle in the philippines they didn’t care and i should ring back later when my new journey is complete. last time i use uber and will convert to a competitor!

Review Title: I booked an uber 4 hours before pick…
Review Body: i booked an uber 4 hours before pick up. 10 mins before arrival i got an email saying no drivers available and i need to re book. i re booked for a later time then the same happened again. this service is sooo poor!!!! it will leave you stranded if they don't fancy taking the trip at the last minute. use normal local taxis at least they turn up!!!!!

Review Title: The trip and driver were fine but the…
Review Body: the trip and driver were fine but the “pickup spot” function was very confusing, leading me to walk several blocks unnecessarily. needs to be fixed.

Review Title: As an older person who booked a car to…
Review Body:
as an older person who booked a car to take me to the station late in the evening i was left stranded having received a message at the last minute telling me that no driver was available. this was after they had sent a acknowledgment accepting my booking earlier in the day.
i will never use them again and will never recommend them.

my husband and i took a 25 min drive to the airport with uber.  the price quoted was not the price we were charged!  uber added a 'wait time' (we waited, not the driver), an "airport facility charge of #3.25 (we wer dropped off at departures likes everyone else), a $2.65 charge for a tunnel we didn't take and a booking fee of $2.35!  the quoted fare was $29.60 and we ended up being charged $38.20!  use lyft!

Review Title: Never will be using this again
Review Body: never will be using this again! 1st time experience, i will tell you how i got this taxi! well i was waiting for a taxi and the taxi driver was asking me if i was going to loanhead i said yes bit i never booked one he told me to get in anyway i said its ok i will wait for one, then 2 young people come and my friend was suggesting i shared i said it was fine ill get one but they said it was fine. but they said to come anyway! i know u pay uber before u go in so i gave the nice people £20 for taking me in the taxi with them due to knowing that u pay before you book! when he dropped us off the taxi driver was so abusive and demanding more money as he said he was nice enough to accept me as a extra person the other 2 said no as they already paid and doesnt say how many people so we got out anyway but the taxi driver followed me saying madam, madam give me money u give me more money i ended up giving him more money as he was freaking me out by following me

i use uber regularly and majority of the time i would recommend them to people.
on friday 27th august i ordered an uber from outside london to bring me home to london, the time was around 11.30 pm again i have used uber for this reason many times.
1. the ride was accepted, i waited at the usual pick up point.
the driver calls me from another place and complains i was wrong in my information, i told him politely this is the normal information i give and he complained for about four minutes, i told him please i am shattered and just want to get home.
he did not respond,i was saying hello about four times before i ended the call.
2. he did come to collect me, as soon as i got in the car he started complaining about the ride, that he should have cancelled the ride, no driver would take that journey this time of the night, i asked him to turn the music down he did not, this man went on and on trying to get a response from me, he then asked how many other drivers have cancelled on me,
i told none, this seemed to make him more angry,
3. i did not respond to him as felt he would be wicked enough to cancel the ride and why this time we were nearly on the motor way,
i believe he would have left me on some country lane.
4. so i endured the journey.
