5. when we arrived at my destination i got out the car without saying a word, and when i got inside my home, i gave a review.

so you can imagine my surprise and anger when i received an email from uber that the driver reported i did not wear a mask for the whole journey, what a liar. i always where my mask,no one has ever had to request of me to put a mask on.

so if he can lie like this.
i know he would have left me on a country lane if i had responded to his rudeness all the way during the ride to my home.

then to top it all cannot respond directly to uber as there site will only let you respond to certain complaints.

am absolutely disgusted that someone can lie like this.
the first thing i do before i get on transport be it bus, train, taxi, uber is put mu mask on.
evil person. very evil.

Review Title: driver picked up a different person
Review Body: driver picked up a different person, then changed route for the new person (much longer) charging to me a lot of money, no way to get refund, and still had to pay a taxi to reach my home

Review Title: Very rarely have a good experience
Review Body:
very rarely have a good experience. mostly overpriced. some terrible experience examples:
taxi said it had arrived and it hadn't, was charged, couldn't get money back.
driver tipped themselves without my authorisation impossible to report this or get a refund.
customer service diabolical to no existent.

Review Title: I have had a iPhone stolen by the…
Review Body: i have had a iphone stolen by the driver. i have had uber lie and kept saying give us some time.  this has been since april2021.  don’t have an apology, a refund, a discount, or no other compensation for what i went through to get my work phone back.  a feeling of insult and abuse by a company that doesn’t care about you.  i still use the service until i get my own car but know they are not trustworthy.

useless, constant fluctuating fares, never any drivers to pick me up, received  an alert stating the driver had complained i was not wearing a mask when i was, whenever a car is sent to my home they always wait on the other side of the main road putting us in a dangerous situation and charging me whilst waiting for us to cross the road trying to avoid lorries, buses and cars.

Review Title: Complete waste of time and money
Review Body: if i could give less stars i would. apparently an uber x can only take 3 people. does not specify this on the app. i have since been charged 2 cancellation fees as the drivers cancelled the journey on me. i have then had to pay £60.00 for a 45 min journey. called customer services who were beyond rude and unhelpful will never be using the uber ride or uber eats services again.

Review Title: Uber Kenya customer service is terrible!!!
Review Body: customer service in uber kenya is useless! i had a driver that did not end the trip and i ended up with a ridiculous bill which i was to pay before using the app again. i contacted customer care severally for weeks and all they say is they will get back to me. not once has a person from uber contacted me after 2 months of waiting. i later learned that there are better apps there, namely bolt & little.

Review Title: Really wanted to talk to a person over something.
Review Body: i was trying to get a hold of some form of customer service to ask about a charge. had to end up getting a slight refund over talking to someone. really annoyed cause it wasn't mine or the drivers fault. just wanted to know what was going on with the charge. ridiculous i couldn't talk to a person.

ive used this service loads, probably hundreds of times. some drivers are great and some are terrible though most of the time theyre adequate. as long as they arent aggressive, on the phone when theyre driving and as long as we get from a to b im all fine

Review Title: I would love to give -10 stars
Review Body: i would love to give -10 stars. i arranged a trip to the airport a month in advance and the driver canceled on me at the time they were supposed to arrive. the next driver was almost an hour away and i couldn’t take a chance on them canceling at the last minute as well. so i canceled my trip and they charged me a fee. i ended up driving to the airport.

Review Title: I wish I could have given a zero…
Review Body: i wish i could have given a zero rating. i requested an uber for me and my daughter. they forward the information. vehicle type, color brown, and the plate number. a black vehicle pulls up with the correct plate #. i assumed i had read it wrong, and mistakingly read brown. we get in the vehicle, and the driver is not wearing a mask. he never put one on the whole ride. i did not say anything,  because not knowing this person, i didn't want to get into any type of dispute. he's following the gps, and then we hit some traffic.  he began getting irritated and took a quick turn to go a different way. at which time we hit even more traffic.the whole time he was on his cell phone with his wife. of course there is no live person to file this complaint with, so i filed this online through the uber appstating ubers policy is that it's mandatory to wear a mask. this is a safety issue, and our health has been put at risk. they replied that they would contact the driver and tell him he needs to wear a mask at all times. they will review the situation to see if he should be allowed to access uber any longer. unfortunately, they will not reimburse for the ride! worst customer service ever!

Review Title: I have very bad experience with Uber…
Review Body:
i have very bad experience with uber 😞..the drivers first accept the request and after making the passengers wait for some time call the customers and ask for drop location.if the location not beneficial to them they ask the client to cancel the ride and if the customer do not cancel the ride they send abusive msg to the customer and also delete there chat records and then cancel the ride.either they visit the location and start the ride without calling the customer showing that the ride is started and the customer is uncessary penalised for this.even the customer support doesn't even attempt to call the customer to understand the issue and get them penalised in their next rides.
uber is fraud

Review Title: Absolute rubbish if I could give no…
Review Body:
absolute rubbish if i could give no stars i would.

avoid at all costs, you have to set up a payment method before you can request a trip (no other company does this) they take a pound when you request a car and then after about 5 minutes say there are no drivers, i did this 3 times before i realise they tale £1 each time and never send a car.

uber where great during lockdown 2020 but now the worst taxi company around and have increased prices by at least 20%. last year an uber package to my sisters (2 minutes away) was £3 (perfectly reasonable) but today they wanted £3.50 for the same trip and after 3 attempts i have deleted the app and gone with a local taxi firm.

Review Title: Ordered an Uber the night before an…
Review Body: ordered an uber the night before an early morning flight.  10 minutes after the prescheduled pickup time i received a notice that no drivers available!  had to drive myself to airport and will now pay about $400 for a 14 day trip!  uber is no longer reliable!

Review Title: Use a Taxi or Try Lyft
Review Body: my driver went to the wrong location and then i got charged for their mistake. i asked for a refund and it credited me uber cash. i don't want uber cash as i never want to use this terrible company again. their is no us phone support line. their only options for refunds are credits..... this company was terrible under the previous ceo and has gotten even worse since.

there is never a car when you need one. lazy drivers, very money hungry.
not recommended, use taxis instead.

Review Title: some uber drivers will make you wait…
Review Body: some uber drivers will make you wait and then cancels the ride. i've waited 25mins before this driver to cancel my ride. if we riders get charged for cancelling then drivers should get the penalty too for wasting the riders time!

requested a ride to the hospital, driver (who was lovely and only saving grace) arrived and advised there was no destination in the app, i checked and for some reason there wasn’t…how is this possible?? - if i hadn’t put a destination at the time of the booking how could i have ordered the journey without telling them where i was going??. how could my destination be my home/pick up location?? as a result uber double charged me - from where the driver was to my home and then from my home to my destination (!!) and refused to help when i wrote to them to explain what happened - lots of excuses for the sake of stealing 12 extra pounds. never again. thieves.

i was recently charged without even taking the trip! their driver asked for phone number on call and started the trip without me, then uber cuts inr 300 and even after complaining several times, they are refusing to refund.

Review Title: For some reason my app said my driver…
Review Body: for some reason my app said my driver was a minute away. i didn't get a notification, so i checked and saw a message that he arrived, i texted i'm on my way out. as soon as i stepped outside, he looked at me and left. so i'm stranded and i was charged 10.91 the cost of the trip that i did not take .julio, your karma will come back to you. i will never use or recommend this service. bad business uber.

Review Title: Went to go get in the taxi and the…
Review Body: went to go get in the taxi and the driver drove off and cancelled the taxi from his side and still had the nerve to charge after waiting so long to speak to a manager they said there was nothing they could and would note the feedback best to use a different company because these drivers are scammers and have learnt a way to scam customers extra money
anything under £10 drivers won't accept job and when you do get a driver it's 15-20 minutes away

Review Title: Only giving a one star tonight
Review Body: only giving a one star tonight. so not happy with uber delivery. i placed an order for my minor child. the order was taken, and a driver was there to pick it up. the order showed that it was ready for pick up. well, as my little one was waiting for her food, it never arrived, she fell asleep because the wait was extremely long. i contacted uber support. they told me a bs story that the restaurant closed and it wasn’t their fault. well, then why did it show that a driver was picking it up? i only pay for uber because there are a couple restaurants that door dash doesn’t have. no need foe me to pay for 2 delivery options of one doesn’t stand by their deliveries. if you can’t deliver, don’t show me that the driver is picking it up. problem is, uber has merged with postmates who was the worst ever service. they use to pick up the food, cancel it and when i called the restaurant the restaurant told me that it was picked up . what a scam. the restaurant was then out of the money. restaurants then won’t work with uber or postmates because they lose money. please screen your employees a lil better. so easy to get a job, pick up an order and then cancel and eat their food. i know employers take. chance on employees. just don’t bs the customers when they call in to ask wth happened to their food.

Review Title: Drivers only respond if the trip suits…
Review Body:
drivers only respond if the trip suits them. tried ordering a taxi on more than one occasion. to see cars available but then drivers reject my request because it doesnt suit them. resulting in me having to walk home at 1.20am in the morning.

very poor service.

i just had a very bad customer care experience.
i had a very bad experience with a driver where i felt very uncomfortable and unsafe, the driver was extremely rude and i was scared.
i have reached out to the customer service a few times and they didn’t do anything about it.

Review Title: If I could have given zero stars
Review Body: if i could have given zero stars, i would have. i scheduled a ride with uber the day before i was supposed to go to the airport. no one showed up at the designated time. i got a message saying no drivers were available, even though i had scheduled a ride. i’ll never go with uber again and i’ll tell my friends and family not to ride with them either.

the worst taxi company ever!!! every single time you deal with uber taxi you will have an issue with them! today i been kicked out of the vehicle because driver released that he have picked up wrong person and i left standing in middle of the road :(

Review Title: We booked Uber the night before for…
Review Body: we booked uber the night before for 8.05 - 8.15 the next morning. at 8.12 that morning uber emailed me saying that the car was cancelled. the driver went to 135 and no one was in. we were at 264, no one phoned or emailed me to see where we were. and uber charged me £8 for the cancellation. i don’t think i will be using uber again.

uber was fine until recently, i was at the correct pick up point and driver claimed he was there when he was not. i spoke on the phone and even had the door staff at the venue confirm we were all looking and couldn't see him. i assume it was him that has left me a bad review because since that happened if i try to book i can rarely connect to drivers and on the occasions that i have the drivers have cancelled on me. total waste of space.
i've gone back to a local taxi company instead and even though they charge slightly more the drivers are all friendly and prompt (and are actually waiting where they say they are) so i'm sticking with them. cheers for that uber, think you should check that your drivers aren't total twits before you hire them.

absolutely disgusting organisation.  exploiting cheap labour while they make billions. there's a reason they are court all the time, they are unethical.  drivers are driving for less than they were 25 years ago with these, despite the cost of living and everything else going through the roof.  delete delete

Review Title: Driver took wrong turn and made us pay for it
Review Body: driver took a wrong turn and made our journey 20 minutes longer, assuring us he wouldn’t charge us for the error, he did. after contacting uber complaints they still didn’t refund the portion of the journey taken by error. shocking customer service.

uber keeps sending me riders with a pickup drive of 30 minutes without any ideas how long the riders are going and they expect me to accept those trips.

how will i accept a trip when i have to drive 30 minutes to pickup riders only for the drivers to be going to 8 minutes drive. i did not drive 30 minutes just to make $3.47.

if you then did not accept the trip, they’ll drop your acceptance rate and if you chooses to cancel the trip they’ll also drop your cancellation rate.

but when you pickup so many trips without canceling, they don’t increase your cancellation rate. very poor and lack of customer support for the drivers. no motivation whatsoever to keep driving for uber. i case that’s why most people are changing to drive for lyft.

you wait for ages, then a driver is supposed to come, then he cancels, etc.

not recommended

Review Title: Driver 20 minutes early resulting in fee
Review Body: needed a ride to the airport so we scheduled in advance. driver arrived over 20 minutes early and we got charged a fee for making the driver wait. they then cancelled on us before our allotted time slot and the fee was not waived. we had to wait for a new driver to get to the airport. not using uber again. i will use lyft or a taxi in the future. lyft has never let me down.

Review Title: I would put a zero if I could
Review Body: i would put a zero if i could. some uber driver named guillermo picked up my adult girls to take them to the publix in ft myers beach. he took them to the store and then he drop them back off at our resort. they tipped him and he left. after he left we discovered he charged $150 to my daughters credit card. he claims they had sand on his floorboard. number one sand  on a floorboard does not cost $150 to vacuum out and number two my girls had not yet been to the beach! if there was any sand from them walking on the street and getting in his car it would have been minimal. my daughter called uber and they backed this scammer. never trusting uber  again!! you’ve lost  customers uber, i hope no one else gets taken by this company!   update: after asking for a time stamp on the photos this guy had and being denied them, uber refunded the $150. my suggestion is any time you use something like this take photos before and after of the vehicle you enter. sad world we’re living in today …

Review Title: Uber driver stole my phone says he'll…
Review Body: uber driver stole my phone says he'll mail it back refusing to answer any calls or txt now. customer service is impossible to get a hold of  dont use uber! ig i'll be using lyft now.

i booked a ride at 7:00am to get to work (7 mile ride).
my driver arrived at 7:24am!!!! i was late for work.
this was my first time and last time to use uber

uber has become a thief!!!!
the charges are ridiculous! how on earth can a $27 ride be $80? i have been noticing these abnormal changes for last many weeks and i wasn’t sure what’s going on. then i checked and uber claims there is not many drivers around hence this “abnormal” charges. i do not know what changed this summer that uber do not have enough drivers for their rides! it’s summer and evening rides are common like every year and i do not believe there are limited number of drivers which uber claims to charge these abnormal rates. i believe it’s just ripping off it’s customers. such a thug! everyone should boycott uber!
terrible! money chasing. had cabs booked and after realising they can get more money, no drivers are available and the price tripled! do not use!

Review Title: The driver stole my package she was…
Review Body: the driver stole my package she was hire to deliver it and she refused to give it to me is a $100.00 value package she dosent answer or nothing on top uber dosent get back to me and dosent refund the trip that was supposed to deliver my package so it been stole by one of uber drivers that ubet support ans let her still working like nothing ever happened people be aware

we booked our uber well in advance to take us to the airport at 6am on a sunday morning.
when booking our estimated cost was $32 which we thoughts a was reasonable price because the airport was 28 minutes away at that time of the morning.
when we received confirmation that our driver was outside ready to pick us up, the cost went to $82 , we had no choice but to accept this as we had a flight to catch. when we were dropped off at the airport i looked at the app after the driver had left and it said that we were charged $112.00 . it seems that that the driver had charged us 3x the normal rate!! when i looked into this, the information supplied by uber said that we “ could be charged up to 3x the normal rate for busy time’s “ to attract drivers to that area. i find it difficult to believe that at 6am on a sunday morning would be classed as a busy time. this is our first experience with uber, and we will be deleting the app and not using it again.

Review Title: If you have more than 1 kid
Review Body: if you have more than 1 kid. the drivers will discriminate against you and cancel the ride. drivers have been lying on me saying i’m not wearing a mask. just to cancel the ride because they see me with my 3 kids

Review Title: Unreliable with constant cancellations and fair increases
Review Body: i have been a loyal customer from the beginning and find most drivers fantastic. lately in the last month the service has been unreliable and horrible. constant cancellations, app not working properly (leaving me without a confirmation and the driver circulating around the block, followed by charging  me for extra time) the most recent trend is constant cancellation of bookings or increasing the fare ride to a ridiculous amount. my longest time trying to get a cab has been 1.5 hours

Review Title: wait and wait to be connected to a…
Review Body:
wait and wait to be connected to a driver and when you are, tge driver cancels.
this has happened on numerous occasions.
absolute joke
way too expensive. they can tip their own drivers at $53 for 10 miles.

Review Title: Had 3 canceled ubers in a row
Review Body: had 3 canceled ubers in a row only 2 min away. yet we get hit with cancelation charges but the drivers don't, for canceling just minutes away.

Review Title: 20+ minute waiting times and driver cancellations
Review Body: 20+ minute waiting times, and then drivers can cancel even after 20 min wait with no repercussions…. making you wait another 20 minutes. happens often. charges you cancellation fees that don’t even cancel your ride so you get charged again. use a different service, you’ll regret using uber and have an unpleasant experience.

Review Title: I booked an Uber to be picked up
Review Body: i booked an uber to be picked up, was confirmed and i waited and waited. no follow ups when arriving. i get a notice on my uber app trip canceled and a 6.25 charge, no number to be found to talk to someone about this situation. no one called, though they have your number. darwin was my driver. when in app they only give you certain things to dispute a fee for. i think the driver didn’t want to deal with the traffic and road construction and the fee for the trip wasn’t enough for any extra effort.

what is the point????ordered an uber way in advance . ordered at 11pm for a 5:05-5:15 for me, my hubby, and my elderly in laws an xl to get to our location! watched the map. driver was 11 minutes away. we waited.  5:05 comes, nothing,  showing closer, then status changes to picking up soon. 5:10 comes,  5:15, 5:20! then it pops up stating there are no xl's available! what the hell??  no way to contact driver!!!! i tried ordering again  because we had to leave to make it to or destination. so i would like to thank uber for showing me and everyone i know not to trust uber!! lost alot of customers when theuy find out.  i've am so very frustrated barely made it and had to take our car!don't use uber! never again!!!

awful experience! extremely rude driver who almost bumped into another car. i escalated the situation a couple of times just for uber romania to ask me twice to send them my details even if i already did and no one bothered to reply. bye bye, uber! see you never. i will never be your customer, i advice people to go for others apps.

different drivers cancel more than 5 times, some accept the ride when they are 12 minutes away and still cancel mid-way . and no customer service whatsoever. i don't understand why this exists and costs money, better off walking.
rubbish. booked a ride 3 hours before and went on the app 15 mins before to see and no drivers available. late for the appointment in which i had

Review Title: No prices given-no notice of driver coming
Review Body:
tried to schedule a ride. no price was given. uber app said price would appear when driver confirmed. it didn’t. tried to cancel, but since it was a scheduled trip, it didn’t show in my trips. looked like it wasn’t scheduled. got a message from a driver he was there. there was no notice beforehand. had to pay cancellation fee of $21 for nothing. there was no apparent notice of driver and no easy way to confirm trip or cancel. this trip did not show in mytrips.

the fee for the ride not given until the driver was a doorstep was $454 or about $150/hour.

this is an awful service.
no prices
no confirmation text/email
no notices
no way out of cancellation fee for an unknown ride

when uber started you paid what the app showed you.
nowadays i get a bill with a basic rate, and you pay extra for the time the uber drives. last time i used uber the driver made a detour and i couldnt figure out why as i though the rate was fixed. now i had to pay an extra 15 euros above the rate for the time spend in uber.

2 uber rides ago i had to pay twice for the same drive.

uber went from awesome to a huge scam.

i will never order an uber anymore, as there are more cheaper options nowadays.

if i could give zero stars i would.
my partner booked an uber to go shopping, the app took the payment from her bank and then she recieved a notification that there are no drivers available, now she has to wait 3 working days for a refund. we rang customer service and they were no help at all, we asked for the uber and was told we would have to pay for it if there is a driver available. when we explained we cannot afford to pay for another uber when we have already paid for 1 already, she replied with "is there anything else i can help you with".
we will not be using uber services anymore and i recommend that other people stick to their own local taxi company and "just eat" services.

avoid at all costs!
wanted to add a stop on the app but wouldn't work driver suggested creating a new trip after we arrived at the first drop off followed his advice and got charged £17.59 to travel 1.52 miles onto the final destination, you can't complain they make it too difficult

uber ride. absolutely disgusting service. 5 trips where a driver has either accepted the job and to take me on my faired journey for them to either cancel my ride at the last minute or decide to taken on other jobs before getting to me . i use uber ride 5days a week and have found the service to be disgusting. i’ve been consistently late for work as i’ve missed trains due to the disgraceful service.

i can't believe that yesterday after an event, none of the uber drivers could reach a place as public as the bbva stadium, they all canceled and to end up being a bad service, they charged me a cancellation fee, i downloaded the lift application and in less than expected, the driver was at the place. very bad service, i don’t know if is the uber app or the drivers ….

Review Title: Nothing based off of drivers but you…
Review Body: nothing based off of drivers but you pay a large amount for a small drive sometimes and wait longer than it would be to get in the car and drive yourself or even take the bus. it used to be better but prices have gone uo so much and made it worthless.

won't make this mistake again. twice, scheduled a car in advance for a morning flight, only to find that morning that the driver was scheduled to come 45 minutes later than requested, which was too late to make our flight. we had to scramble at the last minute to find a ride to the airport, which was an hour away. never again -- next time we'll schedule a cab or limo/towncar.
drivers constantly cancel. prices jump. pre-booking function is a waste of time

Review Title: Just Been waiting 30 mins for a Uber
Review Body: just been waiting 30 mins for a uber. paid the transaction and watched my driver as he was 10 mins away. all of a sudden just disappeared and told driver cancellation out of nowhere. thanks for leaving my wife in the rain because you obviously had a over priced ride somewhere else. would also appreciate my money back as well

we order a cab, wait for the cab, cab arrives cab driver says cab cancelled! no explanation no apologies.  middle aged couple  with their son. then another taxi firm turns up for the order but cannot tell us how much. we grabbed a black cab. don't bother with user, bad service,  bad attitude.

Review Title: Uber is the sketchiest taxi company
Review Body:
uber is the sketchiest taxi company. if you ever have a bad experience with a driver who is harassing you they do not have a phone number to call direct there is no number you never talk to an actual person
you feel totally and unsafe the fact that they don't have your security in their best interest

when the driver cancels, you get charged a cancellation fee. that makes no sense! i tried to call the driver to figure out what was going on, since he seemed lost. he wouldn’t answer, and instead cancelled the ride, which i then got charged for.
very bad app! the drivers always need more time because the navigation is very bad.  we cancel every second ride because the driver takes the wrong way. never again !!!
horrible, the driver didnt explain the meeting point , came 30’ late, declined to drive and charged a cancellation fee

Review Title: Taxi driver ran a red light and almost…
Review Body: taxi driver ran a red light and almost crashed into me because he was inpatient and didn't want to wait then he had to wait behind a bus  so he tried to cut me up and say it was my fault while i had it all on dashcam do you lot just employ anyone? then i put in a complaint for a serious offence (dangerous driving) and running a red light uber customer service just basically brushed it off this happened in birmingham uk

Review Title: The Most Disloyal and Uncaring Company to Drive for!
Review Body: my credentials before uber deactivated my account: trips-over 15,000, rating-4.97, reached professional driver level status 2 years ago, hired over 5 years ago, averaged between 70-80 trips a week (sometimes more), and to top that off, when the covid-19 pandemic started, worked everyday up to the end of august, while a lot of other drivers decided not to, and i'm 61 years old, and at this age, i was definitely risking my life. would rather work then rely on the gov't. despite all this, uber could not wait for this old man to get any blemish on his record. which is what happened to me. at or around the end of august, after being off work for about 2 hours driving earlier that day for uber, i was mistakenly arrested at my home...they got the wrong person, which is why i got the charges dropped not too long after that. that night, i made bail, and the next morning uber fired me. even showed them the document from the d.a.'s office showing charges were dropped, but that still wasn't enough for uber. i proved my loyalty to uber, thought maybe they would show some to me. sounds a bit like age discrimination, 61 is too risky for uber to hold on to.

uber cheats you with referrals, offers you up to $ 1000 for referring people to drive uber but they do not process their data or create issues for 90 days and then activate the driver you referred but they do not pay you your incentive for passing the date to receive $$$$
not worth waste of timelyft app is perfect vs uber i have a lot to say customer support very poorfrom              uber driver

Review Title: It’s the lack of drivers for me
Review Body: it’s the lack of drivers for me. working people depend on uber to get them to and from with in a reasonable time for a reasonable price. the fact that they take the money off the card before the driver even arrive is beyond me for them to be able to cancel at anytime. i don’t know what to say other than why put taxis out of business if your company isn’t a reliable source of transportation.

Review Title: Myself and 3 others arrived in Glasgow…
Review Body:
myself and 3 others arrived in glasgow on friday for a long weekend. we had a few things organised and had to rely on taxis to get us there. we decided to use uber as it seemed very easy to book. what a shock i got. every driver was foreign, and with the exception of 1 driver, fricking rude. i’m not racist but when you’re picked up from a driver that’s clearly not from this county that’s rude with a lack of basic manners you can’t help questioning why you would support there life over here. i will not be using uber again.
tossers

Review Title: Ive tried to use Uber 3 times
Review Body:
ive tried to use uber 3 times. twice the driver picks up the job then cancel. last night it said £28, 8 mins, 12 mins, 10 mins, then ‘we can’t cover the job, try again later’. i tried again £58
i used a black cab. £32
uber has gone hopeless. their services are very unprofessional. poor fleet of cabs and drivers.

one of the drivers deliberately took a route to the airport that double the time it should take and doubled the fare. when i complained they did nothing to explain what would happen to the driver and only gave me a 25% refund on a trip that cost double the state price. i'm disgusted with both their drivers ability to cheat customers and the company's willingness to let him.

how are you going to let a driver confirm my trip, ask me where i am going and then cancel because it’s too far. they chose this job they should be willing to drive me where i request. completely unprofessional and unreliable.

uber is unbelievable now. i ordered a there and back trip so my wife could bring my lunch to my work and then return home. halfway through, the driver cancelled the rest of the trip and left my wife stranded across town from our home. i have no idea how uber has justified raising the prices 25%-100%, depending on the time of day, when the service is so unbelievably ignorant of the customers needs. on top of that, there is no access to customer support from the app or the website or by phone! i have searched around and found that customer support still has a twitter account but to no avail. they are not replying. i would rate zero stars if i could.

driver showed up 15 minutes early and called me. i pleasantly told emmanuel that i would be out in five minutes, to which he responded “that’s too long i’m canceling your ride,” and took off. i was then thirty minutes late due to another person canceling on me and the next having a 13 minutes wait time (showing up forty five minutes after my original ride time.) in addition, aforementioned emmanuel said i was not wearing a mask when he sped off and didn’t even meet me, leading to penalization from uber, regardless of the fact that i am a healthcare worker that always wears my mask as a vaccinated individual. i will not be using this pis* poor service again. thanks for making me a half hour late to work.

work for uber driver,  have been waiting nearly 3 months for a response as to where half my missing payment is. 60 messages to support and all they answer is we will tell you when we get a response. it has now been well over 2 months, and they will not provide me with a number to contact anyone. awful employer, would not recommend at all.

absolute rip off.....got the usual journey into manchester from my home for just over £10 as usual.
on the return indidnt realise until i got in that it was £26 odd for the same return journey?
i asked the driver ,he said it was uber and nothing to do with him....
then you try getting any sort of contact apart from the multiple choice that has nothing to do with price or discrepancies . then shuts off.

made to rip off .....avoid at all costs

Review Title: The scheduled ride feature is an…
Review Body: the scheduled ride feature is an absoloute farce. in london fare surges hit everytime so when it's time for your scheduled drivers to arrive drivers refuse the booking because it is not reflecting surge charges. absoloutely useless. i get a message saying unfortunately there are no drivers available last minute i have no choice but to book an uber on surge charges instead of booking a taxi company to pick up at a reduced cost which i would had done prior

Review Title: The app is getting  stupid expensive
Review Body: the app is getting  stupid expensive. been transferred from driver to driver for tweny minutes  and have to pay triple the fair been using uber for years...disappointing

while on vacation, my wife and i rode into town and then back, the rude there was very nice, the gentlemen spoke about history. the way back was totally different, the driver wanted to talk politics, very uncomfortable, and not agreeing with him, just want wanted to get back.

an absolute disgrace of an organisation. hadn't appreciated that when they give you a price and a pick up time it means nothing. they may pick you up if they feel like it but otherwise they will pretend there is a driver on their way but leave you waiting and the stranded. can't believe they have a licence to operate.

Review Title: Uber condones Verbal Harrassment, aggressive driving, and endangerment to passengers
Review Body:
unfortunately, i had a terrible experience with uber today. my fiancé and i forgot our masks in our hotel room. upon entering the vehicle of the uber driver, he requested and asked if we had masks. my fiancé responded that we did not & forgot ours but he would run to the front desk quick ( 1 minute) and would grab two for us and apologized. the uber driver did not allow us to exit the car and started pulling off. he then started aggressively verbalizing that we need mask and of the reasons for it. we then told him again, before exiting the parking lot, that we could exit the car and cancel our trip. he would not allow us to exit. he verbally said with an aggressive tone “ this is a general conversation. stop talking & listen”. i did not take this well as it was an inappropriate conversation and the tone was set from the start of the trip. he then continued to harass us regarding the trip. we made it known that we would like to exit the car immediately after he pulled out of the hotel parking lot. he sped over three lanes almost causing an accident and kicked us out of the car with inappropriate language and aggressiveness “ get out.”. we almost got hit getting out the car and then he almost hit us when he executed a uturn while rolling down his window to scream at us. i immediately reported the entire situation to uber support. not only did they responded with saying that my concerns/ comments are dully noted, they charged three dollars more the the fare price. the customer stopper team is the worst i’ve experienced in my lifetime. not only does uber support “ suck”.
uber, the company, condones verbal harassment, endangerment to passengers, and aggressive driving.

evidently, uber has so much business, they don't care about a good business model where customers are treated with respect and honesty.  tomorrow,  i will once again for the third time have to dispute an unauthorized monthly charge for an uber pass at $24.99.  uber drivers are, for the most part, great, but uber management sucks and they are costing their drivers money.  after much effort, i found uber executive emails online and notified them about repeatedly forcing the pass onto me.  of course, they could not be bothered to respond to a customer. i don't use uber enough to pay a monthly fee. i just want to pay for individual rides, but uber is taking that choice away from me, and from the research i have done, many other customers. everyone should check their accounts for an unauthorized uber pass.  appears that i cannot get an individual ride, unless i pay for a pass.  after filing another dispute, i am deleting my uber account.  i will go to lyft, taxis or just hoofing it.  uber has no conscience!  steal! steal! steal!

frustrating. my uber driver didn’t even drive to my road and then drove off in another direction for a few kilometres without cancelling and ignored calls. second time this has happened. i was waiting in the pick-up spot on time and was wearing a mask. terrible service which has made me late for work.

there is no way to report this on the app and customer service leaves you on hold for a long time so need to report here.

i have the driver details which i can forward.

Review Title: Trip price increased & driver was unable to get me to my destination
Review Body: i booked a trip from o2 arena to bazely street, which was quoted as £19. due to a tunnel closure, we sat in traffic for 1 hour and then the driver had to let us off at the same point he picked us up from (he was unable to get us to our destination). i have now been charged £31 for this trip which is insane!! i complained to uber and they say that as a "goodwill gesture", they will refund £10 to my account. so that brings the total price down to £21 for a ride which essentially did not happen. where is my refund?!!! disgusting that not only was my price altered and increased by uber, but also that i am being charged for a ride which did not happen.

Review Title: Uber has been absolutely shocking for…
Review Body: uber has been absolutely shocking for the last two days in manchester, booked many and all been cancelled due to no drivers in area but seen loads of  empty cars pass by us! was able to get one uber this morning but only dropped us half way to the destination with no explanation and said it was 10-15 minute walk away. had to walk in torrential rain tonight for 30 minutes trying to get back to the hotel as we were told by the lady from customer services there was nothing she could do for us. will never use uber again in manchester.

Review Title: Horrible in Vienna and very low service…
Review Body: horrible in vienna and very low service in bukarest due to many drivers cancellations.

Review Title: Dont't even THINK about using Uber
Review Body: dont't even think about using uber. seems almost every reviewer can't stand them. they missed a critical appointment of mine, then charged me for cancelling it, when the driver when to the wrong address! if you have an important appointment call them if you  plan to be 4 hours late! the drivers cancel low-fee trips when they get an opportunity to drive someone to an airport. their refund policy, to be "politically correct" is "extremely mentally challenged". fortunately, their stock is dropping!

Review Title: I was standing outside st marys…
Review Body: i was standing outside st marys hospital   with my 81 year old father who just had been discharged from hospital after 1 week still very frail  i waited more than 35 minutes as one driver accepted and then cancelled this was done 4 times i’m furious as every time it showed 1 minute away i’d bring my frail farther out in front of the hospital for the driver to cancel disgusting behaviour on über part

uber took my reservation for my trip to the airport. then they sent me a notice that my driver would be arriving the next day. the time expired and no driver - app kept saying - arriving soon. 10 mins later the app said no drivers and deleted the reservation. i had to call a local cab driver and he came and took us to the airport.

do not depend on uber for scheduled rides to airport.

i also sent a complaint into uber about the no show driver for my trip. they responded by refunding my fare from a ride on sunday that had nothing to do with the no show on monday. they appear to not only treat their passengers poorly, but their customer service does not bother to understand an issue and appears to not care if they take money from their drivers.

very poor company - horrible customer service - use at your own risk.

Review Title: Uber has no customer service they…
Review Body: uber has no customer service they charge you when driver cancel and you have to go in and dispute. driver will on slow nights except and never come so you cancel and get changed. and where do you call?  tell me if you can figure it out.

news flash uber eats drivers . not everyone tips on credit card they actually tip with cash and i literally wait for three uber drivers i know since they saw no tip on screen they dined it. well you lost the cash tip.

Review Title: Charged for rides which never arrived
Review Body: ordered an uber that never arrived so i cancelled it so i could order a second one. the second one never arrived so i cancelled that one to order a third one. that one never arrived so i ordered a fourth one, which eventually arrived and charged me considerably more than all of the previous fares on offer. in the end, i had to wait 1.5 hrs for an uber to arrive when it should have just taken minutes. to add insult to injury, uber refuse to refund what i spent on the rides which never arrived. so, in other words, if you, the customer, pay for a ride that doesn't show up, you, and not the driver, have to foot the bill. i emailed customer service to give them an opportunity to refund my purchases but they refused. i will not be using uber again and i would recommend others look elsewhere.

Review Title: I will delete the uber app
Review Body:
i will delete the uber app. there are much more trustworthy apps out there.
my last trip was the worst taxi experience of my life. i accepted the fare of £30 - and was charged £55. the driver was completely incompetent, couldn't speak english, smelled terribly and took the longest possible route - thereby adding £25 to my journey.

it is no wonder uber are being sued - they do not deserve to be in the uk!

Review Title: I booked and had accepted a driver who…
Review Body:
i booked and had accepted a driver who was enroute, inbound 8 minutes @ £22
uber cancelled ride a minute after and said rebook which i did straight away only to find it x 2 surge so £44
i complained and got told it is what it is!

for a supposedly friendly company who is trying to branch out that’s a dick thing to do.
i’m angry and disappointed!

really sucks. drivers cancel unapologetically leaving you stranded. then you get ridiculous charges when they cant find you. spent £8 just trying to get one to pick me up. one asked me to cancel because he was miles away. charged me for cancellation. then second one got lost and didn’t know where he was. had to cancel. charged me £6. hell withuber. this is constant now. a-holes.

scheduled a trip, no drivers available. move to exect and low and behold ones free.
dont bother with uber only money grabbing and book a taxi is a waste of timr

Review Title: They’re touch and go in the U.K
Review Body:
they’re touch and go in the u.k. some drivers are fabulous (like we had one yesterday who was totally ok with us taking a cat with us) but other times i’ve had drivers who don’t show up (they try and wait for 5m so they get a cancellation fee especially at the airport). and i had a driver once who said he would let me bring the cat in her box but then wanted me to dump it in the boot.

they need better policies around drivers who don’t show up and pets. but they are around half the price of addison lee or a third of the price of a black cab so it’s not all bad. plus they do seem to care more about the environment and their cars emissions more than any other taxi app.

Review Title: First family vacation post COVID - Never Again with Uber
Review Body:
first family vacation post covid. 6 am flight for my family of four. i scheduled in advance and confirmed a 4:30am pickup to the airport. been an uber customer since the.beginning, advocated foe them etc. standing in the driveway ready for pickup and the guy - no traffic mind you - indicates he will be at our house at 4:55. i’m forced to take our family car and park it at the airport for a week. ubers response? $20. i write back, and this is what they say - customer support fluff garbage. never again.

“ we're sorry to hear that your pickup experience did not go as expected. this is certainly not the kind of experience we want riders to have.

we completely understand you use uber because you want a convenient ride with a driver who comes right to you within the estimated provided. delays in getting to your destination are a frustrating experience we don’t want any rider to have.

we have reviewed and confirmed that you’ve already been compensated for the poor experience you described. please know that we review our standards on a regular basis and feedback like yours is valuable as we continue to design more helpful support experiences for riders.

we've noted your feedback and hope this experience will not turn you away from the convenience and reliability we strive to offer. please note that we'll take the necessary actions about this situation to help ensure that this doesn't occur in the future.”

Review Title: Drivers cancel last minute..Service varies between drivers.
Review Body: usually decent service, but varies from driver to driver. recently many drivers cancel last minute or accept the job and ask you to cancel!  drivers are playing tricks trying by accepting a job and then not turning up or asking you to cancel or just parking and waiting in one spot for ages. prices constantly increase whilst  service doesn’t improve the timing is off . they say drivers will arrive in 10 minutes .. it takes much longer which has resulted in me being late. prebooked uber never works as drivers cancel last minute so that's not reliable. a lot of drivers speak on the phone during the trip via their headset thinking that you don’t realise  . ive had good and bad .. i’m looking at cheaper alternatives e.g bolt

Review Title: Very bad experience with Uber drivers…
Review Body: very bad experience with uber drivers !!! i took taxi from the airport to my home .i need it to make one appointment on my phone when i was traveling then i just left the phone on the chair and i left it there 🤦🏻‍♀️ i just was tired . contact uber few times then i send email to uber support they give me my uber driver phone nr so i can call and ask for my phone. the person who answer told me that he is not uber driver at all , but he is working for bt 🤷🏻‍♀️ why uber support give me a number of person who is not even uber driver!??other thing it’s he was not good driver at all !! we was going inside the roundabout with no looking at all. i’ll do my best to not use uber never again 👎🏻.

the app is a joke. wish i could put no stars, hardly ever have drivers available always waiting ages to get one, don’t even try scheduling one because they just cancel them 5 mins before they are due because they don’t have available drivers. customer service is appalling too

Review Title: One star as you can't put a minus.
Review Body:
one star as you can't put a minus.
uber your customer service is one of the worst ones i've ever experienced. i lost an item, called the support immediately asking to be connected with the driver. i was told that this is impossible and was sent out to the police. i finally got through the driver the next day just to find out that yes the item was found but another customer took it with him.
i reported it to the police but it took you over a month to respond to them. then you refused to provide the details. you directed the police officer to the driver who didn't even respond.
now i'm £130 out of pocket because your drivers are handing out lost property to whoever. this means if you lose a phone in an uber car an @uber driver will just let you take it.
i spent over 3h on the phone trying to resolve this issue with no luck. hence now i will take it to the internet.
rest assured that i will never again use drive with uber you're not the only company providing this service now. you call yourself a community but your company is a joke. you don't even provide a reference number for complaints.

would have been a 5 star. but i scheduled my pickup for 8:30 last night, got the confirmation pickup would be 8:30 - 8:40 . i got a notification around 8 saying the driver is 4 minutes away!!! got to work 30 minutes early before anyone else arrived!!! had to sit outside! george the driver was great! my 1st uber ride. thoroughly disappointed for $25 plus tip, about my scheduled , (obviously ) patronage of uber. unbelievable. it was scheduled!

Review Title: Absolutely at the end of my tether!!
Review Body:
absolutely at the end of my tether with this company !! absolute joke!!

so i opened up an uber account years ago and the added a picture along the way i must of accidentally opened up a driver account (i don’t drive) so after paying quite happily via paypal or a debit card over many years with no major issues, i wanted to change my profile pic ( you know a nice simple job) oh nooo because i’d opened a driver account meant i couldn’t change my profile pic … so simple solution one would have thought.. get in contact with u we explain and delete the unused driver account ….🤔🤔 if only things were that simple … and common sense was all the rage !! nope i was told that won’t work and to change my profile pic i’d need to delete my account!! fine ok if that’s the easiest option all for the sake of a profile pic fine do that! ok old account deleted .. i then re opened an uber account all shiny and new and i could change the pic perfect … then i came to book a ride all the same payment methods … so i press to book all looking good … the. hold wait a minute!! payment declined, can’t used the payment methods… 🤦🏽‍♀️🤔🤷🏽‍♀️😑🙄 … goes to check paypal working fine and bank card working fine … ok so try again still not working … so get in contact with uber to explain … a whole heap of pointless generic message being sent to me i g me they were looking into it, can you send a screen shot of what was coming up etc i complied and sent the info. so i then receive a message (where apparently & i quote from uber’s generic pointless comment back….. ‘no response needed
why was my payment declined?
·

thanks for your message, lydia.


we're not able to go into detail, but our goal is to ensure that everyone has a positive experience with uber. this means ensuring that use of the uber application is consistent with our terms and conditions.’

right ok so there’s an issue, then surely common sense would dictate tell the account homdef what the issue is so we can come to a solution and fix the problem!!’

so i’ve rung the only customer service number there is only 1 & having to repeat the situation about 4 times! so far and being told the same bs stuff !! with no resolve!

i don’t understand why there’s some secretive ‘problem’ with my account i’ve explained countless times and yet all i keep getting is generic messages that offer zero help or a solution then being told its with the elusive ‘escalation team which no one can speak too!

what kind of service is this ?! i’m the account holder and i’ve been using the same paypal and cards as my old account and yet your feeding me utter rubbish and sending me generic pointless messages that doesn’t explain or help the fact i can’t use my uber account! the amount of time wasted and frustration is a joke! fuming is an understatement! 😡🤬😡🤬😡🤬😡

disgusting service !! i used to do delivery with uber eat , its automatically change my delivery address , and i tried to contact driver so we cant even call driver , i tried with 2 different phones , they gave wrong contact details of rider , and payment have been taken to my account but food not get delivered , and even on the app there was no option to contact someone authorised from uber , in the help section there was just faqs , bad service

Review Title: First let me make it clear I’m an UBER…
Review Body: first let me make it clear i’m an uber driver! but at this point i will only drive for lyft! uber is not only robbing there drivers there customer service is poor for there drivers! i decided to come back to uber an drive after a year of not driving. an i’ll be damn same issue. earned 200$! july 1! it’s july 21 still haven’t gotten my money i’ve called 5 times! changed bank info as they told me to still no monies! i just called the lady said she has fixed it i’ll have it in 24 hours i told her no! your going to fix my instant pay today so i can have my money today! i have already waited 3 weeks! on money at the time i needed for a big reason i still had to end up borrowing it bc uber has yet to pay me what i earned but they made ther money! i have a 5 star rate 90 percent acceptance rate an this is how i’m treated! never neve again will i drive for uber they already make just as much as we do for doin nothing!!! they need to have a person in each state where we can go to to have issues resolve in a timely manner! i would hate to have an accident bc god only knows when someone will get on the ohoen or how it would get handled! long story short everyone drive for lyft! an choose them for your rides and if your a rider choose lyft it’s safer there professional
terrible waited 1h30mins for a driver to be assigned only for them to cancel order will not be using again ridiculous

dreadful. no delivery twice now. in eating as well. uber app allows to call driver. left three messages. still nothing.

avoid uber

Review Title: Why Uber driver don’t want to worked I…
Review Body: why uber driver don’t want to worked i got good money some of them very lazy to worked i’m happy driving uber why they don’t to be satisfied a whole bunch of idiot to stop the uber hailing business

Review Title: Charged for No Shows, Could do better
Review Body:
i started using uber and at first things went ok but the last few occasions, the car has not arrived but the driver has told me he is at my location but nowhere to to be seen. i look at the app and the address is nowhere near my home or the drop off address, which is clearly shown on my phone. i then see that i have been charged for the no show but when i request a refund, i just get a credit.
just looking at my credit card statement and only one of three cancellations has been refunded. this really is bit crooked because if i called a mini cab and the car never arrived, there is no way that i would pay for a trip that i never made.
so i've reverted to using a local cab company again and am receiving much better service, without any dodgy charges

i started driving for uber fresh out of college. i had driven for less than a year when i got into a situation with the rental car company that provides vehicles to uber drivers. the owner of the rental car company in my opinion used his inside contacts at uber to get me fired. he had them run a lifetime background check on me found a misdemeanor on my record and that gave them all the ammunition they needed to boot me from the platform. uber is a joke! take lyft who i hope to be driving for soon.

ordered a driver to deliver a package. i was quoted 30gbp and they tried to charge me 157gbp!!! the driver took a two hours route instead of almost straight line 20-25 mins route. lucky i have used prepaid card and there was no enough funds to cover the fair.

Review Title: Driver canceled the trip two minutes from my home. And, I got charged $6.50 for a cancellation fee
Review Body: i ordered an uber through the app this morning and when the driver was two minutes out he canceled my trip. which was scheduled to go to the tampa airport. that made me late for my flight. to make matters worse i got charged a $6.50 cancellation fee. what bs. i wonder how many people they do this to and do not fight it. please pay attention to your uber receipts. i’m using lyft now

Review Title: Watching Uber go from Great to Hate
Review Body: after years of using this service, i’m done. back to taxi for me after having three drivers in a row all cancel on me because i am a little remote this time. i’ve seen their rates go through the roof and service through the floor. i doubt they’ll be in business much longer, and i for one say good riddance!

Review Title: Drivers are always late for 5 min…
Review Body: drivers are always late for 5 min journey they ll come after 15 mins

Review Title: Uber kicked me out right after the shut…
Review Body: uber kicked me out right after the shut down,  during the worst times of covid19 where we were struggling to get food on the table. instead of creating some type of support to communities they were busy firing. now, that they are desperate due to loss of drivers, they offer me to  work. when i confront them, they pretend that they don't know  that i'm fired. the worst annoying thing though: they don't accept my valid safety and inspection sticker for a ford edge 2019. in the past they forced me to scratch off a one month old inspection sticker to replace with a brand new one. this time i refused, and have realized that uber uses you, and when they stomach is full, they puke you!i complained many times about amount were displayed on my dashboard didn't arrive, or just disappear from the dash board. the answer was always a standard email, at some point they wrote that they believed there were fraudulent activities on my account and their fraud specialist would investigate etc. i kept on trying to food up who stole my money.. i didn't let them go away with thst fraudulent statement and kept on explaining my right to be kept updated about the fraud investigation outcome. short time later i was deactivated for the reason: customers were not happy about me.  with 4.8 rating.
absolutely ridiculous. mask mandates still in place, rude drivers who just want to charge cancellation fees. do yourselves a favor and stick with lyft. much better experiences on the regular.

Review Title: Twice in a row the drivers have…
Review Body: twice in a row the drivers have cancelled my trips and charged me for it despite me calling and directing them to the right address. amateurs. how can you not find it you have a sat nav!

my sister has ms and after visiting us for a week booked an uber to take her back to king's cross station. the booking was made in the morning, several hours before her departure. as the time approached she got notifications saying the driver was 15 mins away, then 4 mins away, then 15 seconds away ... then no-one turned up! 15 minutes later her booking was cancelled ... not by her ... we don't know who cancelled it. if she misses her train she will have to pay a small fortune to catch another ... she is currently trying to get to king's cross via a combination of trains and black cabs accompanied by my wife ... but as she has ms rushing is not an option!  i'm disgusted ... to go from "15 seconds away" to "not coming at all" ... how can that be?
disgusting unacceptable service. drivers repeatedly and continuously cancel bookings and charge cancellation fees. use an alternative where ever possible!!!

Review Title: I use Uber occasionally at home and…
Review Body: anti mask, anti vaccine driveri use uber occasionally at home and away.  i've never had a problem until this week.  called an uber from vancouver airport, and got a surly driver who refused to wear a mask and ranted on about his crazy antivaxx attitude.  he was loud, angry and arrogant (as well as seriously misinformed.)  never again.

Review Title: I ordered an uber and the driver…
Review Body: i ordered an uber and the driver cancelled so now i am charged with a cancellation fee.  this is ridiculous. no one will talk to me in person they send me to some company that will charge me more than the dam cancellation fee.  i am furious.  what kind of business are you running. i use uber quite often and this is how repeat customers are treated.

Review Title: I signed up for driver and my…
Review Body: i signed up for driver and my background is in pending for over a month and it usually takes 3 days and every time i call them they keep telling me there sorry and wait more and does not till me why is it taking so long, it’s horrible i wouldn’t recommend uber to anyone.

Review Title: Even scheduling a black car 5 hours prior & uber no shows
Review Body: at 830 scheduled a ride to the airport for 145. at 150 uber texted me “all the black drivers are busy. try later.” being undependable will not keep them in business. probably be a good time to buy stock in avis & budget.

on 7/14, used uber app to order pick up and ride home from iad(dulles airport, d.c.).  was told by app that driver will be chun, in silver prius. car rolls up, i ask driver his name to confirm, he gets out, opens trunk into which i place my bag.  i have a hearing deficit, he had heavily accented, rapid speech, which did not change upon my telling him of my hearing problem. i get in the back seat, and he takes off. i am not sure he knows where to  go. he says something about i-495, i say no-must take 267, the tollway. he seems unsure of how to access it.   now the fun(horrific) part. there was opaque plastic(like plastic bag material, not plexiglass) material stretched between the two front seats and headrests, such that i could not see out of the front of the car. this was more than a bit disconcerting, and i asked if he would remove the plastic. he said he couldn't. i asked if i could ride in the front seat. no, regulations didn't allow that, was his response. i realize that the plastic may have been because of covid concerns, but i was wearing mask, and can prove that i have had two doses of vaccine. so the forty plus minute ride was quite frightening, not being able to see out the windshield, and not knowing if he was on the right track. i have not been able to find a phone number to talk to an uber rep(i gather one has to be in their premium club or some such nonsense to speak to a rep). have tried emailing, asking for them to call me, but with no success.  would i use uber again? yes, as the temp nears freezing in hell.
£4 fare knocked up to £12 and most drivers as usual refused to take the fare. waited a while for the car but it was professional driver.

Review Title: Do not waste time nor money I was…
Review Body: do not waste time nor money i was charged $80 for a spill fee, that for one i absolutely did not do. the driver felt so way because i did not tip which i had my reason why. but out of revenge or whatever i was charged a ridiculous amount for something i didn’t do. i will walk before i step foot in a another uber service.

dear uber,
i have not been able to find where in your help centre i can leave you feedback, hence replying here.

i have been notified of a report by one of your drivers that they cancelled a trip order because we were not wearing face masks. i am baffled at this person's audacity.

i placed several orders yesterday evening and those drivers never showed up, having cancelled on us way before getting to the pick-up point. all this time we were standing by the side of the road in open air, in an area where wearing a mask is not mandatory. had the respective driver bothered to show up, of course we would have put on our masks before getting into their car. but they never did, maybe because they determined that our trip wasn't worth the hassle or having found a more lucrative order.

i hope this clarifies the matter.

thank you,
dan damaschin

ps: both your website and the app are lacking the basic functionality of allowing users to leave unstructured feedback. they do not provide even an email address where riders can contact you. is it because do you not want to hear about issues?... that's terrible customer service, in my humble opinion.

Review Title: Your loss is Uber’s gain - and they WILL always aim to keep it that way!
Review Body:
yet another awful experience, and now it is clear they will never be incentivised to change this... i will never use this company again, and not because such a service is not needed (generally speaking) - it’s because of the terrible management and business structure causing issues right across its user base, including many of the drivers who are simply trying to make a living.

i had an important trip booked for this morning, scheduled well ahead of time. as usual, uber does not take any responsibility for their commitment to their users, and allow trips to be cancelled due to “no drivers being available”, right before they are scheduled - suggesting that you should “try requesting another trip”. as soon as you try this you will find there are in fact plenty of drivers available, but the price has now gone up at least 3 times the original price (in my case £26 instead of the original £6-8). this trip was only around 3 miles, which cost me £7 with a local taxi company, who were very grateful for the fare. once cancelled by uber, there is no record of the trip on your account, nor can you ask any questions or give any feedback. hence the surge of people taking to trustpilot and other review platforms to express their frustrations.

the issue here is uber take a large percentage of the fare, meaning they are going to be even more profitable if and when users accept this late minute hike in prices out of desperation, thanks to the last minute cancellation from uber. coming from a tech and business background, this ux would be a very straightforward fix, and absolutely well within uber’s power to change - and yet they still choose not to.

i sincerely hope another service can come along to unite all local taxi firms in such a way that everyone benefits, without all these headaches and amateur corporate execs pulling the strings to manipulate the sizes of their wallets!

Review Title: Canceled my rebooked airport ride 5 minutes before scheduled pick up.  Uber's days are numbered.
Review Body: scheduled a ride yesterday to luton airport from central london for this morning.  uber canceled the booking 5 minutes before pick up - can not find a driver!!! what's the point of taking a booking?  tried to get another uber - the price shot up - more expensive than addison lee and possibly the black cab! uber's days are numbered.  soon no one will use the app.  all the uber drivers who are entitled for workers benefit and wages will have no work.

garbage customer service. i was charged a cancellation fee because the driver went to the wrong location and cancelled the ride. can’t seem to find a phone number to speak with them about a refund. had to use the crappy app help which i was able to get my uber account credited with the fee.

zero zero zero
i had booked an trip last night and no one showed up! i stayed 30 minutes in cold for nothing! i ring the driver he said is comming! after 10 minutes again nothing! i was charged on my bank for the ride i didnt take! mmmm i had to book another to get home! spend double for one trip not fair!
driver name ahmad! nasty

i will be happy to hear when this company closes.you pay money for comfort car and instead you will have car when you cannot fixxed property just simple infant car seat .arrogant and dangerous drivers.rubbish services. they only stink the air.

Review Title: I have been using Uber for many years…
Review Body: i have been using uber for many years but since after the lockdown the service has really gone down. sometimes they are charging nearly double and their excuse is they don’t have enough drivers, which is not the clients problem to have to pay a surcharge. the wait time much longer than before and after waiting for a long time they cancel. i ordered a car today after waiting 8 minutes and when he arrived he said he is going home and my destination was the opposite to his home so asked me to book another car. i was even charged the cancellation fee which i disputed. awful car service, i now use bolt.

Review Title: As soon as booked drivers call customer…
Review Body:
as soon as booked drivers call customer and ask destination, mostly they cancel trip themselves and uber charges extra for that from customer
complaint given 5 months ago but no response. it is better to avoid uber

Review Title: The driver was great; price crazy high
Review Body: the driver was great.  i paid almost $23 for a 1.8 mile trip.  this trip has typically been less than $10.  in small print, it said that they were busy, and the fares were higher.  i will never again pay uber that much money for such a small ride.

the worst ever. i would give less than one star if i could. i have now deleted my account and will never use them again.

allowing order to be taken and paid for, then waiting for hours to cancel the order stating no delivery partner available.

fine if no one is available but why make us wait for nearly 2 hours to cancel.

happened too many time now. even when the order is assigned to a delivery guy, its always late and we can watch our so called delivery driver, heading the opposite direction instead of collecting our order.

good bye and good riddence uber!

uber used to be really good but now they are just robbing people. they have hiked their prices and even though they have already raised their prices. they still have the audacity to charge more than the fare stated due to drivers taking it upon themselves to take a longer route for no apparent reason and adding the extra on top. if you dont check your receipt you wouldn't even know that they have done it. i for one will not be using uber again as it is actually cheaper to go by taxi now and when they give you a fare they dont try and change the amount after your trip is complete. totally disgusted with their underhand techniques to extort money out of people. i shall be using ola from now on, at least with them you know that you will be paying between the minimum and maximum fare stated.

Review Title: Uber is nothing but a useless service
Review Body: uber is nothing but a useless service. their drivers are just dangerous and simply crooks and the rudest set of people. i will never use them again. they should be removed from uk.

Review Title: Preset Uber pickup over 1 month in…
Review Body: preset uber pickup over 1 month in advance at kauai airport. landed and went on uber app and it said car on its way. 10 minutes in we get a notification that said sorry no driver available.  we rescheduled and got another vehicle coming and said 6 minutes away. then it said 20 minutes then 30 minutes. we called the number for the driver and said just confused on when he would arrive...his response was i will get there when i get there. his name on his profile was jimmy and he drove a yukon. 10 minutes later he canceled. talking to the people at the resort we are staying at they informed us that this happens all the time here. wish i could give them a zero.

Review Title: The driver reject my ride at the last…
Review Body: the driver reject my ride at the last moment. i scheduled my ride 10 hours earlier, because i have flight to catch, but this was not enough, the driver  called me 20 min before his arrival to inform me he will not show up and he end the call without telling me what to do.

a few years ago, uber was reasonably priced and reliable. now they are neither. i was in chicago and searched on uber to see what the cost of a ride to my destination would be. though it was unreasonably high based on my experience with uber months before, i decided to go with it since i was in a hurry. about 2 minutes later i went to book the ride and it was $10 more. i felt i had no choice so i booked it. for no reason or explanation, the driver cancelled my ride 2 minutes before she was to pick me up – i had already waited 12 minutes for her to arrive. i was in a rush so i hailed a cab. to my surprise, the cab’s cost was 50% less than uber. over the past 30 days 2 of my children and 2 friends had the same experience as me – high cost and last-minute cancellations. if you book an uber and get screwed it’s your fault after reading this and other similar reviews.

Review Title: i never expecting like this things…
Review Body:
i never expecting like this things happended from uber..

i really trusted intial days and now very dissapointed.. when i was booked the cab, all cabs drivers are asking destination location and just canlcelling the ride, i don't understand why this is happeining. i was faced this more than 5 rides. even for a single ride i need to wait such a long time and afetr many cancelations from the drivers i went for another rider app. some drivers are forced to cancel from my end this is ridiculous.

Review Body: the uber driver took a longer route. i didn't know they would charge me for a drivers decision to take the route he wanted. i'm new to this city and don't know my way around. i use uber all the time. not anymore after they took more money than they were suppose to. i don't need a credit i need my money because i hàve bills and live on a budget.

Review Body: drivers were hard to come by in our area even before the pandemic. cancelling trips 2 min before start etc. but now getting someone to drive a family of 3 (2 adults + 1 child) is absolutely impossible. did hang on for 15 min looking how no one wanted to accept our trip to just cancel the search and take a train instead.

Review Title: If I could give this 0 stars I would!
Review Body: if i could give this 0 stars i would!! fu** uber!!!! 🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕 get off your high biden ass horse!! f*c* masks!!! my idiotic driver last night wouldn’t drive my ass hoke cus i wasn’t wearing a mask 😂 f*c*i*g loser! y’all are! making people wear it over the flu!! honestly every drive i’ve had has never wore one or made people wear it!! until you get this special little fruit cake…!! wouldn’t even pull up. told him i wasn’t getting out until he took me home. he said he’d call the cops! 😂😂 like i cared! i said call them! they came (they were hot) and weren’t wearing a mask 🙄😅 basically told the guy he was a little pussy b****! anywaysssss get the fu** overrrrr it uber!! grow a pair! we all know you don’t have any anyways 🖕
never a driver available, usually the drivers are very rude too. book a taxi elsewhere, better luck winning the lottery than trying to find a taxi with uber

Review Title: I'm an uber driver and the company has…
Review Body: i'm an uber driver and the company has recently cut our pay by almost 30%. this is a horrible thing to do to the people who make you money. i really enjoy my job and until recently i thought i would do this forever. now with gas prices and maintenance costs it's almost not worth it. bad uber

Review Title: Uber driver stopped at wrong address to charge waiting fee
Review Body: uber driver stopped at wrong address, then messaged me he was waiting, charging me $5.6 for waiting time, i told him he was not at pick up address, took him another 5 minutes to arrive pick up address. is this the new trick to rip off customers? i only found out the waiting time charge after i get off the uber. beware.
