awful. i feel sorry fornthe drivers they get paid pennys. if uber price surges the driver ls don't get apid the money its uber!!!!! taking the p**s

worst app ever…!!!! so i dropped off my rental car book the uber to take us for lights down a mile… it said three minutes until arrival when it hit 30 seconds i got a random call from uber driver saying if i don’t tip them extra $10-$15 i’m not worth him to pick up and he’s gonna cancel me..! wth an uber’s ok with this….!! then i had to book another uber that said it was four minutes away and then when it was 2 minutes and 15 seconds the estimate arrival said 27 minutes.. wth did he decide to pick someone else up 1st the walk was only 15 minutes away so because of the first driver screwing me over we decided to cancel and walk a mile instead of waiting 30 minutes which we were already waiting 15 minutes first and so we end up walking and uber charges us a five dollar fee! would never download this app again do not download because customer service there is no customer service you have to go through the app through a helpdesk through a messaging app to even talk to someone and if they even get back to you the one 800 number tells you what to do on the app then hangs up on you!!! dont go with uber try lyft

i ordered a couple of pizzas and paid the extra £1.49 for priority delivery. my food was collected and it took the driver over 50 minutes to deliver it although we’re about 20 minutes from the restaurant. i tracked the driver and it was obvious he delivered two other orders before mine. it also said he was on a bicycle but he arrived in a car so delivery should of been quick as it has been before. i contacted uber support who apparently can’t offer me the £1.49 refund as it’s not their policy. well they’ve lost a customer.

Review Title: I wish I could give minus points.
Review Body:
i wish i could give minus points.
i had train to catch from victoria at 1:15 pm on sunday and it was 6 minutes ride from my pickup point.
for safe side i booked uber for 12:30 in well advance.
at pickup time the app kept saying that driver is 10 minutes away till 1:20pm.
when called to call centre, they asked to cancel the trip and rebook it.
totally useless. i missed my train and had to pay for another train and missed my important meeting.
i won't use uber ever again.

Review Title: Got my order in a timely manner.
Review Body: i ordered because i didn't want to go all the way to jane and trethewey.i received excellent service from the driver.he was very nice and delivered my dinner on time.i am very happy with uber.

Review Title: Sorry, no drivers are available to pick you up!
Review Body: i pre-scheduled an uber ride to the airport and received confirmation for a pick up time. on the morning of the scheduled pick up i received confirmation that a driver was on the way. the driver never showed up. ten minutes after the scheduled pick up, i received a message that no drivers are available. after missing my scheduled flight, i finally reached my destination. i immediately added the lyft app to my phone. used them several times a day for five days. they were perfect! i will never use uber again.

Review Title: We arranged for a ride 2 days prior to…
Review Body: we arranged for a ride 2 days prior to our trip to the airport.  it was confirmed.   but the driver never showed up.  we got a message after the driver should have been there saying driver not available and to find another ride.  we were desperate to get to the airport.  we tried 2 more times. each time uber said a driver would be there in a few minutes.  each time no one showed up. we then tried to make it on our own but missed our flight anyway. so much stress and inconvenience.  not to mention the extra fees to reschedule our flight. i don't know what happened to uber, but i will never trust them again.

i rarely use this service due to a previous poor service, but with no black cab available i was forced to try their services once again...and regrettably i had another terrible experience. having added a drop-off, which was literally enroute to my destination, the incompetent driver couldn't follow the sat nav and refused to believe me when  i said it was correct. we ended up on a 20minute detour after dropping my friend off. as a lone female passenger this made me extremely anxious, as we started heading in the opposite direction to where i lived. eventually we arrived at my home, where he proceeded to tell me the journey was now £23 instead of £11.85, as the system had added my "drop-off" to the end of the journey. he said i'd have to take it up with uber. which i did...only to be told they were "unable to look into this" via the app, and when i phoned and asked to speak to a manager i was told by yet another person they weren't able to adjust the fair. at least you are consistent in your complete lack competence in customer support, as your drivers are in getting to a straightforward destination. how they still have a license in london i have no idea. never again.
charged me a "cancellation fee" when their driver simply turned around and did not pick me up, leaving me stranded

after inputting pickup and destination information i was told the fare would be roughly $11.36 for the 2 mile ride, and the driver would arrive in under 3 minutes. as soon as i hit the accept button the fare went to just under $38 and the driver's arrival time went to 16 minutes. when i tried to cancel, because the terms were tantamount to robbery, i would have had to pay a cancelation fee and taxes. f...uber and their deceptive practices. never again!

abandoned - i went on uber's site and arranged for a 5:20 a.m. ride *the day before* for a ride to the airport (i.e. super important). received an e-mail that it was "confirmed." when iooked at the app, it said "your ride will arrive between 5:20 and 5:30." so the next day, i'm waiting and the app keeps giving me that the ride should appear in the next x minutes. 5:30 a.m. arrives - when i have only a few minutes of extra time - and get the message "no drivers available at this time." this information would have been helpful at any point before this!!!!! a**holes. i had to call a taxi in desperation and by the grace of luck and the benevolence of the driver, i barely made it on time. f*** uber.
enjoyed talking to driver about football thanks matt

Review Title: Riders lose money cos of Uber's hidden unfair conditions
Review Body:
my experience with uber shows they lack transparency and integrity. they seem to have chnage their policies in ways that benefit them and their driver-partners, at the expense of the riders.
recently, they launched the hourly rate product.
uber claims that when a rider selects the hourly product, the rider is informed that the full set rate applies even if the trip is completed before end of the first hour.
this is so not true. i informed them about this and they just kept repeating same thing like a broken robot.
i even sent them a screenshot showing what riders see when hourly rate product is selected, and this information is not displayed.
they responded repeating the same lie and attached a link to how hourly rates are priced.
they hid this very vital information that fares for selected hours are non-adjustable/non-refundable in a link that doesn't even show up when riders make a request. so essentially, no rider sees the information on non-adjustable/non-refundable set fares except you go searching for pricing information beyond the fare displayed when you request a ride.

in this case, i selected 3 hours because i had 2 meetings which i expected to last for about 1 hour 30 minutes and lunch appointment for 30 minutes. factoring in transit time between locations, i figured, 3 hours should cover it. however, both my appointments were rescheduled when i got to those locations. so the trip ended up lasting for only 1 hour 40 minutes. uber charged me for the full 3 hours and the driver-partner left to do more trips for the unused portion of my 3 hours booking.
despite my appeleas, uber refused to adjust the fare to 2 hours rate (which is still more than the total time used, but i was willing to accept that). so i lost money on the trip. i also told them the information on non-refundable hourly rate fares is not displayed when hourly product is selected. all i said fell on the deaf ears of uber.

another incident:
in my current geographical location, many driver-partners complain when you do not use cash payment method, and unfortunately having change in this location is also very difficult. so i used to select cash payment. where the driver-partner doesn't have change, uber would credit my wallet with the change. however, i found out the hard way that uber puts a limit on the number of times you can request change be added to your uber wallet when you overpay with cash for a ride. so in this incident, i selected a cash payment due to circumstances beyond my control. the driver-partner did not have change. he asked me to contact uber support so the change will be credited to my uber wallet.
uber support said because they had credited my wallet with change for my one of my previous trips, they cannot give me change for this trip. i explained to them that it's different trips,different payments. none of the drivers were disputing my claim for change because they were all aware.
there was some back and forth with uber, but they just kept repeating the same thing. so i lost money on that ride as well.
till today, uber has failed to share a link to their policy on requesting change be credited to your wallet. riders are not informed of this when selecting cash payments. we only see a notice asking us to have exact fare. but in a location where exact fare in change is almost always impossible, we are forced to make bank transfers to the drivers bank account (provided there's network service) or look for change around or forfeit our change.

please, do your personal thorough research before you use any uber products/service. they have hidden unfair business practices and conditions that will drain your pockets as a rider. don't rely on uber or any of their driver-partners to disclose anything to you beforehand.

Review Title: Uber is honestly the worst transport…
Review Body: uber is honestly the worst transport app i have used. just had 2 drivers cancel on me and waiting 30mins for what should have been a 10 minute trip. fares are too expensive and service is seriously lacking. don’t recommend.

i have a disability. i cant speak perfectly. the driver didnt try to understand me. i wrote my request down. he declined it. he ran two red lights. absolute disgrace. i had to order another taxi to complete trip.

i scheduled a pick up today at 4:00 p.m. the uber driver never showed up but i was a request to give the driver a rating for my trip. the trip never happened but of course i was charged. this is not the first time this has happened to me.
after googling how to reach customer service by phone because it is not listed in the app i spoke to someone. the young lady spoke like a robot like she had memorized her script and said it a hundred times. she said the line was for emergencies only but she would send my information out to the proper people and they would contact me by email. she couldn't have cared less about my situation.
how are you going to say to me that my situation is not an emergency. you don't know what type of environment i mean where i'm at or if i'm in danger because you or she did not bother to ask because she was too busy reading from a script.
no one will ever contact me by email because i'm still waiting to be contacted about a non pickup about a year ago and i was charged $32.
i had to call for a second uber and was charged a different price even though it was to the same place because it said that it was during busy hours.
uber you have to do better this is very shameful and to not be able to contact anyone regarding these type of issues and those issues be addressed and be refunded right away or unacceptable and a horrible practice of business.
the driver roby in a black corolla should be ashamed of himself because i know this is not the first time he has done this.

the driver cancel my trip and they charge me 120 $ for nothing
last 120 dollars and now i can’t

the driver, "ph uc," arrived at my apartment complex driving a car just like my neighbor's. he did not follow the directions, pulled around to her side, then messaged me, "i've arrived" ... i did not answer immediately (i was outside watching), so he then sent a message saying, "are u coming?" the ride was for my son, who was re-parking our cars. i walked outside to let ph uc know that my son was walking towards the car. he rolled his window up while i was talking. he then took my son to some location in a residential neighborhood when my son was trying to get to work at a downtown gas station. i had typed the address of my son's work into uber, but ph uc was not able to locate the 7-11. he dropped my son 15 min walking distance away from his job, at a red light, at 10:00 pm, because when my son realized he had no idea where he was he tried to route the driver to the nearest known landmark and the driver said it was too far away (literally a 3 min drive from the destination). my son was, obviously, late for work. ph uc was exasperated. my son was exasperated. ph uc was not happy with my son. my son did not order the ride on the first place, but he was dropped in an unknown location after dark, after i paid $25 for a 14 min ride, with no idea where to go or even what to look out for. ph uc acted as if it were  a huge inconvenience that somebody new to the area didn't know where they were. to drop somebody off on the side of a road they've never seen / heard of  is dangerous, rude, and taints the company name. lyft is my new thing.

the driver was on time, had a imacculately clean vehicle and was super polite and friendly. the cost for the ride, however, was outrageous!! i could have easily saved $4-$5 taking a yellow cab. this is my first, and last, uber ride!

Review Title: Uber is unfair to the drivers
Review Body:
uber is unfair to the drivers. specifically with the upfront price being introduced which is totally unfair to the drivers.
customer services is absolutely hell, if you ask them a question all they do is send you template messages. doesn't matter how many times you ask they'll just send you template messages. even you asked them legal questions regards to the fares and ask them to become transparent but nothing just template messages. the mileage shows on the app before accepting a job is totally different after starting a job which is really annoying. again poor customer services. treats drivers like slave . very disappointed and very concerned.

new u.k ( london) uber user. may/ june 21
post covid , uber is desperate to revive its user base , which has grown overly used to not getting around too much… hence its offering discounts on its fares , quite a bit off,between 30 to 50% off based on how they rate you as a user.
that’s a very good deal.
my experience so far of uber drivers is that they are courteous and considerate. they have been hit hard in the pocket by the drop off in trade, and so far as i am concerned are deserving of support. they rely on tips, especially given the discounted prices, so my pov is be fair in tipping ( maybe even a trifle generous? )
my one quibble so far is the “location”function on the app. it really doesn’t work too well in my experience.
also i don’t see that uber are keen to receive feedback…. nothing in their own processes that invites feedback … snx no sign of the company monitoring its trustpilot reviews.

may 2021 norcross ga. i had 2 bad experiences. one driver made his car into a sharp trap that did not have working seatbelts or door lock. another driver purposely mispronounced my name yelling por-tee-uhhhh! now my app does not display faces or car models to properly file police reports or fbi tips. may my post help georgia citizens to survive uber support of drug and human trafficking!

Review Title: Uber charged me for a ride I never took
Review Body: uber charged me for a ride i never took. when i contested the charge, they refused to refund me. the most concerning part about this is the driver never picked me up but he was waiting in my driveway after my fiancé drove me home. extremely creepy. i asked why he was at my house instead of the pickup location and he claimed it was uber’s fault and the app must not be working right.  he said i wouldn't be charged but he was obviously lying. i am still troubled by his creepy behavior and uber’s lack of concern for their customers safety and their unwillingness to refund me. i reported them to the bbb as well. do not use uber unless you want to be ripped off and stalked by a stranger.

Review Title: Used uber for the first time today, now a victim of theft TWICE
Review Body: used uber for the first time today. i politely asked both drivers would they prefer cash or card as i have autism which means i struggle to learn new stuff. got home and found card payments gone out. uber said they would not fire these drivers and wouldn't give me a tenner goodwill gesture. i am disgusted.

had terrible experiences with uber drivers in the dominican republic and there's no way to call uber about this. i've submitted complaints through the app with no response. very poor customer service.

absolute shiaaaat system.
i have waited up to 45 mins for 3 different drivers to accept, & only when about arrive, cancel on me to delay the process even more.
yet the company only lets you rate the driver after the trip so the poor block gets a bad rating and never about the service itself. shocking!!!

Review Title: Bad experience in my life it's very bad…
Review Body: bad experience in my life it's very bad driver mr rahul he said 110 extra rs bcoz yesterday my small mistake i was download the uber app thanq so much uber great job

3rd class service, driver cancel the trip after waiting period of 20 to 25mins
i will never book uber again
m irritated from last 1yr
no customer care number is working

Review Title: Driver Cancelled Because I have a Luggage and Got 6 Eros Fine
Review Body: driver canceled for no reason and another time he didn't want to take me because i have two luggage. i got 12 euros deducted from my account. i got fine for the third times like this. i swear with my life that i will never ever use uber ride for the rest of my life.

Review Title: Do these people really know what their doing
Review Body:
my girlfriend booked an uber today for us to be picked up from hsbc, canada sq (canary wharf, london) the driver must have assumed we worked for hsbc and went to another entrance on the other side of the building, the app told us we had 8 mins to get there, er really, how about come and pick us up from the address we booked, anyway the driver booked us as a no show and we were charged £6.00, not good we spend hundreds of ££££ per year on cabs and believe me it will not be with uber.
4th problem on the trot dealing with these morons, i personally don’t use them but the missus said lets give them a go, their gps is rubbish, one driver told us he had never been to london before as he had only been in the country 2 weeks, really!!!! we were only 5 miles outside london. good luck, ill stick to mini cabs and black cabs in future (or buses).

Review Title: Disgusting take money out of your bank…
Review Body: disgusting take money out of your bank and tell u no driver is available  call customer support to be told to pay again and book another trip no way am i paying £13.00 for a £6.00 trip avoid at all costs

first and last time using uber.
i was given an estimate of $20 - $24
i was charged $42.15 in addition to a tip that i gave directly to the driver. driver was nice and courteous.

tried to book a taxi three times, first two drivers cancelled without telling me, third one at least had the decency to call me to tell me it wasn’t worth his time.
i now have three pending card authorisations which could affect me paying my energy supplier.
will never attempt to use uber again.
at least deleting my account and the app was relatively easy.

terrible experience with uber drivers on 2 consecutive days.
charged £27 for a 1.6 mile journey.
the second journey the driver got lost and cancelled. i had a disabled person with me so couldn't walk to try and find the driver. we were charged for it!
tried to get money back for both bookings. managed to get £9.31 for the first one. still not justified!
second journey was shrugged off by customer service.
i won't be using this cowboy company ever again!! trying to rip off customers to make up for lock down loses.
despicable behaviour.

Review Title: Scheduled pickup a week early canceled 5 minutes before pickup.
Review Body: scheduled pickup a week early. driver was assigned (yousef) in the myrtle beach area. 5 minutes before getting there the driver canceled. i then had a new driver connect and say they’ll be there in 45 minutes. i had a scheduled time because i had a plane to catch. i would miss the flight. it’s unacceptable and there’s no recourse to the driver? only if they complete a trip? if you’re an uber driver, people are relying on a ride they’re paying for. don’t take a trip and cancel last minute.

Review Title: Scheduled a pick up hours in advance
Review Body: scheduled a pick up hours in advance, 20 minutes before the pick up time, i received message saying the driver had to cancel and they were looking for a new driver, never heard another thing.ended up walking.

Review Title: Uber is particularly unhelpful when you…
Review Body: uber is particularly unhelpful when you are travelling with kids. i have two kids aged 3 and 5. yesterday an uber taxi driver refused to take us on board on the premises that we did not have child seats!!??!! and that we were 4 people riding the taxi (even though the kids would have traveled in our laps). he left and charged us 6 pounds for not taking the trip... and since you cannot complain in uber unless you have actually taken the cab.... i do not even have the right to complain. appalling company.

Review Title: I was really disappointd in Uber for a good reason
Review Body: i was really disappointd in uber, because of my recent experience, when i was trying to get a ride to south london but nobody was willing to take me (the drivers can see the destination now after accepting the trip) so they were cancelling all my trips for about 3 hours.. and the last driver said (after accepting the trip) that he is too tired to go there..because he just did not want to.. no one ever in any kind of service or hospitality industry acted in this high level of unprofessionality like uber. this is tge highest level of unprofessionality and ignorance regarding to customer service. i am extremely disappointed.

Review Title: I think that that Uber should have…
Review Body: i think that that uber should have contact support the uber drivers cancels everytime.

Review Title: The client service of Uber is a ghost. You are crooked and they don’t care
Review Body: when you take a uber for the airport and the driver asks you 3 times more money in cash and when you refuse and you say that everything is in the uber price the driver takes the wrong direction deliberately for a longer trip and the other airport. i almost missed my flight. unfortunately for him i check on the map and saw that he was going in the wrong direction. unfortunately for me i took a uber so no refund, no apologies and no answer from client service for more than 3 days. that is uber! if you can avoid it go to other app!

Review Title: Don’t rely on Uber for anything…
Review Body: don’t rely on uber for anything important!!! made a reservation 3 hrs in advance for my daughters graduation for arrival between 5-5:10. at 5:10 we got a message saying no drivers available!!!!!

Review Title: Uber is definitely not worth the…
Review Body: uber is definitely not worth the effort.  first, it's impossible to keep the account straight (having just spent an hour on that), there's no customer service phone number(s) and worst, the driver's are unreliable.  you may or may not get a ride.

scheduled a ride, i missed the drivers call when i was in the bathroom, called 30 seconds later and the call didn’t go through, driver left two minutes after the scheduled pick up and charged me. uber leaves no way for me to share this review. they don’t have a phone number for riders. deleted the app and using lyft.

i hate that their drivers will accept the trip even if they are so far from the place or with another customer, so when i order them it shows 2 minutes but i wait for 10 min whistle it’s still 2 min.
use rta taxi

how many times i will book a scheduled ride and one driver will accept it. then they will see the window time will be 30 minutes but unfortunately after 30 minutes of waiting they will cancel you and will not give any ride. it happened many times. i cant even get a help from uber to complain about it right away and be late going to work.

uber drivers are so annoying. you have it wrote in the delivery description twice where to deliver and what the buzzer code is due to me living in a building and needing contactless delivery due to an illness. they will choose if they want to bring it to you or not. today i had my order dropped off in the main lobby of my building, like who the heck does that. and when you contact them about it they don’t even care. they just want your money

Review Title: Missed my key trains home as I relied…
Review Body: missed my key trains home as i relied on uber to get me home. 4-5 cars cancelled at the very last minute (i have screen shots to prove it) uber had a special 30% off discount tonight which i suspect meant drivers couldn’t be bothered. a taxi firm would guarantee a job but surely after several cancellations uber should guarantee the next? this is a tech company and their system is open to abuse. spent a small fortune on a black can fare, would have rather had the truth from them (also try and find a way to complain through their app)

uber are one of the biggest thieves that is out there,i’m not sure why i have not reviewed them before as they have burnt me a few times.i guess it’s one of those things that makes me another idiot that needs a new brain.their drivers are conmen and so are their customers service,last week i ordered mcdonald’s in the early morning and was waiting on my delivery.a few minutes before delivery i got an email saying that it’s been cancelled,they thieves already charged my account but never refunded me.a few months ago uber delivered my chinese order to a different address and did not refund on that,back down at the start of the year i ordered mcdonald’s and it never arrived but trying to get in touch with uber is not straight forward as their app sends you mad and all over the place

Review Title: Customer Service DOESNT EXIST! 4 Months waiting!
Review Body:
customer service doesnt exist! 4 months waiting!

i have tried to get in contact with uber's customer service since march of this year(!). i have a pending payment on my account, which does not allow me to order food or taxis. the money has already been paid out from my bank - the money is gone - but the payment is still pending. i even tried to pay it again but i can't do that either, it doesn't process the payment on the website or in the app. obviously, i do not want to pay for this twice, but at least i tried to solve this on my own.

i reached out to uber on facebook, since it was so hard to find a way to contact their support on the app or on their website. finally, i was able to send a request, i got an answer from a robot in the next 48 hours and i replied and explain my issue again - no response. i waited for a week - no response. i wrote again - no response, i sent another reminder after a few days - no response. i wrote to uber again on facebook, they responded and asked me to have patience. so i waited, two weeks passed without any updates or responses. then i saw in the app that my case had been closed. so i reached out to uber on facebook again, since that's the only way to get a reply from them. they replied and said sorry and asked me to make another request, so i did that. i got a response within a week, i replied and explained my issue for the 4th time and they responded with "we have technical issues with this atm, we will get back to you". i answered this email again when a couple of days to a week had passed - no response. i waited two days and emailed again - no response. i informed uber on facebook that it has been two months since i contacted them for the first time without receiving any help or clarification. they just told me to be patient. i'm sorry but two months is being patient. now it has been four months since i first contacted uber to help me with this issue. apparently, users who want to use the app are not worth helping.

i work with customer support myself, so i know how it is in this business but i have never seen anything like this before. this is totally unacceptable for paying customers. their staff is obviously overworked and have no time for the incoming tickets.

i have used uber since the day they launched in sweden. i've never had any problems before, but as the company grew so fast the quality started lacking. i feel bad for all of the staff - customer support, drivers and food delivery people. all of them are underpaid and overworked. this is really showing to us customers now much more apparent than it did a couple of years ago.

i'm extremely disappointed.

Review Title: At the pendmik situation uber Drivers…
Review Body:
at the pendmik situation uber drivers are denied to pick and drop the customers
every time they are give negative reviews against uber.
there is no customer care service no. available for customers at the time of any emergency

Review Title: I had book a vacation trip to San Diego…
Review Body: i had book a vacation trip to san diego for memorial day weekend. my friend had to keep rebooking for uber xl because these uber drivers keep denying our party of 4 even though they put themself as uber xl. it is a 4 person seater but one of the excuses i keep hearing: “ it is the law”...... what kind of excuses can these drivers make up even more. i get it; it is a busy holiday weekend but they should not had put themself as an xl if their car is not meant for more than 4 people.

Review Title: Requested a ride and after 1/2 hour I…
Review Body:
requested a ride and after 1/2 hour i attempted to contact the driver multiple times, and finally informed that he was on a long gas line in and it would be a while before he would arrive. this was during the time of the gas shortage in nc and our driver accepted the fare knowing he would not be able to pick us up for a period of time. i requested to cancel the fare, he indicated he would and i was still charged. customer services for uber is impossible to contact. i had to cancel the fare through my credit card company. i would never use uber again!

attempted to dispute the charge with my credit card company and uber refused to accept the claim refusing to rebate the money.

Review Title: I will never again take a ride from Uber as long as I live
Review Body: i will never again take a ride from uber. i booked a basic packaged ride for around $39, only to be charged $79. apparently there were no available drivers for the type of ride i chose, so uber sent me a more expensive car to pick me up and drop me off without alerting me in advance. the company denied my request for a refund, saying that after reviewing my information, i paid the correct amount. after going back and forth with customer service i was credited only $19.18 in uber cash. it is insulting and a pure bait and switch. corporate greed at its finest, not caring how their inadequacies affect their passengers and not willing to own up to their mistakes. i have had other bad experiences with uber in the past and this is the last straw. do not trust this company with your business! from now on i'm going to lyft for all my rideshare needs and will never use uber again.

scheduled an uber ride to the airport  a week in advance to make sure there no problems.  30 minutes before the time to pick me up they relayed that a driver was on the way but was going to be about 20 minutes late.  problem was that the driver had picked someone else up and was heading to the airport with them.  around 20 minutes after that they switched drivers on me and now it was going to be 43 minutes before they would be there!  now i wasn’t going to make my flight if i waited so i canceled my trip and drove myself to daily parking which cost me $72.  uber then charged me $5 for canceling.

uber cancelled on me, had to get an addison lee, was late for appointment, then bloody uber had the cheek to charge me £6 for cancelling!! that’s the final straw, no more dodgy uber drivers for me i’m deleting my uber app!

Review Title: Uber is one of the MOST PREDITORY…
Review Body:
uber is one of the most preditory companies out there.
their customer service sucks and they are abusive towards their drivers which is why the service is so bad. drivers have discovered ways to buck the system because they are being abused by the company which leaves the customers without the service they are paying for and angry. this is not the drivers fault- it is the trickle down effect of preditory business practices that take advantage of both the customer and the worker. it has to stop- it’s time for govt. intervention and a great example of why we need govt control- for all you republicans out there- this is why i am a democrat- companies cannot be trusted to be unpreditory.

avoid mr mizanur, this driver took £88.58 from me, which should have been £17.00. a 20 minutes drive home, he got lost, and took 1 hour and 15 minutes! its been 1 week and i have no refund or reply from him or uber!
this company is a fraud please share with all family and friends!

you only get to speak to customer services i philippines, who have no authority or say to anything! no help at all...i will be closing my account with uber!

Review Title: I've just had an encounter with a…
Review Body: i've just had an encounter with a racist taxi driver. registration number ht65ghn lexus gx

well... order uber eats never got delivered, apparently the driver could not find house even though have ordered many times before, restaurant said they spoke with the driver and asked to deliver again, he refused! will not be using uber again!

ubercars ubercars uk/netherlands is a fraudulent company. i booked a cab to heathrow terminal 5 from woolwich london i was initially charged £48.40 .after the trip they deducted  £100.67 from my bank account there was no waiting on the way,no traffic as well.they are fraudulent company,pls be careful everyone. don't patronize them again. the driver abdul  took a slower route m25 to rip me off. tunde laoye.

Review Title: I'd give Uber ZERO stars if I could
Review Body: i'd give uber zero stars if i could.  today i needed a ride and booked a car to arrive in about 10 minutes.  within a minute of booking the app told me the driver was 45 minutes away.  i cancelled and tried again.  this time the car was 3 minutes away, but again, within a minute of booking, the app told me the driver was 20 minutes away.  i cancelled and made other arrangements.  uber used to be a great service, but now it is absolutely awful.  to top it off, these clowns continue to send me "$30 off your first uber eats" emails.  i will never use uber eats.

Review Title: the uber app had the wrong gps pick up…
Review Body: the uber app had the wrong gps pick up location.  i was unable to update this on the map manually.  then i was charged for cancellation fee.  the drivers should be able to enter a pick up location manually if there is a gps malfunction.  i was stuck without a ride and ended up costing a lot more.  i am very disappointed with uber.  the app help is preset and if my situation doesn't fit into those options, i'm stuck.  super frustrating.

above and beyond!

stephen in the knoxville, tn area has been one of the best drivers i had to deal with as a customer of uber. by accommodating my boyfriend and i, who just arrived at the local mcgee airport, have experienced platinum service. this is our first time in tennessee and to experience such magnificent service, stephen showed us around downtown knoxville. he is a pleasant person who enjoys the job he does and we will be requesting stephen than other drivers. thank you for showing us that southern hospitality.

why do you guys suck this much? everytime of the f-----g day there's no drivers nearby? and i refuse to believe there are no drivers closer than 20 minutes away. thw one thing that prevents me from using any other ride app is my phones refusal to run any of them properly more than once. so while i am forced yo use your inconvenient and s---y service, i just want you to know how much i hate you all over there. i know you don't care, amd neither do i

edit: just to clarify, i'm now sitting in my office building waiting now 2 hours for my ride to get out themselves. i'd rather waste that time than give you anything if i don't have to

Review Title: Terrible experience I missed my crazy…
Review Body: terrible experience i missed my crazy golf because my uber driver didn’t know where debenhams was 🤯so he couldn’t find us we had to trek around manchester when we are from scotland (the brave 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿) we have no idea where we were and so ended up having to book another uber and that made us late to crazy golf, wouldn’t recommend worst 19th birthday ever. wouldn’t recommend uber or england for travellers!! 🤬🤬 come to scotland way better
price started at £10.60 ..... driver went wrong way twice - final bill £20.13 ! offered to refund £5 ? where was the £10.60 original price ? time to delete uber app !!!! never again

Review Title: Where are all the drivers in Boston
Review Body: where are all the drivers in boston? a 21 minute wait that turns into 40 minutes.  not dependable anymore if you have somewhere to be.

Review Title: Got a email today saying I broke the…
Review Body: got a email today saying i broke the rules for not wearing a mask. i can tell you now i wear my mask everywhere i go and would love to investigate who the driver was and see there evidence. most of your drivers i have are rude and break the law by using there phone while driving next time i'll take my own evidence and report them everything i catch them using there phone while driving

Review Title: The Worst Customer Service in the Business
Review Body: they are an atrociously run company from top to bottom. the only people they treat worse than their drivers are their customers. they are rude, they ignore your emails and calls, they lie left and right. they are so big that they think they have zero accountability. i once had a driver who spent the entire 90 minute ride telling me and my girlfriend about how he had just gotten out of prison after a 20 year sentence for murder. he told us in detail. when i reached out to uber to ask if they screened their drivers, i was told this was a big deal and they would get back to me. never heard a word. they have lost my stuff before, and they just ignore you. uber can go to hell.

avoid!!! totally unsafe drivers who barely speak english and are not local to the area. why does the satnav take them the most ridiculous routes. i actually asked the driver to stop and follow my directions. these are not taxi drivers!! they are dummys with a satnav.

uber as a company sucks. here’s an idea, try making the people that are keeping your company afloat a priority instead of cheating drivers and customers out of money) imagine that a company that isn’t a total sh/t hole. can’t wait to continually review uber until their uber rating drops even lower than its pathetic star and a half.

absolutely rubbish service!  the company charges extortionate prices for short trips and always take a payment even if they can’t connect to a driver!  i didn’t even want to give them a 1 star more like no stars.  most drivers are rude and definitely against transgender people!  disgusting company.

always found reliable. however i pre booked a taxi with 2 hours notice and 3 minutes before it was due i got a text to say no drivers and try again. i couldn't risk it so had 5 minutes to get to the bus stop. this made me much later for work than intended. this should not happen when you pre book. 15 minutes notice would have made all the difference rather than 3!

really annoyed, scheduled a taxi for the train station 2 hours beforehand, driver initially accepted then cancelled right at the last minute and my entire trip was cancelled, had to book again and almost missed the train. if i cancelled on you guys, i would’ve been charged, but it’s fine for them to cancel on me?!

Review Title: If possible I would have given minus or
Review Body: if possible i would have given minus or zero star review used uber ride on 7th may they send me everyday discount vouchers for ride but when wanted to use it while booking the ride their site will not accept it but as was getting late for work took the ride thinking such big company when i raise the issue later they will keep their word but i was sadly mistaken thought it could be a genuine problem with their site mentioned this to driver he apologised but explained he can’t help but to take it with uber they will surely do something about it. initially i thought let me tell them through facebook messenger instead of talking or giving a bad review on social media but my experience has been horrendous first they refused to believe me wanted me to send them the picture of the offer then they wanted me  to prove actually it was send to my email address when i provided all the evidence they wanted a proof that their site did not accept it can’t believe they can not see themselves or trace it through their transaction how can i have prove that there was problem at their end in morning when you are rushing to office that’s the last thing in your mind they went on sending messages after messages in-spite of me asking them they can keep the money as charitable donation from my side probably they need it more than me and if for them couple of pounds more important then a loyal customer they are welcome to it. my advice never use their service rather call the local cab service help the local business , and though asked them not to send me any offer when they have no intention of honouring it they still are sending me these offers everyday. finally after chasing so much over three weeks they decided to refund the money...better late than never....they tired all the tricks not to luckily this time i had time on my hand to answer all their queries which normally one will not have anyway thanks.

what a terrible company. i was charged for a ride i never took. i did my best to find a number to call. there’s literally no options. so i’m out of money and this company can’t even help me with support. i called the driver line, which is the only number that exist, and the employee told me all i have to do is go on the ap and request a refund. i’ve tried that 7 times now. do not ever give your money to these people.

Review Title: Never had any problems with them in the…
Review Body: never had any problems with them in the past, but they have cancelled all the trips which i have planned 2 hours ago,saying that they don't have driver 10 mins before expected pick up time, telling me to get it later?? awfull service

driver, raymond, did not show up to our address. we texted and he claimed that he was there, but there were no cars on the street. he lied!!! then uber charged us a fee!!
we walked back, because uber could not be trusted to send an honest driver.

i took an uber from lax and had a terrible experience. the driver was great, once i could actually get him. i got in the laxit bus with no problem but the app wouldn’t let me put in my pick up spot. it took me over an hour to get it to work. - every time i tried to book it the price also went up to an astronomical $145. i should have just taken a taxi and been done with the process.

when booking my outgoing ride, it kept telling me my payment didn’t work. i finally got it to work after entering a credit card instead of paypal, google pay or apple pay. i should not have had to do that. i likely will think twice before using uber again.

don't use uber stowmarket the drivers are not trust worthy they said they waited outside our house for 11 minutes that's a long time with no contact or ringing the door bell.  when we checked with subway stowmarket the sandwich wasn't even made!!!! liars and thieves of uber stowmarket.

horrible customer support service. the driver drove the car at the speed of 20 km/h (to charge more obviously), as he said there was some issue with the car. then took rs.500 and told to add the remaining 200+ amount in my wallet as he did not have change but he didn't.
i didn't have internet connection at that time and he knew it otherwise i haven't been in this mess. i got to know all this when i reached home and connected to wifi.
later when i complained like several times, they kept sending only system generated emails and not answering to my emails 😠😠

terrible company!! don't turn up then claim driver phoned and waited outside premises. i live in a cul de sac and there was no phone call. when i try and get refund they copy and paste same response. absolute cowboys!
two drivers cancelled me today, horrible service, very unprofessional, unreliable, i rather walk than use this service.

Review Title: smoke-filled car was not the worst part, it was customer service
Review Body: the driver showed up in a car in which he had apparently just been smoking heavily. the entire interior of the car was drenched in cigarette smoke. absolutely terrible for a non-smoker to endure. of course, i thought uber would bend over backward to make this right and offer a refund. how naive i was (this was my first experience with their customer service). first, they sent me an automated response with a bunch of empty promises and $3.00 (yes, three) of credit towards my next ride or uber eats. i sent another email asking for a refund and got back an email even more pat and flippant than the first one. i will use lyft from now on.

Review Title: Wow threatened by an uber driver for…
Review Body:
wow threatened by an uber driver for booing wheel chair size van to accomodateca a small pushchair.....if yoibhave a young child like guide fldogs stay clear. still waiting for the mythical 2nd line complaints.


despite promised callbacks and a crime reference number uber couldn't care less. they promised a call back which has been in 48 hours received i96 hrs later we are still waiting.

the driver made religious threats against my wife and and uber management still lack the courtesy to call. booked a solicitor for monday

still waiting on uber to contact us back 6 days later . what a tragic company

will never use uber again.
very bad experience as two drivers left me and my two daughters on the side of the road at night.
very expensive if compared to local taxi hire.

uber takes forever. i live in a major city, and the app will say my destination time is 3pm...but at 2:50, the driver still hasn't moved from his location 15 minutes away. completely ridiculous. i'm only using lyft from now on.

i have used uber a few times in different countries and i didn’t have any issues until recently. i had an appointment at 10:00, i booked my ride through the app at 8:40 to be picked up at 9:20-9:30. i got an email confirmation of my ride so i thought all was good. the app was even counting down and telling me to go to the pick up point. there was no one there to pick me up. a few moments later, i got a notification saying there were no available drivers in my area. i saw on the map that there were 4 cars nearby so i booked again for pickup 9:30-9:40. once again, i receive a confirmation email of my ride, app counts down and nobody is there to pick me up. it was too late to look for an alternative way of transport so i had to cancel my appointment. i was so upset and just ruined my day. i just don’t understand the point of getting a confirmation email and then no driver is available. if no one is available, don’t confirm the ride and show that immediately! i won’t be using uber anymore as i wish to make it on time for any future appointments and uber just isn’t reliable.

Review Title: They are one of the worst company in the world.
Review Body: as a uber eats driver they are one of the worst company in the world.

having some spare time i decided to become an uber driver. without going into details this is a company that treats both riders and drivers like garbage. they are only interested in taking their fee, they penalise drivers with no basis to do so and there is no recourse. if you wish to work as ripped off labour then you are stupid. this company should be banned from australia. as a result of my experiences fir friends and family i recommend ola or even a taxi.

Review Title: They went to the wrong address and…
Review Body: they went to the wrong address and charged me a waiting fee for their mistake!! then they added toll charges and other fees for tolls that don't exist. a 0.9 mile ride that lasted 4 minutes was charged for 14.45. then they expect a tip after they overcharge you everytime. the drivers often go to the wrong address and their excuse is i don't know the area so why should it be my responsibility to know where we are going. they once cancelled a ride saying i wasn't wearing a mask but that was a lie. substandard service for a high price.

Review Title: I Love my drivers who work and show up
Review Body: i love my drivers who work and show up, i tip many times in cash and if not i give a good one on line! i hate i can't schedule rides as an ada person for work when the hours don't work! i need rid now and can't get one! 10:45 pm so sad! see the drivers don't want work because they either dont geta good tip to do it etc! now i cant even get a cab!  some of us take short trips but for 8- 10 for a mile or 2 this is huge and i will tip- the exclude cash or in the survey!! look uber/ lyft i would blow up every platform if i had bad drivers! i usually tip in cash and not even the percentage you offer much more!

Review Title: The lux driver made me and my…
Review Body: the lux driver made me and my colleagues wait 25mins then when she arrives, she said "oh i dont have space for 4" and left. and guess what? uber has done nothing to her account...

do not recommend this service!!
they love to charge you for waiting fee for absolutely no reason. they once charged me for a cancellation fee because the driver couldn’t be bothered to read the location that i’ve set for the pick up, he was in a totally different place and when he realised he couldn’t drive to me he cancelled my ride and charged me?? like it’s my fault he can’t do his job. the uber support service is the worst of it all such a useless service when you are demanding your money back. absolutely rip off
had confirmation for a ride to lax, 10 minutes after our pickup time we were notified that no driver was available..this happened at 3am, i will never use uber because of the inconvenience caused.

Review Title: Ripping off riders and drivers alike
Review Body: rip off for both the rider and the driver, they are charging more and more for rides and paying less and less to drivers, gas prices are rising and they pay you less lol

Review Title: What the bozooki is market place fee ?
Review Body:
what the bozooki is market place fee ?
charging me over $7 just stupid fees ( airport and market place)?
who gets that money ?
and me being nice and stupid tipped the driver $5 cash.
no more tips for your drivers. let them know

why are these charges not explained before the ride is booked?
ripoff

Review Title: Complete rip off for the driver and the…
Review Body: complete rip off for the driver and the passenger. uber is like a respect for the drivers relates and shines upon the poor customer service to the passengers. uber continues to steal from the drivers who have to pay for their own gas, pay for their own insurance, pay for the maintenance and repairs of the vehicle, and pay for the vehicle. it was recent theft from the drivers resulting in less drivers on the road especially with the increase in the cost of gas which pushes them to hold surge pricing against the passengers. passages of forced to pay a surge of anywhere up to $40 to which the surge allows them to steal for the funds from the driver when the surgeons are necessary if they paid the drivers properly to the initial 7525 split that used to exist when uber first started.

Review Title: Uber is getting worse by the day
Review Body: uber is getting worse by the day. the cars are old as ever now so you’re not getting the comfort of riding. i even had a driver who smelled like pure alcohol. i’m over it. too expensive to be risking my life

Review Title: So I was in a fender bender and I’m…
Review Body: so i was in a fender bender and i’m waiting for a car to be delivered from carvana excellent company on thursday, may 13 at 5 pm. i have been uber if to and from west ashley to mount pleasant and then mount pleasant back to west ashley daily to comply with my commitments to my industry at my business.  as this has been an experience and i have had to travel from west ashley to mount pleasant where i own a business and have utilized uber to and from. although it may not seem cost effective it is very difficult to rent a car at this time in 2021 due to the nature that there are very limited cars. with that being said today i ordered an uber to drive me home from my business that i own in mount pleasant to west ashley as this is been my travel pattern for the last week spending $60 a day plus a great tip to each driver as i’m a hairdresser and i know how much we take pride in what we do for a living i require and request and mandate a mask in my establishment. uber asks do you have a mask you check the box and say yes very tired today i get an uber the uber pulls up i put my hand on the door knob mask on and he was down the window and he says are you christine i pull my mask to my chin as i’ve been vaccinated i’m a 58-year-old woman i’ve had both my vaccinations i pull my mask down i say yes i go to open the handle to get in the vehicle he immediately pulls the window up locks the door and says you don’t have a mask on and he drives off taking my hand with him i now have to have an x-ray on my hand as this man sped off i don’t even know what to say at this point i’m completely baffled...

Review Title: Yesterday Uber stole money from me.
Review Body: yesterday, may 10, 2021, i took uber from laguna woods, ca to la, ca. we made 2 stops trying to find a safe hostel and they were both in bad areas, they didn't even have signs! so i chose a motel near lax. during the ride uber charged me three times while i was still in the car. i showed them to the driver ali and asked him to call uber to alert them and he refused. the false charges added up to $156.08. the valid charge is $111. 79. but, they cleaned out my acct. i had to take a lyft to lax from a hotel. i am stuck at lax because i cannot afford to stay anywhere. i will be sleeping in the airport for 3 days. i don't have enough money for the baggage and will try to find help from ohio. there is no way to reach uber customer service, just their stupid app. they will not call you. who knows if i will get my money back? all the other reviews do not look hopeful.

Review Title: I had terrible experience with Uber
Review Body: i had terrible experience with uber.  l recently used  uber taxi and  they charged me $40 just  cleaning fee for  the mess ( about less than ten flower leaves  and about two tea spoons of earth from my flower pots). the mess area was about  16"x 8" .i offered to clean it the driver declined. instead she did it herself in less than five minutes and then left and charged  exorbitant fee. i complained to the company about unfair charge but they sided with the driver. i was extremely disappointed with the company and l felt  that they ripped me off. the description of the charges on their website didn't reflect the fees they impose on me.this is so unfortunate for a company that provides public services for not  considering  the challenging times we are  living in.

Review Title: Driver  dint came to pickup spot and…
Review Body: driver  dint came to pickup spot and cancelled his ride and charge cancellation fees himself. poor app with poor pickup location. there is no customer service. i will delete my uber account. 0/5 for service.

i've been in marketing and sales for 40+ years. one thing you learn. customers want to say; i need a ride to xxxx and i'm willing to pay you.

they are not responsible for learning how to choose a destination in a poorly implemented app you made.

they don't care about your liability.

they don't care about your policy or rules.

those are all the responsibility of the company and those who work for that company.

i couldn't figure out how to choose the destination in the app. i was in a hurry. just going to my local walmart and right back.

i chose the option in the app, "choose your destination later."

i got into the uber. gave the driver the address of the local walmart where i needed to go.

he can't update whatever was his response. wanted me to open the uber app and go through whatever such and such to update it.

i got out of the car. i uninstalled uber and uber eats from my phone. will never use them again.

you can agree or disagree, but again, as a customer i should be able to tell the driver an address and be willing to pay for the ride. those are the extent of my responsibilities.

i can get into a cab and do that. i can post to the facebook group called arcade taxi and do that, *which is what i did).

if uber can't get to that simple level, then i have no use for them.

Review Title: UBER USED TO BE A GOOD COMPANY
Review Body: in the beginning uber was a great company. the prices were reasonable and so was the wait time. i used to use it all the time and would get discounts. now i order an uber to go from 187th. st. to 183rd. st. and they want to charge me $20 on any regular day and $40 or more on holidays!!! and the drivers are usually rude and not very helpful. who do they think they are with their poor service and outrageously high prices??? i have completely stop ordering uber and now i use other taxi companies who have flat rates and pick me up on time! i'm glad i no longer use uber and neither do many of my loved ones! goodbye and good ridance!

Review Title: Dear uber team,  This is to inform you that, 2nd time I'm not ride any more in uber car, because unnecessary I'm paying 350 Rs cash to your uber driver. Uber driver said to me.  some problem is happen
Review Body:
