Review Title: My booking was accepted I waited then…
Review Body: my booking was accepted i waited then the driver declined.  this went on for 40 minutes. the price doubled then my booking was accepted. how is this acceptable is the driver accepting my booking them entering a contract with me. if i had walked away and the uber turned up i would have been charged. this company ethically stinks. no compassion..during lockdown they were bending over backwards to support the community now they could not care less.

Review Title: The ride I had scheduled strung me…
Review Body:
the ride i had scheduled strung me along for nearly 45 minutes. when i texted the driver, he apologized and said he would come shortly, then he canceled at the last minute.
i had an early morning flight and couldn't find anyone to come in time, so i drove my car and parked at the airport for 130 dollars. had he the decency to cancel a head of time, i could have made other arrangements.
there are no repercussions for these people and uber makes no effort of following up or providing any way to track or make complaints. do not trust uber.

Review Title: Little bit overpriced but my driver was…
Review Body:
little bit overpriced but my driver was cool and all.
the ride was pleasurable, thank you jimmy.

Review Title: Dont trust time estimates given on Uber app
Review Body: app said 10 minutes.  after confirming we were told 33 minutes by our driver.  very deceptive and bad business.  i would have been better off taking a taxi at the airport.  cost was the same.

i've been trying to get an uber for weeks now since my vehicle has been in the shop. i cannot find a ride from uber at all! quite often the driver will confirm the ride, and then immediately cancel. leaving the customer completely stranded. i used to tell anyone that would ask how uber service was, that it's 100% better than a traditional taxi. however, over the last few weeks i have lost all confidence in the entire company. i suggest to anyone looking for an affordable, reliable ride to avoid uber at all costs. you will waste your time and just end up calling your local cab company for a filthy, stinking, crapcake of a ride....but at least you will have a ride. uber, i'm honestly disappointed, and have been left stranded more than once dealing with your lack-luster unreliable service....won't be long before you are just another failed business that refuses to listen to the consumer....i will give you a zero score if it allows me to, that's how bad your service is.

Review Title: I was using Uber some so many years but…
Review Body: i was using uber some so many years but now since this lockdown 2 started, all the cab drivers have started asking for extra money and they misbehave if you refuse to give them extra money. pathetic services uber is delivering. i have uninstalled the app and will use some other transportation app now!!

Review Title: Kept cancelling on me and then tried to charge a fee
Review Body: got messed about by uber for a journey in central london on sunday. ordered a cab, they said 'finding a driver'... they found me a driver... the driver cancelled... back to 'finding a driver'... found a driver... the driver cancelled etc. etc. after 8 or 9 goes, which took half an hour, i gave up and had to cancel, then get a black cab instead. got home to find they were charging me a cancellation fee because i had cancelled after more than a few minutes! cheeky. the customer support experience to get the money back was awful, and then the next day i found they had sent me three old uber eats emails (from 3 or 4 years ago), and partially recharged me for those orders! still battling now with uber eats over this. be warned, they are shysters, and will attempt to steal your money. customer support puts off answering your query as long as possible, asking you one question per day for many days, and never answering properly. very slippery. and they make you go through separate customer support for uber rides and uber eats, even though it was them that had mixed the two together somehow, not me. cancelling my account with both, not worth the hassle.

Review Title: Don’t Waste Your Time, Money, and Patience. Lyft is better
Review Body:
i started working for uber may 5, 2021 and have yet to use this app properly. uber driver app is having all around issues with keeping up their network, setting options, and driving preferences; the last being my main issue. the app will not allow me to toggle between “delivery” mode and “uberx” mode. i have called support for the last two days, the issue is resolved for only a few hours then proceeds to show the same disruptive behaviors. i haven’t been able to make and money due to this. i don’t see the point in allowing persons to rent hertz via uber knowing the app is not working properly.....


1.) the app keeps deleting all my documents
2.) uber app resets my driving preferences so im only able to deliver. i do not have the option to “reset” or “uberx “.
3.) my question regarding ubers professionalism and whether or not i’ll be refunded or credited went unanswered for the uber rental.
4.) i received a generic response that i’m not entirely sure came from a human being. and frankly all the customer service reps are poor in assistance.
5.) the issue is still unresolved.
awful drivers. awful service. avoid avoid avoid

around marietta, ga/ cobb county the service is terrible. constant cancellations, scheduling often cancels or 20-30 min late. it’s been a real pain in the ass lately. prob everyone collecting unemployment still or something causing this lack of drivers but at least lower the rates and increase new driver/ more driving incentives and implement solutions...

Review Title: Got a taxi was quoted £20 to take
Review Body:
got a taxi was quoted £20 to take
me home, a fair price the taxi driver missed the motorway junction and said i would be charged uber have charged me and refused to refund me the money.

quite scary they can take whatever they want from your bank.

i will be taking it further and reporting them to the manchester taxi authority.

i wonder if they do it all the time on purpose to make more money

the driver was late to pick me up. plus he did not want to drop me off where i wanted to and yelling at me that other way is better. then when drop off me in the car park not where my destination is . then he acused me for not wearing mask. i am wearing mask because im working in the medical center. this is a really bad behaviour for telling the thing that not true. the behaviour is not going to be tolerance. how dare you make false acusation on customer. and the uber customer service isnt helping at all. they forced me to take selfie of myself to prove that im wearing mask everytime when i ride. how ironic.

uber driver reports to uber that we were more than 4 people and hits us with an outrageous charge of about 4 times the normal rate (we took the exact same route 3 other times during the trip with my wife and 2 little girls) uber customer service only replies with premade responses from "the highest level of support" i will dispute with my cc and not longer use them for travel or eats or any thing else this company comes up with

uber didn’t show up!   i booked and “confirmed “ a ride the night before, but no driver showed.  to make matters worse, uber didn’t notify me until after the pick up time.  they had to know that no one was coming.  shame on you.

joke of a company! their drivers mess up multiple times n it's still your fault! if u have nothing important or meeting them go ahead n mess w this company! they could careless about u or your appts, only about their business n pockets! i will go w lyft n on lyft from here on out at least they care about who pays their paycheck n still take care of their employees! uber can go to hell!

Review Title: Bad service not from the drivers. From management
Review Body: bad service not from the drivers. but from management set one price.   then can find a driver.  they ask to try in a few i try now price is double.   it happened  a few times.   so from now on. taxi service.  they are cheaper and honest

Review Title: How many times have they charged me a…
Review Body: how many times have they charged me a cancellation fee when it is their  driver who doesn't turn up, or they don't wait for you to come out. happened again last night, had to walk home and then got charged £4 cancellation which is more than the trip would have cost!!  uber eats also terrible they charge you for food they haven't brought  and always, always get the order wrong. i'm done with uber, robbing swines.

Review Title: Unbelievable that this kind of service…
Review Body: unbelievable that this kind of service exists.... drivers who don't know to drive cars what are in a horrible condition...

Review Title: I have been a loyal Uber customer…
Review Body:
i have been a loyal uber customer taking a total of 1,320 rides with uber and placing 111 food orders with a rating of 4.95 out of 5 up until today. a driver by the name of asmae falsely reported me for not wearing a mask and mind you she never showed up to my location. the trip was canceled and i was subjected to facial recognition to book another trip. i was also sent an email stating that i was reported for not wearing a mask and i would have to take a picture showing i have on a mask for future trips prompting me to delete my account.

it is unfortunate that people like asmae are dishonest and will lie for whatever unknown reason. and she needs to remember karma is real.

i asked for a ride , the driver takes forever to answer, drives in circles, after 15 mins cancels my ride. result: i pay 6.25.

bye uber!

uber is just a great company to deal with.
uber has got a great app it is so simple to use from placing your ride requirements to reaching your final destination it tracks were you are at all times during your journey from pickup to destination
uber gives you loads of information letting you know when and where the pick up driver will be at the pickup address
it including drivers name and his vehicle type and just has important letting you know when the passenger has reached his or hers destination
the drivers i have used have been 5/5
uber dose what it says on the box
it’s been a great uber experience

Review Title: As uber rider I can say with full…
Review Body: as uber rider i can say with full confidence that uber is absolute “what bulls do after lunch?” 💩 in order to provide customer service or support service to their drivers. they keep charging drivers some any issues that happened on the road (claiming for poor customer service) but from other side these money never reaches customers. and from other side when driver unable to find me, or delivery location - they charging customer for canceling an order... but these money never goes to rider.

i received an impeccable service transfer from jfk airport to the hotel (5th avenue in manhattan) and subsequently on return. punctual, professional drivers. high-end vehicles and exceptional treatment.

i signed up with uber ride for the first time.  i found the app to be easy to use.  i scheduled a ride one week in advance for an appt. with my surgeon.  at the time the ride was supposed to arrive, uber sent me a text saying all drivers were busy.  the stupid assigned driver must have dropped me and taken a ride with a greater distance.  i had a backup, as i could foresee this happening so it wasn’t a disaster.  i was pissed and told my brother to sell this company’s stock.  they need someone decent like bezos to run the company like it should be.  well, i’m a very generous tipper.  i had cash in my pocket for the driver.  that is his/her loss.  i will never use this lame service again.  good riddance!

have to be the worst company on the planet , ripped off on surge , people in la using my account and awful support , they didn’t even get in touch with my friend when she got touched up by the driver ! she was so scared ! deleted the app now , i’ll stick to proper taxis in london , they have apps plus i can just raise my hand and see the metre as i go , all regulated by tfl ! they’ve been around 300 years for a reason ! uber ? never again

Review Title: Mate I'm really angered with your…
Review Body: mate i'm really angered with your service i've ordered 3 uber cabs to gade tower hemel hempstead and ur drivers are cancelling my pick ups an also being charged about 20quid for cancellation fees my kids and there are mum stuck trying to get my kids to school an get to work all u can do is take money out of her pocket an mine because ur drivers are thick dont know how to work a satnav i'm not happy atall and anyone who asking about uber i'm telling them dont go to them there rude an cancel ur pick ups and getting charged for it because they cant find an address joke

every time we order mcdonald’s the order is wrong and items are missing. we spend £18.54 on 2 meals and a mcflurry. the drinks were all wrong, the mcflurry was missing and our large chips were not even half full. there is no way to speak to customer service so we were offered a £1.50 refund. that didn’t even cover the drivers tip. don’t waste your time or money ordering mcdonald’s or using uber eats. stick to just eat because at least they have customer service.

Review Title: i was deactivated suposelly for GPS…
Review Body: i was deactivated suposelly for gps fraud.... wth is that i called 6 times and they said some one will contact me in 5 days its being 3 months and nothing.. im with lyft now. thwy just weird hope some one sees this and fix it but is a big companny and ptretty sure nothing will b done well they lost a great driver 5stars... in my first week leople would ask me wow 5star how manny yrs you being doing uber i would say 1 week they would say wow you are doing a good job. thank you to all my customers i drove safe to their destination uber did not took good care bye heloo lyft
my driver verlinda was definately a pleasure to ride with her very professional safe driver great conversation she should be one of the top star drivers what a angel

my driver was doing 110kph in an 80kph zone. he was tailgating like a mad man. see photo.

uber support was absolutely hopeless. template responses. hung up on me on the phone (i called their driver hotline as they provide no other support).

i’ve never felt so unsafe in a car.

i appreciate that the driver may have had nothing to live for, but drive recklessly on your own time - not risking my life.

i take an uber to work and back 5 days out if 7. always the sane route, price varies slightly because of traffic or time of day. yesterday, the uber driver took a right turn at some point rather than going straight, and i questioned it straight away but he told me he was just following the gps and anyway he couldn’t go back so had to carry on that route. safe to say it was longer and i was overcharged. i complained to uber and their reply was “speak to your driver if you have a preferred route”. i do have one! the one i take almost daily! i call that poor customer service and greed, therefore i’m done giving them my money.

Review Title: If we could give Uber a zero star we…
Review Body: if we could give uber a zero star we would. we scheduled a pick up the day before. the app read pick up in 9 minutes. when nine minutes expired the app then said trip cancelled! no drivers! what company in the service sector tells you this especially when it was a drop off at an airport for flights! uber should eat the cost for  missed flight! we’ll  use lyft or another service from now on!

ubereats sucks! you have the option to pay “priority”, as if their $6 delivery fee isn’t enough. you can pay $3 extra just so the driver doesn’t drive around with your order allowing it to get cold.

y’all suck and you may not care but you have lost another customer. no promos, no love, no business thx!

oh, and uber charged me $150 for a 20 mile ride home last night!

Review Title: My driver didn't show up and I missed…
Review Body: my driver didn't show up and i missed my flight it was a business trip and i missed my business opportunity ( i can provide the supporting document) also i had to pay an extra  350$ because of this issue

Review Title: My driver was rude and got lost and I was charged !
Review Body:
update- uber actually contacted me and refunded the overcharge.

i’ve been using uber for a good while now and never had a problem. until yesterday. my driver was rude and had no idea where she was going! my trip was only 5.6 miles from pick up to drop off and was in philadelphia. tell me how she wound up lost in new jersey?! when i finally said something, she gave me a cocky reply insinuating we were almost there, then asked me to use my gps! the original price was $38.79 but when i got home, i was charged $106!! why should i get charged for her stupidity! shes the driver! our trip did not include going to new jersey! how did a trip less than 6 miles wind up costing $106?!?! i’ve contacted the bbb and i’ll be taking whatever further action i have to to get my money back! this is insane!

Review Title: Hello I know u guys don’t care
Review Body:
hello i know u guys don’t care!
but for some reason i ordered a uber and sudenly it logged me out of my app, and i don’t know if the driver is on the way or not! and i need to get to work!!!!

horrible customer service.  incompetent and nonsensical.    i used uber regularly for a couple of years until 2-3 years ago when i was hacked (3 cars were simultaneously sent to my location). uber wanted to charge me $5 tip for each driver, so i disputed.  customer service was inconsistent and ridiculous, at one point indicating that they would charge me but give me credit for future ride.   due to the hack, i uninstalled the app and reported this to my bank.  my bank did not charge my card for the erroneous charges.    lately i attempted to download the uber app to give another choice beside lyft (that i've used since the uber hack).  when i tried to put in my credit card, uber would not allow it.... saying it has unresolved charges.   an uber rep said they would straighten this out, but guess what:  zero response.   best bet:  use another service.  uber customer service ranks among the worst and is untrustworthy

never use this service. waited 1 and a half hours for food delivery, app said driver had picked up and then they cancelled. when i queried they lied and said food never picked up.
this is the second time i have waited this long for the same result.
i will not use or recommend this company.
do not use - there is no service and they are not to be trusted.

the worst experience ever. i took a taxi to be in time at work and it was longer than by bus on other days. it took double time for driver to come to pick up point. when i wanted to cancel, it was said that i will be charged by 6£, so i just went on with my trip. when driver finely arrived he stopped on the other side of the road depside i did put the right postcode. when i did give him a sign that's i'm on the other side he turned  and stopped on the second lane of the road which is absolutely unsafe. at the end instead to stop to the closest point from my workplace as i said that i'm late he took me all the way around. extremely rude and unprofessional!

Review Title: Absolutely no way to contact Uber
Review Body: absolutely no way to contact uber. driver was scheduled day before. at time of scheduled pick-up, it was canceled. "no drivers available". too late to scheduled anything else to get to our flight on time. never will use uber again!

Review Title: The worse company who are getting money…
Review Body: the worse company who are getting money from people but now when uber doesn't have work for them as a company they have to feed the drivers coz that drivers are working hard to make uber. its a big shame for uber owner if they  call me i will tell all the unjustified experience with uber. because they are not only  professional people if you  said any thing against them they block you  but the government officials knows all  that.....

they deliver food cold. you even see in app the roure they're taking, use in app messaging to advise shorter quicker route. driver replies to say they don't care as they're not paid for shortest route. complain via. app when food is cold, they promise refund.  no refund so you chase, they adv refund already issued  please wait few days. no refund arrives, you chase again, they reply saying you can't get a refund as its over 48 hours since the delivery! uber are crooks. do not use.

used to be a great, cheap, and fast service in savannah ga. now it's just crap. rides take far longer, prices are surging nearly all the time with triple the normal price,very few drivers ever available. also some of these drivers are just plain horrible and scare the living hell outta me with their so called driving. i prefer the local transit bus service now.

Review Title: The worst experience of my life I…
Review Body: the worst experience of my life i missed my flight because of uber i have booked a uber taxi 4 day before my trip to glasgow airport on the 12th of april 2021 at 4.30 to 4.40 but i was very disappointed at the 4.40 they send me a msg couldn't find a driver and at that time i had no other option so i missed my flight because of uber i wouldn't advice to anybody to use uber especially if you catching a flight

after finishing an event at 11.00pm, two drivers arrived and cancelled without reason on us despite instruction by event staff. eventually a third driver picked us up at 11.50pm. we will not use this service again.

1. drivers are using the app as instant messenger, it's annoying.
2. when they are picking people up at the airport where i work, the raise the fee by three or four times what uber shows.
3. cars are not in appropriate shape, dirty, obviously been in car accidents.
4. someone was stolen by one of the driver, report came to uber and they said 'report it to local law enforcement'
5. where's the integrity?

someone needs to do something.

location: santiago, dominican republic

Review Title: DON’T SIGN UP TO DRIVE FOR UBER
Review Body: rip off company! i’ve been driving for uber for almost 2 years. they keep changing their rates, policies, quests, and promotions for their advantage only! they want you to loose so they win! they gave drivers fake promises when they voted to pass prop 22 in california, then after prop 22 passed, they started punishing drivers by removing fare multipliers and reducing rates! do yourself a favor and don’t driver for uber!

let’s start with the 1st bad experience i had. it was at patrick’s day and i was intoxicated so i called an uber. a man asked to split the uber with me. i didn’t think anything of it until he tried to force himself to come into my house. the female uber driver blamed me and said i lead him on. (which i didn’t. we were never physical and i did not know this man) she then said he had to stay at my place and he refused to leave me alone. i told her to take him where ever because i don’t know that man. she made me venmo her money on top of tipping her and paying for the ride. i contacted uber and nothing happened.
second experience was just a month ago as well but with uber eats. i placed a priority order and they assigned me a kid on a bicycle. this boy went 3 miles the opposite direction of where the restaurant was. by the time he got to the restaurant, it was closed and then my order was canceled. i could not place another order because all restaurants were closed.
now my third and final experience with this company. i preordered an uber to the airport 4-5 days in advance. the time i was supposed to leave, my uber still wasn’t here. i am spending about $150 more now because this uber i order never showed up so i had to pay for one week of airport parking so i didn’t miss my flight. i could have also bought a cheaper flight if i would have know i would have been driving my car to the airport instead of waiting on my uber that never showed up.
i can’t even contact uber because they don’t have a phone number to contact at this time. cant leave the company a review on their site because it’s not offered online unless you want to rate your past trip.
save your money and take lyft. they are usually cheaper anyways. but because of not one but three terrible experiences, i will never give my money to this company again. and i spent a lot using them. btw, did you know they charge a lot more if there isn’t any cars “near” you. let’s not forget the surcharges they charge people on the most alcohol related occasions. this company was a great idea to keep customers safe from drinking and driving but they literally screw you over over and over again and profit from you trying to do the right thing by not driving.
terrible service.  bad platform.  waited forever to get a driver.  i tried to cancel the request and could not do it.  i ended up taking bart and then got charged for a driver i did not use.

the drivers, when i get them, are fine.
the problem is getting a ride in the first place. if it's the wrong time of day, you aren't getting a ride.
if you're in the outskirts of town you'll get accepted and then cancelled by 4 or 5 drivers before someone actually picks you up.
my advice would be to have a backup plan. don't count on getting a ride before or after 9am/9pm. if you're on the outside edge of whatever town you live in, set aside 45 minutes of lead time to make sure you get a ride to where you need to go in time.

after booking a ride hours in advance, at the time the driver was set to show up to take us to the airport he messaged that he would be a “bit” late. i had to ask what that meant, he quoted another 30 minutes to which i questioned to make sure that he would be there by then. “probably not” was what i got back, and all other communication stopped. no other drivers available, and about 15 minutes later they auto canceled the ride.

Review Title: I'm so disgusted by this company I paid…
Review Body: i'm so disgusted by this company i paid for a pass a month for $34.95 i believe and there still charging regular. price when it's suppose. to be a less price i hope they go out of business. and there drivers suck so does the company!!!!

long wait times.
drivers have no clue on directions.

Review Title: Do not use this company it's a con
Review Body: do not use this company it's a con, waited for a taxi for 15 min then it was at wrong place, i then messeged the driver to say where we was waiting, he then cancelled the trip so i had to order another company. didn't notice till later that i was still charged as they said if they wait longer than 5 min u still get charged but yet it was him in the wrong place . absolutely discusting with how they can take your money like that , will be deleting this app

had a one-way uber from dulles to norfolk. driver was nice and car was nice. problem was that 1/3 way into the drive we(wife and 2 kids) realized that the vehicle had no ac.  contacted uber and all they said was sorry for your being uncomfortable for 3 hrs here's $5 uber cash for your issue.  poor customer service and not a way to hold drivers accountable.

Review Title: Driver a No Show; Bad Customer Service
Review Body: scheduled a ride to the airport for 6:15 a.m. pickup.  waited until 6:38 a.m. and no driver, so had to drive ourselves to the airport and pay 5 days airport parking.  uber charged us a cancellation fee.  disputed it and received refund to "wallet" to use for future uber use, but no refund back to our credit card.  credit to "wallet" is not satisfactory. want refund to our credit card. don't want to use uber again and no way to contact uber for credit card refund and no way to leave a negative review for the driver.  uber refuses to connect.  totally bad experience with uber.

Review Title: Drivers know how to make money out of…
Review Body: drivers know how to make money out of anything. just come and park in the wrong place. they don't work honestly.i will not use this taxi again.i'm deleting my account.

Review Title: Drivers do not know the directions
Review Body:
drivers do not know the directions, took me to wrong address then insisted i get out of the car. i refused but after 10 minutes i was late for my appointment. the driver left me stranded in the wrong location. i had to walk
another 15 minutes to get to correct address. absolutely useless company and drivers. definitely they are now cursed!!

an uber driver january 6th, 2020 falsified 3 trips all from the same location to the same location on the same day. i tried to dispute this with uber but they couldn't find the information. i disputed it with the bank and won. today i ordered from uber eats and they charged my account with those same fraudulent charges, this breaks multiple laws.

Review Title: I’m definitely selling my Uber stocks
Review Body: i’m definitely selling my uber stocks. been holding since ipo and now i know why the stock never goes up! it’s because it’s the worst service on the planet! they think they can keep your cash and mess up? forget sanjay the delivery driver! he’s in some location eating my food and enjoying my tip all on my expense. yea right, i’m on hold with my credit card company to reverse the charge! never again! first time ever using this service and man what a scam!

Review Title: Driver did not pick my son up at the…
Review Body: driver did not pick my son up at the location set by uber and would not go to correct location leaving my son stranded and i was still charged for it
garbage!!!!   had 2 drivers take my ride and then cancel.  it's a joke.

horrible service, unprofessional staff who are unable to help. unprofessional drivers who cant manage to pick up from correct location and drop off at correct location. driver removed his mask in the middle of journey. plus they tried to rip me off for waiting time that was caused by driver. instead of compensating they wasted my time. app deleted will be using bolt only! never use uber!!!

Review Title: Uber in the Fairfield area is…
Review Body: uber in the fairfield area is absolutely terrible . i ore schedule rides and they show up 15-20 mins late . if i even find a ride . multiple cancellations and the drivers will do so mins before arriving to your pickup .

the driver was great but my uber app would not add a second destination to the trip on march 31 st. so as i was only going to be in seattle for a couple of days i paid him $50 in cash. that evening i received a notice of a charge for the total trip on my credit card. i phoned their telephone number and spoke to an agent and she said not to worry she would rectify the situation. she never did!!! it is now march 6th and after numerous emails they have said they can’t find the trip so i copy and pasted the info and replied. i have now done this 3 times and it still has not been dealt with. last night i spoke to another agent who said she would pass all the information on to the proper department. i got an email back from uber in spanish ( i am not spanish) asking me to explain the problem that i had spent a half an hour on the phone explaining. unbelievably  poor customer service. finally on april 9th i received confirmation that they were reimbursing my credit card the  $50 i paid in cash.

update post original msg; i won my case in small claims. uber never appeared in court so i was awarded the default judgement against uber and i was awarded court costs. its time we take a stand again these big tech corps and ensure they provide us w proper service.


original msg; the app allows drivers to accept a ride then cancel. and the app charges you!

i am going to file a legal claim against uber if im not supplied a refund. on principle of course.

see you in the courts uber!

we can all do the same and drag them into local courts around the country.

Review Title: It seems as though Uber is more…
Review Body: it seems as though uber is more interested in their customers being friendly toward drivers than drivers being friendly toward customers based on how they place reviews. if you read up on it, they suggest you start a conversation with the driver, you may learn something interesting. we are the customers and don't have start a conversation with anyone. my husband passed away from cancer this year and in all honesty, i didn't have the mental or emotional energy to start a conversation with any stranger including uber drivers when i was making multiple trips back and forth to the hospital daily for 12 days. what planet are these people from? they want you to be friendly and drivers base part of their ratings of you on that but they are obviously too dense to even consider what their customers are dealing with. this company is a joke. we are the customers who pay them for a service and again, we do not have to start a conversation or even speak when using this service we pay for. i can't stress enough, we are the customers and we pay them. what the hell is wrong with these companies! i'm sick of it. if i told my customers i expect them to be friendly and start a conversation, i would be fired. it's called customer service.

Review Title: Uber charged me $6 as a cancellation…
Review Body:
uber charged me $6 as a cancellation fee when i did not even cancel the trip. the driver cancelled. after me waiting 25 min for him.
also why does uber not have someone u can call/ chat or email?

my brother left his phone in a uber car. driver was contacted by phone call driver answered said she was going to give the phone back. call the phone number back asking for directions where the phone or where to meet and a driver never responded. now i know never to trust an uber driver or this company!

Review Title: Done awful drivers and unethical company
Review Body: many drivers are starting trips but don’t collect you, and then charge for trips. uber initially won’t refund the trips but aware of issues and have to contact direct to resolve. seems to be happening more frequently!

Review Title: They connected me with a driver that’s…
Review Body: they connected me with a driver that’s 16 minutes away from me, now i’m gonna be late for work today when usually takes me 7-8 minutes to get to work , today it will take me 25.

i would give this no stars at all if i had a choice, i ordered my 1st uber ride yesterday to go to my eye doctor as i have had eye surgery the day before.and was not allowed to drive, 10 minutes past the pickup time i got a message the driver canceled. i had to drive myself and was late.
to add insult to injury i was
charged a cancellation fee. when i checked on that i found that the
driver went to the wrong address and addressed it wasn't even close to mine. now i will need another driver soon but i don't know what to do because uber is unreliable.

i highly recommend nobody becomes an uber driver! uber driver is the worst platform ever! they constantly keep putting flags on my account which is causing me to not have the ability to cash out my money. there is no security issue on my account! i am the only person who has access to my account and all i wanted to do was cashout my money like ive normally been doing and now suddenly there is a security issue on my account. cant cashout and cant pay my rent! they lie and say someone from the security team will send an email! thats a lie! because no one has reached out to me or resolved my issue! i still have no paid my rent because i cant cashout! dont trust these lying, scamming ass fraudulent people. i will be contacting the better business bureau about this first thing monday morning. an investigation needs to happen!

Review Title: They just a bunch of thieves I request…
Review Body: they just a bunch of thieves i request a ride from harrison nj to hackensack hospital 20 dollars + tolls are 2.15 uber charge 6 dollars on the way back the driver never show up he got lost and they charged me 5 dollars for cancellation i never canceld that ride 2nd driver show up with no problems and again extra dollars for tolls.what they do is they send the driver the long trips with tolls and customers been robe never again with uber.

ordered at say 8:30 . delivered 10:00 called 4 times. driver 2 minutes away .restaurant stated uber driver couldn’t find restaurant 3 times . 🤣🤣. food arrived stone cold.  bad service. unable to call uber. don’t order food after 8. you find a driver not willing to earn 5.00 plus an expected tip. in this case $0.00

Review Title: On Saturday 3/27/2020 I took a Uber…
Review Body: on saturday 3/27/2020 i took a uber service, the car was dirty and nasty, bottles of water,on the floor and the seat with black stain, i complained about this send it pictures how ruined and messed up my clothes was, requested my refund of $37.00, and the uber company gave me a credit of $5.00  for that and i as been back and forward with uber customer services and lately they didn't responded no more, i told them they can keep the  $5.00 and ill make sure to let everybody knows about this,its not the money its about how customers can be treated by drivers and the company  and after i as been using them  for years..never again ill ride in a car from uber and all customer people do not ask for uber service please another cars company doing better and more professional its a petty that i can't post the pictures of how nasty that car was and my clothes

Review Title: Absolutely the worst experience my wife…
Review Body: absolutely the worst experience my wife had to deal with today with uber lift. the driver was rude to her at the get got , loaded her wheel chair and asked her for a pin number. she new nothing about any changes uber has done we had no email or text of this change. being that she did not know of this new thing of having a pin number the driver became very rude and disrespectful to her and to her chair out of the car and thew it on the grown and kicked her out of the car. we tried all day today to get ahold of customer service with no avail . we will no longer us uber as a transportation for her needs, uber has no customer support , and no easy access to file a complaint. the absolute worse service i've seen from uber. this company need to have better customer service that one can access with ease without having to go through multiple functions that get you nowhere.

Review Title: Never there when you need them
Review Body: i was in a car accident and was recovering. car was totaled. uber drivers never show up and made me late for several doctor appointments. doctors do not like late. i rescheduled and uber still did not show up. i would rate lower than 1 star if i could.

Review Title: If I could give them no stars
Review Body: if i could give them no stars, i would. booked a ride to the airport a week in advance. morning of, and after the proposed arrival time for my pickup, i tried to call the driver as the car had not moved for several minutes. no answer and then i get a notification that the driver cancelled the ride and uber is sending a replacement ride. he shows up, tells me that he doesn’t go the that specific airport, gets in his car and drives away. i had to scramble to get alternate transportation. never again will i use uber.

terrible customer service. there is no phone number to call for help... there is no way to contact them over the internet. the only way to even try is through their app - and when you don't have your phone.... you can't get help...
i left my phone in an uber car and noticed almost immediately. i asked the hotel representative for help and we looked up uber - but there is no way to contact customer service without using the app...
i didn't have my phone so could not use the app. the hotel representative let me use her phone with the uber app and i used this. the only thing that happened was that i received an email that said that i had contacted them....nothing about what to do next or if they had contacted the driver.... nothing....
we kept calling my phone and finally the uber driver answered. he said that he had just started his shift and didn't know when he could drop off my phone. i asked if i could request a ride from him so that he could put this in his schedule and drop off my phone but he said that even if a friend ordered a ride that he could not guarantee that it would be him who would get the ride. i thought that i would maybe find a way to contact uber to make the request for him ... but again there is no way to contact uber....
this was beyond stressful as i'm traveling and my flight is leaving in the morning....
my life is in that phone .... i really needed that phone and was willing to do just about anything to be sure that i got it back.
the uber driver did drop off my phone - i'm not sure if he had to take a break to do this - and am beyond grateful to have it back...
uber has no customer service....
after all of this....i went on the internet to look up lyft (which i've never used before). lyft has a customer service line and a way to contact them over the internet. uber does not even have a way to contact them over the internet - it has to be app only and when you don't have your phone - you don't have the app...
i've always been a good customer - and don't understand why uber wouldn't help me... and wouldn't reach out to me at all after filling in all of the information they requested from the app - including my email address and the hotel phone number...
obviously - uber doesn't care....

Review Title: I can’t believe what just happened to…
Review Body: i can’t believe what just happened to me yesterday. i’ve been using uber for almost than 2 or 3 years ago. i just always open the app, enter the address to where i want to go and press confirm and that’s it. first time some kind of imitation of a driver, call me to told me that i pinned the wrong address to pick me up. i had never changed my residential address on the app. he told me with the worst attitude, that i pinned wrong my own address, that he was in other place that “i pinned”, that he is not from the area. that he doesn’t knew it. i was seeing him on the map, closer. he was totally rounding other place that i have never pinned on the app. i think he doesn’t wanted to pick me up because the ride was a cheap one. my ride was around $7 (that is not common lately), the next one that i asked was almost $20 for the same address. what going on with you uber? you’re obviously accepting all kind of people to drive, your quality is not the same that started years ago and the worst part is that your prices are pretty much higher in comparison than when you started. finally, you are starting to became equal or worst than taxis. it was all matter of time.

Review Title: I’ve been using Uber for almost 3 yrs…
Review Body: i’ve been using uber for almost 3 yrs it’s been good here and there and now all of a sudden the prices are going up extremely high for no reason from home to work is only 7-10 mins and some times it’ll cost $9 then it’ll change within time to like $20-30 this isn’t right and it’s always telling me “ all uberx are unavailable at the moment try again later “ then when they find someone it’ll be someone that is at least 25 mins away from you because that is the “ closest driver “ i’ve never had this issue w drives and the price till just recent and this is very very unacceptable 😤😤😤
the worst company ever!!!! i booked my ride 24 hours ahead to the airport and at the last minute they said there are no drivers available. do not recommend this to anyone.  next time call a taxi 🚖

i had a problem with the driver. he spent the whole trip wasting his time to try to receive more money. i sent a message to uber and they did nothing. i used to take ubers 3 or 4 times per week. i won't use uber anymore. very disappointed.

i booked a trip. i got a confirmation that my driver was enroute. he never arrived and would not answer his phone. i left a voicemail on the driver’s phone cancelling. uber would only allow a cancellation if i agreed to pay fee. the driver cancelled defensively stating that my party refused to wear masks. this was a complete fabrication. uber’s complaint system will not allow me to refute the driver’s lies.

horrible experience with uber.
i booked 4 hours ahead for my 3:00pm ride to the airport. i got a confirmation that my ride was booked. just before 3:00pm, i received a notification that my driver was on the way. a little after 3:00pm, i received a notification that no uber car was available. i almost missed my flight. how would anyone feel if they received confirmation of their flight, car rental or hotel booking and when you arrive, they tell you it’s not available. this left a very bad impression on me. i will never again use uber.

Review Title: Let me start by saying that Uber…
Review Body:
let me start by saying that uber service is awful i did put one star because i had to otherwise, i won’t put any star because the company doesn’t deserve it. i did request a ride 2 hours in advance for my son to be picked up only to receive a message saying:
“no drivers were available for your scheduled ride” you’ve could told me that before an hour at least i could’ve made arrangements and not leaving my son stranded. what if it was an emergency or a life or death situation, that shows the company lacks professionalism and not worthy any positive ratings. i’m sure my review is not worthy your time because the negative ratings the company has doesn’t seem to bother the higher management or the owner!!

Review Title: Left my phone in an Uber cab
Review Body: left my phone in an uber cab, never got it back. the lost property system is not fit for purpose. there’s no contact number, no one calls you back, certainly not the driver, and none of the people i corresponded with gave a crap about solving my missing phone. after a week of hassling i was presented with “my phone” only it was the wrong model, colour, and condition. i have deleted my account and would never use this arrogant dishonest company again.

Review Title: I just want to let you know that there…
Review Body: i just want to let you know that there is a driver who delivers food. his hands are dirty he's smelly and doesn't have the hygiene for a person you would delivering your food
absolutely awful company stealing from poor charging more from customers paying less to drivers dont use awful company should be banned

i ordered an uber and i paid waiting for my uber. after it took my money it notified me that the driver are busy. i then thinking my money wasn’t taken place another uber as it told me to try again & then again takes my money & notifies me 3 min later the drivers are busy and to try again. i then try yet again and bump into the same problem. i then transfer to lyft and i went to check my account and uber had taken three transactions of my money. i messaged customer service twice and received no response. i check back this morning and there’s nothing, my account was no longer was showing the transactions but i still don’t have the money placed in my account. this is horrible customer service and a horrible app & would rather take my money to lyft.

Review Title: Your service sucks and had me waiting 3…
Review Body: your service sucks and had me waiting 3 hours , yous should let the company go if you can't find drivers
horrible customer service for drivers and riders.

very bad service, they are not giving god costumer served, and driver today is say i did not come to the place where him never come, and they charge me £6,00, and costumer service saying going to investigate to give me my money back, i don’t recommend this 🤮🤬

this is what happens when your uber driver doesn't show up! we just returned from our 7 day trip and paid $160 to park at the airport garage. if you’re wondering why we parked at the airport garage instead of off-site parking, well, it’s because we didn’t have enough time!
this vacation cost us over $7,000 and we have planned it for a long time. the last thing…the very last thing…we didn’t expect was to be stood up by uber. well, we were.
and you’re offering $3 in credit is a crime…a joke!

Review Title: Uber has become an absolute nightmare
Review Body: uber has become an absolute nightmare! no drivers available and when you do get a driver they say because they are busy the fare is 20 bucks to take you less than a mile because they are busy!

Review Title: After back and forth emails for 3 days…
Review Body: after back and forth emails for 3 days trying to setup my account, i resolved the issue myself because customer service is basically non existent, and then i fly halfway accross the country just to be left tranded for 2 hours and kept being denied for rides while they had drivers in the airport... 3 of them... just sitting.. doing nothing... dont tell me you have rides available if your drivers are not going to accept the route. horrible first experience and will not be using it ever again.

Review Title: ride was fix at rs89 and after…
Review Body: ride was fix at rs89 and after completing it shows rs 120 so i have to give rs30 more to uber auto driver...i thing uber cheated every customer.

stay away, stay away, stay away. absolutely do not use this company. their loyalty is to money and their customer service is non existent. i have no problem with the driver's. it's the company. after using uber a few times, i tried ubereats. because of my experience with them, i've deleted all of my uber accounts. my problem may seem minor, but i still hold to old school beliefs. you get what you pay for. i paid a good bit and got nothing. not even an attempt to refund. if i wanted "buyer beware", i'd have gone to a used car dealer.

Review Title: Uber made me late for a flight…
Review Body: i scheduled a pick up for a ride from my home to the airport it was confirmed until exact time the app said an uber would pick me up then notified me no available drivers so we were late for our flight not good uber you should let people know this ahead of time!!!

i was appalled with the service i received. the driver i was assigned recently, was verbally abusive, took a deliberately long route and asked for supplementary fair in cash despite me having paid the full uber fair within the app.
i've left multiple messages on the application but i have unfortunately received no response. i have been shocked with the lack of customer service and support and i shall be telling people about this experience.

Review Title: Driver went to wrong location and I was…
Review Body: driver went to wrong location and i was charged wait time, i was fobbed off by three messages i sent so i phoned up to be told we don’t do refunds but we will put a credit on your account to cover the wait time two weeks later this has still not been done, i’ve just phoned up again to be told it was reviewed and no credit is due and the guy put the phone down on me, i won’t be using uber again i would rather wait a bit longer and use a local taxi firm.
don’t bother. ordered some food with ubereat and the driver took off with it.

awful customer service, explained issue 3 times but it was ignored every time. requested their complaints policy but they ignored the requests. not valued as a customer, poor experience with drivers and will not use again.

Review Title: Often Uber driver app get hacked
Review Body: often uber driver app get hacked, if you want to report this issue there is no one to help 24/7 . only office hours are 10am to 5pm how you can run a company like this ? if you call also only roberts talk to you. you won’t get help . uber become monopoly no one is there to question them , no government is take action against uber .

not recommending uber. it failed me twice lately. first, three drivers weren't able to locate me (i even tried different pickup locations in the part of the city with low-rise buildings) and they just left, and uber charged me $10 for each of those "cancellations". when you're trying to dispute the cancellation on their website, the form for it is always hanging not allowing you to proceed with dispute process.
another issue was that the application stopped connecting to network, while all other apps on the phone had internet connectivity. rebooting the phone didn't help. eventually i had to reinstall the app and the app connectivity restored. spent lots of time trying to figure out this issue.
the company doesn't seem to care about riders.

Review Title: Uber is so ridiculous one of the worst…
Review Body: uber is so ridiculous one of the worst experience! some of the drivers are rude and will literally act like they picked you up when they didnt just to take your money or will leave you when you have multiple stops! then uber will say 4 drivers near by but nobody wants to pick up the request or they are way too far just ridiculous i pray i get car soon i hate uber!!!!

Review Title: We booked an Uber 2 days prior to…
Review Body: we booked an uber 2 days prior to needing to go to denver airport. app showed ride on its way all the way up to the very last second that it showed it was arriving. then i get a message saying no drivers available. unbelievable!! now i'm trying to find away to airport.

uber motto is absolutely boggus. the drivers are not ready to accept rides over short distances. they'll call you, ask your destination and if it's not to their liking, they'll cancel on you. i had a terrible experience today while trying to book a ride for myself. i had four consecutive drivers cancel on me. i was extremely displeased.

ordered food through uber, they sent the poor driver to the wrong address where he searched and contacted me by phone (wasn't even the right town) and spent 20 minutes trying to sort out what had gone wrong and how to fix it.
unable to resolve he returned the food asking his manager to contact me. i heard nothing, contacted uber directly (restaurant said i needed to go through uber). uber claimed the driver searched for 20 minutes and i wasn't answering my phone and closed the case - no refund. actual rip off, money for nothing.
feel really sorry for the driver too, we had 3 conversations trying to get it resolved, unlike the online box ticking exercise from uber and immediate case dismissed auto response.

used uber eats last night.  placed order only for the driver to go to a different address with our food.  he phoned to say he had arrived but when we said that is not our address and gave him the correct address he said we would have to pay him extra.  when we refused to pay for his/ubers mistake he got very threatening and abusive. needless to say we will not be using uber again.

Review Title: Charged more than double than normal
Review Body:
this has nothing to do with the driver!!
über raised my normal, average $12 for a 4.2mi trip to $31 today, as the cheapest option.
of course, i can't find a contact # to ask why they charged me over double the normal rate and to make it right.
why am i paying almost $8/mi.?
i still tipped because my driver was great.

Review Title: Just got my order from Starbucks
Review Body:
just got my order from starbucks
the driver literally dropped the bag we saw from the window
went out to see and contents were spilled in bag half my drink was gone spilled and the other had the drink come out and was all over containers it had whipped cream
catching him before he went in his car we asked that he inform them he dropped it and order was no good.
he claimed he didn’t speck english put up his hands like oh well and left
15 dollars down the drain.
this has happened before and i’m sick of being told there’s nothing they can do. get people with morals not people that know they do things and walk away
this one was the worse this attitude just wow
he should t be a driver gives a bad name to the company
he knew he did it

Review Title: I'm just waiting for my points to get…
Review Body: i'm just waiting for my points to get my reward and then i'm out. too many times i've been charged, only for the ride to not come. why don't you guys just wait until a driver is on the way to charge me. now...again...i have to watch my account to make sure the money goes back...because sometimes it doesn't. completely aggravated because again...i've paid for a ride that isn't coming.

Review Title: Disgusting the way I have been treated
Review Body: disgusting the way i have been treated. uber do not have liability for their the drivers! they are not accountable for anything they do and once they cancel a fare the drivers fall of thr radar! they left my family in the rain because the fare was only 3.10 and he can get a 4.00 cancellation fee! not the first time this has happened to me even though he refused the fair for no reason. i'm taking this further, i would not let a loved one use this service any more sick of them ripping me off and not being accountable. i will be going back to my local taxi firm whom can be trusted. do not use uber

scammers. i wouldn't of given this company 1* from taking my money and only half of my food shopping arriving but this time they owe me 14 items, costing nearly £24. i reported it straight away in there app and then i chased it up a few days later to recieve an email saying "unable to provide a refund for an order that has been placed more than 48 hours ago"
this isn't the first time. how frustrating when the app clearly states i complained straight away whilst the driver was at my door triying to call uber with no joy and said "they just give him my shopping". in the end i had to look uber up to call customer service to flag this problem up, i then recieve another automatic email saying "unable to provide a refund for an order that has been placed more than 48 hours ago" the app clearly states my complaints messages from the moment the driver turned up with half of my shopping.

Review Title: I’m not a fan of driving in a strangers…
Review Body: i’m not a fan of driving in a strangers vehicle. however, i ordered a ride for my mother. my mother had a very important chemotherapy treatment, i was unable to get to her so i ordered her a ride. the ride arrived on time and got my mother to her appointment safely. however, my mother forgot her cell phone in the vehicle. the driver drove back to the hospital later and dropped the phone off. about six hours later i noticed uber charged us for the driver returning the phone.  very disgraceful! my mother was an elderly cancer patient nervous about her cancer treatment, not an irresponsible college kid. needless to say i won’t use them again, they are challenged ethically as outlined by their driver getting attacked in san francisco. the company only offers $20... unreal! save your money, take public transportation.

customer service is absolute garbage. they do not care about their drivers nor do they care about their riders. they charged me on a corporate card and within minutes of receiving the transaction i attempted reaching out to them for assistance in changing the payment method. i spent over 2 hours searching for a way in get in touch with someone. eventually i just had to file a complaint that my driver was late (this is unfair for the driver and i left a note that it was untrue and i wanted to speak to someone immediately about switching the payment methods). immediately they updated the charge. without any regard for the driver and/or reading the note that went along with my request. i spoke to a different person every single time via chat. nothing was resolved and i will never use uber/uber eats ever again.

i want to give 0 stars. uber need to hire more drivers in toledo, ohio. they also overcharge me for rides. why does it cost $30-$40 when i only live 10 minutes from the destination i’m trying to get a ride from. and then drivers wonder why their tips aren’t what they want it to be, the company sucks. i can hardly ever get rides, but the company wants to charge $30. i’ve currently been trying to get a ride and haven’t had on driver in over an hour!

great drivers great service.  however, i have been over charged more times than i can count.  i reviewed all my trips with uber and found hundreds of dollars of over charges charged to my bank account.  one in september i was charged over $40.00 for a trip that normally cost me $26.00.  i just found out today, but it was over 30 days old and they will not refund me for over charging.  they have constant debits and credits going through my bank account, that it has made my head spin. they hold onto money that you didn't spend and then they refund you 5 days later and take that same amount and debit it from my bank account.  i have lost a lot of money due to their payment method.  if you don't want this to happen, then i suggest you take a cab/taxi.

i tried to get this app in order to schedule a ride for later in the day since the lyft app had a problem with schedule function.  the app malfunctioned, sent me a car right away and i had to ask he driver to cancel since no response to attempts with app.  i was charged a cancellation fee and enrolled in the $9.99 per month pass without authorizing anything.  my bank is processing dispute on pass cost and putting a block on any future charges for said pass.  trying once again on the app to cancel the pass enrollment there was no option to be found.  i have deleted the app and will not use them for rides in the future.

is most disrespectful taxi platform ever existed, cheating the customers by showing them , they cares , but they only care about the money, also never respect their drivers.. uber should be stop to be operating in uk
rubbish company stealing poor drivers times and money

unhelpful would be an understatement., its worse, the double charge, they pretend to not understand, the are the leaders of runaround conversations and if you want to atear clear of a company that doesn't care, pay a taxi driver lol they might rip you off but uber will do it and pretend they care

Review Title: These people are getting worse and…
Review Body: these people are getting worse and worse by the day. half the time i can't even find an uber in the second biggest city in massachusetts. when i do, i constantly get drivers that take the job and then cancel after i've been waiting for 15 minutes. ridiculous and very unreliable

this was the first time i have used uber.  i scheduled an early morning trip to lax, very little traffic on the road or at the airport.  the estimated price was within an acceptable range with the caveat that we would be notified of any changes in advance.  no mention of “surge pricing” or “push notifications.”  i had to do some deep internet searching to figure out what those were (after the ride).  i tipped the driver cash based on what i thought was the maximum estimated charge.  the final charge on my credit card was nearly 3x the maximum price estimate for the trip.  i didn’t know to turn on push notifications for the app, even if i had, being presented with an option to reject the offer at the last minute with no time to book an alternative smacks of bait and switch tactics.    uber’s offer to partially compensate for my misunderstanding with “uber bucks” in no way assures me that i won’t be ambushed by the same tactic next time.  this practice is deceiving and predatory and it is unlikely i will ever choose their service again.

uber drivers are unprofessional and lazy. they also like to act like they are the law. got a bunch of lip from a driver crying because i wasn't wearing a mask and i wasn't even in the car. uber is garbage, i'm a lyft rider from now on.

too bad, worst customer care for drivers. i got difference of nearly $3700 in tax statements.
since february 2021 to may 30, 2021 never heard anything from uber customer care.
driver canceled trip last minute.  the trip was an airport ride loosing the airfare due to not finding another car ride. can't rely on uber for emergencies.

Review Title: Uber said 15 mins till my ride was…
Review Body: uber said 15 mins till my ride was going to show up. waited for an hour and right when my driver got here she cancelled and had to wait another 15 mins for another driver! this is ridiculous and terrible service!

really poor.
paid £48 for subway sandwiches. these were a treat for someone retiring for lunch. uber driver picked the order up but never delivered it to us.
i will not use them again and urge others to do the same.

Review Title: I scheduled an uber ride 12 hours in…
Review Body: i scheduled an uber ride 12 hours in advance and was given confirmation.  the next morning when i was scheduled to have my ride, the app guided me to the spot where my ride was supposed to be but no one was there.  shortly after, i received notification that no uber drivers were in my area.  now i was in a rough area in and this put me in a bad spot.  luckily nothing bad happened.  i am very aggravated and plan to never use uber again.

i downloaded app because i haven't used uber for 3 years and had deleted it. the app already had the wrong destination loaded and prices. picked uberxl for $10 but couldn't change drop off location, so i did not confirm, as i was going to lyft app the driver from uber shows up and i explained the problem. he changes drop off on his iphone and cannot tell me the price? i said ok unfortunately. 14 miles w/ no traffic 20 minute ride according to gps. cost $38.95. uber might have charged $10 plus $29. rip off!

what's the point of the "schedule a ride" option when you do it and never get assigned a driver??? i was supposed to go to a class, and so i scheduled a pickup window of 5:10-5:30, and it stated that i had an upcoming pick up. i never got a driver, and no one ever showed up. it's so stupid

f uber! horrible customer service. overly charged, they charged me $70 for a 3 mile trip. when according to uber before being picked up my ride was suppose to be anywhere from $15-$25. on top of that, my driver took unnecessary routes to my destination. when i tried to resolve this issue with uber. they decide to get back to me 30 days later, just to tell me they can't do anything, or issue me a refund after 30 days. f uber!!

Review Title: I will never use Uber again
Review Body: i will never use uber again. in one day i have had to wait over two hours for my driver's. my second trip, someone 4 minutes down the road from me accepted my ride. just to sit in a parking lot and make me wait 30 minutes before canceling the ride? now i have to wait another 30 minutes for a driver to finish a trip then to pick me up. public transportation is more reliable at this point. i just wanted to go home early like damn.

this service has become absolutely terrible at least in phoenix! sent drivers to wrong location 2 times on my arrival, left me stranded the other evening with no cars available. scheduled ride 24 hrs in advance for airport today, showed a car was coming and then no cars available!!! left me hanging. never again app deleted, maybe try lyft. rider beware!

i had multiple charges on my account for ride's i didn't take. just a few minutes ago i had cancelled a trip for which a driver refused pickup (11:55pm) instead of being charged a $0.50 cancellation fee, i was charged the full ride amount $12.69. they don't have a chat line, or a live customer service hotline. i've only used uber for a week and have had issues since. i work a graveyard shift and they either refuse my trip, arrive 10-15 minutes early and charged me the wait fee, or they come late.  i definitely don't recommend service from uber. don't waste time disputing charges because they wont get back to you! how sad. very poor service!!!!!!

app and website throwing an error when trying to tip. ‘something went wrong, please try that again.’ i asked customer support they told me everything except a solution. delete the app re install, credits can’t roll over, you can tip in cash (no kidding but can’t after the driver leaves), payment method is incorrect (using uber cash...), clear safari cache (using the app..), update ios (it was a fresh install). i’ve spent over a day trying to tip my driver - sorry barbara.

i feel their customer service reads maybe 1 sentence then pastes a canned response. no authority or ability to fix problems.

the worst service ever. i waited 25 minutes for a ride and 5 minutes after my ride was confirmed it changed to me having to wait another 30 minutes! and then 5 more minutes go by and now it's telling me another driver is coming to get me. i finally get picked up and the young driver decides he's going to speed and almost hits a cop car that was backing out of a driveway. then the cop stops at a red light and he almost hits the cop car coming with in two inches of the cops bumper! and for him speeding uber wants to credit me $5.00! thanks but no thanks i will never take an uber again and same goes for my friends and family. so much for helping those who report unsafe driving skills! you really screwd up uber! you lost me as a customer for good!

Review Title: Hi plz be very careful using this…
Review Body: hi plz be very careful using this service uber it’s not good service at all gives you two different prices . charges the customer more and pays the driver less basically it’s a rip off service and not safe at all for customers. i would definitely not recommend them at all

okay so i personally respect the drivers who are serving us but this company never gave back to community. showing new offers but u not gonna get any when u gonna use them and that’s ridiculous.pls don’t make fool people by just showing the offers when u can’t claim to them i am possed off with paying a big amount

Review Title: This app deserves less than 1 star
Review Body: this app deserves less than 1 star. booked uber, driver used different navigation. at the end there is no road(end of road). need to come back whole way. it took more than 1 hrs than normal time. after finishing trip, charged more than 3 times. tried to contact uber, but you can't.

Review Title: This company its absolutely a joke They…
Review Body: this company its absolutely a joke they don't want to pay drivers on the right way they don't give more boost and they charge service charge to the customers and now if you want your fast delivered to your home you have to pay extra fee and that money are going into uber company not for drivers! absolutely joke. for a trip a driver earn 2.50 and they make more than a driver in one trip with servicecharge and fast delivery option. absolutely ridiculous. for the new ppl that want to work as delivery food i recommend to work for delivero and just east much better that uber. hope this company close or some legal institution help drivers to have a better life. they are criminal  they just think to make money and don't think to the honestly ppl working for them. we need an organisation that investigated uber, somene have to help us!

Review Title: Do not trust Uber Never Again!
Review Body:
do not trust uber. they are dishonest and do not protect costumers. a trip that was set up for $24.23 dollars ended up in $105 dollars because driver overcharge surge of $77.54 dollars without any real reason. uber recognized it was not a correct charge and gave me refund in uber cash. i told them that i want a real refund to my credit card and they close the case and never listen to me again. there is not a phone number to complain and get a real refund anymore. the number they give is not answering anymore.
that was august 2020 now is february 2021 and i still don’t have a refund. i am afraid to use uber cash and get more unwanted charges by uber.
at this point, i lost my 77 dollars towards to uber.
i ll never trust any of this private taxi companies anymore. it s better to take conventional taxi drivers.

wrong order delivered. rang uber driver who said he was “just the driver” and not his fault. he wasn’t interested in the slightest. rang restaurant who also said it wasn’t their fault and they rely on the driver collecting the correct order....no receipt supplied and restaurant not prepared to send out correct order. someone needs to be responsible for mistakes surely???

Review Title: Fantastic driver on the premium end
Review Body: fantastic driver on the premium end. understanding, even was i was clumsy in nudging the baggage door in loading my bags and stopping the door with my foot. uber has grown to be a world class company.

Review Title: i have been catching uber for a few…
Review Body: i have been catching uber for a few months. i never had any problems till this evening.this is the #rd time they take money from my account and on this evening i schedule an uber and i had to cancel but still took my money and i want it back this is the worst transportation service who can i talk to far as getting my money back.also the driver never showed up they take tips out your account and hardley ever i tip the drivers.

Review Title: Biggest piece of s*** driver there is…
Review Body:
biggest piece of s*** driver there is on earth. uber driver runs me off the road when i'm trying to merge onto the highway intentionally speeds up.
black subcompact. lic #aac-e99
needed ride to emergency room.  3 drivers canceled.  one as i walked to their car.  then saw i had been charged.  no ride received.  bs

Review Title: This is the worst service ever
Review Body:
this is the worst service ever.
i scheduled the uber, and the app showed me more than 4 drivers had canceled in a row, i was worry they won’t make it by the time i supposed to be at work. so i scheduled a lift and the app didn’t let me cancel the ride with uber. so i ended up taking the lift to work and paying both of them (lift and uber). i’m gonna cancel their service is real bad. lift has better rides and you can trust them.

Review Title: Uber stole $42 from my account on a…
Review Body: uber stole $42 from my account on a credit card that wasn't even mine. the card was a friend's who ordered food for us about 6 months ago. i ordered food on my card last week. idk why it got declined when i clearly had enough to cover the bill. so instead of asking me for another payment method they just went into my account and grabbed whatever card number they wanted without my permission. this is credit card theft. i'll be contacting the police and bbb. shady ass company beware of them. they're the worst out of all delivery company's and the most expensive as if they are the kings of delivery. their drivers always get lost and bring my food cold. useless ass people. i'll never order from them again. doordash is 10 times better then these thieving scumbags!

Review Title: Same place different fair prices and smaller car going back
Review Body: never had a problem with any of the drivers my beaf is they charge u 53 $ to get to jfk from massapequa and 76 for a smaller car to get home . i will not be using them any longer

Review Title: A driver called me and told me he was…
Review Body: a driver called me and told me he was waiting for me. it was 5:00am. i never ordered a uber. he charged me $20. there is no way to get in touch with anyone in uber. i have ben trying to rech someone.

Review Title: Most of the drivers are unprofessional
Review Body: most of the drivers are unprofessional. they accept pick ups but then don’t show, the trunks are not for use even though their picking up at the airport and there are electrical problems preventing windows from rolling up. their attitudes are even worse as if we owe them something; don’t select pick up if you don’t want to pick up!! this last one asked me to cancel after the two minute window passed, absolutely not!

Review Title: We used to use uber for food & ride a…
Review Body: we used to use uber for food & ride a lot but won’t be using them ever again. my partner ordered food for £33 to be delivered home but was sent to her workplace instead.we tried talkin to the driver & was willing to even pick up the food but we could not understand each other .. and he was extremely rude. we ended up ordering something from deliveroo that night.we tried getting a refund from uber but all we got was an automated message, saying sorry we cannot help. we tried talkin to a person but it was hopeless. they can keep my £33 but from now on it will be my local taxi & deliveroo or just eat

i was in oakland ca.  on thursday night i set an appointment to be picked up at 0250 friday morning.  it locked the appt/rate @$34,00.  half hour before pickup igot notices saying the rate i wanted wasn't available but rates at $122.00, $135.00, $106.00, etc.  were available.  when i rejected them, it told me no one was available at my rate.  then, because i hadn't canceled the pickup yet, it started sending them again.  i kept refusing. i was going 25 minutes away. my wife, in pa, ordered me a lift for $35.00.  they were there in 2 minutes and got me to my destination 5 minutes early.  guess thats why most uber drivers are also left drivers.  uber gouges their riders, screwing their drivers out of money.

you all fuc crazy. because they give you applications apps and now just complains like hell do you think driver give a fuk about youlo they selling the drug and when they finished we do our job so dont use as again ever in ur life and police can’t even catch this driver they look very innocent people most is the pakis and east europe driver. cant see me haha

Review Title: Uber is the company where steal…
Review Body: uber is the company where steal people's money without their concerns. and use drivers and riders like a slave. i have experienced both driver and customer, for the past 6 months uber has been charging me monthly 13usd from my australian bank i have shared my details more than8 times with uber still keep charging from my account until i have removed the cards.

i wouldn't even give 1 star.
charge me half the value for not even delivering the food. and taking 2 hrs to assign a driver.
totally disgusting service..... dont use this uber rubbish.

ordered was cancelled after waiting 30 mins no help line to call since it was cancelled only option chat box
they said the driver couldn’t find location yet they never called us
