i have an awful experience with this service when i choose payment with a card.
after a driver took my order, i watched him moving in another direction from me. firstly i thought it may be app bug, but in 15 minutes nothing changed, the driver didn't arrive and on map, he was even further from me than at first. to order a new car, you have to cancel first order and it was a card, they will take fees from you "as driver already on way to you".
so i have to use another taxi service and wait while this person will cancel order by himself.
and this happened to me several times and i started using only option "cash".

Review Title: UBER FORCED MY SICK DOG TO RIDE IN THE TRUNK If I could go lower I would
Review Body: if i could go lower i would. i had a very sick dog that i needed to get to the vet. i ordered an uber and paid the extra $5.00 for a “pet friendly” ride. when the car arrived the driver told me that he wanted no dogs inside his car. i was directed to place my very sick dog in the trunk!! i have attempted to contact uber to complain about this at least 3 times but have received little response from them. i got an email last night requesting more information. i responded by asking what they wanted to know. it’s absurd! i ordered a pet friendly vehicle, paid extra and was forced to put my dog in the trunk. what other information could you possibly need? i am livid at both the situation and my inability to talk directly to uber.

Review Title: Scheduled an Uber a day and a half…
Review Body: scheduled an uber a day and a half prior for a flight to the airport, i get up get ready, then check the status of the uber and it says my driver will arrive soon and gave me an estimated 6:50 and counting down.  about 8 minutes after the expected arrival time i get a notice that no driver has picked up the ride request, please reschedule.  so, they should have plenty of time to notify me, at least 30 minutes  before they should have emailed or texted me that they didn't have a driver.  bad enough you have a driver, worse that you didn't notify me until after the driver was supposed to be there and showed my driver was on the way. you definitely earned your 1 star rating, of course the thousands of reviews shows that, obviously you can't be trusted.

Review Title: Uber ARE absolutely scum of the earth
Review Body: uber are absolutely scum of the earth , they should never exist and should be driven out by the scottish, welsh and uk government . uber really deserve to be bankrupt as they done give a monkeys about their customers and partners all they are interested is the people's money and driver miseries  the quicker uber get the book thrown at them the better for the world it would be. fxxked cxxksuken jerkoffs!!!!!!!!

an absolute disaster when it comes to customer support.
i am unable to sign in (via email, facebook...) and the qa section does not cover this topic (it is not regarding forgotten password).
im not able to find any contact, any form, email, phone number, nothing.
and the last time i have used uber via my fried's app the car did not even show up (even though we called the driver twice!).
so far not so good.

i requested uber for work because my car wouldn't start. after 22 minutes of waiting the driver inexplicably cancelled. now i'm in danger of discipline. if uber would have said they can't pick me up i would have gotten another rideshare company. uber has consistently given terrible service in both the rideshare and food delivery apps!

Review Title: Yesterday issue confirms why I stopped using their services year ago!
Review Body: worst customer service system ever,  good luck trying to get a refund.  my driver took the longer route on my journey, he knew he made a mistake and was apologetic.  course i was charged £2.50 extra because of his mistake.  i dutifully raised with uber , and surprise surprise they took no liability and basically they said tough luck.  ‘nothing wrong here , yea drivers make mistakes but we are not obliged to give you a refund.  review our policies for clarification blah blah’. this is why i stopped using uber a year ago too many of these issues kept happening. my advice stay clear and use the other apps.

being a uber driver, i am not satisfied with fare. they hide actual amount which get from riders and then pay to us.specially nowadays, they charge for example 25$ from rider but when after drp off we see total shows around 17$ and from 17 they pay us after deduction all other services/taxes  this thing i confirmed from riders multiple times, totally unprofessional way. lyft is much better.  i'm seriously thinking to stop driving!!!

uber is a very horrible terrible service!!!!!! lyft is so much better!!!!! my issues with uber are never resolved! uber repeatedly charges more than what youre supposed to pay!!!!! on top of that, my driver did not return my item and i was charged for that!!!!!!!!!! my driver emptied out the trunk as i put my children in the house and he sped off before i could even check. i got home and was missing several items he supposedly didnt see. but yet i am being charged $15 and he did not even return all my items!!! its only been a week of using uber and i already hate it so much! bunch of thieves !!!!!!! there are more horror stories and no way to contact them. they make me late for work every day!!!!! i hate uber . lyft is so much better!

Review Title: Dishonest drivers or routinely adding extra fees
Review Body:
cab drivers always "take another route" and then add extra fee. happened everytime so far. even though i know the way and there's no obstructed roads.

deleted my account and never using again
uber has begun to suck. they take your money and then look for a driver but charge you 5bucks for cancellation.

i have been loyal customer of uber eats for a good while now. never had issues with food or drivers. however, i am charged €3.99 fee for delivery from restaurant that is 1km away and this totals to 4 min driving. delivery fee from little further restaurants i(distance 1.2 km and 1.7 km) is €0.49c. i have paid almost €300 in delivery fees for last year. i find that information on uber eats app saying "this restaurant is nearby so delivery fee is...." is misleading as i am actually charged fortune for delivery from nearest restaurant.
i have tried numerous attempts to contact some rep but to no luck. emails that i came across are not monitored. messenger returned my enquiry with useless link.

Review Title: Such a worst service these cowherds…
Review Body: such a worst service these cowherds doesn't have complaint number also no helpline number ..drivers cancell trip and asks you direct money instead of uber pay .worst service from consumer end ..just they are here to loot people only with the name of service charge ... fckn cheap trics and looting ..just i un installed this creepy service ...soon all people will kick out uber

i had an uber scheduled to go to the airport 6+ hours in advance. i was waiting outside for my driver and it took them until a minute after my scheduled drive to tell me that there were no available drivers. i missed my flight thanks to uber!!!! they deserve nothing!!!!!!! and i will no longer be using them. downloading lyft rn. i mean it’s ridiculous that they can’t give me any notice???👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻🙅🏻‍♀️🚕🤢🤚🏻

Review Title: Driver and service were fine. The charge a nightmare!
Review Body:
driver and service were fine.
estimated charge 40.00 to 49.00. actual charge 188.++. yes, one hundred eight eight dollars snd some cents!! reason “surge”.
after about an hour i found a way to contact uber via email and complain. gave me a credit of 145.00 to uber cash! i want the credit to my credit card. really think i’m gonna use this rip off service again. this is horrendous. beware, walk if you have to but don’t use uber!

horrible for drivers also, it’s so hard to get into contact with them and they are never helpful not to mention all the issue with the app; but i guess they don’t care because they know people will still use their services at the end of the day. what a joke and honestly so rude.

Review Title: 1 star only because it's as low as the…
Review Body: 1 star only because it's as low as the scale will go. scheduled a ride to the airport a day in advance.  app told me my ride was scheduled and driver was arriving.  counted down on the timer till it was time for them to arrive, then was told there were no cars available.  will never use uber again.  had to find another ride.  missed my flight and cost me several hundred dollars.  thanks uber

should have zero stars and have your license revoked nationwide! drivers cancel (4 drivers in a row this morning) but all of them charged for a non existent journey! uber will only refund in credit so they have a nice my money sitting in their bank account instead of mine! rip off.

Review Title: I accepted a 3 mile ride at 14.00 but charged 57.00
Review Body: i accepted a 3 mile ride at 14.00. uber driver was there at the projected time, took 15 minutes to get to the restaurant. the next day i was charged 57.00 because they told me the next day it was high volume of calls and i should of had push notification on. well, i did and guess what, i was not told my ride went from 14.00 to 57.00. i would of never took the ride at 5:30pm. they credited my uber account 47.00 dollars. but they stole 47.00 from my bank account. they refuse to give me back the money they stole from me. why the heck would i call uber again? i don’t trust them, they stole from me and refuse to give me back my money. i need a lawyer.

Review Title: F u c k you and your customer service

ride matching and driver arrival estimation is a fu***ng joke. i had drivers cancelling when they were 50m away, after waiting for 10 minutes.

Review Title: I scheduled a 4:55A uber to airport
Review Body: i scheduled a 4:55a uber to airport.  i stated receiving notifications that that uber would be there at 4:52. then it changed to 4:56.  then changed to 5:11, and went on like that until 5:20 still saying 5 mins away. i attempted to text driver and call him with no response or answer.  ride was supposed to cost $19.77. i ended up canceling,  reordering. uber came at 5:40 and cost me $58!  i almost missed my flight! don't brother trying to call uber directly.  they don't even have a number listed! i attempted to contact thru app but after 3 attempts they never returned response!

Review Title: Terrible, unsafe, didn't take me do you know my address
Review Body: driver tried to dump me out on a different street from my address. then he said he wasn't allowed to drive on the street that the address was on but uber didn't tell me that and i didn't know where i was going. when i refused to get out of the vehicle until he took me to my address he got mad and tore out of there down the street he said he wasn't allowed to drive on went around the corner and ended up going the wrong way down a one-way street at which point in time he burned a u-turn in the middle of the street and tore down that street, and ended up back where we started, opened the door of the van and locked it open and walked away, going into the store on the corner. i doubt i'll ever use uber again.

Review Title: Got charged 83$ for a ride from…
Review Body:
got charged 83$ for a ride from brunswick to south yarra on a cheap suzuki swift car and a stinky driver!
bloody rip off

Review Title: Worst drivers with dirty cars and  arogants,
Review Body:
worst driver with dirty cars arogants frequently refuse the trip if have some shoppings .even if u are on main route they expect cross the street with baby in ur arms.
just rubish drivers .never use uber again

Review Title: They employ dodgy drivers who take you…
Review Body: they employ dodgy drivers who take you the long way round, mostly from overseas where these practises are deemed acceptable... the usual sort... he even asked "which way do you want to go?" what a silly question to ask your customer. he conveniently took us miles out of our way and had the audacity to charge us £30 for a 8-10 mile journey! complained to uber and we did get part of our money back. should have only been £18.00!!  rip off merchant!

Review Title: This was the MOST HORIFIC experience…
Review Body: this was the most horific experience i've ever had. booked a ride to the airport. the driver went to wrong address to pick me up. once he realized what he had done he canceled the ride. then they had the gall to charge a cancelation fee.

Review Title: Uber has the worst customer service
Review Body: uber has the worst customer service. the driver did not come to the pickup location, instead he went to the dropoff location. i spent the past hour trying to get ahold of someone but they said there is not much they can do because he went to the dropoff location. they said i had to cancel the ride if he was going to the dropoff location. well how is anyone supposed to know that?? there is no phone support or anything. i called the driver 3 times and he still kept going. such a scam!!

Review Title: Uber treats its drivers like crap
Review Body: uber treats its drivers like crap. my wife has been driving for them for over 3 years and they suspend her account to run a random background in middle of pandemic costing her money with complete disregard to our situation. i don't know why people drive for uber chose someone else to make money.

Review Title: Uber Driver Support Lacks Comprehension, Competence and Investigative Skills
Review Body: i signed up as an uber driver, submitted the necessary documents and background check in november 2020 and to this date, they have the background check in pending status. each time i escalate the issue whether via phone, email, or message, their agents repeat the same things, either: you are missing documents or i have to resubmit the back. they fail to investigate the real issue, to pay attention to my screenshots and do not take into consideration that they never submitted my background check per checkr. i have told at least more than 20 agents that the app does not allow me to resubmit or cancel a background check because it stays in a lock mode that prevents changes. their staff are incompetent in handling, investigating and escalating rather simple issues. it has been an utter waste of time going back and forth with uber because their foreign agents lack the comprehension and competence to resolve issue. on top of that, i am always told to wait 3-5 days for escalation and then never hear anything but the same crap that they automatically say like some automated robots. this is beyond unprofessional, very frustrating and really absurd at the end of the day.

if i could rate this zero stars, i would because frankly
a) customer service is not up to scratch here - got some my food order delivery sent to me on top of my mailbox where this is prone to snatch by thiefs instead of upstairs and ringing doorbell. every home has a different set up.
b) drivers have poor english - please make sure you do a test before they drive to find out how knowledgeable they are in language.

Review Title: The app and backend are terrible
Review Body: the app, backend, and customer service are terrible. i tried to reactivate my account with them and they ended up transferring a completely different uber driver account to my uber rider account ( we shared the same first and last name but had different phone numbers and email addresses) and then could not resolve the issues for hours because the agents were confused. obviously have a terrible it system if this can so easily happen. app constantly crashes. little to no choices as support ticket options when trying to contact them. all they do is ask for screenshots of your issue when emailing their support and do not actually read what is sent to them.

Review Title: Would have left zero if possible.
Review Body: would have left zero if possible.  took my money when their driver cancelled, then proceeded to hold onto my money despite saying they would refund. no actual useful customer service staff as they give stock answers that aren't actually related to the issue at hand.

Review Title: Commission for drivers is so high, inhumane during this time when work is sparse
Review Body: awful to hear about the high commission you still charge the drivers when work is so sparse during this time. it is inhumane, something must be done to compensate and the commission needs to be lowered before i use uber again.
they tell me they will pay me extra and it almost never happens.  all they want is you to rate them so now i give 1 stars all the time.  they also love to waste drivers time and money.

Review Title: Not good company to work for
Review Body: not good company to work for , they are using drivers as slaves,

Review Title: Did not do anything about driver taking…
Review Body: did not do anything about driver taking a longer route

don't pay drivers very well. the support contact us useless they aren't wanting to help
just avoid using them it's the only safe way for you to not be out of pocket.

i live in st. joseph missouri. need more uber drivers available. very difficult to get a driver available between 12:00pm and 12.30 pm, and also not usually any drivers available during the evening time typically between 8pm-9:30pm. otherwise, next to little complaints about the drivers that pick me up!

Review Title: Democrats beware! Concerned for my safety
Review Body:
so this just happened to me:
i called an uber for a $12 trip from my house to my car dealership to pick up my car from there. i get into the uber car and silence. uber driver is wearing a usa flag mask so i’m thinking -oh a republican that doesn’t like latinos thats why- .... because my friends since trumpism started i can see and feel the descrimination towards me in some people, more than ever before in my 21 years in this country.
a few minutes passed and first thing that comes out of his mouth is “are you from here?” i wasn’t surprised lol
to what i replied “what do you mean from here?” you know like how can you tell i’m not? 🤷🏻‍♀️
we were able to have a good short conversation about the countries he had been to including mine and he ended up talking about venezuela and from there ramping about how this country is heading that way with dictatorship and socialism. at that moment i decided to just listen and not respond. he continued and mentioned moving to costa rica because of the socialism in this country. so as my trip is ending i said to him “good luck in costa rica, you have a great country here”. well because of my comment that let him know i guess that i’m a democrat and don’t agree with his views he added an extra $80 charge to my trip for “cleaning” because i caused a mess in his car.... so i ended up paying $92! now i’m worried about my safety as i see all the violent ways extremists have been acting lately and this man knows exactly where i live. of course i called uber made a report. i hope they solve this soon, give me my money back but still they cannot guarantee my safety. if anything happens to me or my family you all know who did it, i’m posting a picture of him and his info. talk about socialism and he practically just stole $80 from me just because i told him his, our country is great! so if you get in his car, do not talk about politics! i hope uber suspends him for the safety of all democrats that need an uber.

Review Title: Very bad service uber drive refused to…
Review Body:
very bad service uber drive refused to drop me at door if single girl booked a cab her main purpose to booked the cab for her safety and driver responsibility to drop her at home not on road but uber driver said they don't allow to go in the streets...
it's too much bad service don't go for uber

i sent an uber to pick up my dad & he was extremely rude! he dropped him off at the wrong location & asked my dad where the house is when he has a gps to guide him! my dad has a hard time seeing at night so he couldn’t see the street sign. he demanded him to get off and my sister and i had to go walking up the block to find him!!!! what kind of a dumbass would do that!? only his dumb a$$! i’m super disappointed with this driver and he doesn’t deserve to work for uber if he wants to treat a rider like that. he got good reviews but i think it’s all bull$h!t! his name is devin. i hope he loses his job, it’s frustrating to know someone would do that. i’m not happy & will not let this sit!!! if i can post his picture i would! uber fire him!!!!!!

Review Title: Drivers cancelling my order because they forgot to pick it up
Review Body: drivers cancelling my order after waiting an hour and showing 'in transit'. not the first time this has happened. the restaurant said they never picked up the order and wouldn't send another driver to pick it up.

Review Title: Uber is horrible I honestly don’t know…
Review Body: uber is horrible i honestly don’t know how is it still in business the driver take forever ! i could give 10 mins away an they take the long way an more then 20 mins for a 5 min drive unbelievable honestly my food always comes cold ! it’s ridiculous then theh don’t even check the orders to see if it’s correct so now u have cold food . and the order isn’t even correct an u have an automatic tip for 3.99 bro this is the biggest scam ever i hate it

Review Title: If you ever think about being a Uber…
Review Body: if you ever think about being a uber driver don’t do it because they do not care nothing about you!! a few weeks back i caught covid , i was told i could be compensate for the 14 days of me not working and they still have yet called me back or say anything about it because they don’t care nothing about us!!

was disgusted, outraged, now nervous about my health & safety the driver siegie picked my up in the nastiest,  most unsanitary car i have ever seen. he was basically living in his car! pajama pants, passenger seat full of food, trash, and other debris in back seat. as i was approaching the car, i was praying he wasn't there for me! he nodded his head toward backseat & said "put your bags in the seat next to you" didn't offer to even open the trunk! when i reported they sent an auto response and said " sorry" i you had to endure that. let us know how we can help! ridiculous! i will be contacting the bbb, as they have no way to speak to someone on a phone. i asked for an email to send pictures.    still waiting!!! uuuuugh!

lying staff and drivers. driver dropped me off and left the fare running. then made up lies and got me removed off the app. no common sense or logic in understanding customers view point. no wonder their reviews are so bad!!!! won't be long till they are out of business.

warning - do not order food, they’re not responsible for own drivers and useless system so they not refund if your food come open or stone cold. check road before you drive and fair as they will take you around and add the cost.

lucky i can’t give them a zero. my driver took me the wrong route, lying about the usual route being closed. i was then charged triple for my journey and was only told of this after my trip. i complained about this to uber only for them to say they’d look into it and take the obscene amount of money out of my bank. i phoned up twice and haven’t got anywhere, safe to say i won’t be using them again.

Review Title: Would give zero stars if I could
Review Body: would give zero stars if i could. i booked a scheduled trip and received email confirmation of the book. 20 minutes before the driver was due to arrive i checked the app and saw it was cancelled. i rang the so called “customer support” who could give me any reason why it had been cancelled or why i’d not received an email advising me of the cancellation. their suggestion? book another “on demand” trip which by that stage had a 30 minute wait and would have made me late. needless to say i used another company. i’ve deleted the app and will never use uber again.

Review Title: Too many bad drivers, bad Customer Service
Review Body:
too many bad drivers who get lost, changes route and overcharge, never show up, goes to wrong pick up spots. when you report at customer service they might refund you a couple of times and then they wiill state that you already been refunded many times so does not matter what happened and it`s not your fault they will keep your money!
i had a driver last time who never showed up, canceled on me and they charged me $12.55 for that!!
had to call lyft for another $28 and wait 10 more minutes in super cold weather with 2 big bags.

Review Title: I don't recommend uber at all
Review Body: i don't recommend uber at all.  on my last trip i forgot some expensive sunglasses in the car.  and the driver refuses to give them back to me, he stole my sunglasses.  and uber doesn't give me any kind of solution, when they should see what kind of drivers they have.  it is a danger to the community.  i feel ripped off.

uber is worst service .
drivers will take cash amount from customer and they will cancel the trip .

use ola that is best service.

Review Title: I been driver uber for 5 year and thank…
Review Body: i been driver uber for 5 year and thank god i just found a good job, uber is not a real job and this is the only company in the world the cut the rates to drivers instead make is feel better plus passenger are cheap here on massachusetts

rude, inexperienced, mcp drivers , who threaten women
with nasty behaviour
a severe action should be taken for such third grade people and services

i’m a driver for uber, their customer support beyond sucks, they get people from india they don’t understand english and in the background sometimes you can hear a rooster, that’s how professional these people are, i want to deal with american people that understand english they actually help you which they don’t, it’s embarrassing to even say i work for them

i’m very disappointed with uber's services.  in the morning, tired after work, i waited to get home.  several drivers nearby and no one wants to accept the transport order.  finally, when after 10 minutes one driver graciously accepted the order, i waited another 10 minutes for him, where he was nearby.  i called to ask about the cancellation and the driver tells me he's on his way but not where it needs to be.  complete shock and total lack of professionalism.

Review Title: I had an Uber driver tell me that he…wanted me to suck his dick
Review Body: i had an uber driver tell me that he wouldn’t take me to the address i wanted to go to unless i sucked his dick. a few months later i got denied from being a driver for uber eats because i got a reckless driving a motorcycle. i would rather have someone drive fast on a motorcycle than someone that tried to rape women. uber does not really vette drivers.

Review Title: 20 min waiting in cold for the ride to be canceled by the driver
Review Body: i requested a ride, a driver confirmed, the time left was changing to shorter and again to longer. i’ve been waiting for 20 min in cold, when the driver canceled the ride.

my family and i are here in panama city beach, florida and we have no car. as we understand the rules, regulations, and guidelines to wear masks in ubers, we abide by these rules. kristen in panama city beach, florida turned us in for not having one on. here’s the issue i have with that:
she gave us juice, water, and snacks to eat while in the car. i even asked her if i could. were we suppose to eat with our masks on? if we were suppose to wait until we got to our destination then she should have told us that. so if these uber drivers offer you a bottled water, do not accept it, it is a scam, they want to turn you in for ‘not wearing a mask’ so they can get more money.
happy new year to all.

the driver collected an expensive lunch for my parents from a bakers on my mums birthday ordered by my neice from maastricht.

both my parents had covid over christmas they couldn't see their grandchildren and this was a real nice surprise for them.

the notification came though saying it's been collected, then another saying it could not be delivered. then another saying it's been returned to the shop. all lies, what makes it worse is stealing from a little bakers after the year they've had is disgusting.

deleted the app as have my brother sister and cousins, you'll lose more than us.

disgusting company
